28b6(rgyud): spang dpal ngal ma dang cing ma bsdams pa'i tshig smras te/ sdig pa'i lta bar song ba bzung nas/ ngas khyed sdig pa'i lta bar song ba de las kur thar bar byas ste rab tu byung ba
28b7(rgyud): nga tshun chad khyed kyis sangs rgyas brgya song mang po la bsnyen bkur byas te/ de dag la mchod pa dang / rim gro byas/ de dag las chos mnyam te// smon lami btab nas pha rol
28b8(rgyud): hUM phyin pa dag spyod do// khyed lus dang / ngag dang / yid kyi nyes par spyad pa'i las nga sngon bskal pa du mar ngan song gsum du sdug bsngal myong ngo // las kyi sgrib pa de nyid kyis
29a1(rgyud): / da ltar bdud sdig can gyi gnasu skyeso// rin po che tog gi gzungs sngoran byung ba'i le'u 'di bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas bshad pa na/ bdud kyi
29a2(rgyud): tshe lnga brgya tsam de dag bung med kyi dngos po ma snang bar gyur nas/ skyes pa'i dngos por gyur te/ mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa pog// lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas
29a3(rgyud): po'i skye dgu'i sems can bya ba khrag khrig brgya stong grangs med dpag tu meng ba dag gis ni/ bla na meng pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed de/ bla na mad
29a4(rgyud): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par gyur to// de bzhin du sems can bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong grang sa med dpag tu med pa dag ni/ nyan thos dang
29a5(rgyud): sangs rgyas kyi zag pa las phyir mi ldog par gyur to/ lha dang mi'i bu mo grangs meng dpag tu med pa dag ni/ dmad kyi dngos po las gyur te/ skyes pa'i da
29a6(rgyud): bo rnying ngo // 'dus pa chen po rin po che tig gi gzungs las sngon byung ba'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o// // de nas rin po me tog gi gzungs 'di de bzhin gshegs pa
29a7(rgyud): shAkya phub pas bshad pa de'i tshe/ thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'di rgya cher snang bas khyab par gyur te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di na gling bzhi pa
29a8(rgyud): ba phrag brgya gang yod pa de dag na 'dod pa'i dbang phyug bdud bye ba phrag brgya gang dag bdud byed pa de dag sangs rgyas kyi mthus ngogs pa skyes te/ snang ba chen po 'di gang
29b1(rgyud): nas byung zhes gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di la lta zhing bdud sdig can zhes bya ba gang gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams na den gnas pa de bdag cag pas sto
29b2(rgyud): che zhing dbang che la mthu chen po 'ang de'i mthu 'am snyam nas/ de nas bdud de dag gis bltas na// bdud sdig can de mya ngan gyi khang pa na 'dug cing yid rab tu mi dga'
29b3(rgyud): de mthong ngo // de nas bdud bye ba phrag brgya po de dag gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di dag ga la ba dang / bdud sdig can gyi khang pa ga la ba der dong ste phyin nas/ bdu
29b4(rgyud): sdig can la 'di skad ces smraso// kye 'dod pa'i dab nga phyug ci'i phyir thams cad dang ldan pa'i gling bzhi pa'i 'dzi garten gyi khams 'di snang ba byas nas/ khyod
29b5(rgyud): mya ngan gyi khang par zhugs te 'dug/ nga nas 'dod pa'i dbang phyug gi bdud bye ba phrag brgya pho de dag la rgyas pa ra smra ba/ kye grogs po dag shes par gyis
29b6(rgyud): shig/ shAkya'i rigs las shin tu g.yo dang sbyar ldan pa'i dge sbyong zhig 'dir skyes te/ de skyes ma thag tu ba dang ldan pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di snang bar byas/ 
29b7(rgyud): tug mos par byas/ 'khrug par byas te/ bsngangs par byaso// 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa 'di na/ mkhas pa gang su tshangs pa'i dbang po 'am/ klu'i dbang po 'am/ 
29b8(rgyud): gnod sbyin gyi dbang po 'am/ lha ma yin gyi dbang po 'am/ lto 'phye chen po'i dbang po 'am/ mamakha' lding gi dbang po 'am/ mi 'am ci'i dbang po nas gzhan yang mi dang
30a1(rgyud): mi ma yin pa'i bar du mkhas pa su yang rung / de dag thams cad de la mchod pa'i phyir dong ngo // lo drug gi bar du gcig pu gnyi su med par 'dug ste ma
30a2(rgyud): nyid med pa'i sgyu ma bsgrubs pas kho bos kyang rang gi spobs kur bstan par 'dod na/ sde dang g.yog bye ba phrag sum cu rtsa drug dang / de'i drung du dong ste/ kun tu bskor nas bdu
30a3(rgyud): kyi stobs dang / rnam par 'phrul pa dang / rdzu 'phrul dang / brtson 'grus dang / pha rol gnon pa thams cad bstan kyang de'i spyi'i khung bu gcog kyang spangs shing 'jig par bya ma
30a4(rgyud): nus na/ stan de las bskyod pa lta ci smos/ ba gegs gzhan bya bar ga la nus te/ mngangs gsum des de lta bu'i sgyu shin tu bstan cing / sa g.yo bar byas pas/ kha
30a5(rgyud): zo sde dang bcas te/ pham nas shing bcad pa bzhin du sa'i steng du lhung ngo // de der 'dug steng 'dra ba'i mtshan nyid med pa'i sgyu ma bsgrubs nas/ 'di ltar ba du
30a6(rgyud): kyi yul thams cad zil gyis mnan te rig pa bsgrubs nas stan de las langs te/ sems can rnams la rab tu bstan nas gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'din son
30a7(rgyud): su mkhas shing shes pa de dag kyang de lta bu'i sgyu mas bdun par byas te/ de dag gis sems dang 'gro ba drug tu skye ba dang / 'gro ba yang kho bos ma sheso// gang dag de la
30a8(rgyud): skyab su dong ba dag gis spu'i khung chu gcig tsam yang spangs pa dang 'khrug pangar kho bos byed mi nus na/ nga las slu ba 'am/ bskyod par lta ga la nus/ dang kho ba'i rnam/ 
30b1(rgyud): mo lnga brgya dang / bu nyi khri'i tshogs kyi 'khor dang bcas te dge sbyong go'u ta ma dang ngal skyabasu dong nas/ chos nyan pa'i phyir de'i mdur na 'khod do// kho bos de dag dang 'bral ma nus// 
30b2(rgyud): phyir stobs dang ldan pa/ shes rab dang ldan pa/ dbang phyug dang ldan pa khyed kho bo'i grogs gyis shig/ shAkya'i bu mdangs de srog dang bra'o// de la sems can gang dag skyabasu dong
30b3(rgyud): ba de dag thams cad kyang rnam par gzhig par bya'o// dge sbyong g.yo spyi can nag pa'i phyogs pham par byas te/ bdud kyi phyogs dkar po snang bar byas la/ de phyir chang bde ba gnas
30b4(rgyud): par bya'o// de nas bdud me 'od ces bya bas 'dzam bu'i gling 'di gang nang bzhin gshegs pa bzhugs shing chos 'chad pa la bltas pa dang / de nas bdud ma 'od kyis
30b5(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kyi sku mabo pa/ sgra dbyu sa dang ldan pa'i chos bstan pa thoso// thos nas de spu zing zhes byed cing spangs par gyur te/ de nas nges bdud sdig
30b6(rgyud): can de la'adi skad ces smra so// ma lus zhing na 'di ni gzugs bzang mchog/ bsod nams shes pas ring nas gnas gtsang ste/ nyon mongs rnam grol lam ldan yun ra
30b7(rgyud): lon// srid pa kun zad mya ngan rnams las par/ khyod yang mi rigs khro bo'i dbang ma 'gro// gtso mchog 'di ni srong ba gsum na skyabs// 'di la zhe sdang cung zad su bskyed pa/ 
30b8(rgyud): nga ni rmongs shing bde ba nyams par 'gyur// de las gzhan yang bdud mu khyud bzang po zhes bya bas bdud sdig phan la 'di skad ces smra so// nga ni 'phrul chen bsod nams rab
31a1(rgyud): kyi mtshan// mi gnas 'gro ba kun las rab tu bar// sdug bsngal ma lus zad pa'i lam ston pa// bdud brgya kun gyis gtse bar bya mi nus// sdig can gyis
31a2(rgyud): smras pagang yi skye bo dag la dbang byas te// khyod kyi skye bo 'di yang de dbang 'gro/ de yis ring por mi thogs yul spongs byeng // yu bu cag kyang gang du 'gro bar 'gyur// de nas bdud
31a3(rgyud): nags kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba nges 'di skad ces smra so// khyod ni rab tu 'byor par gyur pa'i tshe// de nas khyod kyis rang gi dpa' ba bstan// de na rab tu dpung nyams re chang na// de ring ci
31a4(rgyud): phyir thams cad mkhyen la sngo// bdud ral gri zla ba zhes bya ba nges 'di skad ces smras// da ni su la'ang yid kyis khro ba mang // mi gnas de ni bsam pa nyid kyis gtsang // 
31a5(rgyud): gsum dag las bar cig 'gro bar rgyu// de lag zhan gyis bsad par mi nuso// sdig can gyis smras pa/ dong khams 'di na sa na gang 'khong pa// 'dod la
31a6(rgyud): chags shing rgyal dregs pas myos// de dag gang phyir rtag 'bring phyag bstan te// de dag tshigs pas ci phyir de mi song // de nas bdud sa chu zhes bya ba des 'di skad ces smras// 
31a7(rgyud): snying po med cing sgyu ma smig rgyu 'drar// dngos po kun shes sred pa rnam par brtul// srid bar ma chags na mkha'i ngo bo nyid// de la 'gegs byed nus par ga la 'gyur// sdig pan
31a8(rgyud): gyis smras pa/ mi yi 'jig rten 'di na de yang yod// bza' btung zhim po sman dang gos bstan cing // tshor ba gsum yang de yi sems la yod// ci'i phyir de la brlag par bya mi nus
31b1(rgyud): bdung sring spong zhes bya ba des 'di skad ces smras// sdug can lto 'bru chen po rnams kyis mi// rdzu 'phrul bdag cag yul na ci yod pa// ngor 'grub 'phrul la cha shas mi rig ma// de la
31b2(rgyud): ji ltar brlag par bya bar nus// sdig can gyis smras gangs ni de la zan bcang byas// de la rdo ba dag kyang 'phangs// de bzhin mi snyan tshig smras nas// gnas ngag nas kyang ba
31b3(rgyud): tu bskyod // bdud shes mig bya ba nges 'di skad ces smra so// khyod kyi gang tshed la bgegs byas te// de ni khros pas cung zad 'tshig pa 'am// khyong la khro gnyer bzhin yang ba
31b4(rgyud): byas sam// de las khyod kyi tshig ngan mngon thogs sa ma// sdig can gyis smras pa/ de ni so sor brtags pas rtag tu bzod// 'dod chags spangs shing zhe sdang ba
31b5(rgyud): mug bral// de ni sems can kun la byams sem sa ldan// 'dra bar sprid pa la yang de brta go// bdud thub bka 'a zhes bya ba des 'di skad ces smraso// kun sbyor
31b6(rgyud): gsum gyi zhags pas gang bcings pa// nga la bdag cag nan tan bgegs bya mong // ngas ni skyon dang gti mug zhags pa spangs// de la ji ltar brlag par bya bar nus
31b7(rgyud): sdig can gyis smras pa/ stobs thob khyad cag nga yi grogs yin te/ khyed rnams bag yod byos la de'ur chos// bang phyogs ri yi phreng ba dang // sa 'di ma lus byin gyis
31b8(rgyud): chur brlab bo// mkha' las mi bzang rtug pa'i brag char dang // lcags kyi phye ma'i phung po rab tu dbab// lcags mnga' mdung thung spu gri mnga' bo che// nga lus phye mar brlags
32a1(rgyud): cing dbab par bya// kud nas rab tu rno ba'i rdo rje dang // mdung bung ral gri be ba rnams phab la// 'bar ba mngon 'phangs sbyor ba de dag gis// shAkya'i bu thal bar brlag par bya// 
32a2(rgyud): de bzhin du bdud bye ba'i bar du thams cad kyis tshig su bcad pa smraso// de nas bdud de dag thams cad kyis// mgror gcig tu 'di skad ces smras// de bzhin 'dong bar bgyi'o// nga dang
32a3(rgyud): gnas nas go bgos la// sde dang g.yog tu bcas te 'dong ngo // bdag cag gi rdzu 'phrul dang // stobs kyi yul de dag thams cad bstan pa ri nA bA na// dge sbyong go'u ta ma de rtsal ci
32a4(rgyud): ganga'i modo la rab tu ston te/ khyod rang gis rig par 'gyuraro// de nas bdud bye ba rang gi gnasu dong nas/ go bgos te bdud bye ba re re zhing // yang g.yog stong stong ya
32a5(rgyud): rnam pa mang po gyon pa lag cha sna tshogs pa/ go rnam pa sna tshogs bgos pa ngag dang chas te/ de'i nub mo 'das nas/ dzam bu gling 'di byin te/ yul e g+ha ma g+ha d+ha'i drang
32a6(rgyud): tha~Md kyi na mkha' la 'khod nas/ gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri ba dang / lha ma yin dang / mi 'am tsaM dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / yi dgas dang / 
32a7(rgyud): sha za dang / grul bum gang dag bcom ldan 'das la sems ma dad cing gus par bya bar yid la byed pa med par 'gyur la/ chos dang dge 'dun la'ang sems ma dang ba yod pa de dag
32a8(rgyud): thams cad bdud sdig can gyis bcom ldan 'das dgongasu bcug nas de dag kyang lag cha dang / go cha sna tshogs dang chas te/ de nyid na 'khod do// bdud sdig can ri dbang phyug
32b1(rgyud): chen po'i gzugasu bsgyur nas/ drang srong skar ma la dga' ba zhes bya ba dbang phyug chen po la dad pa/ rig pa'i gnas bco brgyad kyi pha rol tu phyin pa/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pha rol tu son pa g.yo/ 
32b2(rgyud): lnga brgya yod pa/ gangs kyi ri'i ngos la gnas pa de'i mdun du 'dug ste/ 'od skad ces smra so// go'u ta ma'i rigs las skyes pa'i drang srong mchog/ mkhas shing mngon par shes pa
32b3(rgyud): la gnas// oM g+ha ma g+ha d+han de 'dug de ring ni/ rgyal po'i khab tu nges par bsod snyoms spyod/ brtan por sna tshogs gsal ba'i gtam rnams kyis// de nyid khong du lhan ci/ 
32b4(rgyud): smra bar byos// des khyod mngon shes dbang po lnga po dang / gdon mi za bar rab tu thob par 'gyur// de nas bdud sdig can gyis tshig su bcad pa 'di dag smras te/ 
32b5(rgyud): nyid du mi snang bar gyur nas/ rang gi gnasu dong ste/ rang gi 'khor gyi bdud rnams la bsgo ba/ ngas dang mi ma chungs blo bsams ci 'dra ba nga las khyod nyon cig/ 
32b6(rgyud): bdud yul bdud kyi dregs cher 'joms pa'i rgyu mi ston par// rdzu 'phrul mthu dang ldan de shAkya'i bu la rang dgar smra// de rtag tshig 'jam slob ma ngag la bu la ma byams ban
32b7(rgyud): de yi slob ma rgyags spangs gdon mi za bar snga dra mi// grong khyer dag tu g.yeng ba med par mthar gyis rgyu ba na// nga dag glu gar skar mchog tshul gyis rang dgar myur du bzung // nga bos
32b8(rgyud): shAkya'i khyu mchog ci nas ying spro med par bya// bdud gzhan zhig gis smras pa/ glang chen rnga mo seng ga ma he stag gtum sgra drag dbyang dus kyi// 'brug sgra 'byor pa lta bu dram grong
33a1(rgyud): de'i phyi rol myur sprul te// bdag cag lag cha mtshon thogs gdug pa ngo mtshar mngon sum des mthong ma// bslang cing mi dran rdzu 'phrul sosbyor te de nas pa dang
33a2(rgyud): phyogasu 'gro// bdud gzhan zhig gis smras pa/ lam srang bzhi mdo rta babs dag na mi sdug gdong mangs 'khod// sna tshogs mtshon rnon mnga' chen mnga' zhags brla dgas ral gri
33a3(rgyud): thogs// na mkha' las kyang mtshon tsha'i sgra drag sprin las lce yang 'bebs// de nas sa g.yos 'jigs pas dbang med myur du ma rungs 'gyur// bdud de dag gis bdud kyi yul
33a4(rgyud): gyi stobs dang // rnam par sprul pa ji lta ba bzhin du thams cad rgya cher byaso// bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang thams cad dang lnga dpa'i stong gsum gyi spong chen po'i 'jig rten
33a5(rgyud): gyi khams 'di rdo rjer byin gyis brlabs nas/ bdud kyi sma ya nga mi 'byin phyogs bzhin me dang ri'ang med/ sprin nag yang med/ dus ma yin pa'i rlung yang med de/ 
33a6(rgyud): sangs rgyas kyi stobs dang byin gyis klu gang yang tha na char thigs pa gcig tsam yang mo 'bab so// yang de'i tshe nyan thos chen po bzhi snga dro'i chos gos dang sham thabs
33a7(rgyud): bgos/ lhung bzed bogs nas rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen por bsod snyoms kyi phyir zhugs te/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu grong khyer gyi lho phyogs kyi spro nas rgyal
33a8(rgyud): bo'i khab kyis grong khyer chen por bsod snyoms kyi phyir zhugs pa dang / grong khyer gyi sgo de na bdud gzhon nu shin tu dar la bab pa/ byang bzhin bzang ba/ btsun ma'i cha byad 'dra ba
33b1(rgyud): lnga bcu klu len gar byed cing shin tu rgyug ste/ de dag gi lag pa gnyis kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la bzung nas/ srang du rgyug cing glu len gar byed de/ shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces sgra
33b2(rgyud): dge sbyong glu long shog/ dge sbyong gar byos shig/ shA ri'i bus ba/ grogs po dag khyed kyis sngon ma phos pa'i glu thos par byas nyon cig/ bdud gzhon nu de dag thams
33b3(rgyud): cad kyis bcom bsnyungs pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu rgyug cing glu'i dbyangs kyis 'di skad ces smra so// skye mched ngag gis shin tu cho ga/ skye mched dag gis bdag ca
33b4(rgyud): bslus// skye mched dag ni gsod pa ste// skye mched ngag gis mthar dbyung // phung po byas pas shin tu mchog/ phung po byas pas bdag cag bslus// phung po byas pas
33b5(rgyud): bdag cag gsod pa ste// phung po byas pas ngas mthar byung // 'di lta ste/ ba ha ra/ ba ha ra/ b+ha ra bA ha/ ma ri tsA ba ha/ sa t+ya ba ha/ A ma ba ha a swA hA/ 
33b6(rgyud): gnas brtan shA ri'i bu rgyub cing glu dbyangs kyi tshig su bcad pa'ang dag dang / gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag smras pa dang / de nas bdud gzhon nu lnga bcu po de dag shin tu
33b7(rgyud): dga' ste/ yid rab tu dang nas 'od skad ces smraso// mgon po bdag cag de ring bzod par gsol// 'gro ba'i gnyen gcig ston pa'i mchog khyod // phung po khyod kyi ji lta
33b8(rgyud): 'jigs bcas bshad // bdag cag de ltar rtag tu de mngon sum// bdud gzhon nu lnga bcu po de dag thams cad kyis// srang gis lus der tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu
34a1(rgyud): rkang pa la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ chos mnyan pa'i phyir de'i mdun du 'dug/ de nas mo'u dbul gyi za grong khyer gyi shar phyogs kyi sgo nas/ rgyal po'i kha kyi
34a2(rgyud): grong khyer chen por bsod snyoms kyi phyir zhugs pa dang / de nas yang bdud gzhon nu'i lnga bcu nas glu dbyangs kyi bar du ste/ 'od skad ces smras// khams nyid dag gis
34a3(rgyud): tu chog/ khams nyid ngag gis bdag cag bslus// khams nyid ngag ni gsong ba ste/ khams nyid bdag gis mabar dbyung // tshor ba dag gis shin tu chog/ tshor ba dag gis
34a4(rgyud): bdag cag bslus// tshor ba dag ni gsod pa ste// tshe ra ba bdag gis mngar dbyung // sems pa dag gis shin tu chog/ sems pa dag gis bdag cag bslus// sems pa dag
34a5(rgyud): ni gsod pa ste// sems pa bdag gis ma thar byung // 'du shes byas pas shin tu chog/ 'du shes byas pas bdag cag bslus// 'du shes byas pas gsod
34a6(rgyud): pa ste// 'du shes byas pas mthar dbyung // 'khor ba dag gis shin tu chog/ 'khor ba dag gis bdag cag bslus// 'khor ba dag gis gsod pa ste// 'khor ba bdag gi/ 
34a7(rgyud): mabar dbyung // 'di lta ste/ A ma ba A ma ba/ mA ra dza/ ra ra dza/ ha she mya thA/ shaM mya thA/ ga ga na ba swA hA// tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po rgyug cing glu dbyangs kyi tshig
34a8(rgyud): su bcad pa 'di dag dang / gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag smras pa dang / de nas bdud gzhon nu lnga bcu po de dag shin tu dga' ste/ yid rab tu dang ras 'di skad ces smra so// 'phrul ldan/ 
34b1(rgyud): sbas pa 'phags lam thub dbang sras// 'khor ba'i nyes la mnyam lha chos kyi sgron// sdig spangs bdag cag ri mo gus pa skyes// sangs rgyas chos mchog dag 'dun dang skyabs so
34b2(rgyud): bdud gzhon nu lnga bcu po de dag thams cad kyis srang gi dbus nger// tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po'i rkang pa la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ chos mnyan pa'i phyir de'i mdun
34b3(rgyud): 'dug/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa byams mi'i bu gang po grong khyer gyi byang phyogs kyi sgo nas/ rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen por bsod snyoms kyi phyir zhugs pa dang / de nas bdud gzhan
34b4(rgyud): lnga bcu nas gla dbyangs kyi bar du ste/ 'di skad ces smras// reg pa byas pas shin tu cho ga/ rag pa byas pa sa bdag cag bslus// reg pa byas pas gsod pa ste/ reg bya
34b5(rgyud): bdag gi mthar dbyung ngo // bdag po dag gis shin tu chog/ bdag po dag gis bdag cag bslus// bdag po dag ni gsod pa ste// bdag po bdag gis mthar dbyu/ 
34b6(rgyud): 'khor ba dag gis shin tu chog/ 'khor ba dag gis bdag cag bslus// 'khor ba dag ni gsod pa ste// 'khor ba bdag gis mabar dbyung // srid pa kun gyis shin tu chog/ sri
34b7(rgyud): pa kun gyis bdag cag bslus// srid pa kun ni gsod pa ste// srid pa kun ni ngas mthar dubyung // 'dod pa'i dga' bas shin tu cho ga/ 'dod ba'i dga' bas bdag cag bslus// 'dod
34b8(rgyud): ba'i dga' bas gsod pa ste// 'dod pa'i dga' ba ngas mthar dbyung // grogs dag cha 'di myur 'gro ste/ ri gzar chu drag mgyogs 'dra na// byis pa'i skye bos mi shes te// mi ma
35a1(rgyud): gzugs kyi dregs pas myos// de bzhin du spyad te/ mi mkhas smra yi dregs pas myos// mi mkhas dri yi dregs pas myos// mi mkhas ro yi dregs pas myos/ 
35a2(rgyud): mi mkhas reg gi dregs pas myos// grogs dag tshe 'di myur 'gro ste// ri gzar chu drag mgyogs 'dra na// byis pa'i skye bos mi shes te// mi mkhas chos kyi dregs pas myos// mi ma
35a3(rgyud): phung po'i dregs pas myos// mi mkhas khams kyi dregs pas myos// mi mkhas long spyod dregs pas myos// mi mkhas bde ba'i dregs pas myos// mi mkhas rigs kyi dregs pas
35a4(rgyud): myos// mi mkhas 'dod pa'i dregs pas myoso// grogs ngag tshe 'di myur 'gro ste// ri gzar chu drag mgyogs 'dra na// byis pa'i skye bos mi shes te// mi mkhas kun gyi dregs pas
35a5(rgyud): myos// 'di lta ste/ kha rga ba/ kharga ga/ kharga sa/ mud d+hi na/ a brta/ bi brta/ kha brte/ pra mAd+ha/ dz+yo tir brta/ swA hA/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa byams ma'i bu gang po rgyug cing
35a6(rgyud): dbyangs kyis bdud kyi bu rnams la tshigasu ba cad pa 'di dag dang / gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag smras pa da / de nas bdud gzhon nu lnga bcu po de dag shin tu dga' ste/ 
35a7(rgyud): rab tu dang nas 'di skad ces smraso// khams rnams sgyu ma smig rgyu 'dra ba dang // tshor ba'i 'jig rten rtog pas bskyed pa dang // zhi ba'i lam yang khyod kyis legs par bstan// mchog tu
35a8(rgyud): dkon mchog gsum la skyabasu mchi// bdud gzhon nu lnga bcu po de dag thams cad kyis srang gi dbus dor// tshe dang ldan pa byams ma'i bu gang po'i rkang pa la mgo bos phyag
35b1(rgyud): 'tshal te/ chos mnyan pa'i phyir de'i mdun du 'dugro// yang de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor nub phyogs kyi sgo nas/ rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen por bsod snyoms kyi phyir zhugs pa
35b2(rgyud): dang / grong khyer gyi sgo ngan bdung gzhon nu shin tu ngar la bab pa/ byang bzhin bzang ba/ btsun pa'i bu'i cha byang 'chang ba lnga bcu klu lan gar byeng cing / kun tu rgyu ba de dag gis lag pa
35b3(rgyud): gnyis kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la bzung nas srang du rgyug cing gA len gar byed de/ rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smraso// dge sbyong glu long shig/ dge sbyong gar byos shig/ rab
35b4(rgyud): 'byor gyis smras pa/ grogs po dag khyod kyi sa sngon ma thos pa'i glu thos par byas nyon cig de dag gos bcom bskyungs pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor rgyug cing
35b5(rgyud): byings kyis 'di skad ces smraso// dngos tha bde mi rtag sgyu ma chu bur bzhin 'dus byas g.yo ba'i rang ba zhin gang la'ang rtag pa med// smig rgyu mthong nas zhig bzhin
35b6(rgyud): la bar zug med// chos kun myur du 'jig par blo dang ldan pas shes// sdug bsngal chos gzir byams pa thams cad gar chags pa// reg kun sdug bsngal khur yin tshor ba
35b7(rgyud): ngag kyang meng // ji ltar dad pa byang chub lam sgom bsten byed pa// de ltar sdug bsngal kun thar byeng grogs gang yang med// chos kun mtshan nyid gcig ste 'du shes spangs pa da/ 
35b8(rgyud): bdag med ldan pas spyod kun rdzas kyi mtshan nyid bdag/ srog dang gso ba gang zag dang ni byed pa med/ bdud kyi g.yo dag thong la sems ni byang chub bsngos// nam mkha' glog bzhin
36a1(rgyud): dbang po dag la rnam shes byung // reg dang tshor dang sems pa thams cad bdag med de// tshul bzhin brtags na rdzas ni ci yang yod ma yin// byis pa'i snga
36a2(rgyud): bslus pas 'khrul 'khor bzhin du 'jug/ phung po thams cad tshul bzhin brtags na byed pa meng // yang dag mtha' ni stong zhing mtha' rnams kun dang bral// byang chub lam skyed
36a3(rgyud): des ni 'dren pas byang chub brnyes// rmongs byed chos 'di nyid ni chosu skyob pas gsungs// 'di lta ste/ su mun+de/ bi mun+de/ suny+dzi na/ si li/ si li/ si li/ a ba ha si li/ tathA
36a4(rgyud): tA si li/ b+hU ta ko Ti/ si li swA hA// tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor rgyug cing / glo'i dbyangs kyis tshigasu bcad pa 'di dag dang / gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag smras pa dang / de nas bdud
36a5(rgyud): gzhon nu lnga bcu po de dag shin tu dga' ste/ yid rab tu dang nas 'di skad ces smra so// sdig pa'i grog sa kyi dpa di dri'i chos mthos// gti mug mi shes rmongs
36a6(rgyud): pas sdig las ci bgyis pa// rgyal ba'i sra sa la bdag cag mngon sum dang bshags nas// 'gro la phe na phyir sangs rgyas nyid du smon dge 'debs// bdud gzhon nu lnga
36a7(rgyud): bcu po de dag tha~Md kyis srang gi dbus dang / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyi rkang pa la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ chos mnyan pa'i phyir de'i mdun du 'dug/ yang de'i tshe na sangs rgyas kyi
36a8(rgyud): mthus srang de dpag tshad brgya tsam du go skabs yang bar snang ste/ srang de'i dbus na gnas brtan shA ri'i bu ni byang phyogasu bltas te 'dug/ mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po ni nub phyogasu
36b1(rgyud): 'anas te 'dug gang ba ni lha phyag su bltas te 'ag rab 'byor ni shar phyag su bltas te 'dug nas gcig tu nga chang phyed byed tsam na 'khod de// na thos chen po bzhi pa dag gi dbus kyi
36b2(rgyud): sa byugs ma/ khru lnga bdus 'khong po 'apad+ma pa ni 'dzi m+bu'i chu bo'i gsar// mangs man bain+dan sngon bze bo ni dpal gyi snying po// snang ba ni mu tig / khrim lnga'i spros pas lhag pa 'a
36b3(rgyud): na las 'das pa'i dge pa'i dra ba la smras pa zhig zung ste// pad+ma de las snang ba ba'o// snang ba des stong gsum gyi stong chen pa'i 'jig chen gyi khams snang bar gyur / srang ngan pad+ma
36b4(rgyud): bang du ma gsum gyi ldan bas du snang ngo // chen po'i ris kyi lci'i bar du ni pad+ma 'bang du lci'i bag chad lnga par snang / sum su cu gnyis pa'i lha'i mang du
36b5(rgyud): nga'i 'phang dpag tshad brgya bar snang / 'og min gyi lha'i bar du ni pad+ma de'i 'phang dpag tshad phyed par snang // pad+ma 'i 'dab ma dag las/ tshig dang don dang / tshigasu bcad pa sna
36b6(rgyud): byung ste// seMn gang dag sa 'di la gnas pa de dgis tshigasu bcad pa 'di dag tho so// sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir gang zag sdig pa med pa cig skyes pa// gcig pus bdud kyi sde ni dang
36b7(rgyud): dang gzhon par bcas pa bcom// sangs rgyas dpa' bo gcig gis chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor// nya gcig 'gro ba dag la phan phyir byin par the tshom med/ mkhas pa bstan ba
36b8(rgyud): tshul mang rig pa chos don thar 'dod pa// tshul shas bang nas skyes dang nye rgyal mchog 'dir ston pas brtul// 'gro ba kun la phan don rig mkhas dam chos gsungs pa chan// thub pa
37a1(rgyud): sgyu mchod 'jig rten kun gyis mchod pa de ring gshegs// du su gshegs pa stong pa dge sbyong rgyal po bslab gsum 'chang // chang med chos don rig pa lha dang ming ba
37a2(rgyud): 'gro ba skyob// 'jig rten dan dang phan spyod mkhas pa ya shes chen po'i sbyor// dam pa gsung ba dri ma gsum spangs ngo ring 'di kun ston// sdug bsngal 'phongs pa'i 'gro ba thang rnam grol zhing // 
37a3(rgyud): 'jig rten dor slad mi mnyel blo gros mnga' bas spyad/ ma rig pa yos bsgribs pa'i mig can dag la yang // dam pa'i chos kyi mig ni ji bzhin rab tu sbyin// / bde ldan pa'i 'khor
37a4(rgyud): 'dir ni tshogs gyur gyis// don gyi dam pa gzi gas pa gzugs bzang mchog mnga' la// stobs dang ldan zhing mchog dang mchog ma yin mkhyen pa// smra ba'i sang+ge ring po
37a5(rgyud): bogs 'dir gsheg so// 'gro ba'i sdug bsngal rgya mtshor gnas pa gzigs na no// dbang po drug sdom pa'i mtsho ga la rab gnas shing // mngon par shes pa drug mkhan du
37a6(rgyud): rjes 'brang ba// de ni chos kyi rnga chen brdung du yang dag gshegs// dbang po drug gi grong khyer gnas rnams rab 'joms pa// don mchog dran pa drug gi kha lo sgyur dbang po// pha rol tshes drug
37a7(rgyud): rnams rab tu bshad pa'i phyir// drugri se bon smra ba'i sang+ga 'dir gsheg so// 'dod pa ni spyod pa'i lha'i ris drug bar du pad+ma de las tshigasu bcad pa 'di dag b+h+yo ngo // khyed cag tshogs te ring dag
37a8(rgyud): ba spyod// bag med sems la srang dang rgyags pas bisgrubs// rtag tu rmongs shing dgo' ba'i skom gyis myos// bag mang gyur pas byang gshegs mchod mi byeng // 'dod pa mi rtag
37a9(rgyud): chu mo zla ba bzhin// skye dgu'i 'khor ba'i zhags pa shin tu sra// dga' ba dag la bag med ma thar pa// nam yod mya ngan 'da' bar mi 'gyu ro// rtag tu bag meng zhi ba'i phyir mi 'gyur// 8
37b1(rgyud): dang mi dge sngon pas ma mthong ngam// de dang na 'chi 'jigs pas kun zin cing // khyed cag ngan song sa la rab tu zhugs// sbyin dang dul dang kun sdom bag yod la// rten cing sngon gyi
37b2(rgyud): legs byas rnams kyang bsrungs// 'dod pa mi gtsang mtha' mang kun spongs la// bde bar gshegs pa'i skyabs nye bar dang // song ste de yi bka' la rab tu nyor// legs bshad
37b3(rgyud): de ni khyod kyis ngon chen te// shes rab rnam grol rab tu zhi ba'i rgyu// dam pa'i chos ldan mnyam pa dor che no// gzugs na spyod pa'i lha'i ris bcu'i drug gi bar du pad+ma'i mangs
37b4(rgyud): ma la tshigasu bcad pa 'di lta bu 'di dag phyung // mnyam gzhag bsam gtan dga' ba nyon mongs mang // rab tu bsgrims te tshos la rnar bsgoms// ma 'phral sems dang rnar thar
37b5(rgyud): 'dod pas// zhe sdang rab tu spangs pa'i blo gyi sa shig/ rnam pa bcu gsum mtshan ma bstan pa yi// bzod ba mchog la rnam par sgom pagyis// des ni nad dang rga
37b6(rgyud): las thar pa yi// shin tu rnam par myur du thob par 'gyur// gang rnams gzugs kyi rnam rtog sogs la chags// ther zug rtag pa bdag brtan dngos por blta/ de dag gi ni skye
37b7(rgyud): ba'i rgyud mi 'chad// de rnams ngan song sa la shin tu 'bab// rtag tu khams gsum bdag mang rdzas med cing // byed med rang dbang med par rnam bltas nas// rje su 'thun pa'i bcing
37b8(rgyud): pa gang sgom pa// de dag 'gro ba kun las phar par 'gyur// sgyu dang 'dzag 'grol chas 'di phang la// na mkha' 'dra bar gang rnams sbom byed pa// de dag 'chi med na med na pa'ang ma
38a1(rgyud): / sgyumanag las tan kun gyis mchang pa dang bshags// dusu gshegs pa stan pa das// 'gro med cing mi sdum blang ba'ang med/ khang rnams dang po dag la
38a2(rgyud): chags// lam de mchog ste shin tu dag pa yin// da ltar shAkya sang+ge 'di bzhan du// bdud rnams bzhi po rnam pa bcom par 'gyur/ gang dag g.yo ba btul nas gnyis spangs phyir// tsa ma
38a3(rgyud): mtsha mnanam dun sas pa// tshul gsha rnam par rnam par byud pa rnams/ de dag la ni lam mchog 'di da// dag kyi meng cing byed pa med gyur pa// sa 'di 'ang sa par bas
38a4(rgyud): nasu// smin pa spangs na bla na med pa yi// byang chub namamakha'i rang bzhir reg par 'gyur// de lta bu'i don gyi tshig chos kyi sgra de dag byung bas 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir ma dang / mi ma yin pa de dag
38a5(rgyud): tshogs te/ 'bad cing 'khod do// la la ni tshangs pa'i chabadangu/ la la ni dbang byed kyi cha byad du/ la la ni dbang phyugachen po'i cha byang du/ la la ni sred med kyi bu'i cha byang phul
38a6(rgyud): la ni dga' ldan pa'i cha byad du/ la ni 'thab bral ba'i cha byad du/ la la ni brgya byin gyis cha byang du// la la ni sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i cha byang du// la la ni gzhon nu'i cha bang du/ la la ni rnam thos
38a7(rgyud): kyi bu'i cha byang du/ la la ni 'phags skyes po'i cha byang du/ la la ni mig mi bzong gi cha byang du/ la la ni yul 'khor srung gi cha byad du/ la la ni rgyal chen bzhi po'i phal pa'i cha byad ngu/ la
38a8(rgyud): ni nyi mi'i cha byang du/ la la ni zla ba'i chu byang du/ la la ni skar ma'i cha byang du/ la li nr-i lha ma yin gyi chu byang du/ la la ni na mkha' lding gi chu byad du/ la la ni ma'i ci'i cha byad du/ la la ni lho
38b1(rgyud): 'phye chen po'i cha byang ngu/ la la ni rin po che'i cha byad du/ la la ni gser gyi rgyan gyi cha byang du/ la la ni rin po che sna tshogs kyi cha byang du/ la la ni rin po che'i shing ljon pa'i cha byang ngu/ la la
38b2(rgyud): ni rgyal rigs kyi cha byang ngu/ la la ni gzhan mu stegs can gyi cha byang du/ la la mi 'khor lo rin po che'i cha byad du/ la la ni nor bu rin po che'i cha byang ngu/ la la ni glang po ches srung gi
38b3(rgyud): bu'i chu byang ngu/ la la ni rta'i rgyal po sprin gyi shugs ldan gyi cha byang ngu/ la la ni bungad mang rin po che'i cha byang du/ la la ni tshong dpon btsun pa'i chu byad du/ la la ni blon po rin po che'i cha byang
38b4(rgyud): du bdag nyid mngon par sprul te/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir 'khod do// la la ni sngo zhing kha dog sngo la/ phyang 'phrul dang rgyan dkar pos rgyan par bdag nyid mngon pa
38b5(rgyud): sprul te/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod par bya ba'i phyir gdu gas dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dmar po dang mu tig gi phreng ba thogs shing 'phang du ta la'i srid tsam rgya
38b6(rgyud): mamakha'i dkyil ma 'khod do// la la ni phar zhing kha dog dkar la/ phyang 'phrul dang / spud pa kha dog lab rgan te/ gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan sar po dang / mu tig gi phreng ba
38b7(rgyud): shing 'khod do// la la ni leb rgan kha dog le brgan la gser gyi gos dang / phyang drul dang / lhab lhub ste/ gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dad mthing ka sogs shing 'khod do// la la
38b8(rgyud): ni dmar shing kha dog dmar la/ mu tig dkar po'i char 'beb so// la la ni dkar zhing kha dog dkar la mu tig dmar po'i char 'beb so// la la ni lha'i drang srong gi kha dog du bdag tu
39a1(rgyud): mngon par sprul nas// na mkha' las me tog gi char mngon par 'beb so// la la ni bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos kyi gzugasu mngon par sprul nas/ na mkha' las lnga'i
39a2(rgyud): spos sna tshogs kyi char 'beb so// la la ni dri za'i kha dog gis lha'i sil snyan sna tshogs brdu // la la ni lha'i bu mo'i kha dog gis rin po che'i sna tshogs kyi snod du spos chu thogs te/ sa la chag
39a3(rgyud): chag 'dabaso// la lan 'ching ba nag po lta bu'i kha dag ste/ spos snga tshogs kyis rab tu 'dug par byed do// la la ni lci'i bu'i chi byad kyis gar byid cing smra ri byangs 'byin no// la la ni bdagan
39a4(rgyud): tshogs bcom ldan 'das ga la ba logasu thal mo sbyar te/ bcom ldan 'das la bstod do// bdud dang bdud kyi 'khor la la ni// bcom ldan 'das phyogs gau la bzhugs pa de logs pal
39a5(rgyud): mngon par phyogs te/ bcom ldan 'das lam chod pa bya ba'i phyir rin po che sna tshogs thog so// la la ni sra dang / khang pa dang / khyim dang / skar khung dang / rta babs dang / bsil
39a6(rgyud): khang dang / lam gyi bzhi mdo dang / sum mdo dang / khrang pa brtsegs pa dang / sgo gang dang / shing khang dang / gzhal med khang rnams na 'dug cing thal mo sbyar te/ bcom ldan 'das lam
39a7(rgyud): pa bya ba'i phyir 'khod do// de nas bdud sdig can gyis gang gi tshe/ bdud de dag bad g.yog dang bcas te/ dge sbyong go'u ta ma la skyabasu dong bar mthong ba de'i tshe rab tu 'khrugs te/ skrag
39a8(rgyud): tsong srang gi dbus napad+ma de 'khor bar 'dago// 'og min gyi lha grangs med pa'i bar du 'og min nas babs nas chos mnyan pa'i phyir pad+ma de'i khor yug du 'khod do// bdud sdig can gyis
39b1(rgyud): tshig su bcad pa de dag thos nas kun tu bltas na/ rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po'i srang gi dbus na pad+ma de las 'di lta bu'i tshig su bcad pa dag byung ste/ chos mnyan pa'i phyir mi bya
39b2(rgyud): khrag khrig brgya stong grangs med pa dag gis pad+ma de 'khor bar 'khod par mthong ngo // de nas bdud sdig can gyis steng du bltas na/ 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha drug gi gnas thad na yang chos
39b3(rgyud): mnyan pa'i phyir lha bye ba phrag brgya stong grangs med dpag tu med pa dag gis pad+ma de dag 'khor bar 'khod par mthong // de nas bdud sdig can rab tu sdug bsngal zhing yid mi bde nas yid
39b4(rgyud): la bcags te/ spu zing zhes byed par gyur cing lus rdul te/ lus 'dar nas na mkha' la rgyug cing skad chen pos bos te/ bdud gzhan la 'di skad ces smraso// 
39b5(rgyud): 'gyur yid kyis da yi tshig la nyon// nga la stobs med bdag yul 'dir dbang med// thub stobs yon tan shin tu dri med de// skye bo bstan phyir 'jig rten 'dir 'jug/ lha mi dga'
39b6(rgyud): bi'i pad+ma 'dir byung ste// 'gro mchog ma lus nges par nye bar dong // bde gshegs tshig la sgom zhing rab tu dga'// yon tan rab mchog zhi ba'i lam du 'gro// 'di ni 'jig rten gsu
39b7(rgyud): po slu ba dge sbyong sgra yin te// lha mi mang po thams cad yid gcig pad+ma 'khor bar 'jug/ nga ni 'jigs pa'i skad phyung myur du ri yi char bab ste// ci nas bdud kyi snga bcan mtshon gyi
39b8(rgyud): dong bcom 'dir brlig gyis// de nas bdud gzhan zhig gis bdud sdig can la 'di skad ces smraso// bdag gi phan byed 'di nyon cig khyod kyis chos rig na// bdag sde brlag pa mthong
40a1(rgyud): yang zhi bar ci yi phyir mi 'gro// bde gshegs gzi brjid sku dang dpal gzugs mthong bas bdag cag myos// sangs rgyas 'dren pa ma gtogs 'di ni skyabs rab mchog
40a2(rgyud): gzhan med// de nas bdud gzhan zhig rab tu ngu zhing gdong mchog tu khros pas non pas/ bdud sdig can la 'di skad ces smra so// log pa'i lam du zhugs shing lam dman pa// 
40a3(rgyud): bdag gi stobs mthu dang med par 'ang mi shes sam// 'dren pa la yang gang phyir khyod sngo ba// ngo mi tsha'am 'dzem par mi bya 'am// bdag cag stobs ni shin tu brlag par 'gyur// sangs rgyas
40a4(rgyud): mthu yis 'gro ba ma lus pa// pad+ma'i drung du nye bar der dong ste// chos thos tshim pas lus kyang shin tu dag/ bdag cag rnam par 'jigs shing klag gyur te// lus ni dring stobs dang
40a5(rgyud): brtson 'grus stor// ji tsam skad cig ba rlag par ma gyur pa// de yi bar du thub dbang sgrubasu 'dod // de nas bdud gzhan zhig gis thal mo sbyar te// 'di skad ces
40a6(rgyud): spraso// sdig can khyed ni chos kyi spyod pa spang sa shing sdig byed dga'// sangs rgyas mgon 'di 'gro ba'i phan do na mkhas shing dge ba'i mchog/ grong khyer 'dir byon bdag cag
40a7(rgyud): myur du 'ga' zhing dang bas blta// 'jig rten gsum mchid srog chags kun gyi sman la skyabasu 'dod // de nas na mkha' de nyid nas bdud dbyangs kyi blo gros zhes bya ba des sgra
40a8(rgyud): chen por 'di skad ces smraso// khyed kun tshogs pas gus shing dga' ldan pa yi tshig nyon cig/ sdig pa'i lta ba kun bzlog lus tud ngag yid 'thun spyod de// khro spangs rab dag/ 
40b1(rgyud): thub pa'i gsung mchog la yang dga' dang skyes// sangs rgyas mngon sum rnyed dka' skyabs de de ring gus par mchod// de nas skad cig de nyid la bdud bde ma mkha' ldababs nas/ rgyal
40b2(rgyud): khab kyi grong khyer gyi sgo rin po che sna bdun las byas te// bdud la la ni 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po'i cha byad du bdag nyid mngon par sprul nas/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i phyir 'bad cing
40b3(rgyud): 'khod do// la la ni tshangs pa'i cha byad du/ la la ni byang byed kyi cha byang ngu/ la la ni dbang phyug chen po'i cha byang du/ la la ni sred med kyi bu'i cha byed du/ la la ni dga' ldan pa'i cha byangad du// lal
40b4(rgyud): ni 'thab bral ba'i cha byang du/ la la ni brgya byin gyi cha byad du/ la la ni sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i cha byad du/ la la ni gzhon nu'i cha byang ngu/ la la ni rnam thos kyi muchu byang du// 
40b5(rgyud): la la ni 'phags skyes po'i chu byang du/ la la ni mog mi bzang gi cha byang du/ la la ni yul 'khor srung gi cha byad du/ la la ni rgyal chen bzhi pa phal pa'i chubang ngu/ la la ni nyi ma'i
40b6(rgyud): byang du/ la la ni zla ba'i cha bang du/ la la ni skar ma'i chu byang du/ la la ni lha ma yin gyi cha byad du/ la la ni na mkha' lding gi cha byang du/ la la ni mi 'am ci'i chabyang ngu/ la la niH
40b7(rgyud): 'phye chen po'i chubyang/ la la ni rin po che'i cha byad du/ la li ni gser gyi rgyan gyis chu byang du/ la la ni rin po che sna tshogs kyi cha byang du/ la la ni rin po che'i shing ljong pa'i cha byang du
40b8(rgyud): la la ni rgyal rigs kyi cha byang du/ la la ni gzhan mu stegs can gyi cha byang du/ la la ni 'khor lo rin po che'i cha byad du/ la la nor bu rin po che'i cha byang du/ la la na
41a1(rgyud): glang po ches srung gi spyi bu'i n+ya byang ngu/ la la ni rta'i rgyal po sprin gyis shugs can gyi cha byang du/ la la ni bud med ring po che'i cha byang ngu/ la la
41a2(rgyud): dpon btsun pa'i cha byad du/ la la ni blon po rin po che'i cha byad du/ bdag nyid mngon par sprul te/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir 'khod do// la la ni sngo zhing kha dog
41a3(rgyud): sngo la phyung 'phral dang / rgyan dkar pos rgyan par bdag nyid mngon par sprul te/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir/ gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dmar po dang / 
41a4(rgyud): mu tig gi phreng ba thogs shing / 'phang du tu li srid tsam gyi na mkha'i dkyil na 'khod do// la la ni da/ ra zhing kha dog dkar la/ phyang 'phrul dang / spud pa kha dog le
41a5(rgyud): rgan te/ gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / bdan ser po dang / mu tig gi phreng ba thogs shing 'khod do// la la ni leb rgan kha dog lab rgan la gser gyi gos dang / phyang 'phrul dang / lca
41a6(rgyud): lbub ste/ gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan thing ka thogs shing 'khod do// la la ni dmar zhing kha dog dmar la/ mu tig dkar po'i char 'beb so// la la ni dkar zhing kha dog
41a7(rgyud): dkar la/ mu tig dmar po'i char 'beb so// la la ni lci'i drang srong gi kha dog tu bdag nyid mngon par sbal nas/ na mkha' las me tog gi char mngon par 'bab so// la la ni bcom ldan la
41a8(rgyud): kyi nyan thos kyi gzugasu mngon par sprul nas/ nam mkha' las lha'i spos sna tshogs kyi char 'bab so// la la ni dri za'i kha dog gi lha'i sil snyan sna tshogs rdung ngo // la la ni lha'i bu
41b1(rgyud): kha dog gis/ rin po che'i sna tshogs kyi snod du/ spos chu thogs te sa la chag chag 'dab so// la la ni 'ching bu'i nag po lta bu'i kha dog ste/ spos sna tshogs kyis rab tu bdug par bye // 
41b2(rgyud): la la ni lha'i bu'i cha byad gyis gar byed cing / glu'i dbyangs 'byin to// la la ni kha dog sna tshogs kyis/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de log su thal mo sbyar te/ bcom ldan 'das la
41b3(rgyud): bstod do// bdud dang bdud kyi 'khor la la ni/ bcom ldan 'das phyogs ga la bzhugs pa de logasu mngon par phyogs te/ bcom ldan 'das lo mchod pa bya ba'i phyir/ ni ba
41b4(rgyud): che rnam pa sna tshogs thogs// la la ni srang dang / khang pa dang / skar khung dang / rta babs dang / bsil khang dang / lam gyi bzhi mdo dang dum mdo dang // khang pa brtsegs pa dang / skra
41b5(rgyud): khang dang gzhal med khang sna tshogasu bdug cing / thal mo sbyar te/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bya ba phyir 'khod do// de nas bdud sdig can gyis gang gi tshe/ 
41b6(rgyud): bdud de dag thams cad g.yog dang bcas te deg/ sbyong go'u ta ma la skyabasu dong bar mthong ba de'i tshe/ rab tu 'khrugs te skrag cing myos nas rab tu ngu zhing 'di skad
41b7(rgyud): smraso// bdag la phyin chad grogs med de/ bdag gi dpal dang zad stong // bdag ni bdud kyi yul nas 'khyams// brtson 'grus tha ma brtsam par bya// bdag gis pad+ma rtsa ba
41b8(rgyud): pad+ma bcad dang kun 'khrugs te/ de nas sen phyogs phyogs 'gro/ de na tha mi'i stobs yi no// bdud sdig can gyis de ltar bsams nas// rlung ta bur na mkha' las babs te/ 
42a1(rgyud): gi pad+ma ga la ba dang phyin nas/ pad+ma de'i sdong po yan chad dbyung bar 'dod na/ reg par yang ma nus/ pad+ma'i mdab ma bcad par 'dod na/ de dag kyang ma mthong / 
42a2(rgyud): snying po la lags pas brdab par 'dod na de yang ma dmigs te/ dper na glog snang yang mi dmigs pa bzhin// 'di lta ste/ dper na/ grib ma snang yang mi dmigs pa de
42a3(rgyud): bzhin du pad+ma da yang snang mod kyi mi dmig so// gang gi tshe bdud sdig can gyis pad+ma de mthong yang mi dmigs shing reg par mi rung ba de'i tshe/ 'khor thaMd rab tu bsdangs par bya ba
42a4(rgyud): phyir skad drag cing che la 'jigs pa'i sgra byung bar 'dod na de yang ma nu so// yang stobs chen po'i drug shu la gyis lag pa gnyis sa chen po la brdabs te/ rab tu
42a5(rgyud): bskyed par 'dod na// rag par yang ma nus te ma dmig so// 'di lta ste/ dper na/ la la zhig na mkha' la rdob par 'dod na/ mi dmigs pa de bzhin du/ bdud sdig can gyis ma
42a6(rgyud): yang reg par mi rung zhing mi dmigs nas/ de 'di snyam du sems te/ ci nas sen 'dus pa rnams btags te/ sems rnam par 'khrug par bya'o snyam na/ sa ni de dag mthong
42a7(rgyud): yang mi dmigs shing dag par ma rung // de nas bdud sdig can rab tu ngu zhing / sangs rgyas kyi mthus de'i lus shing ljon pa de bzhin du 'dar te/ gdong mchi ma can phyogs
42a8(rgyud): bzhir blta zhing 'di skad ces smra so// dge sbyong gi ni 'gro kun bsdu phyir de ring sgyu 'dri byas// 'di ltar 'dag ni 'dun 'dir slang bzhin skad gcig myos par song // yul dang
42b1(rgyud): gi stobs las nyams shing bdag gi srog kyang zad// dang bslad brlag par ma gyur par du bdag gnas myur du 'gro// bdag gi gnasu 'gro bar 'dod na der yang 'gro bar ma nus
42b2(rgyud): de rab tu skrag cing ngus nas 'di snyam du semaso// bdag gi rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs zad de/ bdag dge sbyong go'u ta ma 'di'i dbang du song du 'ong / dag 'di'i mdun du bdag gi srog zad par
42b3(rgyud): 'gyur du 'ong gis 'dir mi snang bar byas te/ ci nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing ni gnas pa'i sems can gcig gis kyang bdag 'chi ba'i dus byed pa mi mthong bar sangs rgyas kyi zhing ma
42b4(rgyud): mjed kyi phyi rol tu 'chi ba'i dus bya'o snyam nas/ 'on kyang mi snang bar bya ba 'am/ phyogs dang phyogs mtsham su 'bros kyang ma nus te/ de nyid du mgul pa bcing ba lngas bcings
42b5(rgyud): bar bdag gis mthong bar rab tu khros shing sgra ga ste/ skad chen por ngu zhing 'di skad ces smra so// kyi hud bu dang gnyen bshes sdug pa khyed rnams phyis mi mtha
42b6(rgyud): zhes ze'o// de nas bdud dbyangs dang ldan pa zhes bya ba 'khor los bsgyur ba'i cha byad du 'dug par gyur te/ des bdud sdig can la 'di skad ces smra so// ci'i phyir khyod dang
42b7(rgyud): mya ngan yid kyis du gdeng sgo cher 'bod// 'gro ba kun gtso thub mchog skyabasu ma 'jigs myur du song // 'jig rten rnams kyi mgon skyabs dpung gnyer sdug bsngal gsum sa
42b8(rgyud): ga'adi la bstan bkur zhi 'gro bde ba thob par 'gyur yang dag/ de nas bdud sdig can 'di snyam du bdag nyid tshig sman pas// dge sbyong go'u ta mi'i skyabasu song la/ bcings pa
43a1(rgyud): 'di las bdag grol bar bya'o snyam du bsams te/ de nas bdud sdig can gyis phyogs gang na/ bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa de logasu bal mo sbyar ba btud
43a2(rgyud): nas 'di skad ces gsol to// gang zag gi mchog skye ba dang / rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba las rab tu thar bar mdzad pa de la phyag 'tshalo// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de la ba
43a3(rgyud): skyabasu mchi'o// 'di skad ces kyang gsol to// thub mgon myur du 'jigs chen mi bzang bcings pa 'di las khrol// de ring slan chad bde gshegs gtso mchog skyabasu bdag ma
43a4(rgyud): ste// gti mug gis ni bdag ljongs khyod la khros shing nongs chen 'gyis// mngon gsum khyod bzhag spyan sngar de dag sor bshags par bgyi// gang gi tshe bdud sdig can tshig
43a5(rgyud): spyad pas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la skyabasu dong / ba de'i tshe na/ bdag grol ba snyam du sha so// gang gi tshe 'kho ra 'di nas bdag 'gro'o snyam du bsams pa
43a6(rgyud): de'i tshe yang mgul ba bcings pa lngas bcings par bdag gis shes te/ gang gi tshe gang du yang 'gro ma nus pa de'i tshe/ bcom ldan 'das la mgon dang skyabasu sems bskyad
43a7(rgyud): yang bdag nyid grol bar sheso// lan bdun gyi bar du bdag bcings pa dang grol bar shes te de nyid na 'dug go// 'dus pa chen po rin po che tog gi gzungs las bdud brtul
43a8(rgyud): le'u ste gsum pa'o// / gong du smos pa'i bar du ste/ nyan thos chen po bzhi po de dag rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen por bsod snyoms kyi phyir song ba/ bdud
43b1(rgyud): gzhon nu dag gis dge sbyong glu long shig/ dge sbyong gar byos shig ces spyod pa ma yin par byed du bcug nas/ nyan thos chen po de dag kyang srang gi dbus na rgyug cing mya ngan 'das
43b2(rgyud): pa'i lam gyi tshig dang ldan pa'i glu dbyangs kyis gong gi tshe/ tshigasu bcad pa smras pa de'i tshe/ sa chen po 'di rab tu g.yo so// skad cig de nyid la lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / 
43b3(rgyud): dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / na mkha'i lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po brgya stong mang po bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la dad pa rnams gdong mchi ma can gyis 'di skad ces
43b4(rgyud): smra so// chos kyi kha lo bsgyur mchog mya ngan med bzhugs kyang // rgyal ba'i bstan pa 'di lta bu yi gnas gyur to// nyan bos nga dag la ni rgyal ka dang byas pa// 'gro
43b5(rgyud): ba rnams kyis mthong na dad par ga la 'gyur/ de nas lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / na mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / sri
43b6(rgyud): po bye ba khrag khrig mang po gdong mchi ma can gyis bcom ldan 'das kyi gal ba dang lhags te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sder 'khod nas/ 'di skad ces gsol to// de ltar
43b7(rgyud): pa 'di yi gnas// bcom ldan 'das kyis kun gzigs te/ bstan pa'i cho ga srung slad du// kun mkhyen btang snyoms ma mdzad cig/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa
43b8(rgyud): 'di ltar nga nyid der song ste// gzhon dpung bcas pa'i bdud btul la// skye bo mang po thang kyang // mya ngan 'das grong 'gro bar bya// de nas de dag thad kyis mgrin gcig tu 'di skad
44a1(rgyud): ces gsol te/ bcom ldan 'das ma gshegs shig/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi yul bsam gyis mi khyab/ bdud kyi yu
44a2(rgyud): bsam gyis mi khyag/ kA'i yul bsam gyis mi khab/ las rnams kyi las kyi yul bsam gyis mi khyab po zhes/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' ma srul tam/ yul thad
44a3(rgyud): kyi nang na ni sangasau rgyas kyi yul khyad par du 'phags pa'i mchog lags te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gdan 'di la bzhugs bzhin du/ bdud bye ba khrag khrig rab tu pham par
44a4(rgyud): mdzad pa dang / chos kyi phung po bye ba khrag khrig rab tu bstan pa dang / nyon mongs pa'i rgya mtsho skam pa dang / lta ba'i rgya mtsho dral ba dang / sen bye ba khrig khrig ye shes kyi rgya mtsho la
44a5(rgyud): gzung bar spyod mod kyi/ 'on kyang bcom ldan 'das dang gi dus la gshegs pa mi rig so// bcom lnga na 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sems can gyi khams
44a6(rgyud): na san ji snyed pa de dag thams cad bdud du gyu ra la// de dag re re'i bdud kyi stobs dang / byin gyis brlabs kyang sa'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul ji snyed pa de tsam du gyur te/ de dag
44a7(rgyud): thams cad ngal gsod par shom yang spu'i khung gu gcig tsam la yang gnod par mi nuso// ngas ni 'di na 'dug bzhin du bdud bye ba khrag khrig rnams rab tu pham par bya ba dang / 
44a8(rgyud): gdul bar nus te/ bdud g.yog dang bcas pa 'di ni ma gtog so// yang ngal mchod pa bya ba'i phyir bdud 'di dag gis rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po thams cad bdud kyi/ 
44b1(rgyud): stobs dang / rdzu 'phrul dang / rnam par sprul pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyis bkod pas rgyan pas// de dag la snying brtse ba'i phyir/ 'gro bar byas te/ yongasu spyang ngo // de nas bdu
44b2(rgyud): de dag rab tu dga' zhing dad pa skyes nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu dge ba'i rtsa ba'i sa bon skyed par 'gyuraro// ji tsam na gdan la sa bzhengs par bzhed
44b3(rgyud): pa dang / de nas 'od ma'i tshal srung ba'i lha mo mdzes zhes bya ba de/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar gdong mchi ma can du 'dug nas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan pa
44b4(rgyud): ring gshegs pa'i dus ma lags// grong ra 'di dag kun nas bdud kyis gtas// rere yang ni shin tu ma rungs pa// bye bas smra ba'i seng ge bskor zhing mchis
44b5(rgyud): zhe sdang rab 'bar rno bo'i mtshan 'ogs te/ khyod dgongs slad du 'khrugs pa'i sems kyis gnas// mgon pa rnam pa kun tu dang ma gshegs// 'jig rten rtsa lag
44b6(rgyud): brlag par ma btud cig/ gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das gang na las bzhengs pa'i tshe gtsug lag khang gi lha me snang ba'i blo gros zhes bya ba ngas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi
44b7(rgyud): la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ 'di skad ces gsol to// sdig can dag ni lnga stong po// mtshon char bcas te mchis pa ni// bsam med de dag khyed la sde// thub chen
44b8(rgyud): ring ma gshegs shing / gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das gtsug lag khang nas byung ba de'i cha/ sman gyi lha mo grub pa'i blo gros zhes bya ba 'dis/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la
45a1(rgyud): la phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to// 'jig rten sgron ma brlag gyur na// kyi hud chos kyi lam stor cing // chos kyi tshul ni rab tu 'jig/ chos kyi gru
45a2(rgyud): yang 'jig par 'gyur// 'jig rten kun na rgyal chen chos kyi ro ni nyams par 'gyur// 'gro ba 'di dag nyon mongs g.yon can gdug pas shin tu gtams// sa 'dir bde gshi
45a3(rgyud): thub pa'i mchog ni ma rung 'gyur ba lags// ji ltar shin tu dbyung ba'i mthu ni bdag la ci ma mchis// khyod brlag bgyi slad 'di na rab tu mi bzad mang po dag/ sdig pa'i chos
45a4(rgyud): can ral gri sta re mtshon rnon thogs shing mchis// bde bar gshegs pa 'jig rten srung slan bdag gi tshig gson te/ stobs bcu grub par bzhud pa de ring grong khyer ma gshegs
45a5(rgyud): shig/ de nas bcom ldan 'das gtsug lag khang gi dang ra na sa bzhud pa dang / de na shing gi lha mo 'od 'chang zhes bya ba de snying rje ba snying rje bar ngu zhing / bcos kyi zhabs
45a6(rgyud): la phyag 'tshal nas// 'di skad ces gsol to// thang don gru ba thub pa yid bzhin rdzogs khyod ma rung gyur na ni// mgon po khams gsum 'di dag bad de'u ru mig ni
45a7(rgyud): stor bar 'gyur// nam mkha' 'di la sprul gyis rkeng bcings rno ba'i mda' dang mtshon thogs shing / khyod dgrangs slad du kha nas me 'bar rgyu yis de ni dar ma gshegs// de nas sde
45a8(rgyud): gang gi cha lha mo 'od zer chu'i lha zhes bya ba nga sgra cher ngu zhing bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to// grong khyer bzang po 'di na tha
45b1(rgyud): zer ming btags stong phrag nyi shu po// mda' dang spu gri mtshon cha 'bar ba thogs te snying rje med par lha/ gcig pas gcig mi zad pa snying rje med pa stong phrag nyi shu rnams// khyod dgo
45b2(rgyud): slad du 'di na mchis kyis gtsang ma'i zhal ni me gshegs shig/ de nas bcom ldan 'das sgo gang du byon pa dang / derang rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer srung bi'i lha mo te li'i snying
45b3(rgyud): bya ba de na mkha' las sgra chedang ngu zhing bcom ldan 'das kyi thang du rings par song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to
45b4(rgyud): bcom ldan shul 'di sing+ga rnga mo glang chen smyon pas bskor dge sbyong rnams la brtse slang bdud kyis rnam mang gnod par bgyid// sa 'dir ston pa khyed dgongs slad du mu
45b5(rgyud): sngags gzhan yang brtson/ sprin dbyangs 'od 'bar lha glu thug sa btso slad du ma gshegs shig/ bcom ldan bdud phul lo/ dkyi bstan pa rnam zhig dang // sgyu ma bgying pa mi
45b6(rgyud): 'thun gdong can bdud mthong nas// lha mi klu dang mi 'am ci yi dbang po rnams// kun 'dus mi dga' skrag nas shin tu rnam par 'khrugs// dam chos tshar zhig pa dang 'jig rten 'khrugs
45b7(rgyud): 'gyur dang // namakha' skar ma 'ong sor nyi zla gyur mthong nas// 'gro mchog kye ma mi bzang klang ba dang drag rdob/ bang gshegs ma rung 'gyur bar kun dogs kyi dud mchi// mthong ba'i ma
45b8(rgyud): 'di nyams shing // chos kyi spyod ma zad par 'gyur// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas grongs par bklag/ chos kyi chu yang bskams par 'gyur/ dam chos spyod pa 'jig rten du// ma rung 'gyur
46a1(rgyud): bar nye gnas tshe// mi dge ba yi bdud rnams kyang // 'di dag kun ni 'byung bar 'gyur// de nas lha mo des bcom ldan 'das phyir ldog par ma mthong nas/ gdong ma
46a2(rgyud): ma can gyis yang 'di skad ces gsol to// thub pa 'jig rten kun la gzigasu gsol// sgra mchog di ring brlag par ma btud cing // bdag gi grong du mo rung khyod 'gyur na// 'jig rten ga
46a3(rgyud): gyis rtag smang 'gyur du mchi// 'dren pa bdagi tshig gson sems can mchog/ bdag gi gong du brlag par dang ma bzhudang // sen thugs bcu'i slad du 'dir bzhes te// sen skya bas gca
46a4(rgyud): pas 'jigs par mdzod// dam pa brnyas na sa sgrol ba rab 'gyur bar// sngon gyi dam bcas de bzhin ga pa dgongs// sen mang po sdug bsngal du mas gdungs/ sron
46a5(rgyud): chags rnams kyi gtso bo dbugs phyung shig/ sku mchog bskal bu bye ba mang por bzhugs// kye ma 'dod la chags shing byis pa'i sde// de rnams zhi bgyi slad du chos lam shod// skye mched
46a6(rgyud): bo dor ni rang bzhin stong // de nas bac+doMs sgo gang du gshegs pa dang / de nas so'i lha mo gzi brjid che ba'i lha mo khri dang lhan cig skra bzhig cing gdong mchi ma can gyis bac+doMs kyi sku
46a7(rgyud): sngar thal mo sbyar te 'dug nas/ 'di skad ces gsol to// rab tu sbyin la dgongs shing khyod kyis ni// rgya mtsho bzhi bltam pa yi khrag stsal cing // dbu dang rus pa khor yug ri rib
46a8(rgyud): tsam// spyan yang gang+gA'i bye ma snyed stsal to// sngon ni rin chen rnam pa sna tshogs dang // sras dang btsun mo glang chen de bzhin te// gnas dang gos dang mal cha zas skom dang // de bzhin na
46b1(rgyud): pa dag la 'dod sman sul/ rang byung mchog rab la ni mchod pa mdzad// khyed kyis bag yod par yang tshul khrims bsrungs// bzod pa dang ni thos pa rtag tu bsnyen// phar 'dzin mar 'jim
46b2(rgyud): pa yang de bzhino// bya bar dka' ba dag kyang mtha' yas spyad// san du ma nyon mongs par bar mdzad// gang sngon khyod kyis smon lam btab pa ni/ lam mchog ston pa sangs rgyas nyid
46b3(rgyud): gyur cig / chu bo chen po las ni 'gro ba bsgral// 'jig rten la yang shin tu chos bstan te// sdug bsngal ma lus par ni bskam par bya// sems can mang po grangs med grong khyer gzung
46b4(rgyud): sen de dag dgongs pa yongs rdzogs shing // byang chub dam pa la ni shin tu 'khod// 'di ni lam bor sdig pa spyod pa rnams// tshul khrims thos bshig mgon pos bzod par mdzong // 'di
46b5(rgyud): ngag sgrol cig dam bcas dgongasu gsol/ bskal pa bye ba mang por chos ston to// mgon po nu bo dag las 'jig rten sgrol// 'di dag yan lag brgyad kyi chu yi
46b6(rgyud): mgon po mchog rab khyod dang 'dra ba ni// 'jig rten gsum po 'di na 'ga' ma mchis// bdag dgrol 'jig rten 'di dag grol bar mdzod// sring gsum rgya mtsho las kya
46b7(rgyud): 'gro ba sgrol// khyod ni sangs rgyas 'gro ba'i rtsa lag gcig/ rtag tu bzhugs shing chos ni bshad du gsol// de nas bcom ldan 'das sgo gang du gshegs pa dang / skad gcig de nyid la
46b8(rgyud): lha dang / k+Sha dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po na mkha' la rgyu zhing gdong mchi ma can gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bdag cag rnams kyis bde gshegs
47a1(rgyud): sngon mthong ba// zhi ba'i dus la shing tu slob ma dul// chos rnams rgya cher ston par mdzad pa na// de la 'di lta bu yi bgegs ma byung // ston pa 'di ni shin tu su
47a2(rgyud): rgya chen blo yis rang byung nyid brnyas te// thub dbang 'gro ba yongs smin mdzad skad du// 'jig rten nyon mongs bsgribs la chos ston cing // smra ba'i sang+ge 'dzin bzhugs bzhin du// sde/ 
47a3(rgyud): can dag ni bye ba stong mang po// 'di ltar chos rnams rab tu 'jig par byed// sangs rgyas dpa' bo grong du dang ma gshegs// de nas lha mo gzhan zhig gis 'di skad ces gsol
47a4(rgyud): sngon gyi rgyal ba 'jig rten phar brtson pa// de dag yul gcig 'khor lo bskor gyur pa// 'di ni gang du gshegs pa der yang bskor// de ring ma rung bar mi gyur te// de nas
47a5(rgyud): yang lha mo gzhan zhig gis 'di skad ces ga/ sol to// dad dpon 'dir ni thugs rje'i slang // shin tu sa mas can don mdzad spyad// de ni de ring grong khyer 'dor// ban+d+ha
47a6(rgyud): par 'gyur snyam bdag rtogo/ yang de'i tshe lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / na mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gdong ma
47a7(rgyud): ma zag cing ngo 'dzum gnag pa dag namakha'i ngos kyi lam las babs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'khod nas/ bdag nyid la rnam pa mang po byed do// la la ni skra 'bal/ 
47a8(rgyud): la ni rgyan 'grol/ la la na gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan stsol// la la ni bdag gi lus sa la rdob/ la la ni bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la 'dzin/ la la ni shaM
47b1(rgyud): tu nyon mongs par du/ la la ni lag pas brang rdung / la la ni bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs drung na 'dug cing so bya bzhin du 'gre ldog/ la la ni bcom ldan 'das kyis spyan sngar
47b2(rgyud): thal mo sbyar te/ bstod cing phyag 'tshal ba byed/ la la ni bcom ldan 'das la me tog dang / bdug pa dang / spos dang / phreng ba dang / gos dang / phyang 'phrul dang / gser gyi snad pa
47b3(rgyud): dang / mu tig gi phreng ba dang / ras bcos bu dag mngon par 'phor ro// de nas lha gzhan bye ba mang pos mgrin gcig tu skad mngon por 'di skad ces gsol to// 'jig rten don
47b4(rgyud): slang 'di bas mang ba yi// bya bar dka' ba khyod kyi sa rab tu spyad// zad pa'i dus deng 'dir ni khyod skyes kyis// btang snyoms mdzod la mi gshegs bzhugastsol/ sdi
47b5(rgyud): med khyod kyi sangs rgyas mdzad pa nyung ngu mdzad// lha dang mi rnams dbang du mdzad pa shin tu nyung // shin tu yu na ring chos rnams ston cing khyod bzhugs la// srid pa gsu
47b6(rgyud): gyi rgya mtsho 'di las 'gro ba sgrol// dge ba'i las rnams bgyid cing sa bon yongasu smin te/ bdud rtsi'i snod du gyur pa'i sems can du ma la/ khyod kyis thugs rje bskyed de sor
47b7(rgyud): rab sor la// chu bo las ni 'jig rten nyam thag bsgral bar mdzod// 'gro ba'i dgon pa'i dbus son 'khyam gyur cing // 'khor ba'i dgon par shin tu lam stor 'o// de dag pa
47b8(rgyud): ni lam mchog so sor ston// 'phags pa'i chos mchog cho ga gis thar bar mdzod// chos kyi 'khor lo dam pa gang bskor ba// de ni khyod kyi thugs rje ngo mtshar rmad // rlabs chen
48a1(rgyud): thugs mnga' ring du gzhugasu gsol// 'gro ba rnams ni mgor med ma gyur cig/ de nas yang lha mo gzhan zhig gis 'di skad ces gsol to// rnam ldan
48a2(rgyud): brgya lam ma rung gyur na ni// 'jig rten 'di ni ma lus ldongs par 'gyur// yan lag brgyad ldan rnam thar gsum gyi rgyu// 'dir na yangs ya thang ma mchis 'gyur// ngag lus sems
48a3(rgyud): las skyes dge sa bon dag/ bdag cag bag yod gyur pas 'dir btab ste// de slad bdag cag bde ba kun dang ldan// bsod nams 'byung gnas 'di brlag ma gyur cig/ yang de'i tshe
48a4(rgyud): gnas gtsang ma'i lha bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po dag de nyid du 'dus par gyur te/ de dag la 'di skad ces smra so// sa 'dir bya ba'i bdud rnams nyer lhags kyang // thub pa
48a5(rgyud): rlabs chen thugs mnga' nam yang ni/ ma rung mi 'gyur khyed cag ma 'jigs shig/ dag pa 'dal bdag cag mngon sum gyur// dpag tshad sum cu drug tu mgyogs
48a6(rgyud): shing drag shul ldan pas rab tu bskor// rna sbrang ral gri mchod rnon rtsa ba'i sgra mang 'jigs pa bdud kyi sde// byang chub snying por lhags pa de'i tshe de dag 'jigs shing brlag 'gyuran
48a7(rgyud): nga ltar dor brnyas grags pas khyab pa de lag la bgegs shig byed// de nas lha mo gzhan zhig ngu zhing 'di skad ces smra so// sngon byung ba ni bdud kyi sde gcig yin te dang
48a8(rgyud): dpung mi che/ 'di ni bye ba khrag khrig bdud kyi sde shin tu dpung che bas// 'jig rten rnam par 'drad pas 'dzir ni brlag par 'gyur du rab tu dgas// de brlag na ni 'jig rten 'di dag
48b1(rgyud): shin tu snang byed 'khyam par 'ong // de nas brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba de dag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la 'jus nas 'di skad ces gsol to// 
48b2(rgyud): blo zhad bdag cag gi ni tshig gson te/ dge ba bzhugs shig gtso ba thugs rje can// lha mang bye ba mya ngan chen pos gdungs// de la chos kyi bcud kyis da gtor cig/ de nas
48b3(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kyis thad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de la byams pa yangs pa'i spyan gyis gzigs nas/ de dag shin tu dbugs dbyung ba'i phyir tshangs pa'i dbyangs kyis 'di skad ces bka'
48b4(rgyud): stsal to// dang khyed ma 'jigs khyad ni ma skrag shig/ bdud rnams tha~Md bzhos bcas gcig char du// tshegs kyang spu gcig skrag par mi nus na// nga yis lus kun la ni
48b5(rgyud): smos ci dgos// deng ni 'jig rten thaMng dbugs phyung ste// nga yis rtag tu sa 'dir chos bshad do// lam rnams stor ba la ni nga nyid kyis// dri ma med pa yang dag la
48b6(rgyud): bstar bya// ngan sngon bya bar dka' ba mang po byas// zas dang skom yang shin tu rgya cher byed/ gnas dang slar yang mi lung sbyin byin pas// nga la ngang su gnod pa byed pa nus// ngas ni tang
48b7(rgyud): glang chen shing rta dang / lhab lhub phyung 'phrul dag gi rgyan rnams dang // bran po bran mo grong rdal yul 'khor btang // nga la su zhig gnod pa byed par nus// chung ma bu pho bu mo bran
48b8(rgyud): mang dang // yid 'ong dbang phyugs steng rgyal srid dang // sen rnams la phan phyir ngas byin gyis// nga lus de ring 'i phyir 'jig par 'gyur// mgo dang sna dang rna ba mig gnyis dang / 
49a1(rgyud): ngang lpags pa khrag dang rkang lag bcas// nga yi srog kyang lus can rnams la bdang / su zhig nga la 'chi bar byed par dus// ngas ni sangs rgyas bye ba
49a2(rgyud): mang la// gus ldan bdag gi lag nas shin tu mchod// rtag tu tshul khrims thos dang bzod la dga'// nga la su zhig brlag par byed par nus// ngas sdod shin tu bya dka' mang po
49a3(rgyud): rnams// mnyam par gzhag pas rab tung yis byas// lus kun bcad kyang nga la 'khrug med na// nga la rnam par 'tshe bar su zhig nus// nyon mongs ngas btul nges par suH
49a4(rgyud): sems can thang la ni byams sems sna na// khro mong phrag dog pa ba nga la med// nga yi mdun na de ring su zhig nus// ngas ni bdud kyi dpung rnams tshogs pa btul
49a5(rgyud): ngas ni bdud pham byed pa pham par byas// khyed kun rnam par thar par nges par bya// grong ngucu phyir mi 'gro ma 'jig shig/ sen dor phyir phyogs bcu 'di dag na/ 
49a6(rgyud): la la gang dag bzhugs pa rnams// sangs rgyas kun dang byang chub sada' yang // rdzu 'phrul chen po rnams ni kun nas bsogs// zhing rnams mtha' dag rab tu gang bar bya
49a7(rgyud): bsod nams ye shes ngag gis gnas par bya// sangs rgyas dngag tshul bcas kun gnas pas// sangs rgyas ngag gis dgongs pa'i mdzad pa bya// yang de'i tshe lha dang / k+Sha
49a8(rgyud): dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / lha mi yin dang namakha'i lding dang / mi 'am ci dang // lto 'phye chen po dang / mau dang mi ma yin pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya song grangs med dpag tu
49b1(rgyud): med pa dag gis bcom ldan 'das la la gso zhes bya ba gsol nas 'di skad ces smraso// ngo mtshar mang du byung ba grangs med pa'i brtson 'grus dang ldan pa la phyag 'a
49b2(rgyud): ngo mtshar chen po rmad du byung ba grangs med pa'i brtson 'grus dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshalo// bcom ldan 'das kyi lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig
49b3(rgyud): rten dbugs phyung // bcom ldan 'das kyi bdud kyi phyogs 'pham par mdzad // son rnams kyis mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa'i rnyog pa bsal to// san rnams kyi nga rgyal
49b4(rgyud): gyi ri rab tu bsku'o// spyi bil shing ljon pa britsa // 'chi bdag gi nyi ma phye mar blag so// ma rig pa'i mun po bsal to// gzhan mu stegs can rab tu dad par bsdu
49b5(rgyud): chu bo bzhi skam so// chos kyi sgron ma ra shu 'bar bar mdzad// byang chub kyi lam bstan to// bzod pa dang de sa ba la btsud do// bsam gtan gyi bde ba'i la rtser stsal // 
49b6(rgyud): 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi khong du chud par mdzad// ston pa bcom ldan 'das thugs rje chen po mnga' bas lha dang lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten skye ba'i rgya mtsho las bsgral to// 
49b7(rgyud): sa ni rnams 'jigs pa ma mchis pa'i grong khyer du rab tu gtsud do// de nas lha dang mi de dag gis bdug pa dang / me tog dang / spos dang / phreng ba dang / byug po dang / lhab lhub da
49b8(rgyud): rgyar sna tshogs kyis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par mchod nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi phyir lam de phyag dar byas// lha'i gos dang / me tog dang / lha'i ngas bcos thos su
50a1(rgyud): tu g.yog so// lha'i me tog man dar ba dang / man ngar ba chen po dang kha ru sha ka dang / pa ru sha ka chen po dang / many+dzu sha ka dang / many+dzu sha ka chen po dang / 
50a2(rgyud): mdog mdzes dang / mdog mdzes chen po dang / ud pa la dang / ku mu da dang / pad+mas kun tu g.yog so// gang du bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis 'dor ba'i lam de'i ngos
50a3(rgyud): gnyisu lha'i rin po che sna bdun gyi shing ljon pa mngon par sprul te/ lha'i ras bcos bu dang / mu tig gi phreng ba dang / lag rgyan dang / rna rgyan dang / mgo'i rgyan gyis rab tu
50a4(rgyud): brgyan to// shing de dag gi bar bar du lha'i rdzing bu grang zhing zhom pa'i chu dang zhing rnyog pa med la yan lag ba rgyang dang ldan pa'i chus kun tu gang ba/ khor yug tu rin
50a5(rgyud): che sna bdun gyis rgyan gyis brgyan pa dag sprul te/ bar snang la yang rin po che sna bdun gyi gdugs dang / rgya la mtshan dang kha dan dang / gser gyi skud pa dang / mu tig
50a6(rgyud): gi phreng ba bzang zhing gser gyi bye ma dag gi char yang phab bo// dngul dang / bai DUr+ya'i phye ma dang / a ga ru dang / rgya spos dang / dus kyi rjesu 'brang ba dang / tam la'i mdab ma'i cha
50a7(rgyud): yang rab tu phab bo// gor shi sha dang / tsan dan sbrul gyi snying po'i char yang lam der phab bo// lha'i rgyan sna tshogs gser gyi skud pa dang / mu tig gi phreng ba dang / nor bu dang / mu tig
50a8(rgyud): ngag gis kyang na mkha'i dkyil 'ang rgyan to// grong khyer gyi phyi rol na yang lha dang mi rnams bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir lam mdzes par byed do// grong khyer gyi nang
50b1(rgyud): na bdud dang bdud kyi 'khor rnams kyis kyang / bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir bkod pa dag bkod pa byaso// de nas deda'i cha bac+doMs dpa' bar 'gro ba zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la
50b2(rgyud): snyoms par zhugs nas// ti 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs bzhin du lam nas gshegs so// yang de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das sku gzugs dang / rtags dang spyod lam rnam pa sAH
50b3(rgyud): kyis lam der zhugs te/ de nas seMn gang dag tshangs pa la dad cing tshangs pas 'dul ba de dag gis ni bcom ldan 'das tshangs pa'i gzugasu lam nas gshegs pa mthong ba nas
50b4(rgyud): gang dag brgya byin gyis 'dul ba'i bar dang / gang ngag sred med kyi bus 'dul ba dang / gang dag dbang phyug chen pos 'dul ba dang / gang dag rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyis 'dul ba
50b5(rgyud): dang / gang dag 'khor los sgyur bas 'dul ba dang / gang dag khams kyi rgyal phran gyis 'dul ba dang / gang dag rdzu 'phrul chen pos 'dul ba dang / gang dag dge sbyong gis
50b6(rgyud): 'dul ba dang / gang dag gzhoni nus 'dul ba dang / gang dag bud med kyis 'dul ba dang / gang dag seng+ges 'dul ba dang / gang dag glang po ches 'dul ba dang / gang dag klus 'dul ba dang / 
50b7(rgyud): gang dag lha ma yin gyis 'dul ba dang / gang dag ri bong dang cing ri bong lag gis 'dul ba'i bar de dag gis bcom ldan 'das ri bong gi gzugs dang / rtags dang / spyod lam gyis
50b8(rgyud): lam nas gshegs par mthong ngo // sems can gang dag sangs rgyas kyis 'dul ba de dag gi ni bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi gzugs dang / rtags dang / spyod lam gyis lam
51a1(rgyud): nas gshegs par mthong ste/ san de dag pad kyang bal mo sbyar nas mngon par bstod cing phyag 'tshal te zham ring du 'brang zhing dong ngo // yang de'i cha gangs rgya
51a2(rgyud): dang nye ba na gnas pa'i drang sreng skar ma la dga' ba zhes bya bdud sdig can gyis btang nas de g.yog lnga brgya dang / rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po'i drung na sngon bcom ldan 'das pa
51a3(rgyud): srong gi gzugs dang / rtags dang / kha dog dang / dbyibs dang / spyod lam dang / bkod pa de lta bus lam nga nas gshegs shing / lha bye bo khrag khrig brgya snyeng mang po mchod pa byed par
51a4(rgyud): brtson par mthong ste// mthong nas kyang de 'di snyam du semaso// bden par 'di ni grang song chen po mthu che zhing mchod pa ra 'os po ste/ lha dang mis mchod par sAngo // 'di ni lus zang
51a5(rgyud): kyang bsod nams kyi mtshan gyi rgyar te/ mkhas shing slob dpon yin par sheso// bdag cag gnyis gang rgan gang mkhas pa de la ngas ji ltar brtag snyam ste/ de nas
51a6(rgyud): ltar bdag gis bsu la rigs dang / rus dang / gnas dang / brtul zhugs kun tu dri'o snyam du semaso// de nas drang srong skar ma la dga' bas bdag gi 'khor la bltas nas 'di skad
51a7(rgyud): smra so// thos ldan yid 'thang brtul zhugs che 'dzin mchod pa'i rigs par snang // ye shes chos don ldan zhing thub mchog bzod 'di lam rab mkhar/ khyed cag bde 'di la gus par
51a8(rgyud): mchod chen yang dag sbyor/ 'di las 'khor mthar 'gro ba'i legs bshad mnyan// de nas bram ze'i khye'u de dag bad kyis mgrin gcig tu mkhan pa de bzhin du bgyi'o zhes smras// 
51b1(rgyud): de nas drang srong skar ma la dga' ba g.yog dang bcas pa/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar thal mo sbyar te 'dug nas 'di skad ces
51b2(rgyud): gsol to/ khong su zhig/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dra ni bram ze'o// gsol pa/ khyod kyis gdung rus ci/ bka' stsal pa/ nga'i rus ni gau'u ta ma'o// gsol pa/ khyod kyis
51b3(rgyud): brtul zhugs ci/ bka' stsal pa/ nga'i brtul zhugs ni rnam par thar pa gsum gsol pa khyod kyi spyod pa ci/ bka' stsal pa/ nga ri yang dag pa'i mtha'i nga bzhin nyid la spyod do// gas
51b4(rgyud): pa/ khod kyis rab tu byung nas ji srid lon/ khakar stsal pa/ ma rig pa byung nas ji srid lon po/ nga rab tu byung nas kyang de sring lon no// gsol pa/ drang srong chen po skar ma
51b5(rgyud): bshad pa lung bstan pa'i rigs pa gsung ngam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sgro btags pa ma ngab mnyam nyid du'o// 'di ni 'jig rten gyi shes pa ste/ de
51b6(rgyud): la snying po ci zhig yod// drang srong gis gsol pa/ mkhas pa rnams dga' bar bgyid pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ skar ma'i gnas gang yin/ drang srong gis
51b7(rgyud): gsol pa/ gang zla ba dang nyi ma la rten cing rje su rgyu ba'i rgyu skar nyi shu rtsa brgyad brjod pa 'di dgo// de la mdzub ni sor brgyad kyi tshang de/ mdzub de'i tshad kyis lus la srid du mdzub
51b8(rgyud): bcu gnyis mchis par rigs par bgyi'o// glang po'i spyi bo la mdzub gang dang / rkang pa'i mthil la mdzub gang dang mdzub bcu bzhi ste/ skar ma rnams kyi gnaso// gang de dag na
52a1(rgyud): gda' ba ni rnam pa gzhan du mi 'gyur te/ skar ma gang dang gang la bcas pa dang nga ma ganga'o// de yang gang zhe na/ de bshad par bgyis/ thub pa chen po gso
52a2(rgyud): gcig/ sprin drug la ni su bcas pa// de yi gdong gi sor bzhi na/ g.yas phyogs na mi sme ba mchis// spu can gdag la mdog kyang dmar// long spyod bdog cing grags dang lda
52a3(rgyud): mkhas shing rab tu dpal 'bar te// smin drug la ni skyes pa yi// mtshan mi nyid ning lags// gang zhig pa ni sor bzhin// sme ba 'di nying gda' ba do// sna ma la ni skyes pa ste/ 
52a4(rgyud): shes shing rtag tu chos la dga'// mkhas shing long spyong phun sum tshogs// rnam pa kun tu mdzes dang ldan// dpa' zhing rgyal ba phur sum tshogs// dgu rnams rtag par ra
52a5(rgyud): tu 'joms// mgul ba yi ni mdzub phyed na/ gang la tshig pa 'dra ganga' ba// nga ni mgo la skyes pa ste// @'a zhing lo spyod ldan pa'o// mdzub kyi phung po gnyis
52a6(rgyud): pa la// bayon la sme ba gang mchis pa// lag la skyes pa khro ba ste// de ni blur zhing long sbyong ba dog/ mau chan khung g.yon na rma nag mchis// nab so la ni skyes pa ste// nor dang 'bru
52a7(rgyud): yang 'byor bar 'gyur// de ni shes pa'i rgya yang chung // ji ltar khyod ni rgyal la skyes// mtshon mchog dag ni rab tu dga'// phyag gi mthil na 'khor lo ni/ nyi ma lta bur rab tu
52a8(rgyud): mdzes// dbu sgra dag ni bar kyang // gyen du g.yas 'khyil legs par mchis/ sku ni chu zhing gab pa che// 'dren pa khyod kyis nyon mongs thul// tshig 'dra gang gi snying ka ma
52b1(rgyud): skag la skyes te thab mo sreng // tshul khrims 'chal cing 'grogs mi bde// de ni g.yem la dga' ba'o// 'og gam brang ngam rgya ba gcig na// gang la byi srar 'dra gda' ba// mchul
52b2(rgyud): smras te nor dang ldan// bcur zhing chos dang ldan pa'i mi// lte ba'i g.yas g.yon gnya ga na// gang la rma 'dra ganga' ba ni// de ni gre la skyes pa ste// saur sna che zhing tshe yang thung / 
52b3(rgyud): lto ba man chad sor bzhin// gang la sme ba rab ganga' ba// dbo la de skyes long spyod can/ khrims ldan 'chi 'phos mtho ris mchi// mo bzhi la ni skyes pa da// sme ba dmar po chus
52b4(rgyud): gdang// rku zhing g.yo ngan sgyu ma ste/ bsod na mas chung zhi shes pa zhon// gang gi mtshan na smra ba ni// gda' bar gyur pa nges par yang // nag pa la ni smras pa ste// 
52b5(rgyud): 'dod chags rtag tu gA gar dga'// mtshan gyi 'og gam steng na ni// smra ba ser po rab tu gda'// sa ri la ning skyes te// mi mkhas brkam zhing mang
52b6(rgyud): sdang // baR+Sha ginyis kyis ni mdzub gang na// sme ba dmar po de bzhin te// sa ga la ste shor ba mchog/ skyes pa bung med rnams kyiso bskor// mkhas shing dpal la dag snga
52b7(rgyud): thul// rtag tu bde la gnas pa ste// ngo tsha shes shing brtan dang ldan// shi 'phos nas ni mtho ris mche// brla gnyis kyi ri mdzub don// gang la byi srin 'dra gda' ba// 
52b8(rgyud): lha mtshams la ste tshul khrims can// chos dang long spyod ldan pa'o// gang gi brla 'og gnyis na ni// smra ba gda' ba snon la skyes// mi sdug che bung tshul khrims 'chal/ 
53a1(rgyud): dbul zhing snying rje ma mchiso// dbus mo gnyis ka'i gong na ni// gang la rma chung gda' ba de// snrubs las skyes te dbang bang can// myur du bdag khyim zhig pa
53a2(rgyud): dastong // chu stong la ni skyes pa dag/ smra ba dbus mo'i lga nga ma// sbyin pa 'gyod cing chos lam 'tshal// 'chi 'phos nas ni mthi ris mchi// chu smad la ni su skyes pa dgu 'dol
53a3(rgyud): ni smra ba mchis// de ltar ganga' bshes dang ldan// longs spyod ldan zhing sen byams// sme ba gnyis po ganga' ba ni// gro zhun la ste long spyod rtag/ de bzhin nang mongasan byams// 
53a4(rgyud): 'phos nas ni mtho ris mchi// sme ba nag po rje ngar lo// ganga' ba mon gru skyes pa ste// de ni khro zhing 'dod chag sa chung / long spyod ma mchis shes rab ldan// rje nga lan
53a5(rgyud): mdzub don// sme ba mal po rab tu ganga'// ma mgre la skyes blun pa ste// nga ni chu yis 'chi bar 'gyur//  ngad 'og gi mdzub gang na// rma'ang mchis pa khrums stong
53a6(rgyud): la// blun zhing gzhan la gnod pa bgyid// de ni dbul zhing kun po bgyid // gang la smra ba mdzub gang ma khams smad la ni skyes pa ste// sbyin ngang tshul khrims ldan pa dang / shes
53a7(rgyud): 'jig med snying rjer ldan// gang gi rkang pa gnyis ka la// smra ba phra mo ganga' ba ni// nam gru skyes pa ma rabs te// 'dreg mkhan du yang 'gyur ba lags// gang gi mthe bo'i phrag pa yang
53a8(rgyud): sme ba sngon po ganga' ba ni// rtag tu stobs ldan mdang ma mchis// tha skar la ni de skyes te// rkang ma'i la sla ba mchis pa ni// pra nyal ste snying bcu meng/ gsong ma'i gsheng ma'i nga chu
53b1(rgyud): na// shi 'phos nas ni dmyal bar michi// gang gis spong ba 'chal ba ni// skar mi'i gnas ni 'di dag lags// 'jig rten na ni rnam shes 'dis// sen rnams ni pha rol 'dran/ 
53b2(rgyud): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsol pa// kun tu rtog pa'i spyod yul can// byis pa gang la chags 'dus pa// de ni byis pa'i rmongs pa ste/ sems la gnas shing rims nang bcas// 
53b3(rgyud): dang sprul dang rus sbal dang // srog chags gzhan yang rnam mang po// skar ma rgyal la gang skyes pa// de dag bde la sten ma yin// ji ltar bsam gtan rdzu 'phrul dang // bar pa khyod kyis
53b4(rgyud): rnyed pa bzhin// nga yang bde gzigs pa ma// 6phyi nga la khyod mi 'dri// de nas drang srong skar ma la dga' bas// bcom ldan 'das la me tog gis gtor nas// yid rab tu rig
53b5(rgyud): ste// 'di skad ces gsol to// drang srong mi yi gzugs ni// mtshan mchog rnams kyang shin tu ganga'// khyod kyi gdung rus ma 'tshal na// lha 'am 'on te khyod mi la
53b6(rgyud): gsungs dang dbyangs dag 'byin pa ni// tshangs pa chen po bzhin du gda'// spyod pa'i gnas dang tshul gyis ni// sngon gyi drang srong rnams dang 'dra// thub pa ci 'dra phun sum tshogs// 'di sa
53b7(rgyud): ma mthong ma pos ma// khyad kyi sten gang de tsa sgra/ khyod kyi gdung rus tsa logs gsungs// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// pha rol tshu rol mi shes shing // mtshan la la mig
53b8(rgyud): gnas pa// de ngag sdug bsngal kun gyis bcing mo// da ni bar po'i sdong ma yim/ pha rol phyin grung ma rus// bram ze mngan shes drug dang ldan// yang dag dga' bya dag sla'o
54a1(rgyud): dbang po drug ni rnam par gzhig/ chos gsum rtogs pa'i shes dang ldan// nga yi spyod pa rnam par gsum// byang chub sems ni nam skyes pa// de ni nga ni rab tu byu
54a2(rgyud): mtshar ma rnams mi ngas ma dpags// mtshan ma meng par rab tu bsgoms// seMn med cing srog med po// bdag mang stong par mngor sangs rgyas// tshor ba gsum dang 'du byed gsu
54a3(rgyud): stong pa nyid du rnar bsgoms// ngi yi ye shes pha rol song // nga yi tshig 'di mtshungs pa med// gang dag mkhas bzhin ma chags par// byang chub byor ni sems bskyed pa// de dag bzod
54a4(rgyud): stobs phur sum tshogs// ye shes 'di 'dra 'thob par 'gyur// chos rnams la ni mi 'jug cing // rnam par smin pa 'dod mang la// de bzhin nyid las 'gal mi byed // dang/ 
54a5(rgyud): byang chub rnyed mi dka'// chos rnams la ni mi gnas shing // pha rol tshu rol mi brten par// yang dag maH'a ni 'dir bsgoms na// de bzhin gshegs pa nyid du 'gyur
54a6(rgyud): mtshan nyid med cing mtshan ma'ang med// dmigs pa dag ni rnar spangs// chos rnams kun dang ma 'dres na/ de bzhin gshegs pa nyid du 'gyur// rang gi mtshan nyid 'dir 'ong la/ 
54a7(rgyud): rang gi sems la ba chom spongs// na mkha' 'dra bar shes na su// nga 'dra sangs rgyas khyod 'gyur byos// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigasu bcad pa de dag gsungs ma thag tu
54a8(rgyud): de nas drang srong skar ma la dga' bas gas ga dang bcas pas/ bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi gzugs dang / rtags dang / spyod lam du zhugs par mthong nas// sngor gyi/ 
54b1(rgyud): ba'i rtsa ba rnams mngon du gyur to// de nas drang srong skar ma la dga' bas ting 'dzin gang thob ma/ byang chub se de'i rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo bzhin du 'dug nas/ ting 'dzin thang la baH
54b2(rgyud): zhing gzhan la rag las pa med de/ ting 'dzin thaMd kyis mi 'phrogs par 'gyur ba// byang chub se de'i ting 'dzin rin po che tog ces bya ba thob bo// de nas drang srong skar ma la
54b3(rgyud): dga' bas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar bal mo sbyar nas lag pa gnyis na me tog thogs te/ bcom ldan 'das la tshigasu bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod ngo // 
54b4(rgyud): yon+ta mtha' yas 'jig rten mgon po bdam pa gsung ba legs bzhugs pa/ khyod kyi ye shes spyan gyi 'od zer gyis ni 'jig rten kun snang mdzad// rtag tu sems can
54b5(rgyud): kur gyis slad du dpa' bo byams pas ma ngon 'phags pa// sen snying po chags pa zad pa 'dren pa khyod la ngang phyag 'tshal// gser gyi kha dog gser dang 'dra ba'i
54b6(rgyud): 'od zer rnams kyis bsil gyur pa'i// yon+ta ngag gis sen thams can byang chub rgyur 'gyur rab tu bskul// khyod kyis chos kyi 'khor lo rab bskor nyon mongs ri rnams ba
54b7(rgyud): par 'gyur// ba mi'i spyod pa byang chub shes pa'i rgyur ni nga ring mthar phyin to// smad pa chen pos san snying po mtshan rnams kyis ni rab brgyan pa// seMn snying po sangs rgyas 'gyur
54b8(rgyud): ba'i 'dren pa daring ba shong du gsol// bdag gis lta ba'i rgya mo bcang cing grol nas 'gro ba bsgral bar bgyi// ji srid kyis ni sangs rgyas 'gyur ba'i ma'i dam pas lung bsta
55a1(rgyud): gsal// sdug bsngal chu bos 'das pa'i sen sring pa'i mtsho las bslu bya bar bgyi// mya ngan 'das pa'i bang ba zag pa med pa'i lam la dgod par bgyi// phyog
55a2(rgyud): bcu dag na sangs rgyas gang rnams yon+ta rgya mtsho lta bu dag/ de dag bdag gis dbang du gsol te byang chub tu ni sems gzhol bgyi// drag cing mi bzang drub pa'i sdug bsngal dag gis
55a3(rgyud): reg pa'i seMn kun// dus gsum gyi ni bdag gis lus dang ngag dang yid kyi bsod nams des// sen thade sdug bsngal de ring zhi bar gyur cig sen kun/ sangs rgyas kyis ni bad dang
55a4(rgyud): ldan zhing rtag tu mya ngan 'da' bar shog/ sen pa mas cad nad zhir gyur cig nyon mongs chu yang bskams par shog/ dro ba nyid kyis ye shes dbang po snying po ldan pa thob gyur cig sa
55a5(rgyud): gang dag gsad par chad cing sdug bsngal ba/ gis gces pa rnams// de dag bdag gi bsod nams ga brjid dag gis myur du thar par shog/ sine ra res kyang ni sa/
