55a6(rgyud): rgya mtsho bang 'ob gyur cig/ shes rab bsod nams chad med pa dang bde ba kun gyis tshim par shog/ de dag sdig pa rnams spangs lta ba mnyam pa nyid du sten gyur cig/ sen pa
55a7(rgyud): slu ba dran zhing chos la spyod pa nyid du shog/ sen de kun chos grub srid pa'i rgya mtsho pha rol rgal gyur cig/ thaMd chos kyis pha rol phyin pa sangs rgya su yang grub par shog/ bskal pa
55a8(rgyud): dpag tu med par chos kyi char yang 'bebs shing 'dug gyur cig/ san thad chos kyi sprin gyi char chus legs par 'khru bar shog/ bdag gis lus dang ngag dang yid kyis nongs
55b1(rgyud): pa cung zad ci bgyis pa// sangs rgyas bde dbang du gsol te gus par bgyis nas sor bshags// bdag kyang phyin chad sdog la lta ba'i las rnams spyod par ma gyur cig/ rtag tu mdu
55b2(rgyud): na bsam gyis mi khyab gang zag mchog bzhugs mthong bar shog/ bdag gi bsod nams cung zad kyi mchos dang nas byang chub bsngo bar bgyi// ser chad dri spyod pa kun dang sdug bsngal
55b3(rgyud): bde spro bar bgyi// sin ba byang chub mchog gi lam du rab tu gzung bar bgyi// bskal par zhing dang ye shes sen rgya mtsho rnam par sbyang bar bgyi// gang du byang chub rag 'gyur zhing
55b4(rgyud): rnam par dag pa thob par bgyi// 'khor kun rnadag cing bzang ba'i sa la rab tu gnas par shog/ smra ba'i sa drangs par mngon par shes pa lnga rnams thob par shes
55b5(rgyud): 'dren pa chags med ye shes ldan zhing bde ba zigs pas lung bstan gsol// 'jig rten du yang sangs rgyas chos kun kha lo bsgyur bar 'gyur zhe na/ me tog sil ma
55b6(rgyud): gtor ba na mkha' la ni gdug su gnas par shog/ lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin mi rnams lhags pa kun kyang dbang gyis shig/ sa rnams g.yo bar byed cing khyod kyis zhabs la mgo bos
55b7(rgyud): phyag 'tshal shog/ de nas drang srong skar ma la dga' bas me tog de dag bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de'i stang log su gtor ba dang / me tog de dag bde bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug
55b8(rgyud): go stang bdugs gcig tu gyur nas 'dug ste/ drang srong skar ma la dga' bas de mthong nas rab tu zang zing med cing mchog tu dga' ba dang / yid bde bas tshim pa skyes par gyur
56a1(rgyud): nas dbus mo'i lha nga gnyis ka sa la btsugs nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la gtug so// drang srong chen po skar ma la dga' bas bac+doMs kyi zhabs
56a2(rgyud): gnyis la gtugs ma bag tu/ de nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i stong gsum gyi spong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rnam pa drug tugayos// ser bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gas
56a3(rgyud): med dpag tu med pa gang dag der lhags pa dag pad kyang / ying mi spro zhing ltang mor gyur to// gang dag glang po ches 'dul ba'i son de dag gis ni// bde bar gshegs pa glang
56a4(rgyud): che'i gzugasu mthong nas ying dga' bar gyur cing / drang srong chen po skar ma la dga' ba me tog gtong ba de dag steng gi bar snang las gdug su gyur te/ gnas dang / sa g.yos pa
56a5(rgyud): de yang mthong nas/ rab tu ngo mtshar du gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la gtug so// gang dag / yang sangs rgyas kyis 'dul ba'i sen de dag thams cad
56a6(rgyud): kyis ni// bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi cha byang du mthong nas ngo mtshar du gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting 'dzin las bzhengs pa dang / sangs rgyas
56a7(rgyud): kyi 'dul ba'i sen de dag gis ti nge 'dzin de las bzhengs par mthong nas/ zang zing med cing mchog tu dga' ba dang mgu ba skyes te/ bcom ldan 'das la me tog dang / spos dang
56a8(rgyud): bdug pa dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / na bza' dang / phyang 'phrul dang / rgyan ji snyed pa de dag gis gtor to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigasu bcad pa 'di dag bka'
56b1(rgyud): stsal to// drang srong chen po myur du longs la nyon// byang chub lung bstan zhes ni 'dren pa gsungs// ma'am pa med pa'i mthus ni sa g.yos shing // na mkha' la yang me tog gtu
56b2(rgyud): gcig 'dug/ khyod ni 'jig rten phar phyir ston dbang po// rkang gnyis ngag gi gtso bo sangs rgyasu// bsod nams mtha' yas na mkha' tshang mnyam pa/ khams gsum snying por
56b3(rgyud): 'gro ba'i sgron mar 'gyur// ngo nas byang chub senga' seng 'a chen po skad ma la dga' bas// bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// gang du bdag chos kyi 'khor lo bskor
56b4(rgyud): 'gyur ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing ngo tso 'dra bar 'gyur// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ khyod ni bska la pa grangs med dpag tu med pa na/ byang phyogasu sangs rgyas
56b5(rgyud): kyi zhing me tog rgyas po 'dri zhes bya ba 'byung te// sangs rgyas kyi zhing der ji ltar da ltar gyi 'jig rten gyi kham sa bde ba can bzhin du bkod pa de lta bu dang ldan par
56b6(rgyud): sangs rgyas kyi zhing der skyes bu dam pa khyod bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'chang rgya ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag pa
56b7(rgyud): pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhangasu ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa'i ba 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu gdul ba'i kha lo sbyar ba bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas
56b8(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das rdul med spos snang skar mi'i dpal zhes bya bar gyur te/ khyod kyi tshe tshad ni bor gyi bskal pa bcu thub par 'gyuraro// sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na nyan thos dang / rang sangs ma
57a1(rgyud): cing / byang chub sa dang sanga' chen po 'ba' zhig gi gnas gyur te/ khyod kyang de na theg pa chen po'i gtam 'ba' shig ston par 'gyuraro// 'khor ji snyed lhags
57a2(rgyud): pa rnams kyis byang chub senga' sanga' chen po skar ma la dga' ba'i lung bstan pa de mthong nas/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i las byed pa la brtson par gyur to// bram ze'i kha
57a3(rgyud): lnga brgya po de dang / srog chags bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag dgu bcu rtsa gnyis kyis/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par gyur to// de dag thaMd kyis
57a4(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa'i ting 'dzin byang chub kyi sems mi brjed pa zhes bya ba thob po// 'dus pa chen po rin po che to ga gi gzungs las drang srong skar ma la dga' ba'i le'u sna
57a5(rgyud): yin pa'o// / de nas bdud bye ba da/ 'di snyam du sems te/ ji ltar gleng khyer 'di'i phyi rol lha dang / klu dang / gnong gasbyi ngag gis rgyan pa de bzhin du/ bdag
57a6(rgyud): cag gis kyang bcom ldan 'das grong khyer 'di'i sgo gang nas gshegs pa'i sgo nga'i sa phyogs bkod pa'i rgyan dam pa khyad par du 'phags pas rgyan to snyam pa dang / de nas bcom
57a7(rgyud): ldan 'das kyi thugs kyis bdud bye ba de dag gi sems kyi kun tu rtog pa mkhyen nas/ 'di 'dra ba'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba mngon par mdzad// de ji lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon pa
57a8(rgyud): 'du bya ba mngon par 'du mdzad pas/ grong khyer gyi sgo bcu gnyisu sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bcu gnyis grong khyer gyi sgo re re nas/ rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen por gshegs/ 
57b1(rgyud): bdud bye ba de dag kyang namakha' la gnas bzhin du// bdud kyi yul gyi rnar 'phrul pa'i rgya ni shin tu khyad par du 'phags pa'i/ rdzu 'phrul grangs med pa dang ldan pa/ bkod po'i mchag
57b2(rgyud): rnams dang bkod pa mdzes pa rnams kyis grong khyer gyi sgo de dag dang / si'i phyogs de dag dang / rtsig pa de dag dang / shing de dag dang / sa'i ngos de dag rgyan te// bdud ba ba de dag dang
57b3(rgyud): bdud kyi 'khor nga ngag la la ngag ni/ tshangs pa'i cha byang lta bu nas/ drang srong chen po'i cha byang lta bu'i bar du bsgyur te/ nam mkha' la gnas bzhin du khang pa brtsegs pa de dag gi skar
57b4(rgyud): khung dang / rta babs dang / ba gam dang / skye shing gi nang na me tog dang / spos dang / bdug pa dang / phreng ba dang / gser dang / dngul dang / nor bu dang / mu tig sna tshogs kyis spras pa dang / 
57b5(rgyud): gos dang / ras dang / ras bcos bu sna tshogs dang / lhab lhub kyi rgya rnams kyi char ni rab tu phag sil sna na dang / dkrol ba sna tshogs ni dkrol nas/ bstod pa dang / 
57b6(rgyud): yon+d+ra bsngags pa sna tshogs kyi dbyangs kyis bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byung ngo // bcom ldan 'das de ltar ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba chen po sngon ma thos pa'i bkod pa mchog tu
57b7(rgyud): rgya che ba khyad par du 'phags pas/ rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po'i sgo na bzhugs te/ zhabs g.yas pa'i mtha bos spo'i thim pa la reg par mdzad do// bcom ldan 'das
57b8(rgyud): kyis sgo'i bem pa de la reg ma thag tu de nas de'i mong la/ thaMng dang ldan pa'i stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rab tu g.yo so// gang song gsum gyi sto
58a1(rgyud): chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'i brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / nyi ma dang / zla ba dang / 'jig rten skyong ba dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sgra
58a2(rgyud): dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / na mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po'i dbang po dag dang / sa dang / chu dang / rgya mtsho chen po dang / grong khyer dang / yul 'khor gyi lha dang / skyes pa
58a3(rgyud): dang / bud med dang / khye'u dang / bu mo dang / lha'i drang srong chen po'i 'khor dang / 'og mir gyi bar dang bzung ste/ sen gzi brjid che ba gzi brjid che ba de dag thang g.yos par snang ba
58a4(rgyud): nges bskul ma thag tu rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer cheran po kho ra khor yug tu bskor nas/ sa dang na mkha' la gnas shing / me tog dang / spos dus kyi rjesu 'brang ba'i phye ma'i ba
58a5(rgyud): gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la gtor to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis me tog dang / phye ma'i bar de dag phyo gas bcu'i phyogs kyi char ra na yang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing rdul
58a6(rgyud): phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing yong su dag pa dang / yongasu ma dag pa dang / stong pa dang / mo stong pa rnam su/ sangs rgyas la mchod cing bsti stang bya ba'i phyir na mkha'
58a7(rgyud): gtor ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag tu me tog dang / phye ma dang / rgyan de dag las tshig su bcad pa 'di dag byung // myur du sad par gyis la 'di dag bltas// byang chub phyir ni bag
58a8(rgyud): yod spyad pa spyod// khyod kyis 'khor ba'i gtsang rong 'khyams pa yi// 'jig rten thams cad dag ni bskal bar byos/ yongasu smin dang ldan shing dus bab gyis// g.yang bang
58b1(rgyud): gyur pa rab tu myur thong la// 'dir ni sngon gyis dam bcas yid la byor// byang chub lung bstar rab tu thob par 'gyur// thub dbang drang srong chen po mya ngan mang // 'gro la phan phyir
58b2(rgyud): ring grong khyer gshegs// bdud stong bye ba rang gis pha ma mdzad // de ni chos kyi 'khor lo myur du bskor// grogs po zhi ba 'di la 'gro dga' mdzad// dpa' mchog dngos po
58b3(rgyud): yang dag spyod pa mdza // 'gro ba'i sdug bsngal dag las par mdzad nas// byang chub du ni de ring lung yang ston// rang byung mya ngan mang pa'i grong khyer gshegs// de phyir zhing der rab tu
58b4(rgyud): myur gshegs la// de ltar mdzes pa de da ga rab ltos te// rim gyis byang chub du yang 'gyur b.rabyos// yang de'i tshe 'od mi'i tshal na byang chub se nga sang 'chen
58b5(rgyud): bi dang / nyan thos dang / nyan pos chen po gang ngag nang du yang dag 'jog la gnas pa de dag gis ston pa de la bltas pa dang / bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab rgya
58b6(rgyud): grong khyer chen po'i sgo na 'dul ba la gzhes shing 'dug pa mthong ngo // de nas byang chub seMnga' sanga' chen po nga dang / nyan thos chen po de dag ba / bcom ldan 'das kyi snam lag
58b7(rgyud): su 'khong pa dang / bkod pa chen po de dag kyang mthong // de nas me tog dang / phye mo'i rgyun de dag las tshig su bcang ba'i sgra gang byung ba de dag gis phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing
58b8(rgyud): yongasu dag pa dang / yongasu mngag pa dang / stong pa dang mi stong pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snang bde du gang bar gyur to// sangs rgyas kyi zhing dngag na byang chubs
59a1(rgyud): dpa' song 'a chen po dang / nyan thos chen po gang dag gnas pa de dag gis sgra ngo bos nas 'di snyam du sems te/ yid du 'ong ba 'di lta bu/ ro myang bar 'os pa
59a2(rgyud): 'di lta bu/ dga' bar bya bar 'os pa 'di lta bu/ tshim par byed pa 'di lta bu/ spro bar byed pa 'di lta bu/ yon+ta chen po brjod par 'os pa 'di lta bu'i sgra 'di dang / me tog dang / phye ma
59a3(rgyud): char 'di yang ga las 'ongs snyamo// de nas byang chub senga' sa pa chen po de dag dang / nyan thos chen po de dag rang gi dge pa'i phyogs btang ste/ ngo mtshar cher 'dzin par gyur to// 
59a4(rgyud): nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa/ sangs rgyas kyi rgyan dang / lhab lhub kyi rgyu 'thun pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhug so// bcom ldan
59a5(rgyud): 'das sangs rgyas kyi rgyad dang / lhab lhug gyi rgyu 'thun pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhug sa ma thag tu/ de nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'jig rten
59a6(rgyud): gyi khams mi 'jed 'di dang / phyogs bcu sangs rgyas kyi zhing bang du bkod pa chen po 'di lta bu snang ste/ 'di lta ste/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/ de bzhin gshegs bku
59a7(rgyud): tu gzigs zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams rdar dag cing / rdul bsags pa med ces bya bar yang sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon+ta bkod pa 'di 'dra ba dang ldan par 'gyur/ rtsig
59a8(rgyud): ba med la legs par rgyad gyi phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed bang du yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa / 
59b1(rgyud): thub pa nga rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po'i spro nas shin tu lham me lhan ma/ lhang nger bzhugs bar snang ba ni ma gtog so// sangs rgyas kyi zhing nga ngag tu yang byang chub
59b2(rgyud): sede'i nga dag dang / nyan thos chen po de dag smra bos pa des bskul ba dang / phyogs bzhir blta zhing 'khor de/ de dag bad kyis 'jig rten gyi khams mi 'jed 'ang ha cang yang
59b3(rgyud): mi ring ba na 'dug par mtho do// sangs rgyas kyi yul gyi lha'i rnar 'phrul pa'i rgyan de dag thams cad kyang mtho // de nas byang chub se del sa de' chen po ngo dag dang / nyan thos
59b4(rgyud): chen po de dag 'di snyam du sems te/ bangag cag kyang 'dus pa chen po'i bkod pa de dag dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa de dag blta bar
59b5(rgyud): brtag pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa nga yang blta ba dang / phyag bya ba dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir dang 'dong // der ni bdag cag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
59b6(rgyud): byang chub tu lung bstan pa yang thob par 'gyur gor ma chags snya mo// de nas phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed zad kyi byang chub
59b7(rgyud): senga' sanga' chen po dang / nyan thos chen po de dag nga bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi mthus// rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas mi snang bar gyur te/ skad cig
59b8(rgyud): bang cig yud tsam de nyid la 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'di du phyin to// de'i tshe phyogs bcu'i phyogs re re nas kyang / byang chub senga' sanga' chen po grangs mang dpag tu
60a1(rgyud): mang pa/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed rnams kyang 'dir lhags nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di bde sa dang na mkha'i bar ma lus par gang ba
60a2(rgyud): gyur to// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag/ byang chub se de'i dag pa'i rtsa ba sna tshogs kyis rgyu 'thun pa rnams par 'phrul ba'i byin gyis brlabs kyis/ de bzhi
60a3(rgyud): gshegs pa shAkya thub pa la mchod pa'i bya ba'i phyir brtson par gyur to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la la dag gis mi/ bcom ldan 'das la mched
60a4(rgyud): pa bya ba'i phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di thang me tog sna tshogs kyi cher gyis khabs par byaso// la la ngag gis ni mu tig gi char bab pa nas de bzhin du sbyar te/ bcom ldan pa
60a5(rgyud): la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir// la la ngag gis ni gsar dang / dngul dang / bai DUR+Ya dang / shal dang / rdo'i snying po dang / spug dang / gor shing sha dang / tsAn sbrul gyi snying po dang / 
60a6(rgyud): shing ha ma la'i lo ma'i char gyis na mkha' khebs par byaso// bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bya ba'i phyiraro// la la ngag gis ni lhab lhub pa dang / phyang 'phrul dang / 
60a7(rgyud): rgyan dang / ras dang / ras bcos ma sna tshogs kyi char rab tu phob po// bcom ldan 'das la mchod po bya ba'i phyir// la la ngag gis ni rin po che'i gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan
60a8(rgyud): dang kha dan sna tshogs spro // bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir/ la la dag gis ni spos sna tshogs kyis gdug so// la la dag gis ni rin po che'i phreng ba sna tshogs
60b1(rgyud): gtor to// la la dag pa'i ni sil snyan dang dkrol ba sna tshogs dkrolo// la la ngag gis ni glu dang gar dang rol mo'i sgra rab tu bstan to// la la dag gis ni sa phyogs ngar spras
60b2(rgyud): chu sna tshogs kyi char gyis chag chag btabo// la la dag gis ni rin po che'i sna tshogs kyi spong rnams rin po che sna tshogs kyis bka' ste// bcom ldan 'das kyi sman sngar po bas
60b3(rgyud): la la ngag gis ni rin po che'i snod sna tshogs rnams spos chus bkang ste/ me tog dang / 'bras bu dang / lo mas rgyan nas// bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar thogs// la la rigs
60b4(rgyud): ni rin po che'i shing ljon pa sna tshogs lha'i gos dang / rgyan dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu sna tshogs kyi sa brgyan nas/ 'phang stong ngo / thog so// la la dag gis ni bas
60b5(rgyud): nyid tshangs pa cher po'i cha byang du mngon par sprul te/ thal mo sbyar nas/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag byas te/ 'khor ba nas rgya cher ji ltar gong du smos pa bzhi 'o// la la dag
60b6(rgyud): gis ni sang+ge'i cha byang du mngon par sprul te/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas 'khod do// bcom ldan 'das kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi mthu dang / rang gi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i stobs
60b7(rgyud): bskyed pas son de dag par chur mig dbang pos gzugs snang ba rnams la thag pogs ma // sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyang de lta bu'i bdud kyi yul chen po
60b8(rgyud): la rnam par 'phrul pa'i byin gyis brlabs rnams dang / rang gi dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang / yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi nang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / 
61a1(rgyud): byang chub kyi yan lag dang / lam dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi yul gyi rnam par 'phrul pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyis/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal
61a2(rgyud): khab kyi grong khyer chen por gshegs nas/ srang gi dbus na pad+ma yod pa ga la ba der gshegs te bon nas/ phyag g.yas pa'i mthil gyis pad+ma'i snying po la reg par mdzad de drangs nas
61a3(rgyud): bzhug so// pad+ma de drangs te g.yos pas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di'i ri khor yug dang / ri'i khor yug chen po dang / ri'i rgyal po ri rab dang / rgya mtsho chen po dang / bdud kyi gnas bde kyang gtso
61a4(rgyud): so// bdud kyi gnas tha na gzhal med khang dang / gnas khang dpal dang / lam dang / stan rnams kyang rab tu gas so// de nas gang bdud kyi bu rnams dang / bdud kyi bu mo rnams dang / bdu
61a5(rgyud): kyi bu tshogs kyi 'khor gnas par dag kyang 'ardzogs spags cing skyo ba skyes nas phan tshun 'di skad ces 'dzer to// rgyu med rkyen meng par ni gzhal med khang 'di dag
61a6(rgyud): g.yo bar mi 'gyur na/ bdag cag gi rgyal po bdud de rang gi yul nas 'ongs par ma gyur gang / bdag cag kyang khang pa 'di nas 'chi 'phos pa'i chos 'byung bar mi 'gyur glang / 
61a7(rgyud): bdag cag gis blta gor ma chag snyam ste/ de nas de dag gis mthong nas 'di snyam du sems te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di ni snyigs ma lnga can du gyur na/ 'di sus lags pa
61a8(rgyud): rgyan cing / shin tu nyams dga' bar byas snya mo// de nas rang gi yul na gnas pa'i bdud g.yog dang bcas pa de dag nga na 'khod bzhin tu yang de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya'i thub pa
61b1(rgyud): dasus bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par rgyan cing shin tu lhame/ ldan ne/ lhang nger bzhugs pa mthong ngo // bang dang ldan pa'i stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'ji
61b2(rgyud): rten gyi khams 'di dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di tha~Md kyang san gzugs dang / kha dog dang / rtag dang / dbyibs sna tshog su gnas pa sha stag gis yongasu gang nas/ sems can gcig
61b3(rgyud): kyang ngo mi shes te/ sen de dag zad kyang bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir mngon par brtson par mthong // de nas de dag yang 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag cag kyang de bzhi
61b4(rgyud): gshegs pa shAkya bab pa de la blta ba dang / phyag bya ba dang / da ltar bdag cag jo bo dang g.yog tu bcas pa/ gar dong ba yang dri ba'i phyir der 'dong gor ma chag ska
61b5(rgyud): de nas yang de'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di bdud bye ba phrag brgya po ngadag bde g.yog dang bcas par bca ma ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa ga la ba
61b6(rgyud): dong ste/ lhags nas spyan sngar 'khod do// de nas bdud sdig can gyis bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logasu thal mo sbyar ba btung nas 'di skad ces gsol to// rab tu rnar dang
61b7(rgyud): sems kyis/ bcom ldan 'das bdag ni skyabasu mchi bdag khrol 'di nas myur du mchi// chos ni yang dag spyad par bgyi// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// 'gro ba pa ni
61b8(rgyud): 'ong ba yang // ngas ni su yang bzlog pa med// gal te lam ni rab shes na// gang du dga' bar 'gro bar byos// bdud sdig can gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// rang gi spyod yul
62a1(rgyud): dga' bar// gang che bdag ni mchi 'tshal che// bdag ni bcing ba lnga dag gis// bcings pa mthong go'u tam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// nga ri rtog
62a2(rgyud): bkun spangs te// grol nas 'gro ba grol byed pa/ ngas ni 'che ba rnam spangs nas// sems can bcings 'bar bar bya// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis/ 
62a3(rgyud): sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di thang sa dang namakha' la gnas pa'i sen rnams kyis yongasu gang ba la gzigs nas// tshigasu bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to// 'dir lpags pa dag par
62a4(rgyud): bcom pade rab spongs la// skad cig ci yang ma spro bar/ khyed cag rnams ni danyon cig/ rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'jig rten dkon// chos dang ngag 'dun shin tu dkon/ dad cing
62a5(rgyud): mos pa 'byor pa dang // byang chub spyod pa shin tu dko no// 'jig rten mgon po'i mngon sum du// chos nyan pa yang shin tu dkon// gang du bzong pa bster byed pa// 
62a6(rgyud): dus ni snyid par dka'// gang du 'jig rten sdig pa yi// rtog pa bde rab spong ba// stong pa nyid ri sgom pa dang // sems ni dul bar byed pa dkor// ji ltar ngas sngor spyad pa yi
62a7(rgyud): byang chub spyod pa snyed par dka'// de las me tog tsam mchod cing // khyed cag rnams la bshad par bya// gang gis byang chub 'byor byed pa// sred pa'i bcings las rnam grol zhing / 
62a8(rgyud): mur ba'i phung po sel ba yi// lam gyi mchog ni bstan par bya// dri ma ngon pa gsum spongs la// ston pas gsung ba 'dir nyon cig/ chu bo rnams ni pha rol rgol// rgya mo can gyi sred pa
62b1(rgyud): spongs// rnam par gsum la rab gnas shing // sdom pa gsum la yang dag gnos// khams gsum gyis ma nyon mongs gang // de dag ma lus rnam par chom/ dkor mchog gsu
62b2(rgyud): gyi rigs mchod dang // chos kyi don du khyed cag rnams// sangs rgyas lha dang bdud gsum gyi// byin rlabs sprul pas lhags pa rnams// dus gsum ma rig bsgribs pa
62b3(rgyud): sems// bye brag tu ni rab spongs la/ khams gsum pa las grol ba yi// zhi byad bzod pa thob par byos// phyir ci log ni rnam bzhi yis// so'i skye bo bslang ba rnams// dngos po
62b4(rgyud): med la rtog byed pa/ de dag bzod pa'i sdong ma yin// mig ni gzugs la chags pa yis// lus dang ngag ngang sems bsgribs nas// bsam gtan bzhi dang bral ba
62b5(rgyud): rnams// 'khor ba shin tu rten par gyur// ja garten na ni gang mkhas gsal// bsam gtad sgom par byed pa rnams// de dag phyin ci log bzhi las// de ring rnam par gro
62b6(rgyud): bar 'gyur// dbang phyug de dag san rnams// chu bo bzhi las bar bar byed// 'chi 'pho smras par rab shes pa// nges pa rnams ni pha rol 'gro/ byang chub seng 'jigs med pa
62b7(rgyud): kang ba bzhi dang ldan pa dag/ san srid pas bcings pa rnams// yang dag shes pas gi cod par byed// phung po lnga rnams yongs shes pa// zhags pa las grol zag pa med// 
62b8(rgyud): dang yang du mi skra ste// srid pa'i rgya mtsho'i pha rol phyir/ sangs rgyas rnams kyi spun sngar khyang // sdig pa dag mi myur du shog/ sdig pa ma lus rab spongs la// 'jigs pa med
63a1(rgyud): par pha rol song // srid par yang dang yang skyes pa// sdig pa'i grogs kyi dbang song bas// 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal de dag ni// 'dus byas la yang myos par
63a2(rgyud): sdig pa'i grogs pa rab spangs te/ sdig pa'i lta ba rnam bor nas// 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal dran byas te// dpa pa'i chos la rab sbyor cig/ btung ba'i dam pa btung bar byos
63a3(rgyud): stong pa nyid kyang rabs sgom shig/ dam pa'i ngan la dngos po mang // rdzas kyang med cing mtshan nyid meng// 'di ltar dbang po drug stong ste/ byed pa po ni 'dil mang // de bzhim
63a4(rgyud): mar rtogs pa yang // dngos po tsam ste g.yo ba med// tshor ba drug dang srad pa drug/ reg pa drug las byung ba yin// de bzhin reg pa'i skye mched drug/ stong pa yin par shes par byos/ 
63a5(rgyud): rang bzhin gyis ni dngos med par// dngos po nyid la brtag par byos// skye ba med cing 'gag med pas/ 'di na rdzas kyang med pa ltos// gang gis chos kun tshul
63a6(rgyud): ste// dus gsum du yang dngos med par// sa pa de dag nang ma dang // de ni bla na med pa'i lam// rnam pa ba cu drug nges grol la// son 'du shes rnam 'jig cing // tshu
63a7(rgyud): pha rol rnam grol ba// de ni bzod pa sgom pa yin// de nas gang gi tshe/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bsod nams kyi stobs rnams dang / mi 'jigs pa'i shugs dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba'i
63a8(rgyud): rgyu 'thun pa'i byin gyi brlabs kyis dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sgra thogs pa med pas tshigasu bcad pa de dag gsungs pa de'i mong la phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams stong
63b1(rgyud): ba dang / mi stong pa sdigs ma lnga can gadz+ra'i klung dpag tu med pa mi 'khrugs pa'i bye ma snyed rnamasu dadangs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi tshig brjod pa 'di dag grags par gyur nas// de
63b2(rgyud): mo la sangs rgyas kyi zhing ra ra nas kyang seMn bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong grangs meng dpag tu med po dag ni shin tu zang zing med pa'i dga' ba dang / ngang pa rnyed de/ bla na med pa yang
63b3(rgyud): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par gyur te/ la la ngag gis ni ting 'dzin dang / bzod pa dang / gzungs sna tshogs thob bo// sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir 'dus pa
63b4(rgyud): sem grangs med dpag tu med pa rnams kyis mi/ don dang tshig dang yi ge 'di dag bos nas phyir mi ldog pa'i sa thob par gyur to// sen grangs med dpag tu
63b5(rgyud): med pa dag ni// theg pa gsum po dag gis nges bar 'byung ba thob par gyur to// de nas byang chub senga' sade' chen po skar ma la dga' bas pad+ma'i khri la 'dzeg par bya ba'i
63b6(rgyud): phyir// rang gi rdzu 'phrul gyi mthus ring po che sna bdun gyi them skas me tog gis kun tu g.yogs pa mngon par sprul te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logasu thal mo sbya
63b7(rgyud): bas btung nas 'di skad ces gsol to// bdi mkhan pa rga shi mya ngan gyi// 'dam du bying ba'i 'jisten thos cad la// rab tu gzigs te mi rgyu rgyur bcas kyi// 'jig rten
63b8(rgyud): du ni chos kyi zam pa thogs// bal po sbyar ba son rgya cher rgyas// rab tu bltams pa'i zhing la gzigs nasu// chos kyi mchod sbyin rab tu 'ag bar gsol// rang gi mthu
64a1(rgyud): rtsal rjor sar du gsol/ mtshungs pa med pa pad+ma mngon 'dzegs te// mgon pa shes rab car gyi babs rnams kyis// spos chu spri gyi char pa rab phab la// tshan ma
64a2(rgyud): gzir ba'i mi la bstadan du gsol// phyogs bcu dag gi sangs rgyas pad dang // drang srong chen po shes rab ldan pa gzhan// khyod kyi dbang dung dag kun bzhugs kyis// babru pa'i dbang ba
64a3(rgyud): bdud rnams pham par mdzod// chos rnams song ba na mkha' lta bu dang // ngo bo nyid kyis ya ma rAng mkhyen nas// sngon gyi dam bcas rnams ni dgongs mdzod la// bla na med 'khor
64a4(rgyud): lo dam pa bskor du gsol// chu bo bzhi dbus 'khod pa'i seMn rnams// mi yi sing+ge sa nga ring ba sprul dug/ sol// khyod kyis chos rnams shin tu bugasu chud// srong
64a5(rgyud): gsum mtho las 'jig rten bsgral dugs la// shin tu rlabs chen 'grus mnga' bcom ldan 'das// be bar gshegs kyi lam ni bde ba la// 'gro ba gzung mdzod
64a6(rgyud): mtshungs meng chos kyang ston// 'jig rten nyes pa'i dri ma gsal du gsol// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis ji ltar bur sprul pa'i 'am skas de las pad+ma'i khri la mngon pa
64a7(rgyud): 'dzegs te/ pad+ma'i snying po la bzhug so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis phyogs bcu'i bde du rnam par gzigs nas bdud sdig can la bka' stsal pa// sdig can ji ltar
64a8(rgyud): khyod kyi rkyen gyis ngeng 'dir 'dus pa chen po chos kyi rnam grangs bshad/ pas/ sen grangs med dpag tu med pa dag mngal na gnas pa dang / rga shis gtse ba rnams las rma/ 
64b1(rgyud): grol bar 'gyur/ rnar bar bar 'gyur/ chu bo bzhi las yang dag par rgal bar 'gyur/ zhi ba'i lam la gnas par 'gyur/ na mkha' dang mtshungs pa'i ye shes khong du chud ba
64b2(rgyud): 'gyur te/ 'di la sdig can khyod ni seMn rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba rnar 'phel ba'i thog mar 'gro ba yin gyi khyod dga' bar gyis shig/ sdig can khyod kyis ngal chos bsha
64b3(rgyud): gsol cig dang / ngas deng bdud kyi dkyil 'khor mngon po'i yul gyi chu bo'i pha rol tu 'gro bar bya ba'i phyir chos bstan to// de ras bdud sdig car gyis de'i tshe tshigasu bcad
64b4(rgyud): pa 'di smraso// ji ste sdig byed khyod la bab zhe sdang rgyags mngan// ci phyir ngang 'dir kun tu skrag par bya ba'i phyir chos kyang sor// de sA khyod la ba brgyags dang nga rgyal yod na ni/ 
64b5(rgyud): thub dbang khyod kyi thar pa ci 'dra ba dag la 'di ra shog cig bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pang ni ma la mngal gyi gnas na zla ba bcu gnas pa// de na yang
64b6(rgyud): ni bdang khyod nga la bsad par rab tu sbyar// de tshe nga la khor dang tha ba cung zad tsam yang med// nga ni bzod dang ldan te tha ba ma lus med pa yin// nga ni bcas ma thag
64b7(rgyud): 'di khyod kyis sa yang g.yo bar byas// nga bsang phyir ni rdo ba'i char pa rab tu dbab par byas// de na khyod kyis nga yi ma'i nu zho myur bskams byas// khyod kyis nga la gnod pa du
64b8(rgyud): ma ci mi byas// nga ni bsam gtan zhugs na khyod kyis bud meng khrid de 'ongs// nga ni bsod snyoms rnam par spyod tshe zas kyang bcang ba byas// khyod kyis de chang la rgyal srid mngon pa
65a1(rgyud): / rab tu bstabs// nga ni byung ba'i nub mo 'dir yang mur pa byas par gyur// de tshe khyod dang skyes bu rnams kyis grong khyer kun tu bskor// rdzu 'phrul gyis ni song ste
65a2(rgyud): rdzi char drag po phag// sa ni 'dom ngo 'phang tsame rdo ba dag gis gang bar byas// zhi ba'i gnas ni gnas pa'i tshe yang sgra ni rab tu phyung // nga ni shin tu dka' ba spyod tsha grang ba'i rlu
65a3(rgyud): dang ni// 'bab chu 'gram na gnas tshe khyod kyis chu bo rab tu btang // nga ni bsad par bya phyir khyod kyis sang+ga rab tu btang // nga tshe khyod kyis nga yi zas la drag po'i dug kyang btab/ 
65a4(rgyud): ni byang chub shing drung nye bar yang dag song ba na// rdo rje dang na gnam lcags spu gr-i mnga' tshor khyod kyis phag// 'grol bar phyir rdo rje'i gdan la mngon par gnas pa na/ khyod kyis
65a5(rgyud): phu smrig gos kyang 'jim rdzab dag gis ra tu bskus// de na yang migar khyod kyis bu mo rnams kye ste// nga bsang phyir ni khyod nyid mthu dang bcas te'ong
65a6(rgyud): mad kyi// 'on kyang khyod kyis nga yi yid la gnod bya sa cung zad med// ngas ni khong brtul nas ni byang chub mtshung sa pa med pa bob// 'on kyang ngo tsha bor te 'dir 'ongs nas ni
65a7(rgyud): yang smra 'am// sdig pa'i tshul gyis 'od sang mchog la sogs pa bzlog byas te// khyod kyis son bye ba du ma rung byas nas kyang // snying rje bor te 'dir 'o ba la rgol zhing rgyu byed dang
65a8(rgyud): nga ni zan zos pa'i tshe yang khyod kyisu// nga bo sang phyir ni glang chen myos pa drag shul tsin yang btang // sa steng ngal lha byin gyis ni rdo ba 'phangs pa dang // kye ma ngas ni zla ba gsu
65b1(rgyud): du rta chas zos pa dang / phyang ka bdang phyir bu mo mdzes ldan rab tu gang btang ba dang // pe ya mdag 'bar ba mi bzad pas ni 'o bos rnams bkang ba dang // kha zas dag ni myur du gdug
65b2(rgyud): pa'i dug dang sbyar ba yi// nga la sdig pa'i las can khyod ni rtsa bar nges pa yan/ khrod nyid dpung bcas bu dang lhan cig sngar bcas 'ongs na su// nga bsang phyir ni mnga' bo che dang ral
65b3(rgyud): gri mnga' mdo begs// 'on kyang 'dir ni khyod kyis ngo yi spu gcig ma g.yos ni// ci phyir khyod ni rgyags par gyur nas 'di na nga dung 'dug/ ji ste bdud ni stong phrag bye ba rgol du
65b4(rgyud): yang bcud kyang // sems can khrag khrig dag ni 'di ru yang dag lcags na su// zhing kun rab tu gang bar 'dug pa nga yi dbang yin te// nga ni khyod phyir mchog tu bya
65b5(rgyud): pa'i yod kyis gnas pa bya// nga ni snying rje gnas te 'gro ba rje su 'dzin byed pa// khyod ri shin tu gtum po la rtag tu gegs byed de// thub pa'i dbang po khyu mchog 'ding
65b6(rgyud): nga yi dbang yin gyis// da ltar tha ma'i dus la nga ni sangs rgyas mdzad pa bya// rnam thar sems kyis seMn rnams kyi don kyang spyad par bya// smras par gyur pa 'ang bzod pa yongasu ba
65b7(rgyud): bar mi bya'o// nga la phrag dog pa ba rab tu khro ba'i yong meng de/ khong ni rje su gzung phyir nga nyid rtag tu mngon par brtson// nga la gsol dang khong nyid zhi phyir 'jig rten gsum rab tu
65b8(rgyud): mchog tu zhi bar byed pa'i chos kyi bdud rtsi bshad par bya// de phyir khyod kyi sdig po'i las rnams med par rab 'gyur gyis// 'jig rten mgon po nga la yid ni myur du dang bar byas
66a1(rgyud): khyed ni rtag tu 'di na gnod par bya bar rab sems kyang // khyod dgrol phyir ning snyig rtag tu byams pas rab tu dang // sdig pa'i blo gros 'or la dang bcas yid la
66a2(rgyud): byos shig dang // ring por mi thogs khyong ni byang chub du yang lung bstan to// de nas bdud sdig can bcom ldan 'das la khros te/ 'khrugs shing rngams nas/ de nas slar 'gro bar
66a3(rgyud): 'dong pa dang // bdag gi mgul pa bcings pa lngas bcings pa snyam du shes te/ 'jigs skrag pa'i sgra dbyung ba 'dod kyang de ma nus nas// bac+doMs dkrongs pa'i phyir// rang khros pa'i
66a4(rgyud): mthus shin tu tsha ba'i dbugs btang ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis dbugs de shin tu yid du 'ong ba'i me tog du mngon par sprul te/ phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thad ma/ 
66a5(rgyud): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs shi nga 'tshe la gzhes te chos kyang ston pa de dag bad kyi dbu'i gtsug gi drang thad kyi stong gi bar snang la shin tu yid du 'ong
66a6(rgyud): pa'i gdugasasu byin gyis brlab so// sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na/ byang chub se de'i sanga' chen po gang dag 'khong ba de dag gis/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la gsol pa/ 
66a7(rgyud): me tog gi gdugs 'di dag ga las mchis// su'i rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul lags// bcom ldan 'das de dag gis byang chub sede'i de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs
66a8(rgyud): kyi bu dag 'jig rten gyi khams mi 'dzad ces bya ba yod / de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba de rab tu
66b1(rgyud): mongs pa can snyigs ma lnga dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du sngon gyi smon lam gyis/ bla na meng pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas
66b2(rgyud): nas chos ston te/ de bzhin gshegs pa de ltar bdud kyi yul gyi stobs thad rab tu 'joms par byed pa/ stobs dang mi 'jigs pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi yul bde mthun
66b3(rgyud): por byed pa sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa'i rgyud bde dang / dkon mchog gsum gyi sgron ma ring du gnas par byed pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba thaMng rnam par 'phel/ kha'i brtson 'grus kyi byin gyis
66b4(rgyud): brlabs kyi stobs byed pa dang / dgra dang phas kyi rgol ba thams cad shin tu tshar gcod par byed pa/ ngo mi mtshar ba dang / bkra mi shis pa dang / rtsod pa dang / rma la
66b5(rgyud): ngan pa dang / lhas ngan pa dang / mu ge dang / 'jigs ba'i tshogs dang / 'bab pa dang / 'gyed pa dang / 'ching ba dang / bab mo dang / rtsod pa dang / char mi 'bab pa dang / dus ma yin
66b6(rgyud): par cha zhing grang ba dang / rlung dang / tsha ba dang / nang dang / sgra mi snyan pa de 'ang rab tu zhi bar byed pa/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa bde 'dun par byed pa rgyal rigs
66b7(rgyud): thams cad 'dun par byed cing 'gugs pa/ rigs bzhi thams cad chos kyi don du la 'dzud pa/ shes rab kyi sgron ma rab tu 'bar bar byed pa/ lam drang por rab tu son pa/ khyim
66b8(rgyud): dang / grong dang / grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang / ljongs dang / yul dang / pho brang 'khor dang / yul 'khor thad 'dun par byed pa/ gza' dang / rgyu skar dang nyin par dang / mtshan me dang / 
67a1(rgyud): zla ba gcig dang / zla ba phyed dang / dus dang / lo bde 'dun par byed pa/ lo tog dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu dang / 'bru dang / sman thams cad grub par byed pa/ 
67a2(rgyud): bzo dang / las kyi mtha' dang / gnas dang / byin gyis brlabs pa dang / dgos pa theng grub par byed pa/ lus dang / ngag dang yid kyi nyes pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa/ 
67a3(rgyud): rig pa dang dran pa dang / blo gros dang / mos pa dang / dpa' ba dang / brtan pa dang / bzod pa dang / spobs pa rnam par 'phel bar byed pa/ chos thams cad la sgrib pa med pa'i snang bas
67a4(rgyud): rab tu sad par byed pa/ 'phags pa'i rigs bzhis chos kyi tshul gyis byin gyis rlob pa/ theg pa chen po ston par byed pa/ byang chub sada' rnam par 'phel bar byed pa/ 
67a5(rgyud): sen chen po rnams dbugs 'byid pa phyir ma ldog pa'i sa la rdo rje lta bu'i sems byin gyis rlob pa/ sa bcu la yang dag par 'jug pa byed pa/ mi skye ba'i chos
67a6(rgyud): la bzod pa khong du chung bar byed pa dang / dbang bskur ba'i chos dang / byang chub la gzhol bar byed pa/ gdul ba'i sen rnams rjesu 'dzin pa/ chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor gson
67a7(rgyud): bdal snying rje chen pos khyab par byed pa dang / pha rol tu phyin pa la 'jud ba/ bla na med pa'i lam la yang dag par 'jog par byed ga chos kyi char rab tu 'bebs pa/ chas kyi
67a8(rgyud): sen bad tshim par byed pa/ sangs rgyas kyi bkod pa mtha' dag yongasu rdzogs par byed pa/ bdud bzhi'i yul las rab tu thar par byed pa/ phung po'i lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das
67b1(rgyud): pa'i dbyingasu 'jog par byed pa/ chos mnyam pa nyid rdo rje lta bu brten pa'i chos kyi snying pos lus 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya dang/ tshig rab tu dge ba la 'jug pa lung bsdu
67b2(rgyud): pa 'tshong par bzhed do// 'das pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pad kyis kyang chos mnyam pa nyid rdo rje lta bu'i brten pa'i chos
67b3(rgyud): kyi snying pos lus 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs phyag rgya dang / tshig rab tu dbye ba la 'jug pa lung bstan pa gsung so// byin gyis brlab so// gcig la gcig rje su dgyes
67b4(rgyud): gang dag da ltar phyogs bcu na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag bzhugs te 'tshe zhing gzhes la/ chos kyang ston pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das des
67b5(rgyud): bang kyang chos mnyam pa nyid rdo rje lta bu ba/ na ba'i chos kyi snying pos lus 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs phyag rgya dang / tshig rab tu dbye ba la 'jug pa lung
67b6(rgyud): bstan pa gsungaso// byin gyis rlob bo// gcig la gicig rje su dgyes pa mdzad // ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan dang gzhan dag tu/ de
67b7(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang dag 'byung ba de dag kyang chos mnyam pa nyid rdo rje lta bu brten pa'i chos kyi snying pos lus 'jas
67b8(rgyud): pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs phyag rgya dang tshig rab tu dbye ba las 'jug pa lung bstan pa gsung bar 'gyuraro// byin gyis rlob par 'gyu ro// gcig la gcig rje su dgyes pa mdzad
68a1(rgyud): par 'gyuraro// de nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing de ga na/ byang chub se nga sada' chen po gang dag yod pa de dag gis so so'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dag la yong
68a2(rgyud): zhus pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis sngon ma thos pa chos mnyam pa nyid rdo rje lta bu brten pa'i chos kyi snying pos lus 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs phyag rgya dang
68a3(rgyud): tshig rab tu dbye ba la 'jug pa lung bstan pa gang 'di ltar yon tan mang po bgyid pa/ 'di ltar yod tan bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / ldan pa/ chos bang la sgrib pa ma mchis
68a4(rgyud): pa'i snang ba bgyi ba nas zhi ba'i bar du bgyid pa de gang lags chos mnyam nyid rdo rje lta bu/ brten pa'i chos kyi snying pos lus 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs phyag
68a5(rgyud): rgya dang tshig rab tu dge pa'i la 'jug pa lu nga bstan pa bdud kyi stobs kyi yul bad rab tu 'jom sa pa bgyid pa nas phung po'i lhag ma ma mchis pa'i mya
68a6(rgyud): ngan las 'das pa'i dbyingasu mya ngan las 'das pa'i bar du bgyid pa de skye bo mang po la sman pa dang / skye bo mang po la bde ba dang / 'jig rten la thugs brtse ba dang / skye bo phal
68a7(rgyud): po che dang / lha dang / mi rnams kyi don dang / sman pa dang / bde ba'i slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad du gsol// de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis/ byang
68a8(rgyud): chub sedang sede' chen po de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu dge nged kyang 'jig rten gyi khams mi mdzad du/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
68b1(rgyud): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa ga la bzhugs pa der 'ding // da ltar phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan dang gzhan dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom lda
68b2(rgyud): 'das gang dag bzhugs shing 'tshe la gzhes pa de dag thaMd kyang / byang chub sa de'i tshogs kyis bskor cing / nyan thos kyis ngage 'dun dang bcas pas mdun du bdar nas/ 
68b3(rgyud): 'jig rter gyi khams mi mjed du/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya bub pa ga la bzhugs pa der gshegs te/ de bzhi
68b4(rgyud): gshegs pa shAkya thub pa de dang lhan cig/ son thams cad la phan pa dang / ngan par spyod pa'i las la sa bzlog pa dang / bzang ba spyod pa rab tu rdzogs par bya ba
68b5(rgyud): dang / bla na mang ba'i ye shes yongasu rdzo gas par bya ba'i phyir chos mnyam pa nyid rdo rje lta bu ba rten pa'i chos kyi snying pos lus 'joms pa zhes bya ba
68b6(rgyud): gzungs phyag rgya dang tshig rab tu dbye ba la 'jug pa lung bstan pa 'di 'chad par 'gyur/ byin gyis rlob par 'gyur/ gcig la gcig rjesu dgyes pa mdzad par 'gyuraro// sangs
68b7(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das de dag bde 'jog rten gyi khams mi mjed du 'dus nas/ byang chub senga'i tshogs kyis bskor cing / nyan thos kyi dge 'dun gyi mar mdun gyis bltas
68b8(rgyud): chos mnyam nyid rdo rje lta bu brten pa'i chos kyi snying pos lus 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs phyag rgya dang tshig rab tu dbye ba la 'jug pa lung bstan pa'i 'chang par
69a1(rgyud): gyis/ khyed cag las gang chos ma'am pa nying rdo rje lta bu brten pa'i chos kyi sring pos lus 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs phyag rgya dang tshig rab tu \u0f7f
69a2(rgyud): ba la 'jug pa lung bstan pa mnyan pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das chad mang grangs med pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma steng dus gcig tu sangs rgyas kyi zhing gcig na bzhugs pa
69a3(rgyud): dngag la mchong pa bya ba dang / chos nga yang nyan pa dang / sangs rgyas dang / byang chub senga' thams cad dang lha'i yul dang / bdud kyi yul thams cad nga / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rgya
69a4(rgyud): bkod pa de dag blta ba dang / sangs rgyas mang po 'dus pa sngon ma thos ma mthong ba blta bar 'dod pa de dag dang ngad kyang lhan cig tu 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed du// de
69a5(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de dag la ba bzhugs pa der 'dong // de nas sangs rgyas bac+doMs de dag la/ 
69a6(rgyud): byang chub sa da'i sade' chen po de dag gis 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi zhing der gzungs 'di 'chad pa na gal te bdag cag gis
69a7(rgyud): gnas rnyed cing / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag dang / byang chub senga' sa 'a chen po ji ltar tshogs de dag la yang phyag bgyi ba dang / bsar bkur 'gro ba dang mchod pa
69a8(rgyud): dang / chos mnyan par rngo bog pa lta na de bzhin du bdag cag kyang de bzhin gshegs pa dang / babs gcig tu de bzhin gshegs pa dag bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
69b1(rgyud): sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa ga la 'dar chas mnyam pa nyid rdo rje lta bu brten pa'i chos kyi snying pos lus 'joms pa zhes bgyi ba'i gzungs phyag rgya nga tshig rab tu dab ba la 'jug
69b2(rgyud): pa lung bstan pa mnyan pa'i slad du mchis te/ der bdag cag gis dus gcig tu sangs rgyas kyi zhing gcig na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das grangs med chang med pa
69b3(rgyud): zhig bzhugs shing 'tshol gzhes pa rnams la mchod par 'gyi'o// de dag las chos kyang mnyan par 'gyuraro// dang bdag cag gis rdzu 'phrul gyi yul bkod pa bzhes
69b4(rgyud): rten gyi khams mi mdzad legs par brgyan pa de yang blta bar ba gyi/ 'dus pa chen po bkod pa de dag kyang blta bar bgyi'o// de na sa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag nis
69b5(rgyud): sangs rgyas kyi zhing so rang rang gi byang chub song song chen po de dag dang / nyan thos chen po de dag la 'di skad sa bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu dag byung
69b6(rgyud): cag 'jig rten gyi khams dang 'jug pa'i gnas dang / go skabs kyi phyir de ltar the tsom ma za shig/ de ltar nam nur ma byed cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan
69b7(rgyud): 'das rnams kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'jug pa mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes la mkhas pas sen yongasu smon par mdzad pa ni// mtha' ya so// rigs kyi bu dag nga
69b8(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa de thabs mkhas pa chen po dang ldan pas go skabs yang // rigs kyi bu dag yongasu brtag pa bzung ste/ sa ni gang la la sems ca
70a1(rgyud): gyi khamasu bsdu bar bsdus pa khams dang skye mched la gnas pa'i seMn de dag gal te re re'i lus kyang ri rab tsam du gyur du zin kyang / de bzhin sa
70a2(rgyud): pa shAkya thub pa des son lus de lta bur gyur pa de dag bde yongs 'bru gcig gi nang du chud par naso// sems can re re zhing yang yul gyi gnas go skabs yangs te/ 
70a3(rgyud): sen de dag phan tshun mig rgyang gis kyang mi sleb so// yongs 'bru de gcig tu sen 'di kyi lus bcug kyang bri ba 'am gang bar yang mi mngon te/ rigs kyi bu dag ca
70a4(rgyud): gshegs pa shAkya thub pa de ni thabs mkha sa pa de lta bu dang lda no// rigs kyi bu dag gzhan yang sra ba nyid ji snyed pa de dag 'di ni sa'i khams te// de bzhin
70a5(rgyud): pa shAkya phub pa des sa'i khams thade rngu la gcig gi steng du 'jog nus la rdul da gcig su du si'i khams thams cad bzhag kyang bro ba 'am
70a6(rgyud): bar mi mngon te/ de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa de ni thabs mkhas pa de lta bu dang ldan// rigs kyi bu dag gzhan yang gang cung zad gsher bar snang ba de tha ni
70a7(rgyud): khams te/ de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa des chu'i khams de thad sA'i rtse mo gcig tu chud par/ nus la skra'i rtse mo gcig tu tshu'i khams de bang chud kyang bri ba la
70a8(rgyud): gang bar mi mngon no// rigs kyi bu dag gzhan yang ji tsam du dro bar snang ba de thams cad ni ma'i khams te/ me'i khams gang sngon byung ba dang / 'byung ba dang / 'byung bar
70b1(rgyud): 'gyur ba de dag pa rdul phra rab gcig tu chud par nus la// me'i khams dbang rdul phra rab gcig tu bcug kyang gnas shin tu yangs te rang gi yul bzhin du rgyu'o// rigs
70b2(rgyud): kyi bu dag gzhan yang gang cung zad rlung gi khamasu snang ba'i rlung gi khams nga thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa nges spu'i khung bu de gcig tu 'jug nus la/ 
70b3(rgyud): rlung gi khams de bde spu'i khung bu nga gcig na gnas shin tu yongs te / rang gi yul bzhin du rgyu'o// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang ngo bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa des
70b4(rgyud): gang phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag thams cad kyi sen 'ad 'byung ba chen po bzhi pa de dag 'ang dang lhan cig pu rdul gcig gi stang du 'jog par nus
70b5(rgyud): rdul gcig la san de dag thams cad 'byung ba chen po de ga dang bcas par rang gi yul gyi las kyi mtha' rnams spyod pas kyang gnas shin tu yangs par
70b6(rgyud): rgyu ste/ phan tshun gnod pa yang med la/ rdul gcig gi rtse mo de yang bri ba 'am gang bar mi mngon te/ de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa de ni thabs mkhas pa de lta bu dang
70b7(rgyud): ldan no// rigs kyi bu dag gzhan yang dus gsum du gtogs pa'i seMn rnams kyi skye mched drug dang spyod pa nye bar len pa dang / smon lam dang / byin gyis brlabs dang / tshig
70b8(rgyud): gi lam gyi sgra dang / yi ge dang / tshig brjed pa dang / 'du byed gsum gyi las kyi mdo'i bya ba dang / phung po dang / dpyod pa dang / bsags pa'i bya ba tha dad pa ji srid pa dang / 
71a1(rgyud): gang yang sen thams cad kyi sngon gyi mtha'i mu ras bzung ste/ dus gsum du gtogs pa'i 'gro ba drug tu 'khor ba ni srid pa 'grub pa dang / 'chi 'pho dang / 
71a2(rgyud): smra ba 'byung ba dang / sa'i khams kyi rdul phra rab ji snyed pa dang / sin thams cad kyi dus gsum du gtogs pa'i skad cig bang cig yud tsam 'das pa ji snyed pa dang / sen tha~Md kyi
71a3(rgyud): dus gsum du gtogs pa'i spu'i khung bu ji snyed pa dang / sems can bad kyi dus gsum du gtogs pa'i sems can thams cad longs spyod pa dang / kun spyod pa dang khade ba
71a4(rgyud): dang / sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur ba ji snyed pa de dag thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa des skad cig gcig la rab tu mkhyen te/ de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya
71a5(rgyud): thub pa de ni mtshan nyid kyi rnam par 'phrul pa dang / mngon par shes pa'i ye shes 'di lta bu dang ldan pas mi rta garnam par mi rtog cing lhun gyis grub par
71a6(rgyud): dus gsum gyi mtha' yongasu mkhyen to// rigs kyi bu dag de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa de sangs rgyas kyi yul la 'jug pa'i ye shes la mkhas pas mnyam pa nyid
71a7(rgyud): kyis sems can yongasu smin par byed pa'i thabs tshad med pa 'di lta bu dang lnga'o// mtshan nyid bshad pa 'di lung bstan pa na phyogs pa dad pa dag na de bzhin gshegs pa de
71a8(rgyud): ngag gi so so'i 'khor byang chub sems dpa' brgya stong grangs med dpag tu med pa dag smon lam gyi yul la 'jug pa'i ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin par gyur to// 'dus pa
71b1(rgyud): chen po rim po ma tog gi gzus las mtshan nyid kyi le'u sde lnga pa'o// / yang de'i cha shar phyogs logs kyi 'dzag can gyi khams mngon par dga' bar
71b2(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa mi 'khrugs pa zhes bya ba/ byang chub senga' sems dpa' chen po grangs med dpag tu med pa rnams dang thabs gcig tu sangs rgyas kyi yul rnam par 'phrul
71b3(rgyud): pi'i bar gyis brlabs kyi stobs kyis gshegs par chas nas/ skad cig gcig tsam la sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir dbus kyi gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khamasu byor te/ de bzhi
71b4(rgyud): gshegs pa dag bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sang sa rgyas shAkya thub pa la ga la bzhugs pa der gshegs nas/ pad+ma'i gdan ji lta bu byung ba la bzhugaso// byang
71b5(rgyud): chub senga'i sanga' chen po da dag kyang rang gi rdzu 'phrul gyi swA bas bskrad pas pad+ma'i stang ji lta bu byung ba de dag la 'khong ngo // de la sogs pa sangs rgyas
71b6(rgyud): ldan 'das bzhugs shing 'tshol gzhes pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med dpag tu med pa'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul skad kyang skad cig bang cig yud tsam de nyid la/ sangs rgyas kyi
71b7(rgyud): 'ang 'dir dbus kyi gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khamasu byon to// de bzhin gshegs par ra yang byang chub sems dpa' senga' chen po grangs med dpag tu med pa dang / nyar thos
71b8(rgyud): bya ba khrag khrig brgya song dang thabs gcig tu bzhir gshegs pa dag bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de ga la bzhugs par byer to// bye
72a1(rgyud): nas kyang pad+ma'i gdan ji lta bu byung ba rnams la zhug so// yang de'i tshe na lde phyogs logs nas de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen tog ces bya ba bon nas
72a2(rgyud): pad+ma'i snying po la bzhugs pa'i bar du rgyas par bya'o// de bzhin du byang phyogs logs nas// de bzhin gshegs pa rnga sgra zhes bya ba byon nas/ pad+ma'i snying po la bzhug so// 
72a3(rgyud): yang de'i tshe nub phyogs logs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa che dpag med ces bya ba byom nas/ pad+ma'i snying po la bzhugs pa'i bar du'o// 'og gi phyogs logs nas/ 
72a4(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad ces bya ba byon nas/ pad+ma'i snying po la bzhugs pa'i bar du'o// stang gi phyogs logs nas de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes
72a5(rgyud): kyi 'od zer ces bya ba/ byang chub sems dang 'a sems dpa' chen po bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong grangs meng dpag tu med pa gang+ga'i klung gi bye ma smad kyi sangs
72a6(rgyud): kyi zhing gi rdul snyed dang babs gcig tu sangs rgyas kyi yul thams cad rnam par 'phrul pa'i byir gyis brlabs kyis de ras gshegs par chas pa dang / sems kyi
72a7(rgyud): skad cig gicig la sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir dbus kyi gleng bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
72a8(rgyud): thub pa ga la bzhugs pa 'dir gshegs nas/ pad+ma'i gdan ji lta bu byung ba la bzhug so// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag kyang ji ltar rang rang gi bsod
72b1(rgyud): nams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyi byin gyis brlabs kyi pad+ma'i stan sprul pa rnams la 'khod do// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyogs bcu nas lasu pa
72b2(rgyud): dag/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir la la ngag gis ni 'jam+bu'i chu bo'i gser gyi char phab po// gong du smos pa bzhin du sbyar te/ la laM dag
72b3(rgyud): gis ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing ma lus par bskor ba byaso// la l-i dag ni chos nyan pas bskor nas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi spyan sngar thal mo sbyar te 'a
72b4(rgyud): la la ngag gis ni rang gi dge ba'i phyogs yid la byed cing ga so// yang de'i tshe zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa sa thal mo sbyar te rang gi rdzu 'phrul gyi mthu dang / sangs
72b5(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi spongs bskyed pas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di ma lus par gsu rgya sa bkang ste/ 'di skad ces smraso// bcom zad ga
72b6(rgyud): mdzad pa// thub pa zla ba kun nas gshegs// sngon chad ma mthong ma bos pa'i// dge 'dur phun sum tshogs 'di snang // byang chub sems dpa'i brtul zhugs mchog/ 
72b7(rgyud): sangs rgyas kun gyi rang ga pas// zhing 'di mtshang rten gyur pa ste// zhing rnams kun gyis phyag byaso// gang ras sems can smad pa yi/ zhing ni snyigs ma lnga ca
72b8(rgyud): thub pa snang mdzad rgyu med par// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang mi gshegs// de ring bdud ngan pachar bcang cing // nag po'i phyogs ni rab gzhob dang // spyod pa dge ba
73a1(rgyud): bsdu ba'i phyir// de yi don du kun nas gshegs// yid mi rab tu dang byos la// bdud sde rab tu 'joms pa yi// chos nyid zhi ba rab nyon la// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgya
73a2(rgyud): 'gyur bar byos// theg pa chen po spyod pa'i lam// bzod pa'i go bgos shes par byos// nyon mongs pade zang bya'i phyir// gzungs 'di de ring mnyan par byos// gdar rnams la ni
73a3(rgyud): bzhugs na su// srung ba 'di ni bshad gsol phyir// de phyir thams cad mgrin gcig tu// 'dren pa rnams ni spyan drongs shig/ dam chos yur rings gnas pa'i phyir// sgrib pa
73a4(rgyud): zhi byang ba// chos rnams thams cad bsdus pa yi// gzungs 'di gzhan gyis mi thu bo// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa theb pa grangs mang dpag
73a5(rgyud): tu med pa de snyed kyis mgrin gcig tu 'dis daces gsol to// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rna sa pad+ma'i gdan 'di dag la bzhugs te/ dang thugs rje chen
73a6(rgyud): po dang ldan pa rnams kyis byams pa chen po'i mchog dang bzod pa yongasu bskos pa/ mi 'thun pa'i rgyu 'thun pa bshad pa/ chos thams cad sdud pa/ 'jigs pa dang bral ba
73a7(rgyud): 'jug pa/ bdud kyi las thams cad las yang dag par bgyid pa/ bdud kyi rgyal mtshan rab tu stsol// chos kyi rgyal mtshan sprid par bgyid pa/ nyon mongs pa thams cad
73a8(rgyud): 'joms pa/ dgra thams cad tshar gcod pa/ the tsom thams cad gcod pa/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la 'dzud pa/ 'jigs pa thams cad las rnam par
73b1(rgyud): thar bar bgyid pa/ dgra bde srung ba bla na med pa/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi chos thams cad dran pa dang / blo gros dang rtogs pa dang / mos pa mi mdzad pa spyod pa
73b2(rgyud): thams cad kyi thabs dang ye shes la mkhas pa kun tu ston pa/ bde ba phun sum tshogs pa thams cad kyi skye mched dang / byin gyis brlabs pa dang / ting 'dzin dang / gzus
73b3(rgyud): dang / bzod pa la 'jug pa/ snang ba'i ye shes mkhas pa la 'jug pa nas// byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun gyi snying po 'dzin pa'i bar gyi gzugs 'di san
73b4(rgyud): rnams kyi gzi brjid dang / kha dog dang / lo ngas spyod dang / stobs dang / grags pa dang / bde ba la ba pAr gnas pa dang / spobs pa dang / dran pa rjer 'phel ba
73b5(rgyud): dang / thos pa 'dzin pa mi brjed pa dang / ngag thaMd pham par bgyid pa dang / lo tog mngon par 'phel ba dang / bslab pa 'dzin pa dang / dran pa'i sted du gyur pa dang / spyod pa mngon pa
73b6(rgyud): 'grub par 'gyur ba dang / byang chub yang dag par thob par bgyi ba'i slad du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis gzung 'di// nga 'dir bdag cag la bshad du gsol// chas
73b7(rgyud): tshul rjesu gzung ba dang / yun ring du gnas pa dang / dkon mchog gsum gyi rigs chab mi 'tshal ba dang / bla na med pa'i byang chub kyi lam dag bstar pa dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' rang
73b8(rgyud): nam mkha' dang / de bzhin nyid dbyer ma mchis pa dang / mun pa dang / snang ba dang / dmigs pa dang / mi dmigs pa dang / tshu rol dang / pha rol dang / rtog pa dang / rnam par rtog pa
74a1(rgyud): sems can dang / srog dang / gso ba dang / skyes bu dang / gang zag thams cad dper ma mchis pa dang / chos thams cad mi skye ba dang / mi 'byung ba
74a2(rgyud): mi 'gags pa dang / mnyam pa nyid kyi mtshan nying dngos po ma mchis shing / yang dag pa'i mtha' dbye'i ma mchis pa dang / sa dang / chu dang / me dang /  dang / mamakha' dang
74a3(rgyud): shes pa'i khams dper ma mchis pa'i snang du/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyi so 'dir bdag cag la chos thams cad kyi tshul gyi dkyil 'khor dar
74a4(rgyud): pa'i gzugs bshad du gsol// gang 'dir thos ma thag tu sems can bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong dpag tu med pa dag la dkon mchog gsum mngon du gyur cig/ sems
74a5(rgyud): can rnams phan tshun du dge ba'i shes gtan bgyid cing phan pa byed par gyur cig/ sems can gra ngas med dpag tu med pa dag/ bla na med pa yang dag par
74a6(rgyud): rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dang / phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ba dang / lung bstan pa thob par gyur cig/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag thams cad kyis
74a7(rgyud): kyang / chos bstan pa'i phyir cang mi gsungs par gyur pas/ gnang nas pad+ma'i snying po de dag la bzhug so// ji ltar sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du gtogs pa'i sems can
74a8(rgyud): kyi sdug bsngal thams cad zhi bar 'gyur// dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad bsngags pa'i phyir dran pa dang / rang ba dang / dang ba dang / mos pa rnyed par 'gyur ba dang / sangs rgyas
74b1(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das rnams mthong ma thag tu sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir gtogs pa'i sems can rnams kyi sems dang sems las byung ba rnams la 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang
74b2(rgyud): gti mug dang / lta ba ngan pa dang / nga rgyal dang / rgyab dang / drag pa dang / 'jigs tshogs la lta ba dang / the tsom dang nye bar len pa dang / sring pa'i sred pa kun gzhi'i nyes pa dag rab
74b3(rgyud): tu zhi bar 'gyur ba dang / sems can so so nas 'di snyam du bdag cag cig pu de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan sngar na chos nyan pa'i phyir 'dug gi/ 'di ma gzhan ni su yang mdo// 
74b4(rgyud): bdag cag gcig pu la de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs thams cad kyis dgongs te/ nang thams cad rab tu zhi bar bya ba'i phyir chos ston par bzhed do// 'di ni
74b5(rgyud): gzhan sus kyang de bzhin gshegs pa la chos mnyan pa'i phyir gsol ba ma bta bo snyam du shes par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i sangs rgyas kyi yul gyi slor la
74b6(rgyud): mnyam pa nyid la 'jug pa'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhug so// yid de'i tshe gang sangs rgyas kyi zhing ma lus pa 'dir gtogs pa'i sems can rnams dbang po thams cad
74b7(rgyud): bca bal mo sbyar nas de dag gis mgrin gcig tu 'di skad ces gsol to// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis bdag cag la chos bshad du gsol/ btsun
74b8(rgyud): pa bde bar gshegs pa rnams kyis bdag cag la bshang du gsol/ bdag cag gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos nan tar gyis bsdu bar bgyi'o// nga
75a1(rgyud): yang de'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa nges sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gzhan rnams la mchod pa'i phyir spros bkod pa las shin tu ldag
75a2(rgyud): pa'i spos gong du mchog tu khang par du gyur pa/ rgya chen pos sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di thams cad khyab par byin gyis brlab so// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das lhag ma rnams la
75a3(rgyud): mchod pa'i phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du gtogs pa'i sems can thams cad kyi lag ni rin po che dang / me tog dang / phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa sna tshogs da / 
75a4(rgyud): gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / brgyan dang / lhab lhub sna tshogs dag gis gang bar byin gyis brlabs nas 'di skad ces gsung so// nga ltar sangs
75a5(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan rang gzhan dag nas bdag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing du dri ba'i phyir byon pa rnams dgongs su
75a6(rgyud): gsol// bdag sngon gyi smon lam gyis 'di 'dra bar rab tu nyon mongs pa can snyigs ma lnga dang ldan pa'i 'jig rten du/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ma
75a7(rgyud): par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/ sen bsam pa nyams pa lam rab tu stor ga ma rig pa'i mun pa dang / rab rib kyi ling rtogs gis nyon mongs pa'i mun par bcug pa/ 
75a8(rgyud): ngar song gsum du zhugs pa/ mi dag pa dang 'grogs pa/ dge ba thams cad dang bral ba/ thabs mkhas pa thams cad kyi yongasu spangs pa/ mtshams med pa byed pa/ dam pa'i chos
75b1(rgyud): spong ba/ 'phags pa la skur ba 'debs pa/ snying rje med pa'i bsam pa can gyis sems can rnams la snying rje ba'i slad du/ snying brje ba dang / brtson 'grus kyi stobs kyi brtson
75b2(rgyud): chen pos grang ba dang / dro ba dang / rlung dang / tsha ba dang / ngal ba dang / chad pa dang du blangs par bgyi'o// grong dang grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang / ljongs dang / yul dang / yul 'khor du
75b3(rgyud): rkang gis 'gro bar bgyi'o// sems can la phan par bgyi ba'i slad du/ rtsub pa dang / nyung ba dang / ro med pa shin tu smad pa mi 'thun pa'i zas za bar bgyi'o// de dag gi dag pa'i
75b4(rgyud): rtsa ba bsgreng pa'i slad du sbom pa/ rtsub pa/ gan mi bde ga/ shan dang / shing bal dang / gso mo'i ras dang / phyag dar khrod kyi gos bgo bar bgyi'o// ri dang ri'i sul
75b5(rgyud): dang / nags srug po dang / grong stong ba dang /  khrod du gnas par bgyi ba nas/ rwa'i mal cha dang / gso ma dang / shing gi 'dab ma/ rtsub pa/ dri ma zhom pa reg nam
75b6(rgyud): bde bo'i'amal che sprad par bgyi'o// bdag gis thabs mkhas pa dang / snying rje chen po dang / brtson 'grus kyi cha bgos nas/ sems can rnams la gtam snum pa sna tshogs pa
75b7(rgyud): te/ rgyal rigs rnams la ni rgyal srid dang / dbang phyug gi gtam bgyi'o// bram ze rnams la ni rig byeng dang / skar ma'i gtam dang / blon po rnams la ni yul dang las kyi mtha'i gta
75b8(rgyud): dang / smar ba rnams la ni khams dang / smad dang / sgrub pa'i gtam dang / tshong pa rnams la ni nyo tshong gi gtam dang / dmangs rnams la ni las kyi mtha' la mngon par 'a
76a1(rgyud): pa'i gtam dang / bud med rnams la ni kha dog dang / rgyan dang / bu dang / blug pa dang / 'grar zla med pa'i gtam dang / dge sbyong rnams la bzod pa dang / sems
76a2(rgyud): pa dang / las gsum la brtson pa'i gtam bgyi'o// sems can yongasu smin par bgyi ba'i slad du/ ma thob pa thob par bgyi ba dang / mngon sum du ma bgyis pa mngon tu
76a3(rgyud): bgyi bar gzung ngo // mabar pa rnams thar par bgyi ba'i slad du/ sdug bsngal rnam pa sna tshogs la spro bar bgyi'o// sems can yongasu smin par bgyi ba'i slad du/ yul
76a4(rgyud): rgyu bar bgyi'o// de ltar mod kyi sems can 'di dag ni nga na ba dge la ga shi'o// mi snyan pa ze ro// phra dog gi chos kyi rgyu ba bdag la 'khrigs pa'i chos gyis med pa la
76a5(rgyud): bskur pa 'deb so// kha gsags dang / tshul chos pa dang / sgyu dang / g.yo dang / brdzun du smra ba dang / zhe gcod pa dang / bud med kyi tshig dag gis bskur ba 'as
76a6(rgyud): bdag la sas 'thor ro// bdag bsad pa'i phyir mtshon dang dug dang / me dang / 'khor lo dang / mnga' bo che dang / ral gri dang / mdung dang / ngag sta dang / rdo dang / mtshan
76a7(rgyud): char 'bab so// bdag bsad pa'i phyir glang po che dang / sbrul gdugs dang / seng+ga dang / stag dang / glang po che dang / ma he dang / sbrang ki dang / phag rgod dang / chen po che rnams kyang
76a8(rgyud): 'gyed do// bdag gi gnas dang / gnas khang dang / btsug lag khang yang mi gtsang ba dang / dri nga bas 'geng so// bdag gi nyan pos grong khyer du zhugs pa rnams la/ 
76b1(rgyud): 'phags pa ma yin pa'i sems can rnams kyis glu dang / gar tshul ma yin pa byed du btsung ngo // thabs bad+ma stong du mas bdag bsang ba'i phyir brtson no// bdag gi bstan pa
76b2(rgyud): nub par bya ba dang / chos kyi tshul gyi sgron ma bsad pa dang / chos kyi rgyal mtshan bskal pa dang / chos kyi gru gzhig pa dang / bdag gi chos kyi mchod spyin rnam par gtor ba'i
76b3(rgyud): phyir brtson no// nga sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi chos kyi tshul la gzigs te/ ji ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
76b4(rgyud): ngag gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing nyon mongs pa can snyigs ma lnga dang ldan pa 'dir 'dus pa chen po mdzad nas/ dam pa'i chos kyi tshul yun ring du gnas par bgyi ba dang / 
76b5(rgyud): bdud kyi stobs kyi yul thams cad rab tu gzhon pa dpang kor mchog gsum gyi rigs gnas pa rgyun mi 'chang par bgyi ba dang / sems can rnams kyi
76b6(rgyud): dge ba'i rtsa ba 'phel bar 'gyi ba dang / dgra dang / pas kyi rgol ba thams cad chos dang 'thun pas tshar bcad pa dang / sems can rnams kyi 'bab pa dang / rtsod pa dang / mu ga
76b7(rgyud): dang / nang dang phas kyi dpag tshogs dang / 'ching ba dang / 'gyed pa dang / rgol ba dang / dus ma yin par grang ba dang / tsha ba dang / char dang / rlung dang / lus dang / ngag dang / yid
76b8(rgyud): kyi nyes pa dang / lta ba yang ba rab tu zhi bar bgyi ba dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa thams cad 'dun par bgyi ba dang / 
77a1(rgyud): dang / grong dang / grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang / yul 'khor thams cad srung ba dang / g.yo ba dang / dug dang / byang dang / rmongs byed dang / rmi lam ngan pa dang / 
77a2(rgyud): ltas ngan pa thams cad gzhil ba dang / 'bru dang / sman dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu dang / bcud thams cad kyis sems can nye bar 'tsho bar bgyi ba dang / rgyal rigs dang / 
77a3(rgyud): bram ze dang / dpangs rigs dang / rje'u rigs rnams dge ba spyod pa la gzung ba dang / byang chub kyi sems rab tu bskyed pa dang / pha rol tu phyin pa rnams la gzung ba dang / 
77a4(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams babs shes pa la mkhas dang / dran pa dang / blo gros dang / rtogs pa dang / mos pa dang / dpa' ba dang / 
77a5(rgyud): brtan pa dang / spobs pa rnam par 'phel ba ra bgyi ba dang / dbang bskur ba'i sar dbugs dbyung ba la 'jud cing ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'gro bar bgyi ba'i
77a6(rgyud): slad du/ sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dag bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gis chos mnyam pa nyid rdo rje lta bu brtan pa'i chos kyi snying pose lus 'joms
77a7(rgyud): pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs phyag rgya dang / tshig rab tu dbye ba la 'jug pa lung bstan pa'i chos kyi rnam pa 'di bshad cing byin gyis brlab so// gcig la gcig dgyes pa nges 'di ltar
77a8(rgyud): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das nga ltar phyogs bcun bzhugs shing gzhes pa dag/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing sdigs ma lnga dang ldan pa 'dir dri ba'i phyir gshegs te bzhugs
77b1(rgyud): dngag thams cad kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di srung ba'i slad du/ chos mnyam pa nyid rdo rje lta bu brten pa'i chos kyi snying pos lus 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs phyag rgya dang / tshis
77b2(rgyud): rab tu dbye ba la 'jug pa lung bstan pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di dam pa'i chos kyi tshul yung ring du gnas par bgyi ba dang / bdud kyi yul gyi stobs thams cad rab tu gnas
77b3(rgyud): ba dang rje ltar gong du rgyas par brjod pa bzhin du sgrib pa med pa'i ye shes kyi pha rol tu 'gro bar bgyi ba'i slang du/ bdag gis gsol pa btab pa la thugs brje bar mdzad / 
77b4(rgyud): gang sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di ngas pa'i chos kyi tshul yun ring du gnas shing phas kyi rgol ba zad kyis mi tshugs pa dang / mi 'jigs pa'i chos can du 'gyur ba dang / 
77b5(rgyud): dpon mchog gsum gyi rigs mo 'chang ba dang / chos kyi bcud kyis sems can thams cad nye bar 'tsho bar 'gyed pa'i slad du legs par bshad du gsol/ 
77b6(rgyud): byin gyis brlab tu gsol// bshang ras kyang phan tshun rje su dgyes pa mdzad du gsol// de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis 'di skad ces gsung so// de bzhin du
77b7(rgyud): bdag cag gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa la lag bskyong bgyi ste/ chos kyi tshul yun ring du gnas pa dang / bdud kyi yul gyi stobs thams cad
77b8(rgyud): tu gzhom pa ras sgrib pa med pa'i ye shes kyi pha rol tu 'gro bar 'gyi ba'i slad du/ byin gyis brlab cing chos mnyam pa nyid rdo rje lta bu brten po'i chos kyi snying pos lus
78a1(rgyud): pa zhes bgyi ba'i gzungs phyag rgya dang / tshig rab tu dbye ba la 'jug pa lung bstan pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad kyis gang su dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir gto
78a2(rgyud): pa'i sems can thams cad nyon cig/ 'di lta ste/ aM ga ra/ aM ga ri/ b+ha ga ra/ pra b+haM kar/ b+ha ya mahA/ mi tr-i b+ha se/ a khaM// a kha/ e ba ra/ ro ma/ da man+te/ ka rat+ta/ 1sa?
78a3(rgyud): ra/ sa ma bA ha ne/ sa man+thab+ha dr-i/ d+harma/ d+harme/ d+ha ma ke dza pA le/ mi tA nu pa laM/ pA la b+ha dra/ ga Na ga Na/ wa ran+te/ hi li hi li/ hi li ti li kaM/ dze b+ha ba ta/ Ta ka se/ Ta ka ta / TA
78a4(rgyud): ba ran+te/ ga Na ba ran+te/ hi ran+ti/ shi rin+di/ bin+na pa ta/ go ba he/ dzu re mi tra dzur/ rdza she/ a gre/ a ba me/ sa s+ya ta thA dA na/ hu lu hi li/ n+di/ sa ma d+ha maM/ drA ma/ 
78a5(rgyud): ku tsu ru/ mu tsu ru/ a tsi ti/ tsi li tsi la/ li tsa bA ha/ tsu lu nu lu/ mi tra bA ha/ ku lu ku lu/ sa rA sa ra/ kut+ya ku t+ya/ ma hA sa ra sa ra/ tu Tu tu ru/ 
78a6(rgyud): ma hA sat+ya/ tri da ya/ puSh+pa she su puSh+pa she/ du ma pa ri ha re/ a b+ha ye/ ru tsi ni ka rak+ShaM/ a ya ma sU bi bA ha/ ti ti le/ ma ma le/ pA sha ka/ shi shir shi shi ri/ lo
78a7(rgyud): bi nA ya ka/ badz+ra badz+ra d+ha ra/ badz+re bA te/ badz+ra ma de/ badz+ra datAM/ tsakra badz+rA ye/ tsakre tsa ba te/ d+ha ra d+ha re/ b+ha re b+ha re/ pu re ta ra/ hu hu ra/ b+haM ga bi ba ra/ shwa ra/ sha tsi li/ tsu ru/ 
78a8(rgyud): pra re/ man+tha Na/ man+tha Ne/ ga ga ra Ni/ mu dra Ne/ sar pa mo ha na/ d+hi d+ho ra ya ni/ mu khe shwa ra la ya naM/ ri shiny+dza ni d+ha ba ba tsaM/ tsaN+DA la sa maM/ sarba sat+ya/ a d+hiSh+ThA na/ ab+h+ya
78b1(rgyud): rgyun tu mnyanam min/ pA la rati/ a dza gr-i/ ba tsi ma b+ha na ha ra/ pra bra rba/ gung grung / mu ru mu ru/ hi li hi li/ ha ra ha ra/ ka ka nA ba ha/ hi hi tA/ A yu
78b2(rgyud): ni/ kr-in+tha/ dz+wa lA ba sA ga ra dA ni/ a d+ha ha ni/ mAr+tha a b+hi ro hi na pA la sa t+ye/ a ra Sha ba ti/ hi l-i tsi li/ ya thA ba dza sA pra ya thA/ ba rany+tsa dzing yA nga sa t+ya/ pe rab
78b3(rgyud): mArga a b+hai ro ha \u0f7f/ a tsa la bud d+hi/ dAng pA tsa tsa pa ya/ bi d+hA hring ya/ tsan+da tsa ra/ a tsa le/ sho d+ha ne/ pra kri ti mA ra ne/ i li i li le/ pra be sa ra pra / sarba twAH
78b4(rgyud): tA satwA nu ga te/ a na ba ra ba te/ a la ta/ aM gu ri/ sha mi ni/ bra hA yo hi/ a hita/ aH he/ ni ra ba ya ba/ mi tsi ra mAr+tha/ la na la gu sA
78b5(rgyud): dzi rat+na/ ze she/ d+harma kA ya/ dz+wa la tsan+na/ sa mu nga ba ti/ ma hA b+hU ta d+hA ya/ sa mu dra bo gA ba d+hA Ni mu dra Na/ mu khaM mu dra/ su raraM pra ti se bi d+hA/ su mu
78b6(rgyud): tra a bar+Nani/ saM bar+Na ni/ se ma mo ha ske ra/ bi drA ta ra sa na kI ti ta saM/ yaM ke tsi ta pra to b+ho bA ha/ ba ha ba ha ba ha/ kri tA/ ka ba tA/ shI la mu dr-ihr-i dA ni ra/ 
78b7(rgyud): d+harA d+ha ra/ d+ha ra/ dA ni dA la/ shAkra sarba hr-id ya/ mu dri to sa dza du dza ba ta/ dza kha ba ta/ su ma hi pa ti/ ma hA da b+hU ta mu dr-ita/ ye ke tsi ti shang ta na ni shI ta pre ta/ 
78b8(rgyud): oMn mima?/ sa tsanaM/ gi sha sa pa me khwa dzi ta/ tsAr+ya/ a d+hiSh+Ta ra bAka ba/ thA na N+ya thA ma bu b+h+yas mu ts+tsha ya/ a ba tAr/ mahAka ru Na ya mu dr-i tas
79a1(rgyud): samya ka pra ti pa ta tsir rA tran dz+wal du d+yaHna tri sarba mu ni br-i' b+ha/ ma hA kA ru Na sam d+hi/ dz+nyA na la b+hA ba la nA mi d+hi t+yag/ a bAM bI r+ya ba la na/ 
79a2(rgyud): d+hiSh+Tha ta sarba b+hU to pa tsa yA ya swA hA// / de nas de'i cha sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du gtogs pa'i sems can thams cad kyis 'od skad ces sangs rgyas dang / 
79a3(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshalo// phyag 'tshalo// sangs rgyas thams cad la phyag 'tshalo// zhes lan gsum smras nas/ 'di skad ces kyang smras// kye ma thub pa
79a4(rgyud): 'dus pa ngo mtshar che'o// kye ma'o byang chub sems dpa' sem sa dpa' chen po rnams dang / nyan thos chen po rnams 'dus pa ngo mtshar che'o// kye ma'i chos mnyam pa
79a5(rgyud): nyid rdo rje lta bu brten pa'i chos kyi snying pos lus 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs phyag rgya dang tshig rab tu dbye ba la 'jug pa lung bstan pa'i chos kyi rnam gra
79a6(rgyud): stor pa'i bstan pa thams cad kyis chos kyi tshul dkon mchog gsum gyi rigs byin gyis brlabs ston pa/ bdud kyi yul gyi stobs rnam par 'joms pa/ bdud kyi zhags
79a7(rgyud): pa kun gcod pa/ ngag thams cad tshar gcod pa/ chos kyi rgyal mtshan sgreng ba/ chos kyi phyogs srung ba 'di na ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba/ sngon ma bos pa ste/ sangs rgyas
79a8(rgyud): kyi yul mtha' dag yongasu rdzogs par bya ba dang / sems can thams cad kyi snying po dang / phyag rgya dang 'byung ba chen po thams cad dang / 'du byed dang / skye mched drug
79b1(rgyud): su sbyang bar bya ba nas/ sems can thams cad bla na med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa thob par bya ba'i phyir nga lta sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyi/ phyag rgya dang
79b2(rgyud): tshig rab tu dab pa la 'jug pa lung bstan pa'i gzungs kyi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bsha // gzungs lung bstan pa 'di bshad pan/ byang chub sanga' sems dpa' chen
79b3(rgyud): po gang+gA'i klung sum cu rtsa drug gi bya ma snyed dag gzungs mngon par sgrub pa'i ting 'dzin dang bzod pa thob par gyur to// yang de'i tshe zla 'od gzhor nur gyur pa sngar las las
79b4(rgyud): nas bal mo sbyar te kun tu rnam par bltas nas/ sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs dang / rang gi rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyi ma thus sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di dbyangs kyi bka
79b5(rgyud): ste/ 'di sad ces smras// rgyal ba zla ba rnams kyi 'khor/ 'di 'dra ba ni rnying par dka'// byang chub sems dpa' brtul zhugs che// mkhas pa 'di ni rang
79b6(rgyud): par dka'// gang 'od thugs rje ldan pa yi// mgon pos chos tshul byin rlabs pas// phyag rgya 'di 'dra thos pa yang // mchog tu rnyed par dka' ba'o// bdud kyi phyogs rnams
79b7(rgyud): thams cad dang // ngag rnams kyang ni pham byed pa// dkon mchog gsum rgyun mi 'chad pa// rdzogs sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs// sgrib pa thams cad bsal ba'i phyir/ 
79b8(rgyud): bzong dang nges par rab 'phel ba// sems can rnams kyang 'dun byed pa// rgyal po dang ni yul 'khor skyong // 'di na ngan byas bzlog byed pa// lta ba ngan pa rab 'gog pa// 
80a1(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' dbugs 'byin pa// byang chub lam yang rab ston pa// pha rol phyin pa 'phel byed pa// bzang po spong pa rdzogs byed pa// babs
80a2(rgyud): dang ye shes spobs pa rnams// 'phel bar bya ba'i phyir byin gyis brlabs// dkar po'i phyogs ni sdung byed pa// gzungs ni gzhan gyis mi thob pa// byang chub lam las
80a3(rgyud): mo g.yo ba// chos kyi dbang rnams 'bar byed pa'i// gzungs la yid gnyis thams cad ni// bsal nas lhag par mos par byos// gang gis byang chub 'grub 'gyur ba// 'di ni
80a4(rgyud): rdzogs pa'i lam yin// chos smra rnams ni srung ba nga // nyan pa ma don par 'phel bya'i phyir// gzhan gyis mi thub pa yi gzung sa// bdag gis nga yang bshad par bya// 
80a5(rgyud): slob pa med pa 'grub pa dang / sems can rnams kyi phan 'phel phyir// byang chub sems dpa' grags chen po// su dga' de la dad pa dbul// yang de'i tshe byang chub
80a6(rgyud): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzhon nur gyur pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyis mgrin gcig tu 'di skad ces smra so// bdag cag kyang gzungs 'di la dad pa dbulo// byin
80a7(rgyud): gyis brla'o// rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu ma 'am/ dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bskan ma gang la la zhig gos khrus byas te/ gos gtsang ma bgos la/ me tog sa
80a8(rgyud): tshogs bkram pa spos sna tshogs kyi rab tu gdugs pa/ ro bro ba/ sna tshogs kyis yongasu bskor ba/ ras dang / rgyan dang / ras bcos bu sna tshogs bting ba/ gdugs dang
80b1(rgyud): rgyal mtshan dang / ba dar snang bas shin tu rgyan pa'i 'khor gyi khyamasu sing+ge'i khring ga na 'jam pa la 'dug ste/ gzungs 'di yang dag par bshad na/ su yang de'i sem
80b2(rgyud): 'khrug pa 'am/ khams 'khrag pa 'am/ lus 'khrug po 'am/ yid 'khrug par mi byed do// de'i lus la yang dbugs mi gtong ngo // klad pa na bar byed mi nuso// 
80b3(rgyud): mig na ba dang / ljon pa dang / so na ba dang / rus pa na bo dang / mgul ba na ba dang / dpung pan pa dang / rgyab na pa dang / rgyu ma ra ba dang / ljon pa dang / chu son pa dang / 
80b4(rgyud): brlang ba dang / byi ba na par byed sus kyang mi nus te/ de ni gan sa med do// de'i skad 'gag par yang mi 'gyur// chos smra ba de sngon gyi mi dge ba'i las kyis
80b5(rgyud): khams 'khrug pa 'am/ skad 'gag par gyur na yang des gzungs 'di bklags na thams cad ma lus par zhi bar byed par 'gyur te/ las yongasu
80b6(rgyud): byang ras bde bar 'gyuraro// chos nyan pa gang dag der 'du bar gyur pa de dag la yang su yang khams 'khrug pa 'am/ skad 'gag pa rwa byed par mi 'gyur ro// gang dag den
80b7(rgyud): gzungs 'di nyan pa de dag kyang mi dge ba'i las kyis yun ring por na ba dang / khams 'khrug pa dang / skad 'gags pa de thams cad yongasu byang bar 'gyur// de ras zla
80b8(rgyud): 'od gzhon nur gyur pas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor can gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed de dag ga la ba de logasu thal mo sbyar bas btud nas
81a1(rgyud): 'di skad ces gsol to// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bdag la dgongasu gsol/ gzungs 'di la dad pa bstsal du gsol// 'di lta
81a2(rgyud): ste/ shAn+te/ a sa ma ro ba/ maM tr-i sau ma ba te/ e hi/ na ba kuny+dzA be/ nab kuny+dza ge/ mU la sho d+ha ne/ ba ha kha ba ha kha/ mA ra ba ta ba tA/ pa ri s+yAng / ba ha sa kha ha sa/ 
81a3(rgyud): a mU laSha tsa la/ tsa tsa le/ pra tsa lA/ d+hi d+hi le/ e ka na ya pa ri ts+tshi nga tsan+ti ni/ ba ra sa/ ba ra sa dza naM/ kha ga su/ ra tri ne swa ba su ra tri ne b+hu ta ko Di bi ra ts+li d+ya dz+wa la bar+tha
81a4(rgyud): la kha ba ye dz+wa la kha na ma k+Sha khA/ ka ka kha ha d+ya hA/ hu shu ru / s+phar+ra 'e ngam/ btsongs/ a ma ma n+ya/ ma ma khya/ ma ma sa mu dra/ mu rAg ga/ se skA rA ma pa
81a5(rgyud): sAng/ bo d+hi sA k+Shi ti bi ma/ mahA bi ma/ b+hu ta koH/ A kA sha shAs par s+yang swAhA// yang de'i cha sangs rgya sa kyi zhing de dag thams cad du gtogs pa
81a6(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag dang / nyan thos chen po de dag dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod
81a7(rgyud): sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / na mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po'i dbang po dag dang / sems can gzi brjid che ba gi za brjid che ba nga dag
81a8(rgyud): thams cad kyis la gso zhes bya ba byin no// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis kyang 'di skad du/ kye ma gzungs 'di ni stobs che ba/ drag shul dang
81b1(rgyud): ldan pa ste/ ngag thams cad bzlog pa/ mi 'jigs pa dang / nad dang / rmi lam ngan pa dang / ltas ngan pa thams cad yongasu phar bar byed pa nas/ sgrib pa med pa
81b2(rgyud): ye shes dang / bsod nams dang / ye shes chen po bsags pa bla na med pa'i ye shes kyi rgyu 'thun pa'i bar gyi gzungs 'di bshad zhes bka' stsal to// yang de'i
81b3(rgyud): tshe tshangs pa phun sum tshogs pa'i dbang phyug ces bya ba kha dog bzang po rgyas pa mchog dang ldan pa lha'i las 'das pa'i gros dang / spud pa dang / rgyan dang / mo tog dang / spros
81b4(rgyud): dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa rgya chen po rnams kyis lus brgyan nas/ bud med kyi gzugasu bsgyur te/ tshangs pa chen po'i stobs kyi yul bkong ba byin gyi brlabs kyis
81b5(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med kyi spyan sngar 'dug/ de nas tshangs pa chen po phun sum tshogs pa'i dbang phyug star las
81b6(rgyud): nas ngal mo sbyar/ phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis gang bdag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing ma lus pa 'di
81b7(rgyud): dbyangs kyis go bar bgyis la der bdag la bgegs cung zad kyang mi 'byung bar dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi tshig brjod pa rnam par gdon mi 'tshal ba bstan par bdag
81b8(rgyud): byir gyis brlab tu gsol to// bdag gis nga ltar chos smra ba rnams dang / chos nyan pa rnams kyi slad du/ 'di 'dra ba'i gsang sngags kyi tshig srung ba bshad pa
82a1(rgyud): bgyi ste/ ci nas smang ma'i dus na/ bdud dam/ bdud kyi 'khor tam/ lha 'am/ kA 'am/ klu mo 'am/ klu rgan po 'am/ klu rgan mo 'am/ klu'i 'a
82a2(rgyud): tam/ klu'i 'khor mo 'am/ klu'i bu 'am/ klu'i bu mo 'am/ de bzhin du rgyas par bigya ste/ sha za 'am/ sha ze mo 'am/ sha za rgan po 'am/ sha za rgan mo 'am/ sha za'i
82a3(rgyud): 'khor tam/ na za'i 'khor mo 'am/ sha za'i bu 'am/ sha za'i bu mo 'am/ mi 'am mo ma lags pa'i bar gang la la chos smra ba dang / chos nyan pa rnams la glags
82a4(rgyud): lta ba 'am/ skabs tshol ba'i dag phyir rgol ba zhig mchis te/ ba na chos smra ba 'am/ chos nyan pa rnams kyi spu'i khung bu gcig tsam la yang 'tsha 'am/ gnod par bgyi
82a5(rgyud): dam/ 'jigs par bgying ngam/ mdangs phrog gam/ lus la dbugs chen po gtong ngam/ ba na skad cig gcig tsam yang sdang ba'i sems kyis ltam
82a6(rgyud): bdag gis bdud nas mi dang mi ma yin pa'i bar de dag bzlog pa dang / chad pas bcad pa dang / tshar bcad pa dang / rmugs pa dang / rengs pa dang / rmongs par bgyi/ 
82a7(rgyud): 'tshal bar 'gyi na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi gang bdag gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing ma lus pa 'di dbyangs kyis gang bar bgyi ba'i dbyangs kyi dkyil
82a8(rgyud): 'khor gyi tshig brjod pa byin gyis brlab tu gsol// 'di la su zhig bdag gi grogasu 'gyur// de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis cing mi gsung bar gyur
