82b1(rgyud): pas gnang ba mdzad do// de ras brgya byin gtsug pud 'dzin ces bya ba 'dzam+bu chu bo'i gser gyi rgyan gyis 'od kyis lus brgyan nas ha cang yang mi ring ba zhig tu 'dug// de
82b2(rgyud): nas brgya byin gtsug pud 'dzin gyis tshangs pa phun sum tshogs pa'i dbang phyug la 'di skad ces smraso// che zhe nga bzhin gshegs pa che dpag med kyi sman sngar ma 'dug cig
82b3(rgyud): che zhe 'dir bag meng par ma byed cig/ bcom ldan 'das la ma 'tshe shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byis pa rnams ni spros la dga'// de bzhin gshegs pa spros mo mnga'/ de dag
82b4(rgyud): 'jig mtshan nyid kyi// 'dus byas dag kyang ston bar mdzad// de bzhin gshegs pa ni gzungs dang yi ga dang tshig rab tu dbye ba thams cad kyang bzhin nyid kyi tshul
82b5(rgyud): brnyes pa ste/ che zhing bzhin gshegs pa ni nga / lta ste/ na mkha' dang mnyam pa nyid mnyam pa nyid du gcig pas// de bzhin nyid la 'gal bar mi mjed nga / nam mkha' la ni
82b6(rgyud): 'du byed gsum gyi 'dzag lha'i mtshan nyid spro btags pa medo// ji ltar 'du byed rnams la na mkha' mi rtog tsang / rnam par mi rtog pa de bzhin du/ de bzhin gshegs pa yang
82b7(rgyud): 'dod pa'i yom cad la spros par mi 'jeng mo teg rnam par mi rtog mi gnas mngon par mi zhen te/ de bzhin du srog la ma yin// skye ba po la ma yon/ gso ba po la ma yin/ 
82b8(rgyud): bra la ma yin/ gang zag la ma yin/ phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched rnams la yang spro bar mi mdzad/ mngon par mo zhen ma/ chen khyod kyis ji ltar na nga bzhin gang shegs
83a1(rgyud): nga'i sku la spro bar byed/ de bzhin gshegs pa tsha dbag med kyis bka' stsal pa/ lha'i dbang po rtag rtog ste spros shig/ khyed la ngas mi sdug pa
83a2(rgyud): bur gyur tar/ skyes bu dam pa chen po 'di ni sangs rgyas mang po la lhag par bya ba byas shing / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyeng par// skyes bu
83a3(rgyud): pa'adi ni de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir legs par rgyan nas bud med kyi lu su mngon par sprul pa yin gyis/ 'di la bud med ces tshig tu ma brjod cig/ da
83a4(rgyud): brgya byin gtsug phung 'dzin gyis tshangs pa phun sum tshogs pa'i dbang phyug la 'di skad ces smraso// rigs kyi bu bdag la thugs rdzibar dgongs te bzod par gsol/ 'di skad
83a5(rgyud): smras pas bdag la 'bras bu mi sdug papo sa par ma gyug cig/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' ltang mo can gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gal te brgya
83a6(rgyud): gyos tshig nga slar ma bshags na/ de'i 'bras bu rnam par sprin po rnga tsam zhig tu 'gyur/ de bzhin gsheg/ sa pa tshe dpag med kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu gal
83a7(rgyud): te nges slar ma bshagasu zin na/ tshe rabs brgyad khri bzhi stong du 'dod pa'i mngal smad pa bud med kyi dngos po yongasu blangs par 'gyur ro// de bas na rigs kyi bu tsa nas kyang ngag gi
83a8(rgyud): las bsrung bar bya'o// rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis khyod kyi dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi tshig brjed pa byin gyis brlabs kyi khyod kyis spobs par gyis shig
83b1(rgyud): de nas tshangs pa phun sum tshogs pa'i bang phyug sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs kyi thal mo sbyar te phyogs bcur rnam par bltas nas 'di skad ces smraso// sangs rgyas bcom ldan
83b2(rgyud): 'das rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang / nyan thos chen po rnams dang / lnga dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yiyan dang / na mkha'
83b3(rgyud): lding dang / mi 'am tsau dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams bdag la dgongasu gsol/ bdag gi bsam pa la chos kyi tshul 'ang ring du gnas par 'gyur ba dang / chos smra ba rnams dang / 
83b4(rgyud): chos nyan pa rnams dang / nanan tan dang ldan pa rnams la 'tshe bar mi 'gyur bar 'dir dang ba stsal du gsol// gang slang ma'i dus na bdud nas mi dang mi ma lag
83b5(rgyud): pa'i bar gyis de dag la 'chi bar mi bgyid par dang bskul du gsol// de nas tshangs pa phun sum tshogs pa'i dbang phyug gis de dag gi sdang ba'i sems bzlog pa dang / mna'
83b6(rgyud): bsnag pa'i phyir dbyangs kyi sgra phyung nas sgra nges 'jig rten gyi khams 'di thams cad gang bar byaso// yang de'i tshe tshangs pa'i dbang po de dag thams cad kyis mgron gcig tu
83b7(rgyud): 'ang skad ces smra so// bdag cag kyang gzungs 'di la dang pa dbu'o// bdag cag nyid kyis kyang phyi mi'i dus na/ gzungs 'di gzungs par bgyi'o rab tu bstan par bgyi'o// ngas
83b8(rgyud): ba'i chos kyang srung bar bgyi'o// chos smra ba dang / nyan pa de dag dang / nan tan dang ldan pa de dag kyang srung bar bgyi'o// bdag cag gi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang / 
84a1(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang / nyan thos cher po rnams kyi spyar sngar gzungs 'di la dang ba dbul gyis skyes grangs pa gzungs
84a2(rgyud): gsungs shig/ de nas tshangs pa phur sum tshogs pa'i dbang phyug gis 'di skad ces smraso// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dang
84a3(rgyud): chen po rnams dang / nyan thos chen po rnams kyis bdag la byin gyis brla tu gsol/ 'di lta ste/ a ma le/ bi ma le/ ga Na shAn+te/ hA ra/ tsan+d+ra ma hA tsan+na/ tsan+d+ra ha/ 
84a4(rgyud): me ha/ so maM s+thA ma a ba ha/ bi ba ha/ e ga dze ma tra/ kha ba/ mU la pa ri ts+tsha / yak+Sha tsan+na/ bi shA tsa tsan+daM/ a brta ni/ saM brta ni/ saM kAr Ni/ dzi b+ha ni/ sne b+ha ni
84a5(rgyud): mo ha ni/ ud tsAtani/ ha ma hA/ mahA/ ma hA saM kutsa ne/ kha kha sha ba/ a ma la/ a mU la/ ri ba te/ a sA ra kha ba swAhA// gsang sngags 'di las
84a6(rgyud): 'da' zhing // mang po tshogs par mi spyod ni// mig gi mthong zhing 'go yang 'gas/ yan lag pa dang 'jig par 'gyur// 'di lta ste/ A tsa tsa/ a ba ha/ 
84a7(rgyud): tsak+Sh+maHtsak+ShaHtatA/ kha can+da/ mkhog/ tsan+da/ tsan+da/ tsA/ nanaha/ mU la tsats+tsha/ tsa mU la/ tsatsaha/ ma mU la tsatsA/ mU d+ham+b+ha/ ba yU ba sU swA hU~M// de nas tshangs
84a8(rgyud): dbang po thams cad nas/ shazi'i dbang po'i bar gyis legaso zhes bya ba byin te/ 'di skad ces smraso// steng chen po'i stobs kyi shugs shin tu 'joms pa'i gsang
84b1(rgyud): sngags kyi tshig 'dzib shang de phan pa ma yin par sems pa'i 'byung po thams cad la zhags pa 'di ga ba nang dag 'tsho bdag la 'gyur/ tshangs pa phung sum tshogs pa
84b2(rgyud): dbang phyug gis 'di skad ces smra so// 'byung po gang dag sdang po'i bsam pa can snying rje meng pa byas pa mi bzog sems can la 'tshe ba rnams sam/ bdung ngas/ bdud kyi
84b3(rgyud): 'khor grags lta zhing skabs tshol ba rnams/ sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa la mngon par dang pa'i rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba rnams la skabs tshol du
84b4(rgyud): nye bar 'ong ba dang / bcur mo dam pa dang / bu dang bu mo dang / btsun mo'i 'khor rnams dang / blon po dang / shor ba dang / dpung dam pa dang / 'khor rnams dpa
84b5(rgyud): gzhan yang sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa la dang ba skyes pa dang / brang mang dang / khye'u dang / bu mo rnams dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen mchos smra ba dang / chos nyan pa rnams
84b6(rgyud): dang / dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / bsam gtan dang / kha ton la 'grus pa rnams dang / zhal ta byed pa la brtson pa rnams la skabs tshol du 'ong zhing ba na sa
84b7(rgyud): kyi skad cig la spu'i khung bu gcig tsam la 'tshe'am/ gnod par byed dam/ 'jigs par byed dam/ mngangs 'phrog gam/ lus la dbugs gtong ngam/ sdang ba'i sem
84b8(rgyud): kyis blta ma/ bdud nas mi dang mi ma yin pa'i bar lus dri nga ba de dag gi mgo chal pa bdun du 'gaso// de dag gi mig kyang long bar 'gyur/ sring yang skams pa
85a1(rgyud): 'gyur/ sha bkrasan du 'gyur/ lus 'argya cing rjo ba nga/ rdzu 'phrul yang yongasu bri bar 'gyur/ de ngag sags par ltung bar 'gyur/ rlung
85a2(rgyud): kyang nga ngag phyogs bzhir gtong bar 'gyur/ rdul gyis kyang de ngag g.yogs nas de nying du sems 'khrugs te 'joms par 'gyur// gang dag sa la rgyu ba de dag gis
85a3(rgyud): sa'i khung du 'jug par 'gyur te/ si'i 'og tu dpag tshad brgyad khri bzhi stong du de dag gi tshe yongasu zad par 'gyur ro// gang dag chu na rgyu ba'i 'byung po sdang ba'i sems dang
85a4(rgyud): ldan pa/ sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa la mdo na par ma dad par gyur pa de dag sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa la mngon par dang po'i rgyal po rgyal rigs nas/ zhal
85a5(rgyud): byed par brtson pa'i dge slong gi bar la 'che'am/ gang dag sngags kyi tshig 'di dag las 'da' nang dag kya nga de bzhin du mgo tshal pa bdun du 'gas pa nas de nyid
85a6(rgyud): de dag gi tshe yongasu zad pa'i bar du 'gyuraro// yang yul gang du bdud kyi tshogs kyis mi grub pa'i gzungs kyi phyag rgya'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'byung ba der bdag cag gis
85a7(rgyud): srung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sba ba'i slad du spro bar bgyi'o// der chos 'dod pa'i son bde yongasu smin par bgyi'o// sdang ba'i gnod sbyin nas/ sdang ba'i lus srul po'i bar 'ang
85a8(rgyud): de nas bskrad par bgyi'o// yul de ni 'bab pa dang / rtsod pa dang / mu ge dang / pha rol gyi dpag tshogs dang / dus ma lags pa'i char pa dang / rlung dang / grang ba dang / tsha ba dang / 
85b1(rgyud): nang bde slar bzlog par 'gyi'o// bde ba dang / 'dum pa dang / lo legs pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba 'thun pa rnams sgrub par bgyi'o// chos smra ba rnams dang / chos nyan pa rnams la nang
85b2(rgyud): ma mchis pa dang / grags pa dang / rung ba dang / sI snang chen po nye bar sgrub par bgyi'o// yang de'i tshe tshangs pa chen po'i dbyangs dang ldan pa zhes bya ba/ byang chub sems dpa'
85b3(rgyud): sems dpa' chen po sa bcu la gnas pa/ tshangs pa'i nang du ni tshangs po kun gyis bkur/ bdud kyi nang du ni bdud kyis bkur/ brgya byin gyi nang du tsha brgya byi kun gyis bcu
85b4(rgyud): ba nas/ de bzhin du sbyar te/ rnam thos kyi bu dang / 'phags skyes po dang / mig mi bzang dang / yul 'khor srung dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / sred med kyi bu dang / lha ma
85b5(rgyud): yin dang / lha'i dbang po'i nang du ning ngag ku na gyis bkur ba kha dog bzang po rgyas pa mchog dang ldan brgyan dam pas legs par brgyan pa/ bud med kyi gzug
85b6(rgyud): dang / rtags dang / spyod lam gyis de bzhin ga shegs pa shAkya thub pa'i sman sngar 'dug ste/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir/ lag pa
85b7(rgyud): gnyis na yang bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che thog so// de nas byang chub sengar sa nga'i chen po dbyangs dang ldan pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa dal migo mi 'dzums
85b8(rgyud): par bltas te/ gzhan ma yin pa'i dngos po brjod du med pa cir yang ma yin par bltaso// don de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa des tshangs par dbyangs dang ldan pa la 'di skad
86a1(rgyud): ces bka' stsal to// kye khyod kyi mig mi 'dzums par ci'ang ma yin pa'i bar dang la ci zhig blta// ci 'di la sangs rgyas zhes bya ba dang / ci yang ma yin pa zhe
86a2(rgyud): bya ba'i chos gang yong ngam/ de bzhin du 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug gi nyon mongs pa rnams yod do zhes bya ba'i ming gi dngos po na rkyed gyi mtshan nyid // mtshan nyid kyi
86a3(rgyud): ni ma rigs pa'o// ma rig pa'i rkyen gyis 'du byed rnams nas/ 'gog pa'i bar du rgyas par bya'o// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar mchis pas na/ de'i slad du ma
86a4(rgyud): rig pa zhes gsungs na/ bcom ldan 'das gal te ma rig pa ma mchis na/ sring po'i yan lag bcu gnyis po de dag gang las skye bar 'gyur// ci na mkha' las skyes zhes
86a5(rgyud): bgyi na na mkha' nyid kyang ma mchis pa'o// bco ma ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu da de bzhi na te/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad nin mkha' lta bu'o// 
86a6(rgyud): ji ltar na mkha' rdzas ma yin// mtshan nyid ma yin/ mun pa ma yin/ snang ba ma yin/ rtog pa ma yin/ rnar rtog pa ma yin/ rnam par rig pa ma yin/ grub pa ma sna
86a7(rgyud): brjod pa ma yin/ ci yang ma yin pa shes med pa/ dngos po thams cad spangs pa/ de bzhin du rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams de bzhin nyid kyi phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi chos
86a8(rgyud): rnams ni yang dag pa'i mthas yongasu bcad pa'o// bri ba med pa 'am gang ba med par phyir sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ni pha rol dang tshu rol la reg pa med pa'o// cha shas med
86b1(rgyud): ba'i phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ni brjod du med pa'o// mi g.yo zhing rnam par gzhag pa meng pa'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ni rdzas dang / dngos po dang / mtshan nyid ba
86b2(rgyud): mang ba'o// tshig gi lam dang bral ba'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad ni sgro btags pa med pa ste/ yang dag pa ma yin pa'i kun tu rtog pa las srid pa'i yang lag rnam
86b3(rgyud): smraso// bstan ba 'di bshad pa'i phyir/ srog chags brgyad khri bzhi stong gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bsrung // de nas bdud srog can gyis
86b4(rgyud): gsol ba/ gal te sangs rgyas kyi chos na mkha' lta bur dngos po ma mchis shing brjod du ma ma ches pa lags na/ nga ci'i slad du ye shis dang / brtsom
86b5(rgyud): 'grus dang / thabs dngang 'og gnor pas zhe nga ji ltar bdag la 'tshe/ bang gi bdud kyi yul 'joms// ba gri bdud kyi yul nas sen kha 'dren/ 'gro ba med pa
86b6(rgyud): 'ong ba meng pa dang / ci yang mi yin pa'i skye mo la slob du 'dzud/ gang gi tshe sen 'di dag khod kyi bslab pa la slob pa na/ de dag nyon mongs pa skye ba spyod pa yang dag par rdza su ma
86b7(rgyud): babang // gang gi slad du khyod kyis bdag gi slang du grangs meng dpag tu med pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang / byang chub sanga' sanga' chen po rnams dang/ 'an thos chen po rnam
86b8(rgyud): dang / tshangs pa cher po rnams dang / brgya byin dang / 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi dang / dbang phyug chen po rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba'i lha dang / klu dang / gnod spyir dang / dri za dang
87a1(rgyud): lA ma yin dang / mamakha' lding nga / mi 'am cingadang / lto 'phye chen po rnams bsdus nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing ma lus pa 'di gang bar bgyis// spong rdza
87a2(rgyud): pa 'dis kyang gang dag pos ma thag tu bdag klad pa nang mi bzad pas btab ste/ sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba myong zhing lus kyang rul la dri nga bar gyur pa nga 'dra ba'i gsang sngags
87a3(rgyud): kyi tshig rnams bshad/ yang de'i cha bdud drug khri brgyad stong dang bdud kyi 'khor grangs med dpag tu med pa dang / de bzhin du sdang ba'i gnod spyor dang / sring po dang / grul
87a4(rgyud): bum dang / sha za de dag thams cad kyis kyang mgrin gcig tu 'di skad ces smras// bdag cag kyang bas ma bag tu klang pa na bar gyur te/ lus kyang rul cing dri nga bar
87a5(rgyud): gyur nas/ shin tu sdug bsngal ba'i tshor ba mye ngo // de ba zhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// sdig can khyod kyis 'das pa
87a6(rgyud): par byos shig dang / de byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug pa'i tshe/ khyod kyis nga bsang ba'i phyir dpag tshad brgyad cu tshun cha da kyis dang na mkha' bdud kyi sdes bkang ste
87a7(rgyud): pa nas/ da ltar bar dbye ba 'khor dang bcas te/ nga bsad pa'i bar du bkye bas debs na khyod yongasu gdul ba dang / zhi bar bya ba dang / yongs mya ngan las 'da' ba dang / 
87a8(rgyud): du bdud gzhan rnams nas mi dang mi ma yin pa'i bar du gdul ba dang / zhi bar bye ba dang / sdug bsngal bde nye bar zhi bar bya ba dang / 'ong ba dang / 'gro ba mang ba ci yang ma
87b1(rgyud): pa'i sgyu ma la bslab par bya ba dang / 'gro ba bde du 'chi ba'i pho dang skye ba'i 'khor ba'i chu kun skam pa dang / phung po lhag ma med pa'i bar du mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings
87b2(rgyud): yongasu mya ngan las 'das pa'i phyir sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang / byang chub sa de'i grangs med dpag tu med pa nas mi dang mi ma yin pa'i bar rnams pa sogs kyi / 
87b3(rgyud): sdig can khyod bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems spyad cig/ de ltar na khyod klad pa na ba'i sdug bsngal zang ba tsher ba 'di las yongasu thar bar 'gyur// 
87b4(rgyud): mthar gyis sangs rgyas kyi chos na mkha' rang bzhin lta bu mngon du mchog/ bdud kyi yul las ches khyad par du 'phag sa pa'i sangs rgyas kyi yul rnams kyang 'thab pa
87b5(rgyud): 'gyur/ yang de'i tshe bdud drug khri brgyad sde dang / bdud kyi la khor grangs med dpag tu med pa dang / sdang ba'i gnod sbyin nas lus srul po sdang ba'i bar gyis mgrin gcig
87b6(rgyud): tu 'ang skad ces gsol to// bdag cag gis kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par bgyi na/ ji ltar bdag cag sangs rgyas kyi chos na mkha'i rang ba
87b7(rgyud): lnga bu de dag mngon du 'gyur// thams cad las khyad par du 'phags pa'i sangs rgyas kyi yul 'dir yang thob par 'gyur/ de nas bdud sdig can gyis 'di skad ces smra so// gal
87b8(rgyud): bdag phyi mi'i mthi'i mu'i bar du klang ba na bar gyur kyang bdag 'di 'dra ba'i g.yo smras byang chub tu sems mi bskyed// de nas tshangs pa'i chen po dbyangs dang ldan pas 'di skad ces
88a1(rgyud): gsol to// bdag kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyi spyan sngar bstan pa'i chos kun gzung bar spro'o// sangs
88a2(rgyud): rgyas kyi zhing snyigs ma lnga can 'dir de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa 'di'i bstan pa la gtso bos btab pa gzung bar bgyi ste/ nga yang shAkya thub pa nyi ma nub kyi bar du bang gis
88a3(rgyud): bstan pa'i ngal chos kyi tshul 'bar bar bgyi'o// yul gang na bdud kyi tshogs kyis mi 'ub pa'i gzungs kyi tshogs kyi rnam grangs 'di ma byung ba dang bdag gis 'byung bar bgyi'o// 
88a4(rgyud): gang du byung ba der mi shin tu lhag par byung bar bgyi'o// grong dang / grong khor dang / grong rdal dang / yul de dag na rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo gang dag mchis pa
88a5(rgyud): dadag kyang srung bar bgyi// yongasu bskyang bar bgyi/ gnod pa las bzlog par bgyi/ dor dang dge ba la gzung bar bgyi'o// gang dag bdud kyi tshogs kyis mi thub pa'i gtsu
88a6(rgyud): kyi rnam grangs 'di phan bris nas 'tshong ba rnams dang / gang na chos smra ba sing+ga khri la mchis te/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yang dag par rab tu 'chad par 'tshal ba de dag gis der thogs
88a7(rgyud): gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag brjod par bya'o// gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag gis bdag dgug par 'gyur te/ bdag nyid 'khor dang bcas par phyogs dang mchis nas/ chos smra
88a8(rgyud): ngag dang zhan pa de dag srung ba dang sba bar bgyi'o// 'di lta ste/ a ba maM/ a ba maM/ e ba re/ aM ba re/ pa re kuny+dza/ nA da nAng/ puSh+ka rA ba ha/ dza lu ka/ ma kha ya/ oM li/ mi li/ 
88b1(rgyud): ki li/ ma li kI Ni tsir mu dra mu dra mu khe swA hA// bcom ldan 'das gang dang gang na chos smra ba de dag gis thog mar gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag dran par bgyis la/ bdag cag gis kyang
88b2(rgyud): lha'i rna ba'i khams shin tu yong su dag pas bos te/ deng ma mchis na 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la bslus par 'gyur zhing / bdag bla dam
88b3(rgyud): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar yang mi 'gyur bas/ bcom ldan 'das bdag der mchis la/ chos smra ba'i rkang pa'i drung du spyi bos blang ba
88b4(rgyud): bgyi'i// chos smra ba de'i spobs pa rigs pas nye bar sgrub par bgyi/ chos smra ba dang / chos nyan pa de dag gi rang thams cad bsal bar bgyi/ lta ba ngan pa dang / bya ba ngan pa dang / bcom
88b5(rgyud): thang bsal bar bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das phyogs gang na tshe sa kyi rnam grangs 'di 'chang ba dang / 'dzin pa dang / kun chub par bgyid pa der bdag 'khor dang bcas
88b6(rgyud): mchis nas 'bab pa dang / rtsod pa dang / mu gau dang / nad dang / 'jigs pa dang / pha rol gyi dpag tshogs dang / char mi 'bab pa dang / dus ma lags pa'i rlung dang / tsha ba dang / lta ba
88b7(rgyud): ngar ba dang / bya ba ngan pa nga dag thams cad dang / mi dang mi ma lags pa dang / dud 'gro rnams kyi 'jigs pa bde zhi bar bgyi'o// ngar ba mi shis pa dang / rmi lam ngan pa dang / ltas
88b8(rgyud): ngan pa dang / sdang ba dang / brlang ba dang / zhe gcod pa dang / ro bro ba ma mchis pa dang / kha ba dang / cha ba dang / dring ba dang / rag ra mi bde ba'i dgu re thams cad bsal bar bgyi'o// 
89a1(rgyud): tshab dang / mu ge'i gnod pa rnams bsal bang 'gyi'o// glang ba cho dang/ sing+ge dang / stag dang / ma he dang / spyang ki dang / sbrul 'dug pa dang / rkun po dang / gaman
89a2(rgyud): can dang / mi dang mi ma lags pa'i 'jigs pa thams cad zhi bang 'gyi'o// deng sems can thams cad kyis lang spyod dang / kun du spyod pa'i slang du/ nar dang / 'bru dang / sman dang / me tog
89a3(rgyud): dang / 'bras bu dang / ro dang / zas dang / skom dang / gos dang / mal cha sna tshogs nye bar sgrub par bgyi'o// yul gang ni chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'chang ba dang / 'dzin pa dang / 
89a4(rgyud): klog pa dang / kur chub par bgyis pa dang / 'chang ba der bdag gis sems can rnams kyi gnod pa thams cad so sor bsal bar 'gyi'o// sems can rnams kyi la
89a5(rgyud): sbyong dang / kun spyod pa'i slad du phan pa dang / bde ba dang / yid bde ba thams cad sgrub par bgyi'o// sa/ de dag kyang chos 'dod pa dang / dge ba spyod pa la gzung ba
89a6(rgyud): bgyi ste/ 'di ni bdag gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyi spyar sngar smon lam btab pa'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad bdog la thugs brtsa
89a7(rgyud): bar mdzad du gsol/ skyes bu'i mthu 'di nyams 'og tu chud par bgyi ba'i slad du/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis bdag la yid bzhin du bsam pa yongasu rta
89a8(rgyud): pa'i las kyi dngos grub stsal du gsol// de nas de'i tshe mdo la shAkya thub pa la sogs pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyis tshangs pa dbyangs dang ldan pa de la/ 
89b1(rgyud): thugs brtse bar dgongs te/ 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// tshangs pa dbyangs dang ldan pa 'dir gang gi phyir brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang 'jig rten skyong ba thams cad dang / gzhan
89b2(rgyud): sangs rgyas kyi chos la mngon par dga' ba'i lha dang / kA dang / gnod sprin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yan rnams bkug ste/ skyes bu'i mthu chen po 'di lta bu byed par 'gyur gyis/ dang
89b3(rgyud): kyis gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag tshangs pa dbyangs dang ldan pa 'di la sbyin par bya'o// de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag thams cad kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// 
89b4(rgyud): tshangs pa dbyangs dang ldan pa la gru bzhi par gyur cig/ 'di lta ste/ tsa mr-i thA/ mut+tA/ ba ri s+ya / ha mu ha/ hamU ha/ se ra swa ba la kri/ sha mi kha/ pa ra bA ha/ tsa mA ra yaH
89b5(rgyud): / su bau kha/ a mU la/ pa ri ts+yai nga sa ma dung d+hA a d+hiSh+Tha te swAhA/ de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu bdud dang / brgya
89b6(rgyud): dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten spong ba thams cad dang / lnga dang / klu dang / ga nod spyod dang / dri za dang / lA ma yin rnams dang / gzi baN+Di che ba gzi brjid che ba'i mi dang mi ma yin pa rnam
89b7(rgyud): 'gug cing 'dun par byed pa'i gzungs 'di sangs rgyas thams cad kyis yongasu bzung zhing byin gyi brlabs kyis khyod 'dis skyes bu'i mthu chen po 'di lta bu byeng nus par 'gyuraro// rab
89b8(rgyud): dang ldan pas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cag bud med kyi cha byang 'di lta bus chos kyi tshul srung bar bgyi'o// bur mong rnams kyang yongasu bsrung bar 'gyi'o// bcom ldan
90a1(rgyud): bud med la la zhig bu 'tshal te/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzin tam/ klog gam kun chub par bgying ngam/ bris te 'chang na bdag gis bud med
90a2(rgyud): bsam pa yong su rdzogs par bgyi'o// yang bud med gang 'di lta bus sems yongasu skyo bar gyur te/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'chang zhing klog pa nas nyan pa'i bar du bgyid na/ 
90a3(rgyud): de 'dod pa la spyod kyang mngal du mi 'chag so// yang bud med gang brnyas shing smad par gyur pa long spyong dang kun spyod pa dang bral ba nges chos kyi rnam grangs de bkrabs na/ bsam
90a4(rgyud): pa bang 'grub cing bde ba thams cad kyang phun sum tshogs par 'gyuraro// chos kyi rnam grangs 'di srung ba dang / sems can gyi bsam pa yongasu rdzogs par bgyi ba'i slad du
90a5(rgyud): bdag gos nor bu rin po che 'di gnyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad la dbu lo// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu de bzhin te/ srung
90a6(rgyud): dang / yong su rdzogs par byed par 'gyuraro// 'dus pa chen po rin po che tog gi gzungs las/ gzungs kyi le'u ste drug pa'o// // yang de'i cha byang chub sanga' sems dpa
90a7(rgyud): chen po shin tu rnam par phye ba'i blo gros zhes bya ba/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa dang / ha cang yang mi ring ba zhig na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
90a8(rgyud): ba nor bu 'bar ba'i dpal gyis spyan sngar 'dug nas de yud tsam gyis tshangs pa'i cha byang dang / skad cig gis bdud kyi gzugs sA / de bzhin du sbyar te/ brgya zhin gyis
90b1(rgyud): gzugs dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha'i dbang pa'i gzugs dang / 'phrul dga' dang / dga' ldan dang / 'bab bral dang / rgyal chen bzhi dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / gnod spyir nga/ 
90b2(rgyud): lha ma yin dang / namakha' lding dang/ mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / srin po dang / yi dgas dang / sha za dang / grul bum dang / rgyal rigs dang / bram ze'i rigs dang /  chug
90b3(rgyud): dang / dmangs rigs dang / sad+ma dang / glang po che dang / mahen sa dud 'gro'i skye gnas kyi bar gyi gzugs rnam pa sna tshogasu snango // skad cig gis bya dang / shing dang / ri dang / 'bras bu dang / 
90b4(rgyud): gos dang / mal cha dang / snam bu dang / snong dang / byang phrul dang / rgyan dang / smad rnam pa sna tshogs dang / rin po tsha'i gzugs dang / yud tsam gyis dge slong dang / dge slong
90b5(rgyud): mi'i gzugs dang / skad cig gis sangs rgyas kyi gzugasu snang ngo // skad cig gis kha dog dang / rtag sa dang / dbyibs dang / gzugs brgyad cu rtsa bzhing sna // 
90b6(rgyud): de nas de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa de la tshe dang ldan pa byams mi'i bu gang pos gsol pa/ bcom ldan las rigs kyi bu 'di kha dog pa/ gas dang / dbyibs dang / 
90b7(rgyud): gzugs brgyad rtsub rtsa bzhir gda' ba'i rgyu gang lags rkyen gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ tshe dang ldan pa gang po rigs kyi bu 'di mthu ra tu che ste/ bya
90b8(rgyud): chub sems dpa' shin tu rnam par bya ba'i blo gros dam bcas pa'i stobs kyi yul gang la gnas nas sems can rnams yongasu smin par byed cing / shes rab kyi mig sgrib pa
91a1(rgyud): pa med pas phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yong su dag pa dang / yongasu ma dag pa grangs med dpag tu meng ba ga na bsam pa dang / sems ji lta bu dang / spyod pa
91a2(rgyud): lta bu dang / ci 'dra ba'i nad kyis btab pa dang / gang la skyabasu song ba'i sems can ci 'dra ba dag mthong ba de 'dra ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas 'dal ba ji lta bo bzhin
91a3(rgyud): du/ byang chug sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi bar gyi gzugs dang / kha dog dang / rtags dang / spyod lam dang / dbyibs dang / gzugs de lta bu dag gis sems can rnams
91a4(rgyud): theg pa gsum las phyir mi ldog pa la 'god pa dang / sems can gang dag 'dod pa'i zil gyis non te/ yo byad dang / long spyod rnam pa sna tshogs 'dod pa de dag gi chags
91a5(rgyud): spang ba'i phyir yo byad rnams byin ras phyir mi ldog pa la 'god pa dang nad kyis btab nas sman 'dod pa rnams la sman byin te phyir mi ldog pa la 'god pa dang
91a6(rgyud): byang chub songs shin tu rnam par phye ba'i blo gros 'dis nyi na ga cig la pang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can rnams sdug bsngal las yongasu thar par byas te/ theg pa
91a7(rgyud): gsum la phyir mi ldog par 'gong ba'i dam bcas pa'i stobs kyi yul 'di nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sa ma yon bgrod pa ma yin no// gang pos gsol pa/ 
91a8(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'di sems can yongasu smin par 'gro ba'i slang du/ skyes bu chen po'i me'u chen po brtsams nas ji srid cig lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
91b1(rgyud): bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu 'dis bskal pa gang dag gi pha rol tu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa'i bskal pa ni grangs med de/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing
91b2(rgyud): gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul rnyedang // byang chub sems dpa' shin tu rnam par phye ba'i blo gros 'dis bskal pa gang dag la ting 'dzin gyi mthus skyes bu'i mthu 'di lta bu brtsams nas
91b3(rgyud): bskal pa grangs med pa drug cu rtsa bzhi 'angaso// gang pos gsol pa/ 'di ji srid cig na sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang du bla na med pa yang dag por rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs
91b4(rgyud): par 'chang rmya bar 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' su la ba/ bskal pa chen po brgya stong phrag nyi shu rtsa drug 'das pa'i 'og tu bskal pa chen po stsol ma
91b5(rgyud): zhes bya ba la sangs rgyas kyi zhing nor bu'i snying po zhes bya bar 'byung bar 'gyur te/ skyes dgu'i tsha lo stong phrag bzhi bcu thub pa na mtshams meng pa byed pa nas/ mi
91b6(rgyud): ba bcu'i chos kyi bar dang ldan pa'i sems can rnams kyi nang du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs
91b7(rgyud): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas me tog rgyas pa mtha' yas pa'i 'od zer ces bya bar 'gyuraro// nges lo bzhi khrid sangs rgyas kyi bya ba ma lus par byang
91b8(rgyud): par 'gyuraro// yongasu mya ngan las 'das pa'i phyir theg pa gsum po de dag la sems can rnams yongasu smin par byed par 'gyuraro// de'i 'og tu phung po'i lhag ma med pa'i
92a1(rgyud): mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyingasu yongs mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ro// gang pos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das skyes bu dam pa 'das sngor sems can yongasu
92a2(rgyud): smin par bgyis pa de dag gang du 'byung bar 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ skyes bu chen po de'i smod lam re su chad pa med de/ nges smon lam 'di skad du/ na
92a3(rgyud): phyogs bcu'i phyogs re rer yang sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnam su sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag bar chad med par mthong bar ma
92a4(rgyud): gyur tam/ bdag gis sngon byang chub kyi spyad pa spyod pan/ sems can gang dag 'og mar bla na med pa yang dag pa ra rdzogs pa'i byang chub la bsrung ba dang / yang
92a5(rgyud): dag par 'dzim du bcug pa dang / pha rol tu phyin pa drug la bkong ba de dag phyogs bcur so sor sangs rgyas kyi zhing du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa
92a6(rgyud): byang chub mngon par sangs rgyas par ma mthong ba de srid du/ bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi bya'o// ting 'dzin bkod
92a7(rgyud): pa'i mthu 'di 'dra bas phyogs bcu'i phyogs re rang yang sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnamasu sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag dang / gzhan
92a8(rgyud): dag na yang seMn gang dag mtshams med pa byed pa dang / the tsom na nas mi bde ba'i chos kyi bar dang ldan par 'gyur ba de rnams de dag nas shi 'phos nas/ bdag gi sangs rgyas kyi
92b1(rgyud): zhing du skyes la/ bdag byang chub sems dpang gyur pa bzhin du de dag thaMd kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed par byas te/ phyir mi ldog pa la sor bkod ras/ de nas gdod bdag blan
92b2(rgyud): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar skyes bu'i mthu chen po 'di ltar bu rgyun tu bya'o zhes smon lam bta'o// de ras phyogs bcu
92b3(rgyud): sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas 'dus pa'i byang chub seder rnams kyis 'di skad ces gsol to// gang dgang ltar sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jir lhags pa rnams stor pa 'di lta bu dag
92b4(rgyud): kyang mnyes par bgyis byang chub sede snying rje chen po dang ldan pa 'dus pa chen po 'di lta bu yang mthong / 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan
92b5(rgyud): 'das rnams kyi chos mnyam pa nyid rdo rje lta bu brtan pa'i chas kyi snying po lus 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i gzugs phyag rgya dang tshig rab tu dbye ba la 'jug pa lung
92b6(rgyud): bstan pa'i chos kyi tshul gyi byin gyis brlabs sngon ma bos pa 'di yang chos mnyan pa'i slad du rnyed pa ni bdag cag gi rnyeng pa legs par rnyed do// 'dus pa chen po rin po che tog
92b7(rgyud): gi gzungs las dam pa'i chos yongasu gzung ba'i le'u ste bdun pa'o// / yang de'i cha de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'khrugs pas thang dang ldan pa'i 'khor la thos
92b8(rgyud): te 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu dag brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha me yin dang / na mkha
93a1(rgyud): lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po'i dbang po nas mi dang mi ma yin pa'i bar du gang dag sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa la 'dir lhags pa khyad cag bde ngas sgra
93a2(rgyud): bar bya'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams 'dus pa 'di lta bu 'di dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'dus pa'ang dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig
93a3(rgyud): rten skyong ba dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa 'dus pa 'di lta bu ni dko no// de bas na khyed kyis 'di mthong nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir ma 'ongs pa'i
93a4(rgyud): dus ni dam pa'i chos 'di dang / chos kyi tshul 'di yongasu bskyang ba dang / dkon mchog gsum gyi rigs 'di 'bar bar byed pa ra spro ba dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa ma
93a5(rgyud): kyi spyan sngar khyod so so nas rang rang gi smon lam thob shog/ yang de'i tshe bdud dag spyod me tog ces bya bas me tog dang / 'bras bu dang / myu gu sna tshogs kyi rin
93a6(rgyud): po che sna bdun gyi bre bo byur bur bkang ste/ bud med kyi gzugs kha dog bzang po rgyas pa mchog dang ldan par bsgyur nas bud med kyi gos dang rgyan mchog gis brgyan te 'di skad
93a7(rgyud): ces gsol to// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang su dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir byon te bzhugs pa thams cad dang / gang gzhan yang su dag 'dir 'dus pa/ thade bdag
93a8(rgyud): la gongasu gsol/ bdag gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad la me tog dang 'bras bu dang / lo tog dang / myu gu thams cad kyis byung ba'i yongasu gtam zhing
93b1(rgyud): rgyas pa'i bre bo 'di dbul na/ sems can thams cad la thugs brtse bar dgongs te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thaMd kyis bdag gi bre bo me tog dang / 'bras bu dang / lo rtag
93b2(rgyud): dang / myu gu thams cad kyis yongasu gtams pa 'di bzhi su gsol// 'di ltar bdag la bskal pa bzang po mtha' dag la sangs rgyas kyi zhing ma lus pa 'dingar bud med kyi gzugs
93b3(rgyud): kyis sems can rnams la zas dang / sgom dang / 'bra spu dang / me tog gi sbyin pa'i bdag por 'gyur bar bgyi// de dag kyang yongasu smin par bgyi/ bsod nams kyi rnam par smin pa
93b4(rgyud): nges/ bdag pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongasu rdzogs nas/ bla ma med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bgyi/ sen gang dag bdagis
93b5(rgyud): 'dul ba de dag kyang yo byad kyis mi 'brel bar bdag gis rim gro bgyi ma/ bdag gis bsam pa rnams yongasu rdzogs par dngos grub su la du gsol
93b6(rgyud): de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag thams cad kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// skyes bu dam pa khyod 'di ltar sems mngon par dad pas sbyin pa che zhing mtho
93b7(rgyud): byas pa dang / sangs rgyas thams cad khyod kyis mchod pa byas pa lag so// leg so// khyod kyi bri bo me tog dang / 'bras bus yongasu gang ba 'di yang bzhi so// khyod kyang
93b8(rgyud): tog dang / 'bras bu dang / 'bru dpalo tog la sogs po ji ltar 'dong ba dang / dza tsam 'dod pa dang / gang gi phyir 'dod pa nang par gyur cig/ khyod kyi ba yid kyi brnag pa la/ 
94a1(rgyud): su rdzogs par gyur cig/ me tog dang / 'bras bu dang / 'bru phun sum tshogs pa grub par gyur cig/ 'byor pa yang phur sum tshogs par gyur cig/ de nas bdu
94a2(rgyud): dge sbyong me tog gis yang gsol pa/ grong dang / grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang / ljongs dang / ri brags gang dag na bdud kyi tshogs kyis mi thub pa'i gzungs 'di 'chang ngam/ son te/ 
94a3(rgyud): 'chang ngam/ tha ra glegs bam la bris te/ sti stang bgyed pa'i grong dang / grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang / ljongs dang / ri brag de dag tu bdag gnas par bibya'o// de dang de dag tu shing
94a4(rgyud): ljon pa rnams kyi me tog dang / 'bras bu nas 'bru dang lo ta ga gi bar du sgrub par bgyi'o// nga dag bde na me tog dang / 'bras bu 'tshal ba'i sems can rnams
94a5(rgyud): kyang tshim par 'gyi'o// bcom ldan 'das de bas mchebs pa ma gtogs par gal te den sems can me tog dang / 'bras bu'i zas 'tshal ba 'ga' zhig me tog dang / 'bras
94a6(rgyud): bu'i zas ma 'tshal ba'i slang du 'gum pa'i dus bgyis par gyur na/ dus gsum du gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad dang / 'dus pa chen po ma lus pa
94a7(rgyud): 'di bdag gis bslus par gyur cig/ bdag kyang bla ra med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar ma gyur cig/ gang yang sems can rnams
94a8(rgyud): me tog dang 'bras bu 'chal ba ngari bdag gi sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yong su rdzogs pa'i rgyur 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das den me tog dang / 'bras bu de dag 'tshal nas so/ 
94b1(rgyud): de dag gcig la gcig phan pa dang / mnyen pa dang / snying rje'i semasu gyur pa de ni bdag gi tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongasu rdzogs pa'i rgyu
94b2(rgyud): 'gyu ro// gang me tog dang 'bras bu 'tshal nas brtsor 'grus dang ldan par gyur pa de ni bdag gi brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongasu rdzogs pa'i rgyur 'gyur// gang sems dang / 
94b3(rgyud): sems las byung ba dag la mi rtag pa'i 'du shes 'jug pa de ni/ bdag gis bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongasu rdzogs pa'i rgyur 'gyur ro// gang me tog dang / 'bras bu
94b4(rgyud): 'tshal nas pa na bya dang ri dwags kyang chos 'chal bar gyur cing stong pa nyid la gnas na/ da ni bdag gi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongasu rdzogs pa'i rgyur 'gyur ro// gzhan
94b5(rgyud): yang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gang du 'byung ba ngar sems can gyi 'bras dang / gro dang / ras dang / til dang / mor sram snga dang / mo sran gre'u dang / byas na dang / sra
94b6(rgyud): chung dang / sran ma dang / gang dag lo tog tu 'gyur ba de dag gi sA da ngu bdag gis nan tan cher bgyi'o// 'bru dang lo tog mang po de dag gis kyang mdzod dang / bang ba rnams ba
94b7(rgyud): yongasu gam par bgyi'o// de ma sen pa na bya dang ri dgas dag gis kyang 'tshal bar gyur na/ de ni bdag gi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yong su rdzogs pa'i rgyur 'gyuraro// 
94b8(rgyud): bdag gis bu ram shing dang / dgun 'brus dang / bal po'i se'u gyi khu shugs shin tu mang po sgrub par bgyi'o// der bdag gis sems can rnams kyi rdza ma dang / bum pa dang
95a1(rgyud): bya stsogs rnams yongasu gtam par bgyi'o// gang de la bar bya rang ri dgas la sogs pas 'chal na yang de ni bdag gi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ba
95a2(rgyud): yongasu rdzogs pa'i rgyur 'gyuraro// de ltar bdag gis pha rol tu phyin pa drug po de dag yongasu rdzogs nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par
95a3(rgyud): 'tshang rgya bar bgyis// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi bdag gis byang chub sems dpa'i spyod ba 'di lta
95a4(rgyud): 'di la rjesu dgyes pa mdzad du gsol// de nas sangs rgya sa bcom ldan 'das de dag thams cad cang mi gsung bar gyur pas gnang ba mdzad // de bzhi dag
95a5(rgyud): pa ye shes tog ces bya bas 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// skyes bu dam pa khyod 'angadi lta bu'i mthu chen po byang nus kyi/ skye sa bu ngas pa khyod kyis stobs dang / brtsod
95a6(rgyud): 'grus dang spro ba brtul ba de lta bus sems can thams cad gnyer bar gyis shig/ de ras bdud dge sbyong lkog gis de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes tog de las dbugs
95a7(rgyud): pa de bos nas/ 'di skad ces gsol to// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bdag la dgongasu gsol/ gang la la zhig na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di mi spyod pa dang 'dag mi gnas kyi/ 
95a8(rgyud): gang la la chos kyi rnam grangs 'di spyod pa der bdag gnas te/ sa phyogs der 'bru dang / sman dang / 'bras bu dang / me tog gang dag 'byung ba de dag sems can rnams kyi long spyod
95b1(rgyud): kun spyod pa'i slad du/ rab tu sdum bag can dang / shin tu che ba dang / shin tu mang ba dang / shin tu ro gda' ba dang / shin tu kha dog dang ldan par sgrub par bgyi/ se na de dag kyang
95b2(rgyud): bza' ba dang btung bas tshim par bgyi/ ser rnams kyi mdzod dang bang ba dang / bum pa dang / rdza ma dang / bya stsogs rnams shin tu yongasu gang bar bgyi/ khan gang bya dang ri dgas kyis nga la
95b3(rgyud): kyang de ni bdag gi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yong su rdzogs pa'i rgyur 'gyur ba dang / bdag gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir bskal pa/ spong bams cad du sems can rnams la zas
95b4(rgyud): dang skom gyi long spong 'di lta bu dag gi so tshim par bgyi/ de bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi zhing kun nas nyon mongs par gyur pa snyigs ma lnga dang ldan pa grangs ma mchis dpag tu ma ma a
95b5(rgyud): pa gang+gi'i rlung gi bye ma snying rnamasu bskal pa spong bar la yang skyes bu'i mthu chen po 'di lta bu bgyi zhing / de nas gdod bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
95b6(rgyud): byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bgyi ma/ bdagi la sa yongasu rdzogs par 'gyur bar dngos grub stsal du gsol// bcom ldan 'das 'di dag ni ring gi smon lam
95b7(rgyud): gyis 'gug pa'i gsang sngags kyi tshig lag so// 'di lta ste/ tsa me kha tsa me kha/ tsa me kha/ pri pr-i ta ste/ ba ha ba ha ba ha/ sma ra asma ka ra/ san+te bi ba ba ba sa be/ sa ra sa ren+d+he/ sa
95b8(rgyud): ra ma hen+de/ sa ra badz+ran+na/ tar pa ya/ asma ka na/ hu hu/ hu hu/ hu hu/ e se ga dza be/ ta kha tata kha/ bA yu bA he/ u pa nA ya/ sarba ta pA ya/ bi dza bA/ pu shA sha/ a
96a1(rgyud): d+hi/ d+ha radu n+yan/ tsan+da ak+Sha ye dza la b+ha he ne/ sma ra a sA ka na sa mya ka pra ti ba rab yam/ sa ta kA li/ ya ma me/ ma mi ma ming dza ba ra swA hA// bcom ldan
96a2(rgyud): 'das bdag yongasu smin par 'gyi ba dang / byang chub kyi spyod ba yongasu rdzogs par bgyi ba'i slad du gang dang gang na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di dang gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag bshad pade
96a3(rgyud): dang de dag tu bdag gnas par bgyi'o// de nas yang ngo'i tshe sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag thams cad kyis de la leg so zhes bya ba byi mo// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa
96a4(rgyud): chen po thams cad dang / bdud 'khor dang bcas pa de dag ba mas cad dang / brgyu byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jog rten skyo nga ba thams cad dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod
96a5(rgyud): sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / na mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / grul bum dang / sha za dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa de dag thams cad dang / sangs
96a6(rgyud): rgyas kyi zhing 'dir gtogs pa'i sems can thams cad kyis mgror gcig tu leg so zhes bya ba byin te/ skyes bu dab pa khyod bud med kyi gzugs kyis sems can yongs
96a7(rgyud): smir par byed pa dang / pha rol tu phyin pa drug spyod pa legaso leg so// kho bo cag gi bsod nams dang / brtsor 'grus dang / stobs dang / pha rol gnon pas skyes bu'i ma
96a8(rgyud): de lta bu mngon par 'grub par 'gyur// de bzhing gshegs pa shAkya thub pas 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// skyes bu ngas pa 'di'i grogs byed par snying brtse ba cang du spro/ 
96b1(rgyud): bdung dge sbyong ma dog gi 'khor gang yin pa des mgrir gcig tu 'di skad ces gsol to// bdag cag 'di'i snang bzhir du 'brang zhing mdza' ba dang / rje su 'thuran pa'i grogs 'gyi'o// 
96b2(rgyud): skyes bu ngam pa khyod rnam bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba de'i tshe khyod kyi bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu
96b3(rgyud): lung bskon cig/ bdung dag sbyong me tog gis smras pa/ bzhin bzang dag de bzhir du gyur cig/ sems can gang ngag gis sa la sa bon rnams btab te/ me tog dang / 'bras
96b4(rgyud): bu dang / dri kun tu spyod par gyur pa de yang bdag cag lnga phan pa dang bde bar gyur cig/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa de la bdud dge sbyong me tog gis 'di skad ces
96b5(rgyud): gsol to// bdag ni khyod kyi bstan pa 'dzin pa chos kyi tshul 'bab par bgying ba lags te/ 'di nyid du thog mar mu de'i dgon pa rab tu zhi bar bgyi ba'i slad du/ 
96b6(rgyud): nan tan cher bgyis/ bcom ldan 'das bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstar du gsol// de ras bdud dge sbyong me tog gis de bzhin gshegs pa
96b7(rgyud): shAkya thub pa de la yan lag lngas phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'dugo/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas bdud dge sbyong mo tog la 'di skad ces bka' stsal
96b8(rgyud): to// bde gshegs sras po dpa' bo pad+ma'i gdong longs shig/ khyod kyis daring byang chub mchog tu smon lam snying po btab// rtsa la gi gcig pu snying rje skyes te dkris pa'i sdug
97a1(rgyud): bsngal gyis// gzir ba'i 'gro ba 'di bkrol nas ni sangs rgyas 'grub par 'gyur// chos rnams rang bzhin dri med ngag la na mkha' 'dra ba dang / song zhing mtsham
97a2(rgyud): rnams dang smon pa'i yul las rangab grol bar// rtogs nas zhing 'dir ring po mi thogs dpal ldan zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas dgra bul blo gros shin tu brtan ba nyid du 'gyur// 
97a3(rgyud): bdung dge sbyong me tog mchog tu dga' zhing yang bde ba skyes nas/ bcom ldan 'das de dag la me tog sna tshogs kyis gtor to// yang de'i cha byang chub sa dang sa der chen po grub pa
97a4(rgyud): blo gros zhes bya ba stan las langs te thal mo sbyar nas/ sa sa rgyas kyi zhing 'dir gtogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la dbyangs kyis go bar byas nas/ 
97a5(rgyud): skad ces gsol to// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bdag la dgongasu gsol// bskal pa bzang po byung ras pa ngag gos de bzhin gshegs pa 'khor ba
97a6(rgyud): 'jig gi spyan sngar yongasu smin par bgyi ba'i slad du smon lam btab ste/ sems can rnams kyi nang bzhi brgya rtsa bzhi rab tu zhi bar bgyi ba'i slad du/ bud med kyi gzugs kyi
97a7(rgyud): sa'i bcung las byi blangs te/ rtswa dang rtsa ba sna tshogs kyi nang du stsal to// sems can rnams kyi long spyong du bgyi ba dang / nang rab tu zhi ba'i sdang du slar bcud kyis lar brgya
97a8(rgyud): bzhir sbyar te/ rtsa ba'i sman brgya rtsa bzhi dang / 'bras bu'i sman brgya rtsa bzhi dang / mar las sbyar ba brgya rtsa bzhi dang / bkru smar brgya rtsa bzhi dang / sman rang med ces bya ba brgya rtsa bzhi
97b1(rgyud): ras ska ba'i phye ma dang / ril bu dang / sngar stsal ba'i bar du srong rtsa bzhi bstan to// san yongasu smin par bgyi ba dang / nang zhi bar bgyi ba dang / san rnams la phan par bgyi ba'i slad du/ 
97b2(rgyud): bdag gis nga bzhin gshegs pa 'khor ba 'jig zha 'bring dang bcas pa la kun spyad pa sna tshogs kyis bsnyen bkur bkur bgyis nas/ der bdag byang chub tu lung bstan par 'chal
97b3(rgyud): nga dang / de nas de bzhin gshegs pa 'khor ba 'jig gis bdag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// ma 'ongs pa'i dus na skye dgu'i che lo brgya thub pa na/ de bzhin gshegs pa
97b4(rgyud): dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas zhes bya ba nas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba'i bar dang ldan pa shAkya thub pa zhes bya bar 'byung // de bzhin gshes
97b5(rgyud): bde'i sngon gyi smon lam gyis sangs rgyas 'dus pa chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa' 'dus pa chen po 'byung ste/ dang khyod bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
97b6(rgyud): pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa thob par 'gyuraro// de'i 'og tu bzhin gshegs pa gser thub kyis kyang 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// de'i 'og tu 'od srung gis kyang ba/ 
97b7(rgyud): li 'ding skad ces bka' stsal nas de'i tshe 'dag gis sems can nang pa rnams kyi slad du/ bskal pa chen po gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi bar du sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jir sman che
97b8(rgyud): po bcud kyis len gyi lhar gyur cig/ der yang bdag gis sems can kun gyi spyad pa dang nang rab tu zhi bar bgyi ba'i slad du/ sa'i bcud rgya chen po blangs nas rtsa dang / rtsa ba
98a1(rgyud): lo ma dang / 'dab ma dang / lo tog dang / 'bras bu sna tshogs kyi nang du stsal to// de na sen gang dag gis yang dag par sbyar te 'tshal nas san de dag
98a2(rgyud): sems dang sems las byung ba dag la mi rtag pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / stong pa dang / bdag med par so sor rtog pa gang 'jug pa de yang bdag gi shes rab kyi pha rol
98a3(rgyud): tu phyin pa yongasu rdzogs pa'i rgyur 'gyur ba dang / ji ltar bdag sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir skyes bu'i mthu chen po 'gyod pa de bzhin du phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA
98a4(rgyud): klong chen gyi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams re rer yang bskal pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyeng du bdag gis bud mad kyai gzugs kyis spro ba chen po dang / spobs
98a5(rgyud): dang / brtson 'grus dang / pha rol gnor pa 'di lta bu dang / sen nad pa yongasu smin par bgyi ba dang / bsnyen bkur brgya ba 'di lta bu ngas bdag bla na med pa yang
98a6(rgyud): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar gyur cig ces smon lam bta'o// da ltar yang bdag sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi spar sngar smon lam
98a7(rgyud): 'phel bar bgyi // skal pa chen po dang ldan pa pha rol gnon pa brtan pa dge sbyong me tog 'di'i grogasu yang gyur cig/ bdag cag gnyis kas kha dog gcig tu bud mad
98a8(rgyud): kyi gzugs kyis sems can rnams yongasu smin par bgyi'o// bung med rnams rab tu yong su smin par bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das yang bdagu cag gnyis kyis nang pa rnam
98b1(rgyud): dang / rgan po rnams kyi nang rab tu zhi bar bgyi ba'i slad du/ si'i bcud las byin blangs pa zas dang / skom dang / kha dog dang / dri dang / ro dang ldan pa sbyar bar bgyis te// bdag shes
98b2(rgyud): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar du yong su rdzogs pa'i rgyur gyur cig/ bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur zhe na/ sangs rgyas
98b3(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis bdag la lagaso zhes bgyi ba stsal du gsol// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs po'i byang chub tu lung
98b4(rgyud): bsum du gsol// de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis skyes bu dam pa khyod legaso leg so zhes bya ba byin no// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas 'di
98b5(rgyud): skad ces bka' stsal to// khyod ni 'jig rten nang pa'i sman pa gcig/ de bzhin dbang po rnams la bde byed pa// pad+ma ldan pa zhing gtsang dam pa dang // rnam par
98b6(rgyud): snang mdzad ces bya'i rgyal bar 'gyur// ngo bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos 'dzin ces bya ba lung bstan par 'dod nas// bud med kyi gzugs kyis smon
98b7(rgyud): lam btab pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas de la yang 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// khyod ni ri dngas 'dzin gicig pu ste/ khyod ni ri ba myur du rdzogs par 'gyur/ 
98b8(rgyud): rgyal ldan zhing mchog phun sum tshogs pa'i ni/ ye shes dbang phyug ces bya'i rgyal bar 'gyur// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' ye shes bla ma zhes bya ba lung bstan pa
99a1(rgyud): par 'dod nas/ bud med kyi gzugasu spyod pas smon lam btab pa dang / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de la yang 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// khyod kyis
99a2(rgyud): 'dir ni thabs dang shes rab kyis// me tog 'bras bus sems can tshim byas nas// zhing mchog rnam par dag pa sgo ldan du/ nyi ma mchog gi bde bar gshegs par 'gyur/ 
99a3(rgyud): deng bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' thal ba ston ces bya ba lung bstan pa thob par 'dod nas/ bud med kyi gzugs kyi sa ma la yongasu spyong pas/ sems can yongasu smin pa
99a4(rgyud): bya ba'i phyir smon lam btab pa dang / de nas bcom ldan 'ang sa kyis de la yang 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// 'gro ba mi rtag 'du shes byas nas ni// skye bo byang chub yongasu
99a5(rgyud): smin pas nas/ skye bo rdul can zhing mchog rab bsngags par// me yi sgron ma bde bar gshegs par 'gyur// de ba zhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems can ma
99a6(rgyud): la g.yo zhing rdul dang bral ba lung bstan pa thob par 'dod nas bud med kyi gzugs kyis rlung la yongasu spyod pas sems can yongasu smin par bya ba'i phyir smon lam btab pa
99a7(rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de la yang 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// g.yo bas sems can rnams la dga' sbyar te/ khyod ni nyon mongs rab tu zhi byed cing // rnam dag ni
99a8(rgyud): du mnyam nyid don mthong ga/ zla ba'i 'od ces bya ba'i rgyal bar 'gyur// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa med cing spron ma lung bstan pa thob par 'dod nas/ bud med
99b1(rgyud): gzugs kyis na mkha' las yongasu spyod pas sems can yongasu smin par bya ba'i phyir smon lam btab pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe/ de la yang 'di skad ces ka
99b2(rgyud): stsal to// mi gnas ye shes ston pa mya ngan meng // yang dag byang chub lam mchog don smra ba// sgrib pa bsal cing chags pa med bzhin du// ye shes mchog ces bya ba'i
99b3(rgyud): rgyal bar 'gyur de bzhin du byang chub sede'i spos mchog sla ba lung bstan pa thob par 'dod nas/ bud med kyi gzugs dang ldan pa me tog la yongasu spyod pas/ sems can mang
99b4(rgyud): su smin par slar lam btab pa dang / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de la yang 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// sangs rgyas la mchog ston pa rnams la mi/ me tog spos ma
99b5(rgyud): ngag gis mchod byas nas// me tog 'byung gnas zhing mchog rnam dag tu// kun nas spos kyi bang bar gshegs par 'gyur// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' kha dog pu
99b6(rgyud): sdig lung bstan pa thob par 'dod nas/ bud med kyi gzugs dang ldan pa tshon sna tshogs la yongasu spyod pas/ san yongasu smon par bya ba'i phyir// smon lam btab pa dang / de ras
99b7(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kyis de la yang 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// 'jig rten ngur smrig gos la btsud na su// dkon mchog gsu mo rigs dga' bang ldan byas nas// sngon por
99b8(rgyud): snang ba'i sangs rgyas zhing mchog du/ rin can snang ba'i bde bar gshegs par 'gyur// de bzhin du sa bon dang / nags tshal dang 'bras bu'i lha du ma nas byang chub se 'u bya
100a1(rgyud): khrag khrig brgya song drug cu rtsa bdun gyi bar dag lung bstan pa thob par 'dongad ngas/ bud med kyi gzugs kyis seMn yongasu smin par bya dang khung med yongs
100a2(rgyud): smin par bya ba'i phyir/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu smon lam btab pa dngang dag tshig su bcad pa ri ras lung bstan pa thob par gyur to// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 
100a3(rgyud): pho mtshan gyur te mtshan thob pa ni shin tu rnyeng par sla ba la/ mo mtshan gyur te pho mtshan thob pa ni shin tu rnyeng par dka' bo'i phyir// de nas klu dang klu chen po bye ba phrag brgya lung bsta
100a4(rgyud): pa thob par 'dod nas/ byang chub tu smod lam btab pa dang / tshig su bcad pa rare res so sor lung bstan pa thob bo// nga bzhin du lA ma yin dkrigs phrag stong drug cu rtsa bzhi dang / 
100a5(rgyud): ba phrag brgya cu dang / lha dang mi'i bu ma mi 'khrugs pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong bdun cu dang / bdud dang bdud kyis 'khor dkrigs phrag bya ba khrag khrig brgya stong
100a6(rgyud): phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu nas mi dang mi ma yin pa dang / bram ze dang / rgyal rigs dang / rje'u rigs dang / dpangs rigs dang / skyes pa dang / bung med dang / khye'u dang / bu mo ga
100a7(rgyud): klung gi bye ma snyed kyi bor dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub lung bstan pa thob par 'dod pa dang / tshigasu bcad pa re re so sor lung bstan pa tho bo// mi ma yin pa dang / 
100a8(rgyud): de bzhin du lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / na mkha'i lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / yi dgas dang / sha ba bgrang ba las 'das pa
100b1(rgyud): sngor/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems ma bskyed pa dag ni bskyed par gyur to// sen bgrang ba las 'das pa dag ni phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la gnas par gyur to// 
100b2(rgyud): sen bgrang ba las 'das pa dag ni/ byang chub songa'i ting 'dzin dang / bzod pa dang / gzungs sna tshogs thob par gyur to// sems can bgrang ba las 'das pa dag ni 'bras bu thob
100b3(rgyud): nas/ 'dod chags dang bral te/ zag pa zad par gyur to// san bgrang ba las 'das pa dag ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la sems bskyang ras/ sangs rgyas nyid du bya
100b4(rgyud): mi ldog pa'i sa la gnas par gyur te/ de dag thams cad kyis mgrin gcig tu 'di skad ces gso la to// bdag cag thams cad sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
100b5(rgyud): rnams kyis bka' stsal pa bzhin du dam pa'i chos yongasu gzung bar bgyi'o// gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dran pa dang / yi ger 'dri ba nas/ 'chang bar bgyi ba'i bar gyi ga
100b6(rgyud): de dag kyang reg pas yongasu bskyang bar bgyi'o// 'dus pa chen po rin po che'i tog gi gzungs las lung bstan pa'i le'u sa brgyad pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das nga bzhin
100b7(rgyud): gshegs pa shAkya thub pas 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag thugs brtse bas dri ba'i slad du sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir gshegs pa
100b8(rgyud): rigs kyi bu 'di dag gis gos dag zas dang / skom dang / sman dang / yo byad kyis sen rnams shin tu tshim par bgyis te/ bud med kyi gzugs kyis sen rnams bla na med pa yang
101a1(rgyud): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongasu smin par bgyi ba dang / ci nas 'di dag sems can yongasu smin par bgyi ba'i slad du/ sems bskyed ma thag tu ci
101a2(rgyud): 'tshal ba dang / gang gi slad du 'tshal ba dang / ji lta bu 'tshal ba'i gos dang / zas dang / skom dang / sman dang / yo byad rnams sprul pa 'am/ bsham po 'byor par 'gyur
101a3(rgyud): ba'i yid la re ba yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba dang / ci nas skyes bu dam pa 'di dag/ skyes bu chen po mthu 'di lta bu baM gyed pa dang / sems can rnams la long spyod dang / yongasu
101a4(rgyud): spyod pas rim gro bgyid nus pa la 'di dag la dgosu ga sol// de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi thu gas rje chen po dang / bsod nams dag ye shes
101a5(rgyud): ngong / bsam gtan gyis rgyan pa'i rgyu 'thun pa'i yid la ma dzad pas skyes bu dam pa de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsa la to// khod kyi bsam pa dang / yid la ra
101a6(rgyud): ba yongasu rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir/ dus gsum du gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad byin gyis brlabs pa dge ba'i rtsa ba thad kyi rgyu mthun pa'i gas
101a7(rgyud): sngags kyi tshig 'di dag sbyin no// 'di lta ste/ dz+yo ti ba ba/ d+ha ba ba mun pa ba/ sad t+ya ba ba/ puM N+ya a lang kA ra ba ba/ d+h+ya na ra sa pa ba/ ma hA kA ru Na ba ba/ ma ma pra ti ba ba/ a mo ha ba ba/ 
101a8(rgyud): ro ti ba ba/ kA ti ba ba/ sA li la ba ba/ kha ga~M ba ga/ bA yu ba ba/ brta ba ba/ a d+hiSh+ThA na ba ba/ A ma ba ba/ a ha ne ba ba/ ta tha thA ba ba/ b+hu ti ko Di ba ba/ ning bri ti ba ba/ tri ku sha la ba
101b1(rgyud): ba/ tri ya na ba ba/ tri d+hA tu ka ba ba/ tri bi mok+Sha ba ba/ thi shu kla ba ba/ raSh+Ta a d+hiSh+ThA na ba pa/ ba ba ba ba ba sa ma hA/ e n+ya sa ma hA/ tata ta Ta Ta Ta shwA/ sid+hi/ sarba ku sha la mU
101b2(rgyud): la a d+hiSh+ThA na ya swAhA// skyes bu dam pa khyed kyis chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi gsang sngags kyi tshig bsam pa thams cad yong su rdzogs par byed pa 'di dag san rdzams
101b3(rgyud): kyi longs spyod pa dang / kun spyod par bya ba dang / yongasu smin par bya ba dang / khyed kyi byang chub kyi spyod pa yongasu rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir zung shig/ yang de'i tshe dge sbyong me tog dang / 
101b4(rgyud): dpal gyi lha mo dang rtsi'i lha mo grub pa'i blo gros dang / lha mo sa 'dzin la sogs te/ byang chub sems dpa' khri bi bud med kyi gzugs kyis ser rnams kyi longs
101b5(rgyud): spyod dang kun spyod pa dang / yongasu smin par bya ba'i phyir brtsa na bar gyur nas/ de thams cad kyis mgrin gcig tu'ang skad ces gsol to// bdag cag gi yid la
101b6(rgyud): re ba yongasu rdzogs par bgyi ba'i slad du/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'di rnams kyis gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag gsungs pas nas/ byin gyis brlabs 'dis bdag
101b7(rgyud): cag sems can thams cad la rim gri ba gyang nus// bdag cag bla na med pa'i ye shes sgrub par nus// bdag cag gis sems can thams cad yongasu smid par bgyi ba'i slad
101b8(rgyud): gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag gzung bar bgyi zhing brtson 'grus drag pos spro bar bgyi'o// yang sa na thams cad la snying brje ba'i slad du/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi spyan sngar
102a1(rgyud): rang gis dam bcas pa la gnas par bgyi'o// lha 'am/ kA nas mi'i bar la la zhig de bzhin gshegs pas byin gyis brlabs pa'i dam pa'i tshul 'dim
102a2(rgyud): mchis par bgyid dam zhig par bgyid dam/ rnam par ma rung bar bgyid la/ bdag cag gis dam pa'i chos yun ring du gnas par 'gyi bo'i slad du/ gal te ma zlog gam/ nad tan
102a3(rgyud): ma bgyis na bdag cag gis dus gsum du gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad bslus par gyur cig/ bdag cag bla na med pa'i yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mad
102a4(rgyud): par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar ma gyur cig/ kye grogs po dag lha nas mi'i bar gang la la zhig dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma la 'tshal gal
102a5(rgyud): bdag cag gis de dag ma bzlog gam/ bdag cag gis dang ga gi 'khrugs pa zhi bar 'gyi ba'i slad du nan tan ma bgyi sa ma/ bdag cag gis dus gsum dug phye
102a6(rgyud): pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag thams cad bslus par gyur cig/ bdag cig bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar ma gyur cig/ bcom
102a7(rgyud): ldan 'das byang chub don tu gnyer ba'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig zhugs dang / tsha ba dang / dug dang mtshan dang byang dang / rims zhag gcig pa dang / zhag gnyis
102a8(rgyud): pa dang / zhag gsum pa dang / zhag bzhi pas 'jigs pa nas lha dang / kA dang / gnod sbyin dang / lus srul po dang / rgyal rigs dang / bram ze'i rigs dang / rje'u rigs dang / 
102b1(rgyud): dmangs rigs dang / seng+ge dang / stag dang / nad dang / bkres pa dang / skom pa dang / 'tshe ba gang yang rung ba'i bar dag gis 'jigs shing skrag par gyur pa las sangs rgyas thams cad
102b2(rgyud): kyi byin gyis brlabs pa bsam pa thams cad yongasu rdzogs par bgyi ba'i gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag dran na sngon gyi las kyi sgrib pa ni ma gtogs te/ bdag cag gi
102b3(rgyud): de dag gnod pa las yongasu bar bar ma bgyis na/ dus gsum du gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad bdag cag gis bslus par gyur cig/ bdag cag bla na med pa
102b4(rgyud): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'a tshang rgya bar ma gyur cig/ de'i tshe gang dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir gtogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan
102b5(rgyud): 'das thams cad kyis de dag la leg so zhes bya bar byin te/ skyes bu dam pa khyad kyis legs par dam bcas pa leg so leg so// khyod kyis smras bu'i mthu chen po
102b6(rgyud): 'di lta bu shed nu so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas bdag sdig can la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// thub pa gshegs pa 'di dag la mi dad cing dga' ba'i mchog
102b7(rgyud): bskyed de/ de ring gzhan gyi don phyir dga' bar myur du byang chub sems gzhi la byos// sdig can khyod ni rang gi yul nas rab tu grogs med mthu med kyis/ thub pa la ni khyod kyis
102b8(rgyud): sngo zhing 'arnyog par byed pa btang por byos// de nas bdud sdig can gyis gsol pa/ khyod kyis tshig gis byang chub dri med dad pa'i sems gcig bdag mi bskyed/ thub pa ma gsungs
103a1(rgyud): bzhugs shig bdag la rjesu 'gro ba rnams kyang mchis// de dag lhan cig bdag gi yul nas dpung dang bzhon par bcas par gnas par bgyi// phun sum tshogs
103a2(rgyud): 'dzin bdag mthus ji srid 'tsho bar khyod kyi dbang mi mchis// 'dus pa chen po rin po che tog gi gzungs las snying brtse ba'i le'u ste dgu pa'o// // yang de'i tshe de bzhin ga
103a3(rgyud): pa me tog man ngar ba'i dri mos kyis ngo bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa la 'di skad ces gsungaso// ji ltar 'das pa de bzhin gshegs pa rnams sangs rgyas kyi zhing tha dad pa dag sa
103a4(rgyud): byon te/ nyon mongs pa can snyigs ma lnga dang ldan pa'i sang sa rgyas kyi zhing du 'dus nas dam pa'i chos kyi tshul 'di ni legs par byin gyis brlabs/ bdud bye ba ni pham pa
103a5(rgyud): mdzad/ byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po'i spyan gyis se mas can rnams la ni gzigs/ sdig pa'i lta ba las ni rab tu thar par mdzad/ shes rab kyi sgron man
103a6(rgyud): 'bar bar mdzad/ zhi ba'i lam la ni bkod de/ chos mnyam pa nyid rdo rje lta bu brten pa'i chos kyi snying pos lus 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs phyag rgya dang tshig rab tu dbye ba la
103a7(rgyud): 'jug pa lung bstan pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni bshang / nag po'i phyogs ni pham par mdzad/ chos kyi rgyal mtshan ni btsugs pa de bzhin du da ltar phyogs bcu dgan bzhugs
103a8(rgyud): shing gzhes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rnams kyis kyang sems can la thugs brtse ba'i slad du nyon mongs pa can snyigs ma lnga dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du
103b1(rgyud): 'du chen po mdzad de/ chos kyi tshul 'di legs par byin gyis brlabs pa nas/ chos kyi rgyal mtshan btsugs pa'i bar du ni mdzad na/ shAkya thub pa nyi ma khyod nub nas/ sa
103b2(rgyud): rgyas kyi zhing 'dir su zhig mchog tu 'gyur/ dam pa'i chos 'di 'dzin par 'gyur// dam pa'i chos kyi tshul 'di 'dra bar bgyid par 'gyur/ sems can rnams yongasu smin par
103b3(rgyud): bgyid par 'gyur/ 'dus pa chen po 'dir yang bgrang bar chud bar 'gyur/ bdag gis su'i lag tu chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yongasu gtad par bgyi// de nas bcom ldan 'das de
103b4(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas// de bzhin gshegs pa me tog man+da ra ba'i dri mos la 'di skad ces gsungaso// sang sa rgyas kyi zhing 'di na gnas pa'i byang chub
103b5(rgyud): sems dpa' bzod pa thob pa rnams sam/ brgya byin na ma/ tshangs pa 'am/ 'jig rten skyong ba 'am/ lha dang / kA dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lA ma yin
103b6(rgyud): dang / na mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po'i dbang po 'am/ gang su yang rung ste/ chos kyi tshul 'di la mngon par brtson pa rnams dang / gang dag dbugs kyi gli
103b7(rgyud): bzhi pa mdon gnas pa chos kyi tshul 'di la mngon par dad pa'i brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skong ba nas/ lto 'phe chen po'i dbang po'i bar de dag gis lag tu/ gzung
103b8(rgyud): kyi phyag rgya'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzin yongasu gtad par mdzod cig/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa me tog man+da ra ba'i dri mos kyis byas kyi dkyil 'khor gyi tshig ba
104a1(rgyud): pa thogs pa med pas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing mtha' dag/ khyab par mdzad nas 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// grogs po dag gang su dag sangs rgyas
104a2(rgyud): kyi zhing 'dir 'dus pa thams cad 'od cig/ de bzhin gshegs pa dag bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams 'jig rten du 'byung ba ni shin tu dkonam no// sa
104a3(rgyud): rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad skad cig tu sangs rgyas kyi zhing gicig tu 'dus pa 'di yang shin tu dkon te/ khyed la thugs brtse ba dang / sems can thams cad rje su
104a4(rgyud): gzung ba dang / dam pa'i chos kyi tshul byin gyis brlabs pa dang / bla na med pa'i lam la dgod pa'i phyir/ sa ngas rgyas 'di dag thams cad 'dus te/ dab pa'i chos kyi
104a5(rgyud): tshul yun ring du gnas par bya ba dang / dkon mchog gsum gyi rigs rgyun mi 'chad par bya ba dag sa mas can thams cad yongasu smin par bya ba nas// 'khor
104a6(rgyud): ba'i pha rol tu 'gro bar bya ba'i bar gyi phyir// da ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyi dus gsum du gtogs pa'i sa'i khams thams cad byin gyis brlab so// 
104a7(rgyud): chu'i khams thams cad dang / me'i khams thams cad dang / rlung gi khams cad dang / na mkha'i khams thams cad byin gyis brlaso// de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan
104a8(rgyud): de dag thams cad kyis gang dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di na gnas pa'i byang chub so 'i sanga' chen po rnams dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba dang / 
104b1(rgyud): lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / na mkhor lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po'i dbang po ngas dang / gang dag yang gzi brjid che ba'i sems
104b2(rgyud): can rnams dang / gang dag yang gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams na gnas na de dag bde la bos te 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// kye grogs po dag sems can thams cad yo
104b3(rgyud): su smin par bya ba'i phyir chos kyi tshul 'di byin gyis brlabs te/ khod kyi lag tu shin tu gtad kyis ci nas 'dir dam pa'i chos 'di myur du mi 'dzag pa dang / nub par mi 'gyur
104b4(rgyud): ba de ltar khyod kyis das pa'i chos 'di yid la gyis shig/ 'bar bar gyis shig/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo dad pa gang dag 'dus pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam
104b5(rgyud): grangs 'di 'dzin pa nas yi ger bris te 'chang ba'i bar ba du byed pa dang / dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bstan nam/ dge bsnyen pa 'am/ dam pa
104b6(rgyud): 'dzin pa'i gang zag de dag thams cad yongasu srung zhing yongasu bskyab pa'i phyir rigs par khyod kyi lag tu gtad kyis chos smra ba dang / chos la dga' ba dang / bsam gtan la
104b7(rgyud): mngon par dga' ba dang / chos mnyan pa dang / dam pa'i chos 'dzin pa'i gang zag rnams khyed kyis bsrung bar bya ba'i phyir yongasu bskyang ba'i bar du gyis shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe
104b8(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa dag bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang dag byung bar gyur pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad kyang nyon mongs pa can sdig
105a1(rgyud): ma lnga dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'dus nas/ chos kyi tshul 'di srung ba dang / mi nub par bya ba dang / dam pa'i chos 'dzin pa'i gang zag kun tu srung ba nas
105a2(rgyud): sems can thams cad yongasu smon par bya ba'i bar gyi phyir/ brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten sbyong ba thams cad kyi lag tu gta // de bzhin du ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/ phyogs
105a3(rgyud): bcur sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'byung ba de dag thams cad kyang nyon mongs pa can snyigs ma lnga dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du skad cig gis 'dus te/ sems can la
105a4(rgyud): yan pa'i phyir gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag kyang 'chang bar 'gyur/ chos kyi tshul 'di yang byin gyis r+b+ba ba par 'gyur zhing chos kyi tshul 'di srung ba dang / yongasu bsdu
105a5(rgyud): ba'i phyir/ brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'garten skyong ba tha~Md kyi lag tu gtong bar 'gyuraro// de bzhin du da kyis kyang da ltar kun tu srung ba dang / san yongs smin
105a6(rgyud): par bya ba'i phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di na gnas pa rnams dang / gling bzhi pa na gnas pa'i brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / 
105a7(rgyud): dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / na mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po'i dbang po rnams kyi lag tu 'di shin tu gtad kyis ci nas myur du mi 'jig cing nub par mi 'gyur
105a8(rgyud): ba de ltar khyed kyis dam pa'i chos kyi tshul 'di yi la gyis shig/ rab tu 'bar bar gyis shig/ srung bar gyis shig/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dang pa gang dag dang
105b1(rgyud): dam bcas pa'i chos 'dzin pa'i gang zag dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma rnams gang 'dus pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzin pa nas/ tha na
105b2(rgyud): glegs bam bris te 'chang bar byed pa'i bar dang / chos smra ba dang / chos nyan pa dang / bsam gtan la mngon par brtson pa dang / dam pa'i chos 'dzin pa de dag la khyed kyis bsru
105b3(rgyud): bar bya'o// ri mor bya'o// mchod par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di sangs rgyas thams cad kyi byin gyis brlabs pa ste/ grong ngam/ grong khyer ram/ gong
105b4(rgyud): lam/ ljongs sam/ ri brag sam/ pho brang khor dang / dgon pa'i gnas nas/ dmangs kyi khyim gyi bar du gang na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di rab tu spring de/ 'chad ma
105b5(rgyud): lung 'bog gam/ kun chub par 'gying ngam/ tha na glegs bam la bris te 'chang na/ chos kyi bcud des si'i bcung dang / sems can dmangs 'phel bar 'gyur
105b6(rgyud): te/ khyed des mngangs dang ldan zhing gzi brjid dang / stobs dang / brtson 'grus dang / pha rol gnon pa dang ldan par 'gyur/ khyed kyi g.yog 'khor dang / gzhal med khang 'phel
105b7(rgyud): bar 'gyur/ mo'i rgyal po rnams kyang bsrungs par 'gyur te/ de dag gi rgyal srid dang / dbang phyug kyang 'phel bar 'gyur// de dag gi yul 'khor thams cad kyang bsrungs par 'gyur
105b8(rgyud): 'dzam+bu'i gling gi rgyal po rnams kyang tshigasu bcud des tshoms nas gcig la gcig phan pa'i sems dang ldan par 'gyur/ rgyal po de dag las kyi rnam par smin pa la yang mngon
106a1(rgyud): par yid ches par 'gyur/ dge ba'i semasu 'gyur/ ser sna med pa'i sems ngag phan pa'i dngos po'i sems dang / sems can thams cad snying rje'i sems
106a2(rgyud): nas yang dag par lta ba'i bar du 'gyur ro// so so bdag bdag gi yul lo yang mngon par dga' bar 'gyur/ 'dzam+bu'i gling 'di yang skye bo rags pas gang bar 'gyur/ shin tu lo la/ 
106a3(rgyud): pa dang / shin tu nyams dga' bar 'gyur/ skye bo mang pos gang zhig sa mngangs dang ldan par 'gyur/ 'bra spu shin tu mdog bzang ba dang / shin tu zhim pa dang / lo me'i sman
106a4(rgyud): dang me tog gi sman dang / nor dang / 'bru rnams shin tu 'byor ba dang / nang meng pa dang / bde ba la reg par gnas pa bskyed par 'gyuraro// 'thab pa dang / rtsod pa dang / mu ge
106a5(rgyud): nang dang / pha rol gyi dpag tshogs dang / dgu dang / sha sbrang dab sbrang bu dang / phye ma leb dang / sbrul gdug pa dang / gan da sprin dang / srin bu ma rungs pa dang / 
106a6(rgyud): gras dang bya dang / spyang ki dang / dus ma yin pa'i rlung dang / char pa rnams rab tu zhi bar 'gyur/ skar ma dang / nyin mo dang / mtshan mo dang / zla ba dang / zla ba phyed dang / lo dang / dus
106a7(rgyud): kyang legs par 'byung bar 'gyur/ sems can rnams kyang phal cher dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la spyod par 'gyur/ 'di nas shi 'phos nas kyang bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig
106a8(rgyud): rten du lha rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur te/ de dag kyang khyed kyi g.yog tu 'gyuraro// de ltar gzungs kyi phyag rgya'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i yon tan mang zhing phan yon che ste/ san
106b1(rgyud): rnams 'khor ba'i pha rol tu 'gro bar bya ba'i phyir// sangs rgyas thams cad kyis 'dus pa chen po'i byin gyis brlabs te/ grags pa 'phel zhing yongasu rdzogs par 'gyuraro// bud mad
106b2(rgyud): kyi dngos po skyes nas myong bar 'gyur ba dang / lan grangs gzhan la myong bar 'gyur ba/ ma lus par yongasu zad par 'gyur ro// mdor na tshe 'di la bud med kyi dngos po myong bar 'gyur ba/ 
106b3(rgyud): 'phangs pa thams cad byang bar 'gyur te/ mtshams med pa byed pa dang / dam po'i chos spong ba dang / 'phags pa la skur pa 'debs pa ma gtogs par gang gzhan lus dang / ngag da
106b4(rgyud): yid kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa'i gnas ngan len de thams cad yongasu byang bar 'gyuraro// gang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di tha na glegs bam la bros te 'chang na yang 'dus
106b5(rgyud): pa chen po sangs rgyas thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa'i gzungs kyi chos rnam grangs 'di'i mthus nga'i las dang nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa ri rab tsam
106b6(rgyud): yang bang bar 'gyur/ dge ba'i rtsa ba bde la dmigs pa 'phel zhing yongasu rdzogs par 'gyur/ yan lag thams cad yong su rdzogs pa dang / bsam pa thams cad phun sum
106b7(rgyud): tshogs pa dang / lus dang / ngag dang / yid kyi legs par sbyong ba thams cad 'phel bar 'gyur ba dang / lta ba ngan pa ba spong ba dang / ngag bde chos dang 'thun pas tshar
106b8(rgyud): gcod pa dang / zhi zhing phra ba'i lam bde la 'jug par 'gyuraro// yul gang du gzungs kyi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di spyod par 'gyur ba der sangs rgyas thams cad kyi byin
107a1(rgyud): gyis brlabs pa 'dus pa chen po'i gzungs kyi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i mthus sa phyogs 'di shin tu snum par 'gyur/ 'bras bu mngangs dang ldan pa dang / 
107a2(rgyud): shin tu zhim pa dang / ro dang ldan par 'gyur/ kha ba dang / tsha ba dang / nub pa dang / ro med pa spong bar 'gyur/ me tog dang / 'bras bu shin tu 'byor pa dang / nor dang / 'bru dang / ba
107a3(rgyud): ba dang / mdzod dang / rdzu 'phru dang / bya sgyogs rnams rnam par 'phel bar 'gyu ro// gos dang / zas dang / skom dang / sman dang / yo byad rnams shin tu 'byor par 'gyur te/ de na
107a4(rgyud): sems can gang dag zas dang / skom gyis 'tshe ba de dag ni shin tu nad med pa dang / nor dang ldan pa dang / kha dog dang ldan pa dang / stobs dang ldan pa dang / dran pa dang ldan pa
107a5(rgyud): dang / chos 'dod ba dang / dge ba tshol ba la mngon par btsun pa dang / sdig pa'i lta ba yongasasu spong bar 'gyur te/ de dang / 'di nas shi 'phos nas khyad dang skal ba ma
107a6(rgyud): par skye bar 'gyur te/ de dag gis khyed kyi g.yog 'phel nas stobs dang ldan zhing thogs pa med pa'i tshigasu 'gyur gyis/ chos kyi stobs kyis rigs bzhi'i skye ba'i tshe ga
107a7(rgyud): yongasu bskang bar gyis shig/ sems can rnams chos kyi don la chung cig/ de ltar na khyed kyis dus gsum du gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad la ma
107a8(rgyud): ba byas par 'gyu ro// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa me tog man+da ra ba'i dri mos kyis 'dus po chen po'i mdo'i chos kyi tshul 'di gzung ba dang bshad pa dang / srung ba'i phyir/ sangs rgyas
107b1(rgyud): kyi yul gyi ye shes kyi sgra dbyangs rnam par dag pas don dang / tshig brjod pa'i tshul gyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing ma lus pa 'di kun bkang nas/ byang chub se de'i senga' chen po rnams dang / 
107b2(rgyud): brgya byin gyi dbang po nas tshangs pa'i dbang po/ lto 'phye chen po'i dbang po thams cad kyi bar du gang dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di na gnas pa phal tshor gli de bzhi pa 'di na gnas pa rnams
107b3(rgyud): la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyis bkas spro ba mdzad do// yang de'i tshe byang chub se dang seng 'a chen po byams pa la sogs pa gang dag bzod pa thob pa bye ba sa
107b4(rgyud): phrag dgu bcu rtsa bdud sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di ni gnas pa de dag thams cad kyis mgrin gcig tu 'di skad ces gsol to// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bams kyis/ 
107b5(rgyud): bdag cag gis kyang dus gsum du gshegs pa'i de bzhin pa/ shegs pa thams cad la mchod pa'i slad du chos kyi rnam grang sa 'di rigs pas son par bkur zhing gus pa
107b6(rgyud): chen pos gzung bar bgyi'o// snying rjes sen yongasu smin par bgyi ba nas/ bla na med pa'i lam gyi bar la dgod pa'i slad du bdag cag gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di grong ngam/ grong khor dang / 
107b7(rgyud): grong rdal dang / ljongs dang / yul dang / pho brang 'khor dang / dgon pa'i gnas rgyas par bstan par bgyi'o// dam pa'i chas yud ring du gnas par bgyi ba'i slad du sems can rnams kyang
107b8(rgyud): yongasu smin par bgyi'o// yang de'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir gtogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag thams cad kyi legaso zhes bya ba byin te/ skyes bu dam pa dag la
108a1(rgyud): so lag so// khyed kyis de bzhin gyis shig/ de nas brgya byin dang / tshangs pa nas lto 'phye chen po'i dbang ba'i bar bang dang / gang dag gzhan yang sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di
108a2(rgyud): 'dus pa sems can gzi brjid che ba gzi brjid che ba bye ba khrag khrig phag drug cu rtsa bzhi de dag thams cad kyis mgrin gcig tu 'di skad ces gsol to// bdag cag gis kyang ngam
108a3(rgyud): pa'i chos yun ring du gnas par bgyi ba'i slad du 'dus pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gzungs par bgyi ba nas rgyas par rab tu bshad pa'i bar du bgyi'o// yang dag par bstan pa
108a4(rgyud): bgyi'o// seMn yongasu smin par bgyi'o// chos 'tshal ba dang / chos mnyan pa'i gang zag rnams kyang srung bar bgyi'o// yongasu bskyang bar bgyi'o// gang du chos kyi rnam grangs 'di skye
108a5(rgyud): par 'gyur ba der sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'ang sa bad kyi bkas bdag cag gis kyang 'bab pa dang / rtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa dang / mu ga dang / pha rol gyi dmag tshogs
108a6(rgyud): dang / dus ma yin pa'i rlung dang / char pa dang / gang ba dang / tsha ba dang / gdug pa dang / rtsub pa dang / ro ma mchis pa dang / sra ba dang / kha ba dang / tsha ba'i dngos po rnams rab tu zhi bar bgyi'o// 
108a7(rgyud): bde ba dang nyams dga' ba dang / lo legs pa dang / 'dum par sgrub par bgyi'o// chos kyi tshul yun ring du gnas par bgyi ba'i slad du nan tan cher bgyi'o// chos nyan pa'i rgyal po de dag kyang
108a8(rgyud): shin tu yongasu bskyang bar dri bya'o// bsam gtan la mngon par dga' ba'i sems can rnams kyang srung bar bgyi'o// de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag thams cad kyis
108b1(rgyud): leg so zhes bya ba byin te/ bzhin bzang dag legaso leg so// khyed kyis de bzhin du gyos shig/ bdag dang gzhan dang / gnyi ga'i phyir nam tan gyis shig/ de ltar na khyed kyis
108b2(rgyud): gsum du gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad la mchod pa byas par 'gyuraro// 'di ltar khad kyis sems can yongasu smin par bya ba dang / dam pa'i chos kyi tshul
108b3(rgyud): 'bar bar bya ba dang / dam pa'i chos yun ring du gnas par bya ba'i phyir brtson na/ khang ring por mi thogs par myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs
108b4(rgyud): par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyuraro// de nas dbus kyi gling bzhi pa 'ang ra gnas pa'i brgya byi ni dang // / tshangs pa dang / 'dzi/ rten skyong ba dang / lha'i dbang po nas lto 'phye chen po'i dbang ba'i
108b5(rgyud): dang / gang dag yang san gzi brjid che ba gzi brjid che ba de dag thams cad stan las langs te la mi sbyar nas 'dagu ste 'di skad ces gsol to// sangs
108b6(rgyud): rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyi dkas bdag cag gis kyang chos kyi tshul 'di bstan par bgyi/ srung bar bgyi/ yongasu bskyang bar bgyi/ 'dus pa chen po sangs rgyas pa kyis
108b7(rgyud): byin gyis brlabs pa'i gzungs kyi phyag rgya'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yang rigs pas blangs par bgyi ba nas/ grong dang / grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang / ljongs dang / yul dang / po za
108b8(rgyud): 'khor dang / dgon pa'i gnas rnams rgyas par bshad par bgyi'o// dam pa'i chos 'dzin pa'i gang zag rnams kyang bsrung bar bgyi'o// yongasu bskyang bar bgyi'o// gang dag chos
109a1(rgyud): sgrub pas gnas pa 'am/ chos smra ba 'am/ chos nyan pa'i dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyed dang / dge bsnyen ma dang / dang po'i rigs kyi bu dang / rigs
109a2(rgyud): kyi bu mo rnams chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzin pa nas/ glags bam la bris te 'chang ba'i bar du bgyid pa dang / bsam gtan la brtson pa de dag bdag cag gis srung bar brgya
109a3(rgyud): yongasu bskyang bar bgyi// sti stang du bgyi/ bla mar bgyi/ ri mor bgyi/ mchod par bgyi/ gos dang / gdugs dang / ba dan dang / rgyal mtshan dang / byug pa nas sman dang / yo byad ba
109a4(rgyud): kyi bar gyis sti stang du bgyi'o// chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'chang ba dang / klog pa 'am/ ston pa'i drung du bdag cag nyid nyan pa'i slad du nye bar mchi bar bgyi'o// bdag cag gis chos
109a5(rgyud): kyi rnam grangs 'di la ston par shes nas/ gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan gyis sti stang du bgyi/ bla mar bgyi/ ri mor bgyi/ mchod par bgyi'o// de tsa'i sla
109a6(rgyud): zhe na/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa'i gzungs kyi phyag rgya'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'chang po'i tshe/ chos kyi bcud kyis bdag cag mngangs dang ldan par 'gyur//
