109a7(rgyud): stobs dang ldan/ brtson 'grus dang ldan/ mthu dang ldan/ dran pa dang ldan/ yo shes dang ldan/ phyogs dang g.yog tu ldan zhing tshogs dang mthu bogs pa med par 'gyuraro// de ltar
109a8(rgyud): bdag cag gis yul thams cad du 'bab pa dang / rtsod pa dang / 'bab mo dang / 'gyed pa dang / mu ge dang / nang dang / pha rol gyi dpag tshogs dang / dus ma lags pa'i rlung dang / 
109b1(rgyud): char pa dang / grang ba dang / tsha ba dang / char mi 'bab pa dang / rmi lam ngan pa dang / ltas ngan pa dang / sdang ba dang / nub pa dang / brlang ba dang / kha ba can dang / cha ba dang / ro ma
109b2(rgyud): ma mchis pa dang / mi dge ba'i bogs bgyid pa'i dngos po rnams rab tu zhi bar bgyi'o// shin tu bde ba dang / lo legs pa dang / nyams dga' ba dang / nad ma mchis pa dang / 
109b3(rgyud): 'dum pa sgrub par bgyi'o// rlung dang / char pa dang / grang ba dang / tsha ba rnams dusu 'byung bar bgyi'o// mtshan mo dang / nyin mo dang / zla ba phyed dang / lo dang dus rnams kyang
109b4(rgyud): par 'byung bar bgyi'o// gza' dang / rgyus ra dang / nyi ma dang / zla ba rnams kyang legs par rgyu bar bgyi'o// 'bab chu dang / chu mig dang / rdzing dang / lteng ga ya
109b5(rgyud): shin tu gtam par bgyi'o// gang du sa ni rnams chu'i klung gis gnod par 'gyur ba de yang bdag cag gos ga sal bar bgyi'o// grong dang / grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang / 
109b6(rgyud): ljongs de dag tu yang sen la sman par 'gyi ba'i slad du bdag cag gis 'dab ma dang / yal ga dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu dang / sdong bu dang / 'bru dang / sman dang / ro dang / lo tog
109b7(rgyud): rnams shin tu sdum pa dang / bda' ba dang / kha dog dang ro chen zhing mang ba sgrub par bgyi'o// sems can rnams la nor dang / 'bru dang / sman dang / gos dang / ldab lhub kyis mi brel
109b8(rgyud): bar sgrub par 'gyi'o// sems can de dag kyang dge ba tshol ba'i sems dang / sdig pa yongasu spong ba dang / dpal dang / bsod rabs 'byung bas che ring po 'grub par bgyi'o// 
110a1(rgyud): grong dang / grong khar dang / grong rdal dang / ljongs dang / yul 'khor dang / bro brang 'khor gang dag ra sangs rgyas thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa
110a2(rgyud): gzungs kyi phyag rgya'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'chad dam/ tha na glegs bam la bris te 'chang ngam/ klog gam/ mchod pa dang / sI sung bgyid cing 'chang ba de dag tu rgyal po rigs su
110a3(rgyud): bo nas dbang bskur ba 'byung ba de dag kyang bdag cag gis srung bar bgyi/ yongasu bskyang bar bgyi/ de dag la gnod pa gsal bar bgyi/ phan pa sgrub par bgyi'o// ltangad mo dang / bkram
110a4(rgyud): shis pa dang / lta ba ngan pa dang / byed pa ngan pa dang / byin gyis brlabs ngan pa dang / smon lam ngan pa dang / skyabs ngan pa dang / tshul 'chos pa dang / kha gsag dang / g.yo dang / 
110a5(rgyud): sgyu dang / brdzun du smra ba dang / phrag dog dang / khro ba dang / ser sna thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyi'o// yang dag pa'i lta ba'i lam drang po dang / dad pa dang / dul ba dang / 
110a6(rgyud): ku sdom pa dang / ngo tsha shes pa dang / khral yod pa gzung bar bgyi'o// de bzhin du btsun mo dam pa mas dang / btsun mo'i 'khor rnams dang / blon po dang / dris
110a7(rgyud): pa chen po dang / grong rdal dang / zho shas 'tshe ba dang / ljongs kyi mi rnams dang / rigs bzhi rnams dang / bud med dang / skyes pa dang / khye'u dang / bu mo rnams kyang srung zhing yo
110a8(rgyud): su sbyang bar bgyi ba nas/ ngo tsha shes pa dang / khrel yod pa'i bar la gzud par bgyi'o// tha na yul de dag tu rkang bzhi pa rnams kyang srung bar bgyi'o// gang na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di
110b1(rgyud): 'chad par 'gyur ba nas/ glags bam la bris te bzhag pa'i bar bgyid na/ sen de dag la bdag cag gis de 'dra ba'i nan tan chen po dang / rtul ba chen pos yongasu bskrad par bgyi'o// 
110b2(rgyud): chos kyi tshul yang dag par bstan pa'i slad du/ bskal pa mtha' yas nan tan cher 'gyi'o// de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag thams cad kyis skyes bu dam pa de dag pa
110b3(rgyud): kyis skyes bu dam pa de dag la lagaso zhes bya ba byin te/ bzhin bzang dag leg so legaso// khyed kyis de bzhin du gyis shig/ khyed kyis chos kyi tshul dang / dkon mchog gsum
110b4(rgyud): gyi rigasu mi nub par nan tan byas na/ de ltar na khyed kyis dus gsum du gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas pa com ldan 'das thams cad la mchod pa byas par 'gyur// 
110b5(rgyud): 'dus pa chen po rin po che tog gi gzungs las/ kun tu srung ba'i le'u ste bcu pa'o// // de nas bcoM ma ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas brgya
110b6(rgyud): dang / tshangs pa dang / 'phags skyes po dang / mig mi bzang dang / yul 'khor srung dang / lus ngan po rnams la bka' stsal ba/ bzhin bzang dag nga sen la snying rje ba'i smon la
110b7(rgyud): gyis nyon mongs pa can snyigs ma lnga dang ldan pa'i chos kyi mu ge byung ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas
110b8(rgyud): te/ sen ma rig pa'i mun par zhugs pa/ nyon mongs pa'i chom kun dang / g.yon can gyis gcas pa rnams kyi nyon mongs pa rab tu zhi bar bya ba'i phyir ngas bdud kyi phyogs ni
111a1(rgyud): 'jam par byas/ dam pa'i chos kyi rgyal mtshan ni bsgrangs/ sems can tshad med pa dag ni sdug bsngal rnams las yongasu thar par byas// dam pa'i chos
111a2(rgyud): char ni phab ngas bdud bye ba ni pham par byaso// bzhin bzang dag gang gi phyir de ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang / phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams nas 'dus
111a3(rgyud): pa'i byang chub se de'i sa' chen po bgrang ba las 'das pa dpag tu med pa rnams kyis/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi sa'i bcud dang / sems can gyi gnas kyi nyos pa rnams rab tu zhi ba
111a4(rgyud): ba dang / sems can yongs smin par bya ba dang / mi dge ba'i las thams cad ma lus par zad par bya ba dang / dkon mchog gsum gyi rigs yun ring du gnas par bya ba nas/ sarba
111a5(rgyud): rgyas kyi dgongs pa mtha' dag yongasu grub par bya ba'i bar gyi phyir/ chos mnyam pa nyid rdo rje lta bu brten pa 'chos thams cad kyi lus 'joms pa'i gzungs phyag rgya
111a6(rgyud): tshig rab tu dbye ba la 'jug pa lung bstan pa'i tshe sa kyi rnam grangs 'di byin gyis brlabs kyi de bzhin du khyed kyis kyang byin gyis rlobs la/ srungs shig/ gang nga'i dam pa'i
111a7(rgyud): chos kyi tshul yang dag par srung ba'i dge ba'i rtsa bas bsod nams mngon par 'du byed pa'i tshogs dang / gang lung 'bogs pa dang / kha ton byed pa dang / dran pa dang / brjod pa dang / ba
111a8(rgyud): pa dang / gsum la skyabasu 'gro ba dang / dge bsnyen gyi sdom pa dang / tshangs par spyod pa la gnas pa'i dge ba'i rtsa bas bsod nams mngon par 'du byed pa'i tshogs dang / gang bas
111b1(rgyud): gtan dang po sgom pa nas 'du shes dang / tshor ba 'gog pa sgom pa'i bar dang / gang rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du bya ba nas/ sangs rgyas kyi byang chub mngon du bya ba'i
111b2(rgyud): gyi tshogs dang / gang yang de 'dra ba'i bsod nams kyi tshogs kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba mngon par 'du bya ba de lta na byed pa dang / ma 'ongs pa'i dus na byed par 'gyur ba nas/ de'i dam pa'i
111b3(rgyud): kyi sgron ma 'di 'bar bar 'gyur ba'i bar du gsod nams mngon par 'du bya ba'i tshogs de thams cad khyed kyi lag tu gta do// gang de bzhin gshegs pas thugasu chud pa'i chos kyi
111b4(rgyud): tshul yang dag par 'bar bar byed par brtson pa de dag gi bsod nams kyi tshogs kyang khyed kyi lag tu gta do// ma 'ongs pa'i dus na gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'dzin
111b5(rgyud): banas tha na glegs bam la bris te 'chang ba'i bar du byed pa de dag kyang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di las thams cad 'byang bar 'gyuraro// grogs po dag grong ngam dmangs kyi kham
111b6(rgyud): gyi bar du gang dang gang ma chos smra ba shin tu khras byas te/ gos sar pa bgos nas me tog bkram pa'i 'khor gyi kham su spos sa tshegs kyis bdug pa dang / ras bcoso bu
111b7(rgyud): dang / ras sna tshogs bting po'i seng+ga'i khri la 'dug ste/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di lU'i rtse mos 'chang dam tha na g+hA gaus bam la bris te klog pa deng / gal te khyed chos mnyam
111b8(rgyud): 'am/ chos smra ba srung ba 'am/ chos nyan pa rnams yongasu bskyang ba 'am/ bdag dang gzhan dang gnyi ga'i mo dge ba'i las yongasu zad par bya ba'i phyir ma dong na/ nga'i phyir khyed kyis
112a1(rgyud): kyis bslus pa 'am/ lam bskyed pa la rmongs pa byas par 'gyuraro// de nas bcom ldan 'das la mi mdzad kyi bdag po tshangs pas 'di skad ces gsol to// 
112a2(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das da ltar dang ma mchis pa'i dus no dam pa'i chos kyi tshul 'di rab tu nub par gyur pa na/ grong ngam/ grong khyer ram/ grong rdal lam/ ljongs sam// ri brag sam/ lo
112a3(rgyud): 'khor tam/ gtsug lag khang ngam/ dgon pa'i gnas sam/ rgyal po'i pho brang ngam/ bram ze'i khyim mam/ tshong dpon gyi khyim mam/ dmangs kyi khyim gang dang gang du dge slong
112a4(rgyud): ram/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bstan nam/ dge bsnyen ma chos smra ba 'am/ gzhan yang dad pa'i rigs kyi bu'o/ rigs kyi bu mo shin tu khros bgyis te/ yan lag
112a5(rgyud): shin tu byugs nas gos sar pa 'tshal te me tog bkram pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi khyamasu spos sA tshags kyis bdug pa/ ras bcos bu dang / ras sA tshe
112a6(rgyud): bting ga ro bro ba sna tshogs kyis bskor ba'i seng+ge'i khri la 'dug ste/ lce'i rtse mos gzungs kyi phyag rgya 'di gzhan dag la rgya cher yang dag par rab tu 'chang dang / bris te
112a7(rgyud): klog pa der chos nyan pa 'am/ chos smra ba de srung ba 'am/ chos nyan pa de dag dang / bdag dang gzhan dang gnyi ga'i nyon mongs pa'i las yongs byang ba 'am/ dge ba'i chos
112a8(rgyud): yongasu smin par bgyi ba 'am/ chos kyi tshul chen po yang dag par 'bar bar bgyi ba 'am/ ma shes kyi snang ba chen po mchog gi lam la 'jug pa'i slad du/ bdag
112b1(rgyud): 'khor brgya stong du mas bskor te/ der ma mchis sam/ grong nas dmangs kyi khyim gyi bar de dag yongasu bskyang ba dang / sems can de dag gi nor dang / 'bru dang / mdzod pa
112b2(rgyud): bang ba mang po rab tu gang ba'i slad du/ der ma mchis na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyi spyad sngar bdag gis sngon ma thos pa'i 'bro bor ba'i dam bcas pa
112b3(rgyud): dang 'gal bar 'gyuraro// 'di lta ste/ aM gu ha/ e gu ha/ aM gu haM/ d+ha ga pu ra he/ na yA mi kha/ kha kha/ kha kha/ kha ga kI na na kha ba swA hA// bcom ldan 'das 'di dag
112b4(rgyud): ni gal te bdag chos nyan pa 'am/ chos smra ba srung ba nas/ nor dang / 'bru dang / mdzod dang / bang ba mang po rnam par 'phel bas tshim par bgyi ba'i slad du dang ma
112b5(rgyud): ma mchis na/ yid ma las 'gal bar 'gyur ba lagaso// de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dgathams cad dang / byang chub seng senga' chen po zad
112b6(rgyud): dang / lha dang mi dang lha ma yin thams cad kyis mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa de dag la legaso zhes bya ba rab tu byin no// de nas ko'u shi kas 'di skad ces gsol to// 
112b7(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das da ltar dang ma mchis pa'i dus na/ grong dang / grong khyer gang dang gang du zhes bya ba nas/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyi spyan snga
112b8(rgyud): bdag gis sngon ma thos pa'i bro bor ba'i dam bcas pa dang / 'gal bar 'gyur zhes bya ba'i bar du'o// 'di lta ste/ kha ba mr-i kha/ a pa mr-i kha/ na la gA/ a mung d+hA/ 
113a1(rgyud): mA ba ha/ a khat+ta/ yakha/ a sha kha/ dzi na prA khaM swA hA/ bcom ldan 'das gal te dag gis ngam bcas pa bzhin du ma bgyis na/ 'dir bdang / 
113a2(rgyud): gi bro bor ba'i dam bcas pa dang 'gal bar 'gyur ba nas/ mi dang mi ma yin pa dag gis lha'i dbang po brgya byin la lagaso zhes bya ba byin pa'i bar du'o// de nas 'phags
113a3(rgyud): skyes pos kyang gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das da ltar dang ma mchis pa'i dus na grong gi bar du gang dang gang du chos kyi rnam grangs 'odadi srung ba ma bgyis na/ bcom ldan 'das
113a4(rgyud): de ni bdag gis khro bor ba'i dang bcas pa dang 'gal bar 'a gyur pa lag so// 'di lta ste/ u kha na ba na ba sa ba na sa mA drA se bid dz+nyA ta thA ts+tsha ta/ ba ru Na ba
113a5(rgyud): rA dza swAhA// ming mi ma yin pa'i bar gyis/ rgyal po chena'aphags skyes po la legaso zhes bya bar rab tu bya no// de nas mig ni mi bzang gis kyang 'di
113a6(rgyud): skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das da ltar dang ma mchis pa'i dus na grong gi bar du gang dang gang du chos kyi rnam grangs 'di srung ba ma bgyis na/ bcom ldan 'das
113a7(rgyud): 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar bdag gis bro bor ba'i dam bcas pa dang 'gal bar 'gyur ba lag so// 'di lta ste/ dza lo g+ha/ a to ga/ a ma ma/ ma
113a8(rgyud): a ma sA rA dzA na tsa ya mu dzi swA hA/ denas mi nga mi ma yin pa'i bar gyis rgyal po chen po mog mi bzang la lag so// zhes bya ba rab tu byin no// de nas yang yul 'kho
113b1(rgyud): srung gis kyang 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das da ltar dang ma mchis pa'i dus na gang dang gang du chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni srung ba ma bgyis na/ bcom ldan 'das 'a
113b2(rgyud): ni bdag gis bro bor ba'i dam bcas pa dang 'gal bar ma 'gyur ba lagaso// 'di lta ste/ bin+du dza kha/ kha ba dza ba re mu kha k+ka sA ra/ pu ka ba ha/ A mArga ba Da swA hA/ mi dang
113b3(rgyud): ma yin pa'i bar gyis rgyal po chen po yul 'khor srung lagaso zhes bya ba rab tu byi no// de nas lus ngan pos kyang 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das da ltar da ma
113b4(rgyud): ma mchis pa'i dus ma/ grong gi bar du gang dang gang du chas kyi rnam grangs 'od srung ba ma bgyis na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ni bdag gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi
113b5(rgyud): spyan sngar bro zar ba'i bar gyis das bcas pa dang 'gal ba 'gyur lag so// 'di lta ste/ k+Shu dr-i/ g+hUk+ShAk+Shu tre/ bak+t+ra / sa tIk+Sh+ma rA/ A nA ya mak+Sha / hringa?/ 
113b6(rgyud): dr-i/ sA ba ra hring k+Sha dre/ se gu su k+Sha dr-i/ d+haR+Ya k+ShA ya mu dr-i swA hA/ mi dang mi ma yan pa'i bar gyis rgyal po chen po lus ngan po la lag so zhes bya ba'i bar du b+hi 'o// yang
113b7(rgyud): de'i tshe gling bzhi po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di ni gnas pa'i gnod spyir gyi sde dpon chen po stong nyis brgya dang gzhan yang gling bzhi pa gzhan na gnas pa bzhi khri dang / gzhan
113b8(rgyud): yang lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / noramakha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rdzu 'phrul che ba/ gzi brjid che ba de dag thams cad kyis
114a1(rgyud): mgrin gcig tu 'di skad ces gsal to// bcom ldan 'das lhur ba ma mchis pa'i dus na/ dam pa'i chos kyi sgron ma'i bar du nucu par gyur pa de'i tshe/ grong ngam
114a2(rgyud): khyer dang / grong rdal lam/ ljongs sam/ ri brags sam/ pho brang 'khor tam/ dgon pa'i gnas sam/ rgyal po'i pho brang ngam/ bram ze'i khyim mam/ tshong dpon gyi khyim mam/ 
114a3(rgyud): nyid chen po'i khyim mam/ dmangs kyi khyim gang dang gang du dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen mchog smra ba 'am/ gzhan yang dang po'i rigs kyi
114a4(rgyud): 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo shin tu khrus bgyis te/ yan lag shin tu byugs nas/ gos sar pa bgos te/ me tog bkram pa'i 'khor gyi khyamasu ras bcos bu sna tshogs
114a5(rgyud): kyis bdugs pa/ ro bro ba sna tshogs kyis gta ma pa rgyan pa'i seng+ge'i khri la mchis te/ gzungs kyi phyag rgya'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di lce'i rtse mos gzhan la rgya
114a6(rgyud): cher yang dag par rab tu bshad dam/ glegs bam la bris te klog par gal te bdag cag re re zhing yang 'khor brgya song du mas skor nas ma mchis sam/ der chos nyan pa
114a7(rgyud): chos smra ba srung ba dang / rang gi 'khor srung ba dang / sems can gzhan yang srung ba dang / sems can yongasu smin par bgyi ba'i slad du/ grong ngam/ grong rdal nas dmangs
114a8(rgyud): kyi khrims kyi bar de dag tu ma mchis sam/ 'khor dang bcas pas bka' ma mnos sam/ yongasu ma bskyang sam/ dar sems can rnams kyi nor dang / 'bru dang / mdzed/ 
114b1(rgyud): dang / bang ba mang po rab tu ma gtam mam/ der ma mchis/ der sems can rnams kyi 'thab pa dang / rtsod pa dang / mu ge dang / nang dang / pha rol gyi dmag tshogs dang / 
114b2(rgyud): dus ma lags pa'i chang dang / rlung dang / shin tu grang ba dang / tsha ba rnams ma bzlog na bdag cag gi 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan
114b3(rgyud): 'das bde la bslus pa dang / 'khrus pa dang / ma mnyes par bgyes par 'gyur te/ lus la sha bkras btab pa dang / lta ba yongasu nyams pa dang / lus rul bar 'gyur// bdag cag
114b4(rgyud): g.yog pas bcas pas da ltar dang ma 'ongs pa'i dus na yang gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir bcom/ ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa'i chos kyi rna
114b5(rgyud): 'di 'bar bar bgyi'o// chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ba snyan par bgyi'o// chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la dad pa'i gang zag ni mas srung bar bgyi/ yongasu bskyang bar bgyi'o// yongasu smin
114b6(rgyud): par bgyi'o// ngan par bgyi ma zhes pa'i las yongasu sbyang ba'i slad du/ chos kyi rnam gangs 'di bstan pa la chos smra ba'i gang zag de la bskul bar bgyi'o// chos nyan pa dang / 
114b7(rgyud): chos smra ba kun spyod pa rnam par 'phel ba sgrub par bgyi'o// rgyal ba'i bstan pa mi 'jigs pa'i cho su gzung bar bgyi'o// de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag thams
114b8(rgyud): kyis mi dang mo ma yin pa de dag thams cad la legaso zhes bya ba byin no// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa de la byang chub se dang si 'a chen po ltad mo can gyis zhus pa/ 
115a1(rgyud): bcom ldan 'dan ci lags/ gang bdud bye ba phrag brgya po 'dir 'dus pa thams cad 'khor dang bcas pa lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
115a2(rgyud): pa/ thams cad 'khor dang bcas pa'o// byang chub seM da' ltad mo can gyis gsol pa/ ci 'khor dang bcas pa thams cad kyis dkon mchog gsum la dad pa thob lags sam/ 
115a3(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu de ni ma yino// bdud sdig can g.yog stong yod pa 'di dang ba mthong ste/ 'khrug cing yid mi dga' nas da ltar dang ma 'ongs
115a4(rgyud): pa'i dus na yang dam pa'i chos kyi tshul ji srid 'a bar ba de srid du 'di klags lta zhing skabs 'tshol te/ dam pa'i chos kyi tshul gzhig pa dang nub par bya ba'i phyir brtson par da
115a5(rgyud): de bzhin du g.yog khri sum stong yod pa'i bdud bco brgyad dang / g.yog nyi shu rtsa gcig yod pa zhes brgya bod de dag kyang g.yog dang bcas par dkon mchogasum la
115a6(rgyud): dad pa ma thob ste/ 'khrugs shang yid mi dga'i nas 'di dag da ltar dang ma 'ongs pa'i dus na yang ji srid du dam pa'i chos kyi tshul rab tu rgyas pa de srid du/ 'di dag nga'i bstan pa
115a7(rgyud): la klags lta zhing skabs tshol te dam pa'i chos kyi tshul gzhig pa dang / nub par bya ba'i phyir brtson par byed// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sngon chad khon du bzung ba dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba ma
115a8(rgyud): bskyed pa dang / mi dge ba'i grogs pos yongasu zin pa dang / dge bas skyo zhing mya ngan las 'das pa'i bde ba mi 'dod pa dang / smon lam btab pa'i phyir sems dang sems mtshams
115b1(rgyud): mi sbyor/ dad par mi byed gnas par mi byed/ rab tu gtong bar mi byed do// sangs rgyas 'dus pa chen po 'di lta bu mthong ba dang / gzugs zab mo 'di lta bu thos pas rgyu de nyid kyi
115b2(rgyud): phyin cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la dad pa rab tu rnyed par 'gyuraro// byang chub se der lhad ma can gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar chos kyi rnam
115b3(rgyud): grangs 'di gal te sen dge ba'i rtsa ba skun pa rnams kyi rna lam du grag par gyur na yang de nyid de dag gi bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi rgyur 'gyur ba ni/ bcos
115b4(rgyud): shin tu ngo mtshar to// bde bar gshegs pa ngo mtshar to// yang de'i tshe bdud ri byi zhes bya ba sngon gyi rgyal ba la lhag par bya ba byas pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa/ dkon mchog
115b5(rgyud): gsum la dad ba mi nyams pa rnyed par gyur pa/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ba snyan pa thob pa de drang srong chen po'i cha byad du de bzhin pa
115b6(rgyud): pa shAkya thub pa'i spyan sngar 'dug par gyur nas/ de stan las langs nas kun tu bltas nas zil mo sbyar te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi stobs bskyed pas/ sangs
115b7(rgyud): kyi zhing ma lus pa 'di dbyangs kyis bkang ste/ 'di skad ces smraso// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang / byang chub sed sede'i chen po thams cad bdag la dgongasasu gsol// lha
115b8(rgyud): klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / na mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye che po dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa dang / bdud g.yog dang bcas pa rnams kyang bdag gi
116a1(rgyud): tshig gson cig/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa thugs rje chen po mnga' ba/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing snyigs ma can thams cad rnam par gcod pa/ yon tan bkod
116a2(rgyud): ba thams cad yong su rdzogs par mdzad pa'i ston pa 'di sngon gyi smon lam gyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing rab tu nyon mongs pa can snyigs ma lnga dang ldan pa 'di lta bur bla na med pa yang dag pa
116a3(rgyud): rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas sems cad mtshams ma mchis pa bgyid pa/ dam pa'i chos spong ga 'phags pa la srung ba 'ang mi dge bi'i rtsa ba dang ldan pa/ ngan par spyod pa
116a4(rgyud): dang ldan pa'i se na rnams kyi rgyud yongasu smin par mdzad pa dang / ngan song gsum las shin tu bzla ba dang / theg pa gsum la yong su smin par mdzad pa dang / ting 'dzin dang / ga
116a5(rgyud): dang / bzod pa la dgod pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnam par dag pa bgyi ba dang / dkon mchog gsum gyi ga dungs mi 'chad par mdzad pa'i skad du zhugs kyis de la
116a6(rgyud): khyed kyis kyang ci nas ston pa'i bstan pa yun ring du gnas pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi tshul 'di yang rnam par mi 'jigs pa'i chos can du 'gyur ba dang / sgrub pa dang mi ldan pa ma gtogs pa
116a7(rgyud): de lta dang / ma 'ongs pa'i dus na yang bdud dam/ bdud kyi 'khor sus kyang de bzhin gshegs pas rab tu gsungs pa rgyal ba'i bstan pa 'di la sems can 'ga' la yang 'tshe ba 'am/ 
116a8(rgyud): rnam par 'jig pa 'am/ nub par 'gyid par mi 'gyur ba dang / gang dag yang dam pa'i chos 'di 'dzin pa dang / chos la nan tan bgyid pa dang / chos smra ba dang / chos nyan pa'i dge slong pa
116b1(rgyud): dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma 'am/ gzhan yang dad pa'i rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo las gsum la mngon par brtson pa/ bsod nams bya ba'i dngos pal
116b2(rgyud): dga' ba/ dkon mchog gsum la mchod pa'i las la mngon par brtson pa/ khams gsum na spyod pa'i nyon mongs pa spong ba la mngon par brtson pa/ sems can thams cad sdug
116b3(rgyud): bsngal las yongasu bar bar bgyid par gyur pa de dag la yang bdud dam/ bdud kyi bu 'am/ bdud kyi bu mo 'am/ bdud kyi 'khor ram/ bdud kyi 'khor mo 'am/ bdud kyi pho nyas gces pa
116b4(rgyud): bsam pas glags lta ba 'am/ skabs tshol du mchi zhing g.yeng ba dang / dge ba'i bar chad kyi las bgying par mi 'gyur ba de ltar mdzod cig/ da ltar gyi sangs rgyas bcom
116b5(rgyud): ldan 'das thams cad la gsol// bdag la las kyi dngos grub stsal du stsol// byang chub seder sed chen po thams cad dang 'dud kyi 'khor thams cad dang / lha dang / 
116b6(rgyud): klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lA ma yin dang / mamakha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa thams cad kyang bdag la zhugs bar bar mdzad
116b7(rgyud): gang su da ltararo sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir gtogs pa'i sa la gnas pa de dag kyang sems can thams cad la phan pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa dam pa'i chos su yun ring du
116b8(rgyud): gnas par bgyi ba'i slad du/ bdag la thugs 'artse bar mdzod cig/ bdag la gsang sngags kyi dngos grub sul cig dang / bdag gis bdud dam/ bdud kyi 'khor na thur gyis
117a1(rgyud): tshar bcang ba dang / sems 'khrugs pa dang / lus la gdod pa dang / lus dpa' bkong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul nyams par bgyi ba'i sngags bshad par bgyi ste/ 
117a2(rgyud): de nas bdud dang bdud kyi bu dang / bdud kyi bu mo dang / bdud kyi 'khor mo dang / bdud kyi pho nyas gang bcom ldan 'das kyi bskyed pa la sems pa dad pa gcig tsam bskyed dam/ 
117a3(rgyud): dge slong la 'tshe'am/ ba na skad cig gcig tsam yang sems 'khrugs par bgyid pa nas/ dge ba'i phyogs yongasu 'bri bar bgyi ba'i bar du nad tad bgyid pa dang / grong dang /

117a5(rgyud): tu ba na skad cig gcig tsam yang 'thab pa dang / cod pa dang / mu ge dang / nang dang / pha rol gyi dpag tshogs dang / dus ma lags pa'i rlung dang / char dang / gang
117a6(rgyud): dang / tsha ba dang / chu bo dang / sa g.yo ba dang / sa 'gas pa dang / skar mda' lhung bar 'gyang ba dang / lo ma dang / me tog dang / 'bra spu dang / 'bru dang / sman dang / ro skye bar mi 'gyid dpa
117a7(rgyud): ma rungs par 'gyed par 'tshal na/ bdud des de ltar sems bskyed ma thag tu bdud nas bdud kyi pho nya'i bar de dag rims nad kyis che bar 'gyur/ lus lci ba dang / rdul ba dang / 
117a8(rgyud): rul ba dang / dri mi zhim pa dang / la su mi rung ba dang / ldang mi nus por 'gyur/ bcing ba lngas bdag bcings par mthong ba nas/ de'i yan lag bde 'khums pa'i bar du 'gyur zhing / 
117b1(rgyud): slar brkyang mi nus pa dang / de'i phyogs thams cad mung bar gyur nas nyi ma snang ba'i gzugs kyang ma mthong ba dang / nga'i rdzu 'phrul bri nas sems 'khrug par 'gyur/ do'i yu
117b2(rgyud): drug kyang spyod yul du 'jug mi nus par 'gyur ro// 'di lta sti/ a ma le/ a ha ma ma le/ a dza ba ba/ a dza ba ba/ mU ra sa la bya khas le/ dza ma si le/ haha haM ha ha ha/ g+ho
117b3(rgyud): sar+b+ba/ tsham lag/ dzA ya khaka bo d+hi tras kho na/ sam+ba ru k+Sha pa/ k+Shak+Sha/ k+Shak+Sha k+Sha k+Sha/ mU la 'ata/ khags// kha dz+nyA sa/  ri baH/ r+ya/ sadz+nyA/ ra yul dzA// sar+tha sa
117b4(rgyud): na/ ba saT+Ta dz+nyA/ khu khwa \u0f85dz+nyA/ ba ba nyid nya/ b+hu ka ko/ tarbA tA&d+hA/ sarba dz+nyA b+hi/ a d+hiSh+Ti/ te&dzA/ ba rAHma tr-i ga Na tak+She ba/ kA ma ma/ kA ma r+d+ha/ 
117b5(rgyud): pre ta mA ra bi shwe ya swA hA// thams cad mkhyen pa rnams kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis skad cig du bdud kyi yul thams cad med par byas te/ 'bras bu med par gyur to/

117b7(rgyud): dang mi ma yin pa dang / lha thams cad kyis kyang leg so zhes bya ba rab tu byi no// de nas de'i ches ni g.yos/ sprin ri'i khrugs/ ri'i rgyal po rnams ni rab tu g.yogs te/ gang sa
117b8(rgyud): rgyas kyi bstan pa la mngon par dad pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' bzod pa thob pa rnams ma gtogs par bdud 'khor dang / bcas pa dang / de bzhin du 'byung po ma rungs pa rnam
118a1(rgyud): kyang 'khrug so// de nas bdang sdig can gyis byang chub se de sra ba'i blo gros la smra ba/ rigs kyi bu bdud ri bya'i 'di spobs ga las 'ongs/ mthug las
118a2(rgyud): 'ongs na gang snying rje med pa 'dis/ rang gi phyogs thams cad dang / nga'i stobs kyi yul dang / pha rol gnon pa thams cad ma lus par bcom ste/ nag po'i rtsa lag ni pham par byas// 
118a3(rgyud): mi 'thun par chad par smra bo dge sbyong go'u ta ma'i phyogs ni mtho bar byas// bdag kyang gzungs 'di thos ma bag tu lus dri mi zhim pa dang / rul ba dang / lasu mi rung bar gyur/ 5
118a4(rgyud): gi phyogs thams cad kyang mun par gyur te/ sAng zhing mtho ba med par byas/ yongasu gdung ba chen pos bdag gdungaso// byang chub sems dpa' sra ba'i blo gros kyis smras pa/
