178a6(rgyud): chub seM ra bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ba dang / dam bca' ba bzang ba dang / chos la mi gnas pa dang / bdag the tshom ma mchis pa
178a7(rgyud): dang / slob dpon ma mchis pa dang / rang gi lam la gnas pa bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad du gsol// bde bar gshegs pas bshad du gsol// bcom ldan 'das
178a8(rgyud): kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu legaso legaso// shA ri'i bu gzungs thob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni sangs rgyas nyid du brjod do// shA ri'i bu gang la la zhig byang
178b1(rgyud): chub sems dpa' gzungs phob pa la sti stang byed ngam/ bla mar byeng ngam/ rim gror byed dam/ mchod na nges sangs rgyas thams cad la sti stang byas par 'gyuraro// gang dag gis
178b2(rgyud): gzungs 'di bos pa dang / gang dag mos po de dag kyang / sangs rgyas ji lta ba de bzhin du mchod pa'i 'osu 'gyur zhing byang chub kyi sems dang mi 'bral bar 'gyuraro// shA'i
178b3(rgyud): bu gzungs ni 'di lta ste/ sarba d+ha ra NI/ ut+ta Ni/ sar pra tiSh+Thi ta/ ut+ta ma su pra tiSh+Tha tA/ bi dza ya ba lA/ sarba pra ti dz+nyA/ a ha ra dz+nyA na ba ti/ uta pad ni/ bi naM mA
178b4(rgyud): nI a b+hi Shiny+dza ri/ a b+hi b+ha ha ra/ shu b+ha ba ti a ri shri ta/ ba hu ku b+ha/ a b+hi ba tsa/ shA ri'i bu 'di dag ni dbang bskur ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs kyi chos kyi ming rnam
178b5(rgyud): te/ 'das pa rnams dang / ma 'ongs pa rnams dang da lta ru byung ba rnams dang / legs par gnas pa rnams bya nga chub sengang gang gis legs par gzung ste 'cha
178b6(rgyud): ba de/ myur du mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya ba'i phyir/ bskal pa brgya dang / bskal pa stong dag tu smon lam gyis zad par byed par mi 'gyur/ nga la mtshon gyis
178b7(rgyud): tshugs par 'gyur/ me dang srog chags mi srun pa rnams kyis mi tshugs par 'gyur// nga ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar shA'i bu gzungs 'di ni 'das pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi
178b8(rgyud): yu mo// shA ri'i bu rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la las stong gsum gyi song chen po'i grangs med pa bcu mthar chagasu gang ba'i sangs rgyas rnams la na bza'
179a1(rgyud): dang / zhal zas bzang pos bskal pa grangs med par bzung ba byas pa bas/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gzhan gang gis gzungs 'di las
179a2(rgyud): na tshig cig tsam bzung ba de bas bsod nams ches mang du bsgreng ngo // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shA ri'i bu ga dbang bskur ba'i gzungs 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi yum yin pa'i phyir/ 
179a3(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal ras/ dge slong de dag dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang / lha dang mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i jig
179a4(rgyud): rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bso // 'phags pa dbang bskur ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzog so// // rgya gar gyi
179a5(rgyud): mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang / dA nA shI la dang / zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban+d+ha ye shes sdes bskur cing zhus te/ skad gsar chad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la
179a6(rgyud): phab pa// / rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya hi ra d+hU ba tI nA ma d+ha ra Ni/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa dbyig dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs// sangs rgyas dang byang chub se
179a7(rgyud): thams cad la phyag 'tsha lo// 'di skad bdag gi sa bos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das dga' ldan ra zla ba dkar po lta bu'i rdo leb la byang chub sems dpa' stong phrag
179a8(rgyud): du ma thams cad kyang 'di lta ste/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa/ skye ba gcig gis bogs pa sha stag dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs
179b1(rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sengs sanga' chen po lags par gnas la bka' stsal pa/ legs par gnas byang chub senga' sanga' chen po gang shig dang ldan
179b2(rgyud): gzungs 'di 'dzin par mi 'dod pa des/ 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams mi mthong // ma boso// ma myong ngo // gang gis
179b3(rgyud): 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa rnams mthong ba dang / thos pa dang / myong ba des gzungs thob bo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar lags par gnas byang chub sems dpa'
179b4(rgyud): sems dpa' chen po ni bdag gis bsod nams bya so// zhes mi 'dzin/ bdag gis bsod nams ma yin pa dang / dge ba dang mi dge ba byaso zhes mi 'dzin to// de
179b5(rgyud): phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar legs par gnas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po na gzungs la dzin par mi rtog rnam par mi rtog/ byang chub sa
179b6(rgyud): sems dpa' chen po gzungs thob pa ni 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i chos rnams la dngos por ram/ mtshan nyid du mi rtog/ yongasu mi rtog
179b7(rgyud): ste/ N+yeng du ma yin/ rgyan par med par ma yin/ 'gro bang ma yin/ 'gro ba med par ma yin/ tshi 'phor ma yin/ sme bar ma yid/ spong bar ma yin/ ma~M sto
179b8(rgyud): ma yan/ mtsha mar ma yin/ mtshan ma med par ma yin/ smon par ma yin// mi smod pa med par ma yin/ skye bar ma yin/ 'gag par ma yi// lags
180a1(rgyud): par gnas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang mapa' 'dis spyod pa nga ni/ ye shes la gnas pa zhes bya'o// gang gi tshe ma
180a2(rgyud): la gnas par gyur pa de'i tshe mya ngan las 'das pa zhes bya'o// gang gi tshe mya ngan las 'das par gyur pa de'i tshe dbyig dang ldan pa'i gzungs len cing kun chub par byed la 'a
180a3(rgyud): den dang tshig 'bru yang yongasu zad par mi 'gyur// yongasu ma brtags pa'i tshul khrims can yang yin te/ bden pa'i tshul khrims dang / nor dag po'i tshul khrims
180a4(rgyud): ma brtags pa'i chos can yin te/ bden pa'i chos dang / rnam par dag pa'i chos can no// gzhan gyi dring la mi 'jog cing rang gi chos la zhug so// sangs rgyas la lhag par bya
180a5(rgyud): byas pa'o// rigs pa'i cho ga la zhugs pa'o// legs par gnas de ltar na byang chub senga' sems dpa' chen po mi chag so// mi 'chang ngo // mi dag
180a6(rgyud): legs par gnas gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi chags mi 'tshong / mi grol ba de'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi rigs dang / 'das pa dang / ma pyod pa dang / 
180a7(rgyud): da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi rig sngags kyi ming gzhan gyi gsang sngags gzhi rnams kyis dbyig dang ldan pa'i gzungs 'bob/ tad+ya thA/ ku Ti
180a8(rgyud): ku tsa la/ sa khA oM mi ro to/ ko TA la/ a re ri/ e ma~M r-iNi// legs par gnas pa 'di ga ni 'das pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi rig sngags kyi ming gan
180b1(rgyud): 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi rig sngags kyi mngaganano// legs par gnas dbyig dang ldan pa'i gzungs 'di ni 'a
180b2(rgyud): pa dang / ma bor ba dang / nga ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi yu mo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'das pa'i ngor la mau gnas/ ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar
180b3(rgyud): byung ba'i ngaro la mi gnas pa'i phyir ro// legs par gnas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang la la dbyig dang ldan pa'i gzungs 'di 'dzin pa ngas sangs rgyas
180b4(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das grangs med pa la mchod pa dang / ban bkur byas pa yin// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das grangs med pa dag gis bla na meng ba yang dag par rdzogs pa
180b5(rgyud): byang chub tu lung bstan pa yi no// legs par ga/ sa dbyig dang ldan pa'i gzungs 'di 'dzin pa nges byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di snyam
180b6(rgyud): gru ba dag gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das grangs med pa dag 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas kyi ye shes brnyes par byas/ bsnyen bkur byas/ mchod par byaso// bsod nams
180b7(rgyud): grangs med pa bskrad ngo snyam du shes par bya'o// su zhig bsam pa gang gis dbrog dang ldan pa'i gzungs 'di 'dzin pa de la nye bar gnas par 'gyur te/ shes rab 'don
180b8(rgyud): ba la shes rab ring / gzungs 'dod pa la gzungs dang / dbyig 'dod pa la dbyig dang / thos pa 'dod pa la bos pa nye bar gnas par 'gyuraro// 'di'i tshi ga ni 'di
181a1(rgyud): yin te/ zla ba yang gyi ngol nyi ma shang kang 'bras bus lu'i char dang 'o mar spags te bza'o// sangs rgyas kyi rig sngags 'di dag dang / sa
181a2(rgyud): rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi rigs kyi ming gzhan dag rgyun tu yid la bya'o// 'on kyang gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag gi mthus gang dag gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi
181a3(rgyud): 'jig rten gyi khams dag na 'khor ba'i lha ma yin nam/ nam mkha' lding ngam/ mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / gnod sbyin nam/ yi dag se sam/ grul bum maH
181a4(rgyud): sha za 'am/ mi 'am mi ma yin pa de la sems dga' bar 'gyur// bar chad byed par mi 'gyur/ rtag tu yongasu gzu nga bar 'gyur byang chub yongasu gzung bar 'gyur/ byang chub
181a5(rgyud): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dga' bzang dang / yangs pa chen po dang / lag na rdo rje dang / yongasu dag ldan dang / ri dben pa la gnas pa dang / gangs ril
181a6(rgyud): gnas pas kyang yongasu bzung bar 'gyur// 'og min gyi bar gyi byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis kyang 'di lta ste/ dbyig dang ldan pa'i gzungs kyi mthus 'jigs pa 'am/ 
181a7(rgyud): gnod par de la byin gyis rlob par 'gyur/ de la mi 'jigs pa sbyin par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis dga' ldanan la ba dkar po lta bu'i rdo le ba la bzhugs shing / 
181a8(rgyud): de skad ces bka' stsal nas byang chub se ra sanga' chen po legs par gnas dang / byang chub sems dpa' stong phrag du ma de ngag yi rangs te bcom ldan 'das kyis gsum
181b1(rgyud): pa la mngon par bstod ngo // 'phags pa byig dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogaso// / rgya gar gyi mkhan po dza na mi tri dang dAm shI la dang / zhu chen gyi lo
181b2(rgyud): bar de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te skad gsar chad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa'o// rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya dze gu li nA ma bo / bod skad du/ 'pha
181b3(rgyud): pa drug sel ba zhes bya ba'i rig sngags sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tsha lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan
181b4(rgyud): 'das mnyan yod na/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zos sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs te/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dag
181b5(rgyud): ngag sngor byung ba byang chub sems dbang gyur pa na/ ga sa kyi ri byang ngos na/ spos dang ldan pa'i ri bo la/ ri rgyal de yi sul gnas tshe// gzhon nu bsod nams brgya
181b6(rgyud): mtshan// oM na ya yi lpags gyor la// sbrul gyis rgyan pa'i ska rags can// gdug pa'i sbrul gyis mgo rgyan byas// mthong na gdug pa'i rna rgyan can// dug gi me tog
181b7(rgyud): rnams za zhing // ma lu ta yi lcug khu 'thung // ngal de 'bong 'bong du 'jug/ bu khyod chung shog nga la nyon// nga la drug sal ces bya ba// dug 'jig rig sngags dam pa
181b8(rgyud): yod// drug rnams gang yinang kun ni// nga yi ming gis 'jig par 'gyur// 'di lta ste/ aM a li mit+te/ ti lo mo te/ oM li ti lo maH/ dum+be/ dum bA lI/ 
182a1(rgyud): ye/ du se dus la ya tan+te ke ta ka ka kaR+ShA/ mche mtsharata/ kash+ma / kash+ma ra muka te/ a nan/ i li/ a li laM/ a Sha ya la/ 
182a2(rgyud): mi yaM/ shwe te shwa te/ tun+te/ a na mu/ rak+She swA hA// dge slong ga nga'i drug sel gyi rig sngags 'di ni/ sbyin pa thams cad dkar po ste/ sus rig sngags 'di lan
182a3(rgyud): cig thos pa de la lo bdun gyi bar du sbrul gyis mi za'o// nga'i lus la dug gis mi tshugaso// sbrul gang zhig ngo la 'dzin pa de'i mgo shing ardza ka'i dag pa bzhin du/ 
182a4(rgyud): tshal ba mdun du 'gaso// gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di sbrul gyi mdun du brjod par mi bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sbrul de 'chi ba'i phyir// 'di lta ste/ i la lA
182a5(rgyud): la lI/ tsakra bac+doM/ koH/ ko Ta tI ku raH/ kuraHtaspr-iT/ sUT taM/ pur+ra r+the ti/ maT/ mo \u0f85 ti/ ni ku !/ nau Ti ru \u0f7f te/ mu ruH/ mu ru Te ti/ ni mu ru \u0f7f
182a6(rgyud): mu ru Te ta/ pu ru Ta/ pu Ta Ta ha ra/ phuT Ta dam/ ta ha re/ nA ga ha re/ nA ga Ta ha na/ ta ha re/ sarba hi / sarba Tan+san/ Da ra he/ Ats+tsha/ Ats+tsha la/ cha la cha la/ bi
182a7(rgyud): te/ shI ta ba ra ta laM/ mA ta laM/ ha le ha le/ ha la ha la ha la laM/ i la laM/ ke pa tsa le/ mi la le/ tan Ti ta na Ti/ ta Ta ta Ta/ s+phu ta s+phu Ta/ phaT phaT/ ha ra bi Sha sA hA/ 
182a8(rgyud): dge slong dag de ltar ma/ dug sel gyis 'byung po 'dus pa bde la rog sngags gang brjod cing bsnyad pa de dag thams cad ni de bzhi no// gzhan ma yin pa de bzhi no// yang
182b1(rgyud): pa'o// bden pa'o// ma nor ba'o// phyin ci ma log pa'o// dug 'di mi gdug par gyur cig/ sbyin par byed pa'i gan du song shig/ 'dzin pa'i gnasu song shig ma'i nang du
182b2(rgyud): song shig/ chu'i nang du song shig/ bangal song shig/ ka ba'i nang du song shig/ rtsig pa'i nong du song shig/ ma mkha' la song shig/ sa'i nang du song shig/ zhi bar gyur

182b6(rgyud): phyag 'tshalo// de ltar dge slong rnams ri dri rgyal na gnas te/ de'i tshe 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug kyang ngan bzhugs te/ des bdag la smras pa/ bu sngags
182b7(rgyud): kyi tshig 'di nyon cig/ klu'i dbang po rnams kyi dug med par byed / sbrul gyi dug mong par byed/ g.yog rnams dang / srin po rnams dang / 'byung po rnams dang / sha za
182b8(rgyud): rnams dang / seMn stobs po che rnams dang / grul bum rnams dang / sems can phra mo rnams dang / 'phra men pa dang / phra med ma dang / chu srin dang / stag dang / grub
183a1(rgyud): bum ra dang / mche ba can gyis de ltar sngags kyi tshig drag shul chen po aM gu li yang dag par thos na sngags kyi gtso bo sems can gdug par
183a2(rgyud): tu bajil bar byed pa ste/ sngags can gang gos de shes na lnga rnams kyi bdug pa yang dag par med par byed do// oM na mo b+ha ga pa ti Ar+yA aM gu li/ tud+ya thA/ e klu 'a/

183a6(rgyud): g+hur+yA pa ya/ dpag tshad stong brgyad cu na gnas pa'i klu rnams kyi gdug pa med par mdzad cig/ klu thams cad chings shig/ song cig/ zla bar mdzod cig/ oM hu lu hu lu/ ha la
183a7(rgyud): ha la/ ha la bi shaM/ bcom ldan 'das ma grub mi'i rgyal mo oM gu la si bka' su la pa/ taka ka ta ka ke/ ta ka ke ni Ta ka kaM ni/ shi ra sha ra/ tsaN+Da ka sha ro hi ni/ bgegs bad sal
183a8(rgyud): bar mdzad pa can stong can/ bcom ldan 'das ma grub pa oM gu li ta thA bi ga ta/ klu mo'i tshogs sum cus mchod pa/ dza ya dza ya/ sid+d+ha/ rgyal bar mdzad pa/ maM yi man mi
183b1(rgyud): zod kyi brang ba can/ hUMH skad cig par cig pang cig yung tsam nyin par gyi bar du drug sel ba/ a su su rang ba tadang / ngan pa'i stobs 'joms par byed pa can/ bgegs 'ja
183b2(rgyud): par byed pa can/ lha'i yum khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod swAhA/ sngags kyi tshig drag shul can sbrul gyi mdun du bklag par mi bya ste/ 'ching ba dang / klang ba 'gas shing tshal pa

183b5(rgyud): d+hu d+hu ne/ ban+d+ha ban+d+ha/ rdo rje gzungs mang pos bka' stsa la pa/ 'jog po'i dug 'dong du 'jug la/ dza yaHya/ mu dza mu dza/ mu dza mu dza/ bong shig/ klog dang / 
183b6(rgyud): klang zhes bya ba mgyogs pa'i shugs can/ ro langs chen po bcom ldan 'das ma shAkya thub pa'i zhal nas 'byung / mu ya mu tsa mu tsa swA hA/ bklags pas 'grub pa bcom ldan
183b7(rgyud): 'das ma phags ma ser mo can zhes bya ba rig pa'i rgyal mo rdzog so// // rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya sarba d+harma mA tri ka na ma d+ha ra NI/ bongad skad du/ chos thaMd kyi yum zhes bya
183b8(rgyud): ba'i gzungs/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub seda' thams cad la phyag 'tshalo// 'di skad bdag gis bos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod ra bzhugs pa
184a1(rgyud): kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal ba/ kun ga' bo khyod kyis chos thams cad kyi yum zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'i gzungs/ nang thams cad rab tu zhi bar bya
184a2(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsungs te/ nga yang da ltar 'chang ba zung shig/ tradr-i thA/ a brti/ a brte/ bi brti/ bi bit+te/ b+ho ga ma/ shu d+d+he/ pra b+hA sA re/ ta ra ne/ ug Sha
184a3(rgyud): le/ mug kha le/ sarba d+harma/ pA sha pa n+ye swA hA/ de nas gnas gtsang ma'i lha rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis kyang
184a4(rgyud): gzungs 'di'i snying po brjod par bya'o// d+yA bA/ ets+tsha/ a na le/ e lu le/ a lu phe/ mUr+N+Na a nu ga ta/ sarba d+harma A d+hi pa ti ya prAb+h+yAM/ dz+yo sA kar/ a d+hi ga ta dz+nyA ne/ bi shud+d+ha
184a5(rgyud): swAhA// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang/ thams cad dang ldan na pa'i 'khor nga ngag/ yaM rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi
184a6(rgyud): gsungs pa la mngon par bstod ngo // chos thams cad kyi yum zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzog so// / rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya tsu TA ma Ni nA ma d+ha ra Ni/ bod skad du/ 'phags
184a7(rgyud): pa gtsug gi nor bu zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / 'phags pa nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad la phyag 'tsha lo// dan mchogasum/ 
184a8(rgyud): la phyag 'tshal// phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shes bya mtha' yas pa ma lus par khyab par mchog tu rmad du bya
184b1(rgyud): zhing rnam par dag pa'i thugs mnga' ba rnams la phyag 'tsha lo// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa/ 
184b2(rgyud): mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa/ phongs pa thams cad las yongasu skyob par mdzad pa// 'jigs pa thams cad las rnam par thar bar mdzad pa/ yams kyi nang dang / gnod pa thams cad
184b3(rgyud): 'jig par mdzad pa/ mi 'thun pa dang / rtsod pa dang / 'bab pa dang / 'gyed pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar mdzad pa/ sdig pa thams cad 'joms par mdzad pa dang / 'thung po
184b4(rgyud): dang/ ro langs dang / gshis ngan du 'chi ba dang / rmi lam ngan pa dang / bgegs kyi log 'dren thams cad 'jig par mdzad pa/ pha rol gyi dmag tshogs dang / 
184b5(rgyud): mu ga dang / mya ngan gyi 'jigs pa thams cad bzla ga par mdzad pa/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam
184b6(rgyud): mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po thams cad 'dun par mdzad pa/ dug dang / 'brum phran dang / thor bu dang / gshed byed dang / byang dang / ro langs dang
184b7(rgyud): bkra mi shes pa thams cad 'jigs par mdzad pa la phyag 'tshalo// gshed byed thams cad sel mdzad pa// sdig pa thams cad 'phrog pa nyid// nor dang 'bru rnams 'phel
184b8(rgyud): mdzad pa/ bdag gi bu dang cha'o dang / g.yog 'khor cag tu mang gyur pa// phyir bzlog pa ni brjod par bya// lha dang lha min g.yul 'gyed tshe// brgya byin lha man rnams
185a1(rgyud): pham// de nas rings par kho nar ni// 'jig rten dbang gi drung song ste// de nas snying gi tha skrag nas// 'di skad kyi ni tshig gsol to// lha min bdag pham 'jig
185a2(rgyud): rten dbang // ji ltar bdag gis nan tan gyi// 'jig rten dbang po bdag la ni// lha yi gzigs pas rtag tu gzugs// brgya byin gyi ni tshig gsan nas// dbang phyug gis ni 'di
185a3(rgyud): skad gsungs// lha yi dbang po ngal nyor/ khyod la ngas ni srung ba byin// lha'i dbang po sngor byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/ 'jig rten gyi khams 'jig rten gyis rnam par bltas pa
185a4(rgyud): zhes bya ba na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dag bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'jig rten dbang phyug 'od la sa/ ngas gtsug gi nor bu zhes bya ba'i phyir bzlog pa
185a5(rgyud): nga bzhin gshegs pa bye bas gsungs pa bzung // mkhas ba gang gis rig sngags 'di// bris nas spyi bor dogs pa 'am/ 'don tu ma 'on te klog na yang // 
185a6(rgyud): de yi 'jigs pa kun med de/ rtag tu srung shing sba ba dang // g.yul 'gyed pa ni rgyal bar byed // sdig dang rmi lam zhi ba dang // bsod nams bkra shis rab tu 'phel// lha yi
185a7(rgyud): po de bas na// gang zhig rgyal bar 'gyur 'dong bas// bris te spyi bor gdags par bya// yid la rtag tu dran par gyis// g.yul 'gyed 'ba' shig ma yin te// 'di ni rtag tu sdig
185a8(rgyud): 'phrog/ zung med rnams la bu pho skye// mngal ma gnas pa yongasu skyong // phun sum tshogs pa thams cad byed// sdig pa thams cad rab tu 'jig/ 'di ming phyir bzlog byed ces
185b1(rgyud): bya// yan lag rnams la phyir 'bab byed // lha'i dbang po phyir bzlog pa zhes bya ba/ rig sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo san thams cad la phan par byed pa/ lAm yid thams cad nga
185b2(rgyud): par byed pa/ pha rol gyi dmag tshogs 'ad rab tu zhi bar byed pa zung shig/ sangs rgyas la phyag 'tsha'o// chos la phyag 'tshalo// dge 'dun la phyag 'tsha lo// yang dag par rdzo
185b3(rgyud): ba'i sangs rgyas bdun nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/ byang chub sems dpa' bdag dang bcas pa rnams la phyag 'tshalo// tud+ya thA/ oM dza ya ka ri/ sud+d+ho ta ta ti bo tsi trama?
185b4(rgyud): khi/ sarba mo ga la d+ha ra Ni/ dzi mU taM sa ha sra b+hu dze/ sa ha sa? ne tre/ sa ha sra shi ra/ nAn laM ka ra/ bi b+hu Shi ta/ ma Ni kuN+Da la saMn nA ha san na nga bi tsi tra mo// li d+hi/ tsat+pas+dza
185b5(rgyud): r+ya/ ya ti re ka/ A ka sha ga na tsA ri Ni/ me ga la na ra dzI mau ngi/ ba bi tra kri ta me ga le/ b+hu r-i mi d+h+ri ka ra/ tsu ru tsu tsu ru/ shwe ta ba ste/ mu ru mu ru/ sha ta
185b6(rgyud): a ba na te/ hu ru hu ru ba bing tra mu khi/ ku ru ku ru/ tsan+d+ra mu khi/ A di t+ya ba sha brti ni/ dzam+bA ni/ me ga le d+ha ra NaM/ staM b+ha ni/ sarba bid+yA d+ha ra mA taM/ mo ha ni/ a mo g+ha
185b7(rgyud): pA shang ste/ sarba b+ha maM bi mo tsa ni/ rAtsA8/ a g+ni biShi/ ud ka b+ha ya pra sha ma ni/ ka kha~M dz+ran pA ra Ni/ mo ha ra haraM/ dza ya ka ri/ pa la ka ri/ d+ha ma ka ri/ tedza
185b8(rgyud): bi bA da/ pra sha ma ni/ yud d+ha ni/ bA ra ni/ pa ra tsaka pra sha ma ni/ pa ra saM n+ya bi n+ya sha ni/ yud+d+hot+ta ra bi/ pra b+ha dpa la/ ma Ni ma Ni/ ma hA ma Ni/ ma Ni na d+ha ri/ dzi loka
186a1(rgyud): A lo ka kA ri/ tri bu ra na gar bi d+hA na sa ni/ pa ra sai n+ya drub ni/ sarbakr-i t+ya karma ni sU nA~M/ sarba byA d+hi nI ma pra sha ma na/ a tsi la mo l-i swA hA/ tsi la ma
186a2(rgyud): swA hA/ mi li mi li swAhAM/ tsi li tsi li swA hA/ tse khi li/ tsa khi li swA hA/ tsat+kA li mi Ti ni swA hA/ u d+he kau shi pi ga l-i/ piM ga la kA d+ha mu khi swA hA/ oM ka ra ke ra/ tsar tsa/ 
186a3(rgyud): sair sa ra/ sir si su ru su ru/ muny+tsa mu ny+tsa/ muny+tsa/ pa sa/ pra sha ma ya/ pra sha na ya/ yung d+hed ta ra Ni phaT/ tsit+ta ni ri ma la ka ri paH/ a su ra ning g+ha ta ni/ phaT
186a4(rgyud): ya ka ri phaT/ pri ti ka ri phaT/ sa ha sra shing phaT/ sa hA sra b+hu dze phaT/ sa na sra ne traM phaT/ sarba bid+yA d+ha ra d+ha ra ma ma s+thi te phaT/ sarba sha tru R+Sha shi na phaT/ sarba b+ha ya bi ma
186a5(rgyud): krA Ni phaT/ ba raHkra ni ba pa Ni phaT/ pa ra saM r+yabi dra ba ni ga/ sapak+Shit+ya/ karma sA ni paH/ sar+b+bats+tshad+hi pra shA ma NI phaH/ sarba gra ho ta sA da ni phaT/ srA k+Sha
186a6(rgyud): mA na sarba bud+d+ha bo d+hi satwA nAnra/ sa ma tA mi tri nIn/ so ba stA ya kA nAn/ sa ba ri bA ra nAn/ ti dza sa ma ma shi ra raH/ sarba b+ha yo ba dra be b+h+yaHsarba yud+de b+h+yaHsarba bA dI b+h+yAs
186a7(rgyud): tus+thi te b+h+yaHsarba kri t+ya ke khe rje b+huHserba bi She b+h+yaHsarba kA ya tsit+te bI dI bA b+hUsh+tsa/ rakA rak+Sha rak+Sha mAn swA hA// gtsug gi nor bu zhes bya ba'i phyir bzlog pa las kyi sgrib pa
186a8(rgyud): byang bar byeng pa/ nang thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa/ thams cad du zhi bar byang ba/ bsod nams thams cad sog par byed pa/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams
186b1(rgyud): cang yang dag par ston par byeng ba/ rnam pa thams cad du dpal du byed pa ste/ yi ger bris pa dang / ston pa dang / bklags pa dang / bzung bas bdag dang / gzhan srung ba'o// 
186b2(rgyud): de bzhin du khrus bya ba dang / sbyin sreg gis yams kyi nang dang / gnod pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa'o// 'phags pa gtsug gi nor bu zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogaso/ 
186b3(rgyud): rgya ga gyi mkha bo shI le ma po d+hi nga / zhu chen gyi lo skyab bar d+he yang shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te/ gtan la phab pa/ @6// rgya gang skad du/ 
186b4(rgyud): Ar+ya Sha TA kA ra bid/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa yi ge drug pa zhes bya ba'i rig snga gas/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tsha lo// 'di
186b5(rgyud): skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na bzhugs te/ de nas bcom lda na 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la stsal pa/ 
186b6(rgyud): kun dga' bo yi ge drug pa'i rig sngags gang yang dag par rdzogs po'i sangs rgyas drug dang / 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon nyi shu rtsa brgyad kyis
186b7(rgyud): bshang ba/ yi ge drug pa'i rig sngags kyi rgyal mo 'di kun dga' bo khyod kyis zung shig/ tshangs shig/ lcogs shig/ kun chub par gyis shig/ tud+ya thA/ dal/ kan+d+ha la
186b8(rgyud): dad+ha mi ti ma d+hum te/ ma d+hus ti/ ka rAn+ta te/ kor dz+nyAHti/ ko shA rI/ maT dza/ du du ma te/ ka tum te/ phu dur d+ha/ ka Ta da ne/ taru \u0f7f/ oM nas/ su drab chu
187a1(rgyud): kun dga' bo 'di ni yo ge drug pa'i rig sdug so// klang pa na ba dang / mig na ba dang / rnab na pa dang / son pa dang / spar ba dang / len pa dang / snying na pa dang / 
187a2(rgyud): ljon pa dang / rgya na ba dang / rtsib logs na ba dang / chu son pa dang / byid pa nab dang / rkang pa na ba dang / yan lag na ba dang / nying lag na ba dang / zas ma zhu ba dang / lbos pa
187a3(rgyud): mngal du thogs pa dang / rlung las gyur pa dang / mkhris pa las gyur pa dang / bad kan las gyur pa dang / 'dus pa las gyur pa dang / rims drag po dang / 
187a4(rgyud): gcig pa dang / nyin ginyes pa dang / na gsum pa dang / nyin bzhi pa dang / rims yud tsam pa dang / nyin me'i rims dang / mtshan mo'i rims kyis btab pa
187a5(rgyud): la/ yi ge drug pa'i rig sngags 'dis srung ba dang / yongasu bsgrub pa dang / yongasu srung ba dang / yong su bskyang ba dang / zhi ba dang / bde leg su 'gyur
187a6(rgyud): chang ba spang ba dang / mtshon cha spang ba dang / dug gzhil ba dang / chus gtong ba dang / srang bus bcings pa byas pa las gang zhig 'gal bar byed na/ de'i mgo ardza ka'i
187a7(rgyud): dog pa bzhin du tshal ba bdun du mi 'gas pa ni/ kun dga' bo ngas lha dang bcas pa dang / bdud dang bcas pa dang / tshangs pa dang / dge sbyong dang / bram zer bcas pa'o// 
187a8(rgyud): dgu dang / lha dang mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten nam mthong ngo // tad+ya thA/ aSh+Te/ bebaN+Da ra/ ka raT/ ka yu re/ b+hU ta gra hau/ b+hu tagra te/ b+hUb+hu tapra k+Shi te/ b+hU/ 
187b1(rgyud): ta ya smA ya ni/ pra yab ti/ te dza bi tI/ ya sho ba ti/ gi ra Na na/ shA rI Ni ni/ bdag 'jigs pa thams cad dang / gnod pa thams cad las bde leg su
187b2(rgyud): gyur cig swA hA// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'ag
187b3(rgyud): na yi rangs te// bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// 'phags pa yi ge drug pa zhes bya ba'i rig sngags rdzog s+ho// / 'phags pa she
187b4(rgyud): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa'i gzungs// bcom ldan 'das ma yum shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la phyag 'tshalo// tad+ya thA/ oM pradz+nyA prad+d+ha/ prad+d+ha
187b5(rgyud): a ba b+ha sa/ pradz+nyA ba lo ka la ti/ sarba d+harma arad+hakA ra bi d+ha ma rdi/ sid+d+haM su sid+d+ha/ siR+ShA pA d+ha ga ba ti/ sarba dz+nyA na san d+ha ri/ b+ha ga bai ti/ 
187b6(rgyud): tsha la/ pra sa ra te hasma mA ma su ka ra/ sid+d+ha sid+d+ha bud+d+ha bud+d+ha/ kaM pa kaM pa/ pA la pA la/ d+ha ra d+ha ri/ ba ra ba ri/ gardza gardza/ A gats+tsha A gats+tsha/ b+ha ga ba ti/ mA bi le ba swaH
187b7(rgyud): 'di gzung bas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa gzung bar 'gyuraro// las kyi sgrib pa bde byang bar 'gyuraro// 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu
187b8(rgyud): byir pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa'i gzungs rdzog so// @#/ rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya pradz+nyA pA ra mi ta sha ta sa ha sra d+hA ra t+ti/ khongs
188a1(rgyud): 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa'i gzungs/ bcom ldan 'das ma yum shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la phyag 'tsha'o// tAng
188a2(rgyud): oM mra ni d+harba/ saMg+ha had+harma a nu gra ha d+harbe/ bi mu k+Shi d+harma/ sA ra a nu gra sa d+harmA/ bai shra ba Na pa ri brta na d+harma/ sarba kAr+yA ba ri pra ma Na d+harmaM/ se mau ta a nu pa ri baH
188a3(rgyud): na d+harma swA hA/ oM pradz+nyA shA ti ma ti bi dza ye swA hA/ d+hIHd+ha ra Ni swAhA// oM pradz+nyA bA ra mai tA ba la swAtA// 'di gzungs pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa
188a4(rgyud): gzung bar 'gyuraro// rtag tu bzlas brjod pas na yid gzhungs par 'gyuraro// las kyi sgrib pa thams cad byang bar 'gyuraro// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag
188a5(rgyud): ba'i gzung rdzog s+ho// // 'phags po shes bkyi pha rol tu phyin pa brgyad stong pa'i gzung / ba6/ ma ldan 'das ma yum shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi
188a6(rgyud): pa la phyag 'tshalo// tad+ya thA/ oM hri/ shru ti s+thi ti bi dza ye swA hA/ pradz+nyA pA ra mai tA yaM/ sarba dur+b+ba ti sho d+ha ya/ rA dzA ya swA tA/ 'di bzung bas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
188a7(rgyud): stong pa gzung bar 'gyuraro// ltas ngan pa sna tshogs kyang bzloso// las kyi sgrib pa dang / ngan song thams cad rnam par sbyong bar 'gyuraro// 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi/ 
188a8(rgyud): ba brgyad stong pa'i gzungs rdzogaso// // pha rol tu phyin pa drug gi snying po'i gzungs// 'phags pa yum shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la phyag 'tsha lo// sangs rgyas
188b1(rgyud): la phyag 'tshalo// chos la phyag 'tshalo// dge 'dun la phyag 'tshalo// na mo b+ha ga d+harma kA ya/ se b+ho kA ya/ nir mA tra kA ya/ tad+ya thA/ dA na pA ra mi ta/ shI la bA ra mi tA/ k+tha
188b2(rgyud): pA ra mi tA/ bIr+ya pA ra ma~M tA/ d+hu na pA ra mi tA/ badz+nyA pa rA mi tA/ sarba d+harma shUn+ya tA swA hA/ 'di gzung bas pha rol tu phyin pa drug gzung bar 'gyuraro// stong pa nyid yid la
188b3(rgyud): par 'gyur// rtag tu bzlas brjod byas na chos thams cad kyi mdo dang rgyas pa shes par 'gyuraro// mtshams mang ba lnga byang bar 'gyuraro// ltas ngan pa thams cad kyang bzlog// 
188b4(rgyud): pha rol tu phyin pa drug gi snying po'i rdzog s+ho// // dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshalo// sbyin pa'i snying po 'di lan cig thos pas sbyid pa
188b5(rgyud): thob par 'gyur// oM na mo ma s+t+waM b+ha ga ba ti dA ra d+ha pa ta ye swA hA/ tshul khrims kyi snying po 'di lan gathos pas tshul khrims thob par 'gyur// 
188b6(rgyud): na maHsarba ta thA ga tA nAM/ ma hA kA na ma kAn+te/ na mo b+ha ga ba taM/ shI la pa ra~M puR+Sha sha ri ya shI la maM/ sA d+ha ya sA d+ha ya/ kir tiSh+Tha se bud+d+ho b+ha ga bar d+harmA s+ya
188b7(rgyud): sa mA dz+nyA pa ya ti swAhA/ bzod pa'i snying po 'di lan cig thos pas bzod pa thob par 'gyuraro// na maHsarba ta thA ga tA ya/ a tsin+ta go ta ya/ na ma k+Shan+tI ye ba hu b+hi/ taH
188b8(rgyud): ga ta ra b+h+ye ta ko Ti b+hi ba ri brti ta yaM rak+Sha ku ru tu ku ru tu sa ma ya ma nu sma ra/ shAkya mu na~M sarba ta thA ga tA nA a pa ri mai tA dz+nyA ni go tsa ro dz+nyA pa ya ti swAtAM/ brtson 'grus kyi
189a1(rgyud): seng po 'di lan cig zos pas brtson 'grus thob par 'gyuro// na maHsarba ta thA ga tA nA ma tsim t+ya bi shA ya nA~M/ na mo stu taM b+ha ga ba te bi drA ma/ 
189a2(rgyud): bAr+ye na ku ru bIr+ya bI r+ye/ ma hA bAr+ya ta thA ga ta/ sarba dz+nyA na pa ya ti swA hA/ bsam gtan gyi snying po 'di lar cig thos pas bsam gtan thob par 'a gyur// na maHsarba ta thA
189a3(rgyud): ga ta nA~M/ oM bi ma la/ nirma le/ d+hu ni d+hun/ d+h+ya ra bri ye hU~M phaT/ shes rab snying po 'di lan cig thos pas shes rab thob par 'gyuraro// na maHta thA ga ta ya/ a pa ra mi tA
189a4(rgyud): dag / nam b+hag/ na // ma ya smra/ sa ma samadu/ du / 
189a5(rgyud): phyin pa drug gzung bar 'gyur ba'i gzungs rdzog s+ho// / pha rol tu phyin pa bcu'i snying po 'di lan \u0f7fga thos pas pa rol tu phyin pa bcu thob par 'gyur/ 
189a6(rgyud): na maHsatwA ne/ ta thA ga ta nA~MnAM/ da sha pAr pU ra kA nI hI/ pha rol tu phyin pa bcu thob par 'gyur ba'i gzungs rdzogaso// / 'di la dgo cag brjod pas byams
189a7(rgyud): pa thob par 'gyu ro// na maHsarba ta thA ga tA nAM/ tsu ru tsu ru/ mu ru mu ru/ ka ru Na/ karu N+yai tsit+ta mu ta pa dA ya/ b+ha ga ba ti sarba b+ha yo ma nA sha ya swA hA/ 'di lan gcig badz+ra
189a8(rgyud): pas snying rje thob par 'gyur// namaHsarba te thA ga tA nA/ na mo b+ha ga ba ti sarba satra br-i ya hUM mu do ti swA hA/ 'di lan gcig brjed pas dga' ba ba'i par 'gyuraro// namaHsa
189b1(rgyud): thA gA tA nA~M/ ma nin t+yA bi shA nA/ oM tu lu tu lu traM/ hu lu hu lu/ mu lu mu lu swA hA/ 'di lan cig brjod pas btang snyoms thob par 'gyuraro// na maHsarba twA thA ga tA hU~Mng
189b2(rgyud): ya/ e nu ga te oM ku ru gi no swA hA/ tshad med pa bzhi thob par 'gyur ba'i gzungs rdzogaso// // bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags ma shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi
189b3(rgyud): pa la phyag 'tsha'o// tad+ya thA/ oM mr-i ni d+harme/ sa grA ha d+harma/ a nu gra had+harme/ bi muk+ti d+harme/ sA dA a nug ta d+he rma baM shra ba Na ba ri bti tA d+harma sarba kAr+ya ba ri bram Na d+ha
189b4(rgyud): sa ma tA pa ri brta ma d+harma swA hA/ oM pradz+nyA shru ti smr-i taM/ bi dze ya d+hiHd+hA ra NI ya swA hA/ 'di gzungs bas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa bzung bar 'gyu/ 
189b5(rgyud): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa bzung bar 'gyur ba'i gzungs rdzogas+ho// / dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshalo// oMn+ta
189b6(rgyud): na maHsarba bud+hA nAM/ oM mA/ pre/ mU/ tud+ya thA/ oM b+hU/ 'di gzungs pas 'phags pa phal po che gzung bar 'gyur// 'dri ba dang klog pa yang de dang 'dra'o// 'phag
189b7(rgyud): pa phal po che gzung bar 'gyur ba'i gzungs rdzog so// // dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshalo// na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/ a pra ti ha tA shA sa na n+te/ oM ka
189b8(rgyud): Ni ki Ni ta thA ga ta/ ud b+ha ba shAnu ba rang / ut+ta ma ut+ta ma/ ta thA ga ta ud b+hu ba hUM phaT swA hA/ 'di gzung bas 'phags pa sdong po bkod pa'i mdo bde rdzogs
190a1(rgyud): par bklags shing kha ton du byas par 'gyuraro// 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor dang dam tshig shes par 'gyur// phyan
190a2(rgyud): rgya rnams kyang shes par 'gyuraro// 'phags pa sdong po bkod pa'i snying po rdzogs// / dkod dachog gsum la phyag 'tshalo// na maHsa man+ta bud d+hA nA/ oM pra tiH
190a3(rgyud): shA sa nA nAM/ oM d+hu ra b+hu hU~M hUM phaT phaT swA hA/ 'di gzungs na 'phags pa ting 'dzid gyi rgyal po'i mdo gzung bar 'gyuraro// 'phags pa ting 'dzin gyi rgyal po'i mdo gzung bar 'gyur
190a4(rgyud): bi'i gzungs rdzogs// dkon mchog gsu ma la phyag 'tsha lo// na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nA/ a br-i ti ha ta shA sa nA nAM/ oM ma Ni d+ha ri badz+ri Ni ma hA pa ti sa ra hUM hUM ga/ 
190a5(rgyud): phaT swA hA/ 'di gzung bas 'phags ma rig pa'i rgyamo so sor 'brang ba chen mo gzung bar 'gyur// 'a/ gas ma so sor 'brang ba chen mo gzung bar 'gyur ba
190a6(rgyud): gzungs rdzogaso// / 'phags pa lang kar gshegs pa la phyag 'tshalo// blo gros chen po sngags kyi tshig 'di dag pashad par bya'o// tud+yan+tu/ 
190a7(rgyud): oM bang me pad+me gai/ ha na hi na/ tsu lu tsu lu tsu lu hu le hu le/ yu le yu la yu la/ ba la ba liM pa laM/ mUts+tsha dan de/ b+hi na da b+ha dza/ man dpra ma d+haM/ d+ha ne ki ra swAhA/ blo bras
190a8(rgyud): chen po rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la sngags kyi tshig 'di dag 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed na/ lha 'am/ lha mo 'am/ klu 'am/ klu mo'o/ 
190b1(rgyud): gnod sbyin nam/ gnod sbyin mo 'am/ lha ma yin nam/ lha ma yin mo 'am/ na mkha' lding ngam/ na mkha' lding mo 'am/ mi 'am ci 'am/ mi 'am ci mo 'am/ lto 'phya
190b2(rgyud): chen po 'am/ lto 'phye chen po mo 'am/ dri za 'am/ dri za mo 'am/ 'byung po 'am/ 'byung po mo 'am/ grul bum mam/ grul bum mo 'am/ sha za 'am/ sha za mo 'am/ gni/ 
190b3(rgyud): po 'am/ gnon po mo 'am/ brjed dam/ brdzang mo 'am/ srin po 'am/ sring po mo 'am/ 'phra men po 'am/ 'phra man mo 'am/ mdangs 'phrog po 'am/ mngangs 'phrog mo 'a
190b4(rgyud): lus srul po 'am/ lus srul mo 'am/ mi 'am ci 'am/ mi ma yin pa de dag thams cad kyis glags mi rnying ngo // gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag klog par byed pa denges la
190b5(rgyud): kar gshegs pa'i mdo thang bklags par 'gyuraro// sngags kyi tshig 'di dag ni bcom ldan 'das kyis srin po la sogs pa rnams bzlog pa'i phyir gsu sa
190b6(rgyud): 'phags pa lang kar gshegs pa'i mdo thams cad bklags par 'gyur ba'i gzungs rdzogaso// // rgya gar skad du// sarba ta thA ga twoSh+NI Sha bi dza ya nA ma d+ha ra Ni kal+la sa
190b7(rgyud): hita/ bod skad du/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs rtog pa dang bcas pa/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sa
190b8(rgyud): thams cad la phyag 'tsha lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das che dpag tu med pa de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzo/ 
191a1(rgyud): pa'i sangs rgyas bde ba can gyis chos yang dag par sdud pa'i phug khang bzang mchog na nye bar bzhugaso// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'a
191a2(rgyud): pa spyar ras gzigs dbang phyug la bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu sdug bsngal ba nad kyis yongasu gzir ba'i sems can che thung ba yod de// de rnams kyi phyir 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor
191a3(rgyud): la nyo nye bar gzigs te/ kun tu gzigs pa'i dpal gyi mtshan/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs 'di bcad pa dang / klag
191a4(rgyud): pa dang / gzhan la rgya cher yang dag par ston pa ni ni ring bsgrub par byed pa'i ched du'o// de nas byang chub sa mas dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras
191a5(rgyud): gzigs dbang phyug bstan las langs te thal mo sgyu bar gyur pas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bstan du gsol// de bzhin
191a6(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi gtsug tor rnam par rgyal po zhes bya ba'i gzungs bde bar gshegs pas bstan du gsol// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis thams cad ldan pa'i 'khor
191a7(rgyud): gyi dkyil 'khor la nye bar gzigs te/ kun tu gzigs pa'i dpal zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gtsug tor rnam par
191a8(rgyud): rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs 'di bka' stsal pa/ oMn mo b+ha ga ba to sirba trai lo kya pra ti'i shiSh+Na ya bud+d+hA ya te na maHtad+ya bA/ oM b+hUM b+h+rUM b+h+re/ sho d+ha ya sho d+ha ya/ thi nad+ha
191b1(rgyud): ya bi sho d+ha ya/ a sa ma sa ma man+ta a bad+d+ha sa s+pha ra Na ga ti ga gA na sA b+hA ba bi shud d+ha/ uSh+NI Sha bi dza ya pa ri shud+d+he/ a b+hi Shany+tsin+na mAM/ sar+b+ba ta thA ga NA
191b2(rgyud): su ga ta ba ra ba tsa na/ a mri ta aM b+hi Shi kau ra/ ma hA mu pra man+ta pa daM/ ai har A ha ra/ ma ma A mr-iHsan+d+ha ra Ni/ shi d+ha ya sho d+ha ya/ bi sho d+ha ya bi shau d+hama?/ 
191b3(rgyud): ga ga na swa b+hA ba bi shud d+ha/ uSh+NI Sha bi dz+wa la pa ri shud+d+he/ sa ha sra resmai sany+tso di te/ sar+b+ba ta thA ga tA a wa la ki ni ShaT+TA ra mi ta pa ri pU ra Ni/ sar+b+ba ta thA ga tA mA ta do sha b+hU mi pra/ 
191b4(rgyud): ts+tshi/ sarba ta thA ga tA hr-i da ya/ a d+hiSh+ThA na a d+hiSh+Tha ti/ mu de mu dre ma hA mu dr-i/ badz+ra kA ya sa ma hatabi ri shud+d+he/ sar+b+ba karma A ba ra Na bi shu d+d+ha/ 
191b5(rgyud): pra ti ni brta ya/ ma ma A yung bi shud+d+he/ saHta thA ga ta sa ma ya a d+hiSh+Than a d+hiSh+Thi taM/ ai mu ni mu ni/ ma hA mu ni/ bi mu ni bi mu ni/ ma hAH
191b6(rgyud): mu ni/ ma ti ma ti/ ma hA ma ti/ ma ma ti/ su ma ti/ ta thA ga/ b+hU tA koH/ pa ri shud+he/ bi s+phu Ta/ bud d+hi/ shud+ha/ he hAM/ dza ya dza ya/ bi rje ya bin
191b7(rgyud): ya/ sma ra smar/ s+pha ra s+pha ra/ s+pha ra ya s+phA ra ya/ sarba bud+d+ha d+hiSh+ThA na a d+hiSh+Tha te/ shud d+ha shud d+he/ bu d+hi bud+d+he/ badz+ra badz+ri/ ma hA badz+ra su badz+dza
191b8(rgyud): badz+ra gar+b+he/ dza ya bar+b+he/ bi dzi ya gad+d+hi/ badz+ra dz+wa lA gad+he/ badz+ra ud b+ha ba~M/ badz+ra saM b+ha be/ badz+ra badz+ri Ni/ badz+ram+b+ha ba tu/ ma ma~M sha rI ri sar+b+ba satwa nAny+tsa kA ya ba ri shuH
192a1(rgyud): d+hU ba tu/ sa dA me sar+b+bA ga ti pa ri shud+d+hish+tsa/ sar+b+ba ta thA ga tA sh+tsa mAM sa mA shA sa yan+tu/ bu d+h+ya brad+d+ha/ si d+h+ya si d+h+ya/ bo d+ha ya bo d+ha ya/ baM bo d+ha ma \u0f7f
192a2(rgyud): bo d+ha ya/ mo tsa ya mo tsa ya/ bi mo tsa ya bi mo tsa ya/ sho d+ha ya sho d+ha ya/ bi sho d+ha ya bi sho d+ha ya/ sa mAn+tan mo tsau ya mau tsa ya/ sa maun+ta ri smra ba ri shrid+d+he/ sar+b+ba ta thA na
192a3(rgyud): trahrid ya a d+hiSh+ThA na a d+hiSh+Thi te/ mu dra mu dre/ ma hA mu dre ma hA mu drA man+t+ra pa daMHswA hA/ rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gtsug tir rnam par rgyal ba'i gzungs
192a4(rgyud): 'di ni 'chi bdag chen po'i dbyug pa 'dzin pa ste/ dgra byed sdig 'joms par byed pa 'di grog 'amag zhan zhig la bris te/ mchod rten gyi nang du bzhag la/ 
192a5(rgyud): tu rgya che ba'i mchod pa ji ltar 'byor pas mchod de ba skor ba stong phrag brgya byas na mchog gi tshe dang blo rdzo ba sprin par byed par 'gyur ro// de ltar byas pas zhag bdun pa'i cha
192a6(rgyud): ni lo bdun thu bo// lo bdun po'i tshe ni lo bdun cu 'byo// de ltar mchog gi tshe 'thob cing dran pa dang ldan pa dang / nang med pa dang / skye ba dran par 'gyuraro// mchod rten la bzhugasol
192a7(rgyud): nas mgo la bcangs na nad kyis chen po las grol bar 'gyur ro// gos sam shing shun la gi wang gis rang gis ming dang btsas po'i gzungs bris te/ tsan dan gyi rang bzhi
192a8(rgyud): gyi mchod rten la bzhugasu gsol te/ rang khyim du bzhag la rgya che rab stong gis mchod pas mchod bang zla ba re re zhing brgya phrag brgyad kyis bzlas pa'i mchod pa'i cho ga byas na nas
192b1(rgyud): grol zhing tshe lo brgya thub par 'gyuraro// nad med na 'dam pa'i rang bzhin la yang bya'o// yang gos gtsang ma la sna tshogs rdo rje la gnas pa'i mchod rten bri sa la rdo rje phreng bas
192b2(rgyud): bskor bas rgyan pa nga'i nang du rang gi ming dang gzungs kyi tshig 'di gi wang gis bris la kham por kha sbyar gyi nang du bzhugasu gsol gsol la/ rang gi khyim du bzhag ste
192b3(rgyud): mchong ba rgya chen pos mchod pa byas na rtag tu srung bar 'gyur ro// gzhan yang cho ga ni/ sa la ma lhung ba'i lci bas maN+Dal gru bzhi byas la me tog dkar po bkram
192b4(rgyud): mtshams bzhir zhun mar gyi mar me bzhad bzhag la/ a ga ru dang du ru ka'i 'dug pa byas la de bzhin du dri yi chus gang ba'i snod me tog dkar pos rgyan te/ gzungs
192b5(rgyud): kyi snying po can gyi mchod rten nam sku gzugs dbu su bzhugasu gsol la/ del g.yon pa'i lag pas reg ste/ g.yas pa'i lag pas phreng ba 'dzin pa
192b6(rgyud): nyi ma re re zhing nyi shu rtsa gcig rtsa gcig dus gsum du bzlas pa byas la de'i chu khyor ba gsum 'thungs na nad med pa dang / cha ring ba dang / dag yongasu nyams pa dang / 'dzin
192b7(rgyud): zla rdzo ba dang / ngag btsun par btsun par 'gyuraro// skye ba nas skye bar skye ba dran par 'gyuraro// de'i chus khang pa dang / phyugs kyi ra ba pa 'am/ rta'i ra ba 'am/ rgyal po
192b8(rgyud): tu gtor na rkun mo dang / sprul dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po la sogs pa'i 'jigs pa mi 'byung zhing nad kyis yongasu gdungs par mi 'gyuraro// rago la gtor nan
193a1(rgyud): nga las grol bar 'gyur // nga ltar tshe dpag tu med pa'i phan yod chen po'i gzungs 'di gang dang gang du rab tu spyad dang dngang ru zhi ba chen por 'gyur/ 
193a2(rgyud): mo shing la lang nyi shu rtsa gcig yongasu bzlas te 'chos na nang mang ba dang / blo rdo ba dang / cha ring bar 'gyur ro// chu khyor ba gsum dus gsum du lan nyi shu rtsa tshag
193a3(rgyud): gcig yongasu bzlas te 'thungs nang thams cad las yongasu grol zhing yun ring du 'tsho bar 'gyuraro// gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan
193a4(rgyud): ras gzigs dbang phyug gis bcom ldan 'das tshe dang / ga tu med pa la bskor ba byas nas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mos mad
193a5(rgyud): rter gyi las ji ltar bgyi/ sku gzugs la sogs pa sgrub pa ji ltar bgyi/ 'dir sbyin sreg kyang ji ltar dgyi bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dri ba lags
193a6(rgyud): par smras pa ni/ dpa' bo chen po leg so legs// sems can kun la par brtse'i phyir// 'dir ni rtse gcig yid kyis nyor// de nas bcom ldan 'das kun tu 'ong dpag tu ma
193a7(rgyud): pa'i dpal zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin snyoms par bzhugs nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi tshe dpag tu med pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs 'di gsungs pa ni 'di lta ste/ yo mom
193a8(rgyud): taM/ a mi tod b+ha be/ ya mi ta bi krAn+te/ a mi ta bA tre/ a mi ta gA ma ni/ a mri ta A yu R+Sha ta/ ga ga na kIrti/ ka re sarba kle shak+Sha ye ka rI ye swA hA// zhes
193b1(rgyud): ba'i gzungs 'dis mchod rten byed pa'i 'jim pa blang ba dang / byug pa la sogs pa dang / gdugs gdags pa'i bar ji srid rdzogs par bya'o// 'di'i cho ga ni/ mchod rten chog
193b2(rgyud): mchog gyur pa// de nas yang dag bshad par bya// gser dang / in+d+ra nI la dang / dngul dang / pad+ma rag la sogs pa'i rang bzhin mang po'i rin po ches spras pa sor bcu ga
193b3(rgyud): kyi chang pid+ma'i steng na bzhugs pa/ de'i logs bzhir 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi lag rgyal mtshan bsnams pa'o// me tog dang / bdug pa dang / dri lag na bzung ba'i gnas
193b4(rgyud): gtsang mo'i lci'i bu rnams dang / lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya shin lag na gdugs thogs pa dang / g.yas dang g.yon gyi logs gnyis na spyan ras gzigs dang / 
193b5(rgyud): 'chang gnyis rnga yab dkar po phyag na bsnams pa bya de lta bu'i tsho gas mchod rten la g.yas bskod gyi spyo bas pad+ma'i 'dab ma la bri bar bya'o// de bzhin gsheg
193b6(rgyud): pa thams cad kyis gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs bris la/ de'i ring bsrel gyi snying po can du byas la dri zhim po dang bsres pa'i chu gtor zhing dri zhim po'im
193b7(rgyud): tog gis mchong ba stong phrag gcig gis mchod pa chen po byas te/ dkar po'i phyogs kyi tshes brgyad kyi nyin zhag la bsnyung bar gnas shing / sems can thams cad la @
193b8(rgyud): pa'i blos tshe bad+mo ster ba'i yom byin te stong phrag gcig bzlas par bya'o// zla ba re re zhing byas na zla ba drug gis tshe lo stong thub par 'gyuraro// rtag tu lo gcig tu bas mchel
194a1(rgyud): 'bum thub par 'gyuraro// rtag tu bas na tshe lo mi bzad pa thub cing stobs dang ldan pa dang / gang gis kyang mi thub cing lnga dang lha ma yin dang mi mnyam
194a2(rgyud): pa'i mkha' spyod kyi gtsug tor mchog tu 'gyur// de nas gzhan yang cho ga ni rab tu dge ba'i gnas sa blangs la/ dri zhim pos bsres la mchod rten la bya'o// stong phrag dag
194a3(rgyud): nas brtsams te ji srid lnga 'am gcig gi bar du'o// nyi ma re re zhing mchod rten du gtogs pa gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ba yang dag par bzhugasu gsol la/ ji skad gsus
194a4(rgyud): pa'i mchod ba rgya chen po byas la stong phrag gcig nas brtsams te/ lan bdun gyi bar du bklag par byal/ nyi ma rere zhing tshe dang blo gteng bar byed pa'i gzungs kyi
194a5(rgyud): tshang du byas te/ sems can thams cad la bun mongs du dge ba'i rtsa ba sbyin par bya'o// sems can rnams la bcing ba dang brdung ba la sogs pa spong bar bya'o// zla
194a6(rgyud): gzhan re re la mchod pa nyis 'gyur du byas la brgyad brgya'i bzlas pa byas po ni rang ngam rang dang 'dra bas bya'o// cho ga 'di yis ni dus ma yin par 'chi ba brgyad med par 'gyur/ 
194a7(rgyud): blo rdo ba dang / nang med pa dang / cha lo brgya thub cing 'gro ba thams cad kyi yid du 'ong ba dang / skye ba dran par 'gyur ro// gang gi tshe 'chi ba'i dus byas pa de'i tshe sprul shun pa
194a8(rgyud): brjes pa dang 'dra bar rang gi lus bor te/ mdzes pa'i lus bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khamasasu skye bar 'gyur// yang de ni dmyal ba dang / byol song gi skye gnas dang // 
194b1(rgyud): gshin rje'i 'jig rteran gyi ngan 'grong skye bar mi 'gyuraro// rna ba'i bu gar dpral ba'i sgra yang thos par mi 'gyur na 'bras bu smin par lta ga la 'gyur/ 'di rnams kyi gnasu / 
194b2(rgyud): ba med do// de ras bcom ldan 'das che dpag tu med pas gzhan yang sgrub pa'i thabs bka' stsal pa/ gang gis sems can cha dpag tu med par 'gyur ba dang nyam pa
194b3(rgyud): 'khor ba las grol bar byed pa ni gzhon nu mas bkal ba'i srung ba la chang dang ldan pa'i mdzes pa'i ras mkhas pas bya'o// de nas gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i
194b4(rgyud): gzugs tshon snga ma lus pas gzungs kyi yi ge lasra sprul pa'i mchod rjed gyi nang du bri bar bya'o// tshe dpag tu med pa 'od zer stong gi phreng ba can/ pad+ma dang zla ba'i gang la
194b5(rgyud): bzhugs pa/ ston ka'i zla ba lta bri'i 'od zer can/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ zhal gsum pa/ spyan gsum pa/ phyag brgyad pa/ g.yas pa'i zhal
194b6(rgyud): zhi ba gser gyi 'od zer dang ldan pa'o// g.yon pa ni mche bas ma mchu mngan pa mi bzad pa ud pa la sngon po'i 'od zer gyi 'od dang ldan pa'o// dbus nan sgeg pa dang bcas
194b7(rgyud): shing dkar ba'o// g.yas pa'i phyag gis snying khar sna tshogs rdo rje'o// de bzhin du pad+ma la gnas pa'i 'od dpag tu med pa dang / mda' dang / mchog sbyin pa'o// g.yon
194b8(rgyud): bsdigs 'jub dang bcas pa'i zhogs pa dang/ de bzhin du gzhu nga/ mi 'jigs pa dang bum pa'o// yang mgo bor mchod rted la gnas pa'i oM dang / mgrin par AHdang / 
195a1(rgyud): snying khar hU~M ngo // dpral bar dza // lte ba'i phyogasu hr-i'o// rkang pa ginyis la oM aHyi ge 'di rnams bkod la rAk+Sha sA hA dang bcas pa/ 'di'i nang phung
195a2(rgyud): gi ming spel ba'o// de'i logs gnyisu pad+ma dang rdo rje 'chang gnyis rnga yab dkar po phyag na bsnams pa bya'o// steng du bdud rtsi'i char gyi rgyun 'babs bzhin pa'i gnas gas
195a3(rgyud): mi'i lnga'i bu gnyis// logs bzhir khro bo mi g.yo ba dang / 'dong ba'i rgyal po dang / dbyug pa sngon po dang / stobs po che zhes bya ba ste/ ral gri dang / lcags kyu dang / dbyuH
195a4(rgyud): pa dang / rdo rje bsnams pa'o// g.yon pa gdug pa can 'jig pa'i sdigs mdzub cheng du byed pa'o// da lhar 'ab pas rdzogs par byas la ring bsrel dang bcas
195a5(rgyud): pa'i mchod rten la bsnyung bar gnas pas mchod pa chen bo stong phrag gcig gis mchod pa byas la 'bum phra ga gcig bzlas pa bya'o// de nas dkar po'i phyogs kyi chos
195a6(rgyud): gcig nas bzung ste/ dza srid bco lnga'i bar du stong stong bzlas par bya'o// de nas snga bar nam langs pa dang / bcom ldan 'das ma zhal ma bong bar 'gyur ro// de nas ji ltar dngos grub
195a7(rgyud): 'dod pa ster ro// yang na ni thang ka de dri zhim po dang / bsres pa'i chus byugs pa'i phyogs gcig tu yang dag par bzhug su gsol/ mchod pa rgya chen po byas te nyi ma re re zhing brgya
195a8(rgyud): brgya'i bzlas pa bya'o// yang zla ba re re la stong stong gi mchod pa byas shing stong stong gi bzlas pa byas na che dpag tu med pa dang / stobs dpag tu med pas gzhan gnon pa dang / 
195b1(rgyud): namakha' la 'gro ba med pa dang / nang chen po med par bye'o// sems can zad kyis nyi ma re re zhing tshigs bcad stong 'dzin pa'i phyin ci ma log pa'i ngag tu 'gyuraro// yang mkha gcig gis de lta
195b2(rgyud): bu byed par mi nus na de yis rang gi khyim du dri zhim po dang bsres pa'i sa'i chang bzhugasu gsol la/ ji ltar 'byor pa'i mchod pa byas la zla ba 'ang cag gi ches brgyad la brgyad brgya
195b3(rgyud): bzlas pa bya zhing / nyi ma re re ba la dus gsum du nyi shu rtsa gcig rtsa gcig brjod na blo rno ba dang / tshe ring ba dang / shes rab dang ldan pa dang / nad med pa dang / skyid pa dang / lo brgya 'tsho
195b4(rgyud): ba dang / skye ba dran par 'gyur ro// yang na rang gis ma nus nade'i tshe rang dang 'dra bas byas mtshe ring ba dang blo rno bar 'gyur ro// de nas gzhan yang sbyin sreg gi cho gas ni bang la phan pa'i phyir
195b5(rgyud): nye bar bshad par bya ste/ khru gang gi tshad kyis bab khung zlum po rdo rje phreng bas rgyan pa/ car ngan dkar po 'am sa dkar gyis byugs la me tog dkar po bkram
195b6(rgyud): swA/ logs bzhor zhun mar gyi mar me bzhi bzhag la bdug spos la sogs pas yang dag par mchod la/ phyog sa bzhir mtshan nyid dang ldan pa'i bum pa rab tu mdzes pa
195b7(rgyud): gos dkar po g.yogs la yal gas kha rgyan pa bzhi bzhag par bya'o// 'o ma can gyi ya ma shing la me s+phar la mo lha bkug la/ dgang blugs gsum byin la bsang gtor byas
195b8(rgyud): te gshegasu gsol// de nas tshe dpag tu med pa gsal por bab khung gi dbusu bsams la/ gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ba bzlas shing dgang blugs gsum dbul// yan
196a1(rgyud): oM a mri ta A yu R+Sha swA hA/ zhes bya bas tshe dang blo rdo ba dang bcas pas brgyad brgya dus gsum du sbyin bsreg bya'o// gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ba la
196a2(rgyud): bdun du bzlas pa byas na tshe ring ba dang / blo rdo ba dang / snying po dang / nang med par 'gyuraro// yang na zla ba ro ra'i dkar po'i phyogs kyi tshes brgyad la mchod pa rgya chen po byas la du
196a3(rgyud): gsum du tshe lo stong thub par 'dod pas sbyin sreg byas ni mchog gi tshe ring ba dang / blo rno ba sbyin par byed do// sems can rnams la smad par mi bya'o// cho ga 'dis rang gi lus nad kyis
196a4(rgyud): gos par mi 'gyur zhing lo brgya lnga bcu 'tsho ba dang / dgra/ las rnam par rgyal ba dang / blo rno bar 'gyuraro// dbyangs snyan par 'gyur ro// gal te rang gis ma nus na de'i tshe rang dang 'dra
196a5(rgyud): bas byas na zhi ba chen por 'gyuraro// de nas gzhan yang sgrub par 'dod na gtsug tor gyi rgyal po chen po cher nga blo rno ba dang bcas pas 'bum phrag gcig sbyin sras
196a6(rgyud): byas te/ dang po mthar stong steng gi mchod pa byas la 'bum phrag gcig bzlas pa byas na che lo 'bum phrag gcig thub par 'gyuraro// bye ba byas dbye ba thu'o// nga ltar 'di
196a7(rgyud): ga'i rim pas che lo dpag tu med par 'gyur zhing na mkha' la 'gro ba dang / dpa' ba dang / dgu las rgyal bar 'gyur ro// dpal 'dod na 'bum phrag gcig sbyin sreg byas na dpal che
196a8(rgyud): po thob par 'gyuraro// rgyal po 'dod na pad+ma 'bum phrag gcig sbyid sreg byas na rgyal po chen po thobo par 'gyuraro// bye ba gcig byas na'akhor lo bsgyur ba thob par 'gyur ro// 
196b1(rgyud): yang na ral gri la sogs pa sgrub par 'dod na ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i mchod rten gyi mdun du'ang sku bkram la stong gi mchod pa chen pos mchod la/ bzlas pa 'bum byas la ya
196b2(rgyud): na lcags lnga'i rang bzhin gyis ral gri la bzlas pa 'bum byas te/ lag pa g.yas par bcangs ni yid kyis 'gro ba dang / 'dod pa'i gzugs 'dzin pa dang / stobs che zhing
196b3(rgyud): gzhan gnon pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi gcig tu 'dren pa por gyur nas sman pa chen po'i mchog tshe dpag tu med par 'gyuraro// de ltar rdo rje dang / 'khor lo dang / rtse gsu
196b4(rgyud): la sogs pa yang bsgrub par bya'o// de ltar phan yod dpag tu med pa'i gzungs chen mo de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying por gyur pa mchog tu rnyed par dga' ba 'di ji
196b5(rgyud): lha ji ltar sbyar ba de lta de ltar las grub par byed// gang yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gtsug/ tor rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs 'di nyi ma
196b6(rgyud): dus gsum du lan nyi shu rtsa bcig bzlas pa bya zhing mchod rten chen po byas te yang dag par bcangs la gzhar yang rgya cher gsal bar byas nang skying pa 'thob cing stobs pa
196b7(rgyud): ldan pa dang / nad med pa dang / lo brgya thub pa dang / blo rno ba dang / skye ba drin par 'gyuraro// gang gi tshe 'chi ba'i dus byeng ba de'i tshe sbrul shun pa rjes pa dang 'dra ba rang gi lus bor
196b8(rgyud): te/ bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi kham su skye bar 'gyuraro// dmyal ba'i sgran bug tu yang thos par mi 'gyur na 'bras bu smin par lta go la 'gyur/ gang dag gang du skyes pade dang
197a1(rgyud): skye ba drang par 'gyuraro// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dag dang / lha dang mi dang / lha ma yin da/ 
197a2(rgyud): dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod // // de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gtsug tor rnam par
197a3(rgyud): rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs rtog pa dang bcas pa rdzogaso// / rgya gar skad du/ A d+ya sar+b+ba durga ti pa r-i sho d+ha ni uny+dzi Sha bi dzi ya nA ma d+hA ra NI bod skad du/ 'a
197a4(rgyud): ba ngan 'grong thams cad mongasu sbyong ba gtsug torarnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ sangs rgyas pa byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshale// 
197a5(rgyud): nas lcing bu shin tu brtan pa zhes bya ba zhig sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams kyi nang chos bzang lha'i mdungs na gnas te/ lha'i gzhal yas khang chen po na lci'i
197a6(rgyud): spyod chen po dang / lci bu mo'i tshogs chen pos bsnod ras rtse dga' mgur spyod de/ nga lha'i long spyod myong ba las mtshan mo smra zhig thos pa/ lha'i bu shin tu brtan pa zhag
197a7(rgyud): bdun gyi nyid per 'chi ba'i dus byed de/ je 'chi ba'i dus byas nas kyang 'dza mo bu'i gling du skyes te/ dang yang 'gro ba bdun pa myong bar 'gyur// 'gro ba bdun pa myong nas son
197a8(rgyud): dmyal bar skye bar 'gyuraro// brgya la nam zhig mir skyes par gyur na yang der dbul por 'gyur zhing dmus long du 'gyur zhes nges paso// de nas lha'i bu ngas sgra de tsas
197b1(rgyud): nas 'jigs smug sngangs te spu zing zhes byed par gyur nas ngas rings pa rings par lha'i dbang po brgyu byinag la ba der song ste/ de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyi rkang pa la bya
197b2(rgyud): 'tshe lo// brtabs par smra zhing de kyi hud kyi hud ces smra sngags 'don bzhin du/ lce'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces smraso// lha'i dbang po gsan du gsol// lha
197b3(rgyud): po bdag dang lha'i bu mo'i tshigs kyis bskor te/ lha'i longs spyod kyi dga' bas rtse gzhi dbang ba myong ba las smra zhig bos pa/ lci'i bu shin tu brtan pa zhag bdud na'i che ba'i
197b4(rgyud): dus byed par 'gyur te/ 'dzam+bu'i gling du skye bar 'gyur ra ro// der yang 'gro ba bdun myong nas sems can dmyal bar skye bar 'gyur ro// brgya la nam zhig mir skyes par gyur na yang dar
197b5(rgyud): da dbul por 'gyur zhing dmus long du 'gyur zhes thos na/ lha'i dbang po de la bdag gis ji ltar sgrub bar bgyi// nga ras lcil dbang po brgya byin gyis lha'i bu
197b6(rgyud): shing tu brtan po'i tshig nga thos nas shin tu ngo mtshar du 'dzin par 'gyur te/ lha'i bu 'dis 'gro ba bdun po gang dag myong bar 'gyur snyam du sems shing cang mi smra bar 'dug
197b7(rgyud): pa dang / 'gro ba bdun ni phag gi skye gnas dang / khyi dang / wa dang / spreru dang / sbrul gdug pa dang / bya rgod dang / bya khri ste/ 'gro ba bdun po dadag shin tu mi gtsang ba zab
197b8(rgyud): bar 'gyur ba mthong // de ras lho'i dbang po brgya byin gyis 'gro ba bdun po de dag mthong nas/ 'di snyam du e ma lta'i bu 'di sdug bsngal mi bzad pa chen po myong bar 'gyur na/ 
198a1(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ma gtogs par de'i skyabs dang / brten dang / dpung gnyen du 'gyur ba su
198a2(rgyud): yod snyam du bsam so// de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byir nub mo de'i srong la spos dang / me tog dang / bdug pa sna tshogs dang / gos dang / rgyan sna tshogs la sogs pa khyes
198a3(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyir ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te lan bdun bskor ba byas te/ bac+doMs kyi spyan sngar 'dug nas
198a4(rgyud): lha'i bu shin tu brtan pa'i 'gro ba bdun po dag bcom ldan 'das la zhib tu gsol to// lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis 'gro ba de dag gas lam ngag tu de nas bcom ldan
198a5(rgyud): 'das kyis gtsug tor nas 'od zer sna tshogs byung ste nges phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi gnas thams cad kun nas sdang bar byas te slar log
198a6(rgyud): nas bac+doMs kyi zhal gyi sgor zhug so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dzum pa mdzad nas lci'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// lha'i dbang po gtsug
198a7(rgyud): rnam par rgyal bu zhes bya ba'i gzungs de bzhin gshegs pas spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba/ ngan 'gro thams cad yongasu sbyong ba/ sgrib pa dang / sdug bsngal bar skye ba bams
198a8(rgyud): cang 'jigs par byed po/ sen dmyal ba dang / byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten thams cad yongasu sbyang ba/ bde 'gro'i lam du 'jog pa yod do/ lha'i
198b1(rgyud): po de lta bas na gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i gzus ngan 'og thams cad yongasu spyong ba pos ma thag tu bsgrib par 'gyur ba'i sdug bsngal gyi rang bzhin sna tshogs shin tu mang
198b2(rgyud): 'jigs par byed de// skye ba yongasu dag pa'i rgyud thob par 'gyu ro// tshe rabs bang du yang cha rabs dran par 'gyur// sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro bar 'gyur/ 
198b3(rgyud): lha'i 'jig rten nas lho'i 'jig rten du 'gro bar 'gyur te/ lha'i gnas sum cu rtsa gnyis kyi bar du 'gro bar 'gyur// lha'i dbang po de brjod ma thag tu cha zad pa yang che phyir nur pa
198b4(rgyud): 'gyur ba'i las thob par 'gyur// lus dang ngag dang yid kyi las yongasu dag pa bsags pa bde bar reg pa la gnas pas gnas par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs
198b5(rgyud): pa thams cad kyang de la gzig so// de dag de la rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par srung ba dang / bsgrub pa dang / smra bar maHnga bar 'gyu ro// byang chub sa de thad kyang de la sems
198b6(rgyud): bar 'gyur// brjod pa tsam gyis sen dmyal ba dang / dud 'gror skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten dang / yi dgas kyi yul thams cad snyoms par 'gyur/ rnam par 'jigs
198b7(rgyud): par 'gyur/ rdzar 'thob par 'gyur/ rnam por sel bar 'gyur/ snyings par 'gyuraro// de ltar de la sangs rgyas kyi zhing khrims cad dang / lha'i gnas thams cad dang / byang chub se de'i ga
198b8(rgyud): khams cang kyi sgo rnams bye bar 'gyur// de gang 'dod pa dang 'jug par 'gyuraro// nga nas bcom ldan 'das la lha'i dbang po brgya sbyin gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'as
199a1(rgyud): gzungs de bka' stsal du gsol// sen tha~Md kyi srog la sman gdags par bshad du gsol// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis gsol
199a2(rgyud): bab pa pa mkhyen nas gzungs 'di dag bka' stsal to// oM na po b+ha ga ba te sar+b+ba trai lo kyo pra bi bi shiSh+Na ya prad+hA ya te na maHdad+ya ba e b+h+rUM b+hU b+h+re/ sho d+ha ya sho d+ha ya~M/ bi sho d+ha ya
199a3(rgyud): sho d+ha ya/ a sim sa man+ta a ba b+hA sa s+pha raNad ti/ ga ga na swa b+hA ba bi shud+d+he/ a bi Shany+tsi tsU me/ sar+b+ba ta thA ga tAHsu ga ta ba ra ba tsan/ oM mr-i ta a b+hi Shi ke ra/ mahA mu dra/ mahA ba paM
199a4(rgyud): A ha ra A hang/ ma ma A yuHsan d+hA ra Ni/ sho d+ha ya sho d+ha ya/ bi sho d+ha ya bi sho d+ha ya/ ga ga na swa b+hA ba bi shud+d+he/ uSh+NI Sha bi dza ya pa ri shud+d+he/ sa ta sra rasmi si tse di ta/ sar+tha
199a5(rgyud): khA ga ta a ba lo ka ni/ ShaTAr mai tA pa rau pU ra Ni/ sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta mA Thang sha b+hU mi pra tiSh+Tha te/ sar+b+bAta bA rA tA hr-i ya a d+hiSh+ThA na a d+hiSh+Tha ti/ nA m+bu bu da maH
199a6(rgyud): 6/ badz+ra kA sa sa san/ ri shud+d+he/ sar+b+bA rma mA paraHshred+d+ha/ pra ta nI brta ya/ ma ma~M A lung ze shwed+d+he/ sarba tA thA ga tA sa ma me maHSh+Tha na ma d+hiny+dziti/ mi
199a7(rgyud): dA/  rbu ni/ bi mun rdzun/ ma hA bi mu/ ma tam ti/ mahA ma tAM/ ma ma ti/ su ma ti/ ta thA ge t+t+ra/ b+hUta kaM Di pa shred+d+he/ bi sUT/ shud+d+he shud+d+ha/ 
199a8(rgyud): dzadza ya Ni rdzi ma/ sma ra s+pha re/ swar swa pa sA ya sAr ya/ sar+b+ba pra d+hi ma d+hi wAn/ sa d+hony+dzi ti/ d+d+he shud+d+he/ bud+d+hA prad+d+ha/ badz+ra badz+ra/ ma hA badz+ra/ su badz+re/ badz+ra ga d+hi/ dza ya gang+gA/ 
199b1(rgyud): ya bad+he/ badz+radz+wa lA ga r+b+he/ badz+ra ung b+ha'o/ badz+ra saM b+hA be/ badz+re brdzun/ badz+ram+b+ha ba tu/ ma ma shi rI ra sarba satrA nA kA ya pa ri shud+d+hi b+ha ba d+ha/ sa dA me sar+b+ba ga ti pa ri shud d+hi sh+tsa/ sar+b+bak+Sha
199b2(rgyud): ga tA shra mAM sa ma shwa sa yan+tu/ bud+d+he bud+d+he/ sid+d+hi sid+d+ha/ bo d+ha ya bo d+ha ya/ bi bo d+ha ya bi bo d+ha ya/ mo tsa ya mo tsa ya/ bi mo tsa ya bi mo tsa ya/ sho d+ha ya sho d+ha ya/ bi sho d+ha yA
199b3(rgyud): sho d+ha ya/ sa man+ta/ mo tsas mo tsa ya/ sa man+ta rasmai ba ri shud+d+he/ sar+b+ba ta thA ga tA hrid ya a d+hiSh+ThA ra a d+hiny+dzi naM/ mu dra mu dra/ ma hA mu dre ma hA mu drA man+t+ra pa de/ swAhA// lI
199b4(rgyud): gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs ngan 'gro thams cad sbyong ba/ sdig pa dang / las dang / swA ba thams cad rnam par spyod pa/ bde 'gro'i lam pa
199b5(rgyud): du 'gro ba dang ngan 'gro thams cad rnam par 'jig par byed pa 'di 'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang+gA klung bum phrag bye ba phrag brgyad cu rtsa brgyad kyi bye ma sna
199b6(rgyud): ngag gis gsungs pa/ byin gyis brlabs pa/ rje su yo rang bar mdzad pa// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi phyag rgyas bab pa ste/ son ba bde 'greng 'gro ba
199b7(rgyud): ba dang / ngad 'gror lhung ba rnams bzlog pa dang / sen dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten la sogs pa/ sdug bsngal gyi gnas thams cad du
199b8(rgyud): bsdug bsngal zhing nyam nga bar gyur pa rnams dang / sdug bsngal gyi rgya mcher lhung ba'i sems can rnams rnam par grol bar bya ba'i phyir gsungs pa'o// de bzhin du seMn tshe ba
200a1(rgyud): skal ba chung ba dang / sman pa dang / bsam pa nyams pa dang / sems can lam las 'ams pa rnams kyi don du gzungs 'di 'dzam+bu'i gling du gzhago// lha'i dbang
200a2(rgyud): po khod kyis gzungs 'di zung la lha'i bu shin tu brtan pa la sgrogs shig bsgrags nas kyang gdon pa dang / kha ton du bya ba dang / bsam pa dang / sgom pa dang / dran par bya ba dang / 
200a3(rgyud): mchod pa dang / kun chub par bya ba de spyod bar bgyis shig dang / de ltar lha'i gnas thams cad na 'khong pa'i lha'i bu rnams dang / 'dze m+bu'i gling po'i sems can rnams kyi don dang / 
200a4(rgyud): phan pa dang / bde ba'i phyir gzungs kyi phyag rgya dang / gas pang sngags 'di dag khong la gtang ngo // de'i phyir lha'i dbang po khyod kyis gzung bar bya'o// lha'i dbang po gzungs 'ang
200a5(rgyud): bos ma bag tu bskal pa brgya stong du bsags pa'i las kyi sgrib pa yongasu byang bar 'gyuraro// skye bar smra ba rnam pa sna tshogs sems can dmyal ba dang / dung 'gro
200a6(rgyud): skye gnas dang / gshing rje'i 'jig rten dang / yi dgas kyi yul dang / lA ma yon gyi ris dang / 'ang lci ste/ gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / 'byung po dang / sha za dang / srul po
200a7(rgyud): lus srul po dang / khI dang / ru sbal dang / sbru la dang / gcan zan khro bo dang / bya dang / brang bu dang / sbrang ma dang / sdig sbrul dang / grogs sbur la sogs pa'i srog chags kyi rigasu
200a8(rgyud): byos mo skye bar shes par bya'o// gzhan du na de bzhin gshegs pa dang phrad pa dang / byang chub se da'i rigasu skye ba ni ma gtogaso//  rigs chen po 'di lta ste/ bram ze'i rigs shing
200b1(rgyud): la chen po 'di lta bu 'am/ rgyal rigs shing sa la chen po lta bu 'am/ tshong dpen gyi rigs shing sa la chen po lta bur smre'o zhes nga smra'o// lha'i dbang po de ltar na gzungs 'di'i mthu
200b2(rgyud): byang chub kyi snying po la mabar thug gi bar du skye ba yong su dag pa chen po 'thob sa/ lnga'i dbang po gzungs 'dzini da ltar mo mu cheste/ lha'i dbang po gzungs 'dzi ning lung mthucu
200b3(rgyud): phar yi cheg/ mthu spobs che ba/ dge zhing shes pa yin te/ lha'i dbang po sems can rnams rgya ngon gyi phyir gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs ngan 'gro bams ca
200b4(rgyud): yongasu spyong ba 'di bzhago// 'di lta ste dper na/ nor ba rin po che nyi ma'i snying po shin tu dri ma med pa nam khar yongasu dag pa 'od gsal ba ni 'od zer gyi snang bas 'bar zhing
200b5(rgyud): 'dug/ lha'i dbang po de bzhin du sems can de yang dgos pa mang par shes par bya'o// 'di lta ste dper na/ dzam+bu'i chu bo'i gser mi dri ma med pa/ shin tu yongasu
200b6(rgyud): dag pa/ shin tu mnyen pa/ shin tu sdug pa'o// lha'i dbang po de bzhin du sem de yang shin tu yongasu dag par rig par bya ste/ cha rabs gzhan du yang de bzhin du skye bar
200b7(rgyud): lha'i dbang pos gang na gzungs 'di rab tu ston pa dang / bye brag rngun yi ger 'drir 'jug pa dang / 'dzin pa dang / klog pa dang / gdon pa dang / kha ton du byed pa dang / mchod pa dang / 
200b8(rgyud): nga chub par byed pa dang / nyan pa dang / 'dzin par 'gyur ba der 'gro ba thams cad yong su dag par 'gyur/ sems can dmyal ba thang rgyun chad bar 'gyuraro// lha'i dbang po gzungs
201a1(rgyud): 'di yi ger bris te rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo bzhag par bya/ ri mthon po 'am/ khang pa mthon po 'am/ mchod rten gyi srog shing gi steng du bzhag par bya'o// lha'i dab
201a2(rgyud): dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am// to// dge bsnyen ma 'am/ de las gzhan pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang gis rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mor bdag pa mthong ngam/ dadang
201a3(rgyud): nye bar gnas par gyur na/ ba na de'i grims phog gam/ de'i rdul rlung gis btab pas phog na yang lha'i dbang po sems can de la sdig pa thams cad dang ngan 'gror 'gro ba'i 'jig
201a4(rgyud): pa thams cad mo 'byung // seMn dmyal ba dang / du 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gi shan rje'i 'jog rten dang / yi dgas dang / lha ma yin gyi ris thams cad du ma
201a5(rgyud): bar 'gyuraro// lha'i dbang po sems can dan de bzhi/ gshegs pa thams cad kyis lung bstan cing / bla na/ med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las
201a6(rgyud): mi ldog par rig par bya'o// lha'i dbang po mchod pa dang / rim gro byed cing me tog dang / bdug dang / spos dang / me tog phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / gdug dong / rgyal mtshan
201a7(rgyud): dang / bai dAn dang / rgyan rnams kyis brgyan par byed pa dang / lam bzhi mdor mchod rten byas te/ gzungs 'di bzhag pa la phal mo sbyor ba 'am// phyag 'tshal ba 'am bsku
201a8(rgyud): babyed pa lta co smos te/ lha'i dbang po sen de ni sems can chen por rig par bya'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sra su rig par bya'o// chos kyi gan su rig par bya'o// de bzhin
201b1(rgyud): ba'i mchod rten du rig par bya'o// de nas chos kyi rgyal po gshin rje nub mo nam langs nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste/ bcom ldan 'das la lha'i me tog dang / 
201b2(rgyud): gos dang / rgyan la sogs pas/ mchod pa dang / sti stang byas nas/ des bcom ldan 'das la lan bdun bskor ba byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la gtugs nas
201b3(rgyud): 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gzungs 'di ni mthu che zhing phan yon che ba lags te/ bcom ldan 'das bdag kyang rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par san de'i slad du
201b4(rgyud): bzhin du 'brang zhing kun tu srung ba dang / yongasu bskyab pa'i slad du gnas par bgyi'o// san dmyal ba bde las de bzlog par bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das bdag ni byas pa
201b5(rgyud): gzo bar bgyid cing / byas pa mi gzo bar mi bgyi do// dzaM nas rgyal po chen po bzhis bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te/ bcom ldan 'das
201b6(rgyud): la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gzungs 'di'i tshig zhib mo dang / dgye ba'i cho ga'i tshul rgyas par bshad du gsol// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyas
201b7(rgyud): po chen po bzhi po dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// nyon cig dang gzungs 'di'i bya ba'i tshul bshad par bya'o// sems can che thung ba'i don gyi phyir rigs kyi bu 'am/ 
201b8(rgyud): rigs kyi bu mos tshes bco lnga'i zla ba nyal khrus byas te lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas na nges sen tshe zad pa de'i tshe phyir nung nas nang thams cad dang bral bar 'gyuraro// 
202a1(rgyud): pa thams cad rnam par dag pa thob par 'gyuraro// sems can dmyal ba la sogs pa ngan 'gro thams cad las yongasu bar bar 'gyuraro// bam dung 'gro'i skye gnas song
202a2(rgyud): srog chags bya'i rna lam du gzungs 'di'i smra bsgrags par bya ste/ nges ni ngo'i ngan 'gro'i tha ma yin par rig por bya'o// gang zhig rang chen pos btang ste sman pa thams cad kyi bye brag phye ba de
202a3(rgyud): yang nga du los yongasu thar bar 'gyuraro// de 'i ngan 'greng skyes pa thams cad kyang rgyur chang bar 'gyuraro// shi 'phos nas kyang 'jig rten gyi khams bde bcan du skye bar 'gyu ro// de nyid dang
202a4(rgyud): gyi gnas pa ma yin par rig par bya'o// gang dang gang du skyes pa de dang ngar pad+ma'i snying po kho na las brdzus te skye bar 'gyuro// tshe rabs thams cad du yang tshe rabs dran par
202a5(rgyud): 'gyuraro// sems can sdig pa byed pa gang dag nadus byas pa de dgra gi don du gzungs yungs kar dang/ la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig yongasu brjod de// de dag gi
202a6(rgyud): rus gong rnams kyi steng du gtor na de dag dmyal ba 'am/ dud 'gro'i skye gnas sam/ gi shan rje'i 'jig rten nam/ yi dwags sam/ de las gzhan ngan 'gro rnamasu skyes par gyu
202a7(rgyud): kyang rung ste/ de dag gzungs 'di'i mthus ngan 'gro de dag las thar par 'gyuraro// de dag las thar nas kyang lhar skye bar 'gyur ro// su zhig 'di nyin gcag bzhin du lan nyi shu rtsa ra
202a8(rgyud): yongaso brjod pa de 'jig rten mang po'i mchod pa'i 'osu 'gyuraro// tshe ring bar 'gyuraro// bde ba myong bar 'gyuraro// rtag tu spro ba dang ldan pa dang / mya ngan las 'das pa chen po thob par
202b1(rgyud): 'gyur ro// shi 'phos nas kyang 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur// de nas kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing tha dad pa sna tshog su 'gro bar 'gyuraro// dang yang de bzhin gshegs
202b2(rgyud): pa thams cad dang phrad par 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis kyang dbugs 'byin par 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis lung son par 'gyur
202b3(rgyud): sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du yang 'jig rten la snang bar byed par 'gyuraro// lha'i dbang po thabs 'dis ni 'gro ba thams cad kyang sems can dmyal ba la sogs pa'i 'gro ba
202b4(rgyud): thams cad las yongasu thar par 'gyuraro// de dag gi 'gro thams cad kyang yong su dag cing tshe ring bar yang 'gyur ro// lha'i dbang po song la lha'i bu glo gros shin tu
202b5(rgyud): brtan pa la gzungs 'od rje su stong la sgrogs shig/ lha'i dbang po des na zhag bdun na lha'i bu shin tu brtan pa'i 'gro ba thams cad yongasu dag cing tshe ring ba
202b6(rgyud): 'gyuraro// stobs che bar 'gyuraro// de ras lnga'i dbang po brgya byin gyis de bzhin gshegs pa las rjesu bstan pa 'di blangs te/ de'i gnasu phyin nas lha'i bu shin tu brtan pa
202b7(rgyud): la gzungs 'di byin no// de nas lha'i bu nges nyi ma bdun pa'i bar du nyin drug mtshan drug cu gzungs 'di la brtson par byas pa na de'i bsam pa thams cad phun sum tshogs pa 'di lta
202b8(rgyud): ste/ ngan 'gro las ni yongasu thar/ bde 'gro'i lam la yang dag gnas/ tshe ring bar yang gyur nas/ a la la sangs rgyas/ a la la chos/ a la la gzungs 'di lta bu 'jig+sam/ 
203a1(rgyud): du byung ste/ nges bdag 'jigs pa chen po las yongasu thar par gyur to// zhes cheng du brjod pa ched du brjod // 'phags pa ngan 'gro bams cad yongasu spong
203a2(rgyud): gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogaso// / rgya ga gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang / su re tsA bo d+hi dang / zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ba dang ye shes sdes bsgyu
203a3(rgyud): cing zhus te gtan la phab pa// rgya gar skad du/ sarba ta thA ga ta uSh+NI Sha bi dza yA nA ma d+ha ra NI kalpa hi ti/ bod skad du/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gtsug to
203a4(rgyud): rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs rtog pa dang bcas pa/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tsha lo// 'di skad bdag gis bos pa dus gis
203a5(rgyud): na/ bcom ldan 'das che dpag tu med pa de bzhin ga shegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sa ngas rgyas bde ba can gyi chos yang dag par sdud pa
203a6(rgyud): phug khang bzang mchog na nye bar bzhug so// byang chub songal sa 'a chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu sdug bsngal ba nid kyis
203a7(rgyud): gzer ba tshe zhu ba yod do// de rnams kyi phyir 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor la nye bar gzigs te kun tu gzigs pa'i dpal gyi mtshan nga bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gtsug
203a8(rgyud): tor rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs 'di bcang ba dang / klag pa dang / gzhan la rgya cher yang dag par ston pa ni tshe ring bar sgrub par byed pa'i cheng du'o// de nas byang chub sa nga
203b1(rgyud): chen po 'phags pa spyad ras gzigs bang phyug stan las langs te thal mo sbyar bar gyur pas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bstan du/ 
203b2(rgyud): gsol// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gtsug tong rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs bde bar gshegs pas bstan du gsol// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'a
203b3(rgyud): ldan pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor la gzigs te/ kun tu gzigs pa'i dpral zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa zed kyi gtsug tor
203b4(rgyud): rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs 'di bka' stsal / sar+b+ba trai lo kya pra ti bi shiSh+Na ya bud+d+hA ya/ oM b+h+rUM b+hU b+hU/ sho d+ha ya sho d+ha ya/ bi sho d+ha ya bi sho d+ha ya/ a sa ma sats+tsha
203b5(rgyud): a ba b+ha sa s+pha ra Na ga ti/ ga ga na sa b+hA ba bi shud+d+he/ a b+hiShiny+dzan+tu mAM/ sar+b+ba ta thA ga tA suM ga ta ba ra ba tsa na~M/ am+bi ta a b+hi She kai ra/ ma hA mu dra man+ta pa daM/ A har AH
203b6(rgyud): ma ma AM yuHsarba d+hA ra Ni/ sho d+ha ye sho d+ha ya/ bi sho d+ha ya bi shaM d+ha ya/ ga ga na swa b+hA ba br-i shud+d+he/ uSh+NI 'bi dza ya pa ri shud+d+he/ sa hA swa rasmai saM tsau ngi te/ sar+b+ba ta thA ga
203b7(rgyud): ta a wa lo ki mi/ wA ra mi tA pa ri pU ra Ni/ san+na ta thA ga ta mA te/ nga sha b+hU pi pra tiSh+Tha te/ sar+b+ba ta thA ga te hri ya a d+hiSh+ThA ra/ a d+hISh+Ti te/ mr-i dwe mu dre/ ma hA pu dr-i/ ba
203b8(rgyud): kA ya se ha ta na/ pa ri shud d+hi/ sar+b+be karma A wa ra Na baM shud+d+ha/ pra ti ni bar+d+ha ya/ ma ma a yur bi shud+d+he/ sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta sa ma ya a d+hiSh+Thi na a d+hiSh+Thi te/ oM mu na mu ma \u0f7f
204a1(rgyud): mu ni/ bi mu ni bi mu ni/ ma hA bi mu mi ma ti ma ti/ ma hA ma ti/ ma ma ti/ su ma ti/ tad+ya thA tA b+hU ta ko gI ba ri shud+d+he/ bi s+phu Ta/ bungad d+hi shrad+d+ha/ he he/ dza ya dza yaH
204a2(rgyud): dza ya bi dza ya/ sma ra sma ra/ s+pha ra s+pha ra/ s+pha ra ya sA ra ya/ sar+b+ba bud+ha sa d+hiSh+ThA na a d+hiSh+Thi te/ shud+d+he shud+d+he/ prad+d+he bud+d+ho/ badz+re badz+re/ ma hA badz+ri/ su badz+re/ badz+ra gan+d+he/ dza ya gar+b+he/ bi dza
204a3(rgyud): gar+b+he/ badz+ra dz+wA lA gan+d+he/ badz+ra ud b+ha be/ badz+ra saM b+ha ge badz+ri badz+rI Na~M/ badz+ram+me ba shra ma ma sha rI re sar+b+ba satwA nAny+dzi kA ya ba ri shud+d+hir+m+ma ba tu/ sa dA me sar+b+ba ga ti pa ri shud d+ha~M sh+tsaHsa/ 
204a4(rgyud): ta thA ga tA lA mA sa ma shA sa ya nu bu d+h+ya pra d+h+ya/ sid+d+hasid+h+ya bo d+ha ya ba~M d+ha ya/ bi bo d+ha ya bi bo d+ha ye/ mo tsa ya mo tsa ya/ bi mo tsa ya bo mo tsa ya/ sho d+ha ya sho d+ha ya/ 
204a5(rgyud): sho d+ha ya ba~M sho d+ha ya/ sa man+ta tA mo tsa ya ma tsa yaman+ta smai pa ri shud d+ha/ sar+b+ba ta thA ga tA hri ya ad+hi b+hU na sa d+hiSh+Thi ti/ mu dra mu dze/ mahA mu dr-i ma hA mu drA
204a6(rgyud): man+ta pa deHswA hA// 'phags pa gtsug tong rjer rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzog s+ho// // lha'i dbang po gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya bar gzungs ji
204a7(rgyud): ni ngang 'gro thams cad yongasu sbyong ba/ sdig pa'i las kyi sgrib pa pade rnam par sbyong ba/ bang 'gro'i le ru 'gro ba/ ngan 'gro thams cad rnam par 'jigs par byed pa 'di ni sangs/ 
204a8(rgyud): gang+gA'i klung 'bum phrag bye ba brgyad cu rtsa brgyad kyi bye ma srid kyis gsungs pa/ byin gyis brlabs pa/ rje su yi rang bar mdzad pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ma
204b1(rgyud): kyi phyag rgyas btab pa ste/ sems can thams cad bde 'gror 'gro bar bya ba dang / ngan 'gror lhung ba rnams bzlog pa dang / sen dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshin rje/ 
204b2(rgyud): 'jig rten la sogs pa sdug bsngal gyi gnas thams cad du sdug bsngal zhing nyam ngo bar gyur pa rnams dang / sdug bsngal gyi rgya mtshor lhung ba'i sems can rnams rnam par
204b3(rgyud): grol bar bya ba'i phyir gsungs pa'o// nga bzhin du sems can che thung zhing bskal ba chung ba smad pa dang / rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i skye bor lhung ba rnams dang / bsam pa nyams pa
204b4(rgyud): dang / sems can la las nyams pa rnams kyi don du gzungs 'di 'jam+bu'i gling du sems can rnams la ga/ zungs 'di dang / phyag rgya dang/ sngags yongasu gtad pa/ 
204b5(rgyud): yin no// de'i phyir lha'i dbang po khyod kyis yang dag par ba/ zung bar bya'o// lci'i bu dbang po gzungs 'di lan gcig thos ma thag tu bskal pa brgya stong du bsags pa'i las
204b6(rgyud): sgrib pa yongasu byang bar 'gyur// skye bar skye ba sna tshogs pa sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten dang / yau dgas kyi yul dang / lha ma hA
204b7(rgyud): gyi rigs dang / 'di lta ste/ gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / 'byung po dang / sha za dang / srul po dang / lus srul po dang / brjed byed dang / khyi dang / rus sbal dang / sbrul dang / gtsan zar tshwa
204b8(rgyud): bo dang / bya dang / sbrang bu dang / sbrang ma dong / sdig sbrul dang / grog sbur la sogs pa srog chags kyi rigs rnams phyis mi skye bar rig par bya'o// gzhan du de bzhin gshegs pa dang phra
205a1(rgyud): ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i rig su skye ba dang / rigs chen por skye ba ste/ de la rigs chen po ni 'di lta ste/ bram ze'i rigs shing se la chen po lta bu 'am/ rgyal rigs shing
205a2(rgyud): sa la chen po lta bu'am/ khyim bdag gi rigs shing sa chen po lta bu 'am/ tshong dpon gyi rigs shing sa la chen po lta bur skye'o zhes nga smra'o// lha'i dbang po de ltar na gzungs 'di'i mthu
205a3(rgyud): byang chub kyi snying po'i mthar thog gi bar du skye ba yongasu dgu pa chen po 'phob ste/ lha'i dbang po gzungs 'ang ni de ltar mthu che ba/ phan yon che ba/ mthu stobs che ba/ dge ba shis pa
205a4(rgyud): te/ lha'i dbang po sems can rnams kyi don gyi phyir gtsu gtor rnams par rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs ngan 'gro ba de yongasu spyodang ba ring bzhag go// 'di lta ste/ dper na nor shu
205a5(rgyud): po che'i snying po shin tu dri ma med pa na mkha' ltar yongasu dag pa 'od gsal ba ni 'od zer gyi snang bas 'bar zhing 'dug// lha'i dbang po de bzhin du seMn de yang gos pa
205a6(rgyud): med par shes par bya'o// 'di lta ste dper na/ 'dzam+bu chu bo'i gser shin tu dri ma med pa yongasu dag pa/ shin tu mnyen pa/ shin tu sdug pa'o// lha'i dbang po de bzhin du sems
205a7(rgyud): can chen po de shin tu yong su dag par rig par bya ste/ tshe rabs gzhan du yang de bzhin du skye bar 'gyuraro// lha'i dbang po gang na gzungs 'di rab tu ston pa dang / bye brag tu na yi
205a8(rgyud): ge 'drir 'jug pa dang / 'dzin pa dang / klog pa dang / 'dzin pa dang / kha tan du byed pa dang / mchod pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / nyan pa dang / 'dzid par 'gyur ba de 'gro ba bde
205b1(rgyud): dag par 'gyur sa na dmyal ba thams cad rgyun chad par 'gyur ro// lha'i dbang po gzungs 'di yi ger bris te rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mor bzhag par bya/ ri mthon po 'am/ khang pa mthon
