270b3(rgyud): la la zhig gis bdag nyid gtsang ba byas te/ gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag dkon pa dang / rin po cher 'du shes pas gzung na de bzhin gshegs pa dang 'dra bar dad bdu ba ste/ gsang sngags rna
270b4(rgyud): la gus pa bskrad nas/ yi ger bri bar bya ste/ gong du bshad pa bzhin gsang sngags dang phyag rgya cho ga bzhin du bris nas mchod rten gyi srog shing gi rtsa bar snying po bcug ste/ mchod rten pas na
270b5(rgyud): dge ba'i rtsa ba rgya chen po bsags par 'gyur te/ ston na dang legs pa thad 'thob par 'gyuraro// de nas bcom ldan/ 'das kyis gsang sngags kyi phyag rgya'i cho ga 'di dag bshad
270b6(rgyud): tshe phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams na bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rje su thugs rangs par ma dzad nas gsungs pa/ yang dag par rdzon pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thu
270b7(rgyud): bas sems can thaMd ma'am par dgongs shing / thams cad chos kyi dbyings la bkod nas gsang sngags chen po'i phyag rgya'i cho ga bin gyis brlabs 'thob par bstan pa ni leg so leg so// shin
270b8(rgyud): tu yang lags te/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'thob cing phyir mi ldog par yang 'gyuraro// de nas 'khor gyi dkyor de nyid na lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin da
271a1(rgyud): phrin po dang / drin dang lham yin dang mi'am ci dang ldo 'a bye chen po 'dus pa rnams dang byang chub se pa lags rdo rje dang / rgyal po chem pa bad pa/ 'jig rten myong ba'i mam batshangs pas
271a2(rgyud): khab 'jug dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / brgya byin dang / gshin rje dang chu lha dang / ku ba ra dang / de dag la sogs pa rdzu 'phral che ba'i lha de dag gis bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa de thos nas
271a3(rgyud): bdag cag rang rang gi spyod yul la skye zhing yid 'byung bar gyur te/ mthar gyis yon chen po thob par 'dod pa'i phyir gcig le gcig bos te smras pa/ kye ma yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'gyu
271a4(rgyud): bani shin tu yang rnyed par dga'o// de'i bstan pa de pa'i chos thos po yang shin tu rnyed par dkar// sang sngag dang phyag rgya'i tshogs yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
271a5(rgyud): bstan pa thos pa yang shin tu rnyed par dka' ste/ 'a ni shin tu ngo mtshar to zhes smra'o// de nas de'i tshe bram ze ser skya'i zla ba zhes bya ba bcom ldan 'das las de lta bu'i gsang sngags dang / cho
271a6(rgyud): ston chen po de dag thos shing thob nas sems kyi sgrib pa'i rdul dang rnyog pa rnams dngos par gyur/ 'chi ba'i 'jigs pa dang / sdig pa dang / las kyi sgrib pa thams cad kyang dag par gyur/ tshe yang
271a7(rgyud): phyir nur te ring bar gyur nas dga' mgu yi rangs te yid bde ba chen po thob par gyur to// de nas 'byung po'i tshogs thams cad kyang sems dang zhing rje su yi rangs par gyur to// de nas byang chub sad
271a8(rgyud): sems dpa' chen po sgrib pa thad rnam par sel bas de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa'i las kyi phyir 'khor dang rin po che'i khang pa brtsegs pa nor bu sna tshogs kyis spras po zhig mngon pa
271b1(rgyud): sprul nas/ chos la dga' ba'i phyir bcom ldan 'das la phul te/ lan gsum bskor ba byas nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bas phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/ 
271b2(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kyis gsong sngags dang / phyag rgya dang / dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga shin tu rnyed par dka' ba sen thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba rnams kyi mchog 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems
271b3(rgyud): can sgrib pa che ba rnams kyi don du bshad/ dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed cing tshe ring ba dang / sdug bsngal gyi phung po thams cad las thar bar mdzad pa lags na/ de 'dir bdag cag byang chub se de'i rnams
271b4(rgyud): kyis kyang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad la gsol te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan sngar yang dag pa'i ye shes chub par bgyid pa'i phyag rgya dang / gsang sngags kyi tshig bshad par
271b5(rgyud): 'tshal to/ na mo b+hag b+ha ba san pan baN+Di nA/ sas+ya/ shud+ha ko Ti s+ya ta sha ta maHsrAdz+dza/ namaHsa thachi ba raH'i rnam than po rjes twa sa/ i tu ru tu ru ma ma sarba A ba raHtha
271b6(rgyud): sarba ta thA ga ta A ur ba lA nI bi bu la ni rma le/ sarba sid+d+hi nA ma ma skri tA/ ba ra ba ra/ sarba satwa a ba lo ki ni/ oM sarba ni bA raHbiskam bi ni/ ma ma sarba pA pa bi sho d+ha ni ku ru swAhA/ ba
271b7(rgyud): ldan 'das bdag gi gsang sngags 'di ni sangs rgyas bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgus bshad pa lags te/ gang la la zhig gis ma yengs pa'i sems kyis rtse gcig tu byas te/ skad cig gcig
271b8(rgyud): gton na yang sdigs pa za dbyung bar 'gyuraro// yang gang la la zhig gis gsang sngags 'di cho ga bzhin du dgu bcu rtsa dgu yi ger bris te mchod rten gyi nang du bcug na mchod rten dal/ la la
272a1(rgyud): zhig gis dgra bsam/ tshig snyan pas bstod ma/ spos dang / me tog dang / byug pa dang / mar me 'bul na rigs kyi bu de de'i tshe 'di nyid la sdig pa thad bang shing las kyi sgrib pa
272a2(rgyud): thams cad gsal te/ bas oM pa thams cad yid bzhin/ du grub par 'gyur/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das brgya stong grangs med pa'i gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed la mchod cing bsnyed bkur
272a3(rgyud): bas pa dang 'dra bar 'gyur// de bzhin du mchod rten ring bsrel gyi snying po can brgya stong bye ba khrag khrig gang ga'i klung gi be ma snyed la mchod pa bas par 'gyuraro// de'i dge ba'i rtsa ba rgya cha/ 
272a4(rgyud): po sogs par 'gyuraro// yang dge sbyong gang zhig gis tshes brgya dang / bcu bzhi dang / bco lnga gang yang rung ba la khrus dang gtsang sbra byas te/ gos gtsang ma gyon la zhag gcig bsnyung ba'i
272a5(rgyud): yang na zas dka pa gsum zos te/ mchod rte/ la bskor zhing gsang sngags 'di lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod pas na bskal pa brgya stong du bsags pa'i las kyi sku
272a6(rgyud): pa thams cad dang / mtshams med pa ldabs pa yang yongasu 'bang bar 'gyur/ gzhan yang las dang nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa zed rnam par dag par gyur nas byang chub sems dpa'
272a7(rgyud): sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba bdag nyid kyi lus mngon par bstan te/ bsam pa thams cad dngos grub tu sbyin par mjed cing / yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas zad kyi 'al
272a8(rgyud): yang mthong bar 'gyur// de bzhin du gang la la zhig gis nyis brgya rtsa brgyad bton na ting 'dzin 'thob par 'gyu ro// gang gis sum brgya rtsa brgyad gton na sgrib pa thams cad bang ste phyir/ 
272b1(rgyud): mi ldog pa'i sa la gnas par 'gyuraro// yang gang gis bzhi brgya rtsa brgyad gton na rgyal chen ris bzhi'i rgyal po chen po dag kyang nye bar 'ongs nas lus mngon par bstan te/ bsrung ba dang / 
272b2(rgyud): skyab byed cing shes rab kyi stobs kyang skyed nas bsod nams thams cad nye bar smra'o// gang gis lnga brgya rtsa brgyad bton na dge ba'i rtsa ba de nyid kyis 'dus ma byas kyi lam la gnas pa 'tha
272b3(rgyud): yang gang gis drug brgya rtsa brgyad gton ni rig sngags 'chang du 'gyur te/ nam mkha' la rig 'dzin gyi gan su 'gro bar 'gyur// yang gang gis bdun brgya rtsa brgyad gton na legs tri
272b4(rgyud): yon thams cad ldan par 'gyur/ yang gang gis brgyad brgya rtsa brgyad gton na gzhan gyis bsgo ba med pa'i rang dbang 'thob ste/ sems rnam par dag par 'gyur/ 
272b5(rgyud): yang gang gis dag brgya rtsa brgyad du gtonanaphung po lnga rnam par dag par 'gyuraro// yang gang gis stong rtsabargyad du gton na rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu 'thob// gang gi
272b6(rgyud): nyis stong tshang bar bton na lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'thob/ gang gis sum stong tshang bar bton na pir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'thog/ gang gis bzhi stong tshang bar bton na dag
272b7(rgyud): ba'i 'bras bu 'thob/ gang gis lnga stong tshang bar bton na rang sangs rgyas kyis 'thob par 'gyur ro// gang gis drug sdong tshang bar gton na byang chub seM de'i rdzu 'phrul gnas 'thob par 'gyur/ 
272b8(rgyud): yang gang gis bdan stong tshang bar gton na byang chub sems dpa' sa dang po 'thob par 'gyur/ yang gang gis brgyad stong tshang bar bton na byang chub sems dpa'i sa lnga pa gnon par 'gyur// 
273a1(rgyud): yang gang gis dag stong tshang bar gton na rig sngags dang / gsang sngags rnams kyi bdag po gsang ba pa'i lus 'thob par 'gyuraro// yang gang gis khri tshang bar bton na/ byang chub sa
273a2(rgyud): sa brgyad pa mi g.yo ba gdon par 'gyuraro// yang gang gis nyi khri tshang bar btod na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sku 'thob par 'gyur te/ seng ge'i sgra chen po sgrogs pa
273a3(rgyud): 'gyu ro// yang gang la la zhig gis pa ma'i don gyi pir bsod nams kyi las bya bar 'dod na/ mchod rten snying pa ring bsal can zhig ral du gyur pa gsos la bcos lags pas te/ gang yang
273a4(rgyud): phyog su bskor ba byed cing sngags lan brgya rtsa brgyad tshang gi bar du bskor ba bas na bsam pa thams cad yid bzhin du 'a grub par 'gyuraro// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi
273a5(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thaMd rnam par sel ba leg so zhes bya ba byin te/ le ga so leg so// rigs kyi bu khyod kyis nga'i grogs byas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang sngags kyi chos
273a6(rgyud): tshul bzhin du bshad pa de kho na bzhi no// de nas gnod sbyin thams cad kyi rgyal po gsang ba pa'i bdag pos bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsang sngags kyi rgyal po gas
273a7(rgyud): sngags kyi cho ga 'di dag de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang 'dra ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi sku las byung ba lags na/ bcom ldan 'das snying po dam pa 'di dag 'dzam bu gling na gnas
273a8(rgyud): pa'i sems can rnams kyi las kyi sgrib pa dang / sdig pa thams cad bsal nas de phyin chad bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la 'jug par 'gyur/ de skad ces gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das/ 
273b1(rgyud): kyis gsang ba pa'i bdag po la bka' stsal pa/ gsang ba ba'i bdag po gsang sngags kyi cho ga 'di dag ni ma 'ongs pa'i dus na yang de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten na zhugs pa dang 'dra ba ma
273b2(rgyud): ngas cho ga ji skad bstan pa bzhin du byas na las kyi sbyor ba chung ngus kyang 'bras bu chen po 'grub cing phan yon char gnas par gyur na/ las kyi sbyor ba cher byas pa lta ci smos te/ dge ba'i rtsa ba thad
273b3(rgyud): bsags par 'gyuraro// de lta bas na de dag gi yon ni de bzhin gshegs pa brgya stong bye ba khrag khrig gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyis bshad kyang mi rdzogs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi
273b4(rgyud): mkhyen cing gzigs par zad/ gsang ba pa'i bdag pos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das las tshegs chung ngu ji lta bu zhig bgyi ba bsod nams kyi 'bras bu chen po 'grub cing bsod nams chen
273b5(rgyud): po thob par 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de'i phyir legs par nyon cig dang bshad par bya'o// dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen ma gang la la
273b6(rgyud): zhig gis bsod nams kyi 'bras bu chen po thob yon tan thosapar 'dod pas gsang sngags kyi rgyal po'i cho ga sngar bstan pa bzhin du byas te/ dgu bcu rtsa dag yi ger bris
273b7(rgyud): la sangs rgyas kyi mchod rten gyi mdun du dkyil 'khor gru bzhi bas la ba'i lci bas byugs te/ grwa bzhir dri'i chu bor bu bkang ba re re bzhag/ bdug spos kyi snod 'phrul ba yang bzhag nas
273b8(rgyud): sdod chen po'i nang du me tog dang / dri'i chu dang / 'bras skam po rnams blugs te/ dkyil 'khor gyi steng du bzhag pa dang / yang til nag po dang / sran ma ma 'a dang / 'bras rnams bsras
274a1(rgyud): // bcos pa'i 'bras thug kri sa ra zhes bya ba dang zas dkang gsum dang / 'di rnams bum pa'i nang du blags pa dang / yang shing tog sna tshogs 'bras bu dag bcu rtsa dgu dang / kha zas
274a2(rgyud): ming gis smos pa 'di rnams dang / spos dang / me tog la sogs pa dkyil 'khor gyi stang du bkram la/ gsang sngags kyi yig mchod rten gyi srog shing gi nang du btsag nas mchod rten gyi po/ 
274a3(rgyud): bzhir phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mngon du dmigs te phag byas la sems rtsa gcig pas gsang sngags 'di dag gdon par bya'o// 'di lta ste/ oM bi bu la bi pu la bi ma
274a4(rgyud): le/ pra ba re dzi na ba ra sa ra sa ra/ sarba ta thA ga ta d+hA tu gar+b+he/  d+hiSh+NI te swAhA/ a ya NaNo ba ni sAt+ma/ sarba de ba na/ ba ha ya bi shu d+ha oM d+hiSh+ThA na sa ma ye swA hA/ bdug spos 'ja
274a5(rgyud): burgyun mi 'chad par bya zhing / gsang sngags lan nyi shu rtsa brgyad bton na byang chub sa da' sems dpa' chen po brgyad dang / gan da sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po brgyad dang / gsang
274a6(rgyud): ba pa'i bdag po dang / rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / tshangs pa dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / sred med kyi bu rnams de'i mod la mchod rten de la mchod pa dang / rim gro byed srog shing brtan par byedo// de
274a7(rgyud): bas godu du yang sangs rgyas bye ba 'bum phrag dgu bcu rtsa dag dang / gang+gA klung gi be ma snyed kyang gnas der gshegs te/ mchod rten de la mchod pa dang / chos kyi skur byin gyis rlob cing ring
274a8(rgyud): 'grel dang ldan par mdzad/ da ltar sems thag pa nas tshig tshul bzhin du byas no yon de dag/ gzhan yang mchod rten de yid bzhin gyi nong bu rin po che las byas pa'i bsod nams zob
274b1(rgyud): 'gyur te/ rin po che'i rnam pa bab khrag khrig brgya stong du ma las mchod rten byas pa dang 'dra bar 'gyur te/ dge ba'i rtsa ba brgya chen po dang ldan zhing lus rnam par dag la tshe ring zhing nad med pa dang
274b2(rgyud): bgegs thams cad kyis mi tshugs par 'gyuraro// gang gzhan la la zhig gis mchod rten 'di mthong ngam/ mchod rten de'i dril bu'i sgra de thos na yang las kyi sgrib pa dang / sdig pa tha byang
274b3(rgyud): 'gyur te/ mtshams med pa lhu bas pa yang yongasu byang nas 'chi ba'i dus byas pa'i 'og tu bde ba can gyi 'jig rten du skye'o// gang la la zhig gis mchod rten de'i ming tsam zos pa yang la
274b4(rgyud): ba'i dus byas nas bla na med pa'i byang chub kyi lam thob par 'gyur tha ma bya dang / ri dwags la sogs pa sen gang gis mthong ba de yang tshe 'phos nas dud 'gro'i skye gnas spangs te/ 
274b5(rgyud): bsod nams dang ldan pa'i lus thob par 'gyuraro// gang la la zhig gis pha rol tu phyin pa drug yong su rdzogs par spyod par 'a dod pa des snga ma bzhin du dkyil 'khor gru
274b6(rgyud): bzhi pa byas te/ sa dang lci bas byugs la de'i steng du spos kyi skyang nul gyis byugs te/ dkyil 'khor gyi grwa bzhi dri'i chus bkang ba'i snod rang bzhag la/ sngar bstan pa'i gsang sngags pa
274b7(rgyud): po dag las rnam pa gcig kyang dgu bcu rtsa dgu bris te/ ring gi lag gis mchod rten chung ngu dgu bcu rtsa dgu gdab cing gsang sngags rnams gcig kyang be ra'i nang du gzhug/ de nas
274b8(rgyud): gsang sngags 'di dgu bcu rtsa dgu yo gar bris te/ mchod rten gyi 'phang lo rnams kyi nang du bcug s+ho// mtshad rten rnams dkyil 'khor gyi steng du bzhag ste/ me tog dang / byugs pas mchod
275a1(rgyud): // lan bdun bdun du bskor zhing gsang sngags 'di yang gdon par bya'o// na maHna ba nA TI nAM/ ta thA ga tra gaM ga NA nAM Di bA lu kAM/ ko Ti yuk+tA sha ta sa ta srA NAM/ oM bo bo bi tsa ri Na
275a2(rgyud): tsa ri/ mo ri go ri tsa la ba ri swA hA/ cho ga 'di ltar byas na pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongasu rdzogs par spyad par yang ma zad/ des ni rin po che'i mchod rten bye ba khrig khrig brgya stong gang+gA'i klung gi
275a3(rgyud): ma snye bas par 'gyur/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pa ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu snyed la mchod cing bsnyen bkur byos par 'gyur// de'i gong du yang lha thams cad
275a4(rgyud): kyis mchod pa'i sprin sna tshogs bsdus te/ mchod/ de la yo byas sna tshogs sbyar nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i pho brang dang / yo byad sna tshogs sbyar nas mchod par 'gyur te/ yang dag par
275a5(rgyud): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag snyed kyis ma/ na cing gzigs te byin gyis rlobs par mdzad// rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de'i dge ba'i rtsa ba rgya chen po'i bsod
275a6(rgyud): nams dang / yon thad thob par mdzad do// yang gang la la zhig gis gsang sngags kyi rgyal po 'di snying po 'di ma nor bar yi ga bris la rtag tu bton te/ mchod pa'i las byas la thogs na rig
275a7(rgyud): ba de nyid kyis srung ba dang / bskyab pa mdzad/ phas kyi rgol ba'i dgra thaMd dang / shar gnyer ba rnams dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / yi dwags la sogs pa thams cad kyang / gnod par mi
275a8(rgyud): 'gyur te/ 'jigs shing skra gnas so sor 'byer ba bar gyuraro// gang la la zhig gis rig pa 'don pa de dang gtam byas pa yang mtshams med pa lnga'i las kyi sgrib pa yang yong su 'byung
275b1(rgyud): 'gyur// gang la la zhig gis sngags pa de'i sgra thos sam/ grib mas phog ma/ lus la reg kyang rung ste/ de'i tshe rabs gzhan gyi las kyi sgrib pa dang / sdig pa thad yongasu byang bar 'gyur// 
275b2(rgyud): rig pa 'don pa de'i lus la dug gis mi tshugs/ mes mi tshugs/ chus khyer bar mi 'gyur/ gdon thams cad kyis kyang grags mi rnyed/ thog 'bab par mi 'gyur te/ sangs rgyas kyis
275b3(rgyud): srung ba dang / bskyab pa mdzad cing spyan ras kyis 'tsho bar mdzad/ lha thad dang / dam tshig can thams cad kyis kyang dal stong grogs byed par 'gyur te/ gzhan gyi rig sngags dang / byad dang
275b4(rgyud): sbyor ba thams cad kyis mi tshugs par 'gyur// de lta bas na rig pa 'don pa gnas gang na 'dug kyang gsang sngagasa'i dang cho ga don du gnyer bar bya ste/ gsang sngags yi ger briH
275b5(rgyud): la lam gyi bzhi mdo'am/ sum mdo skye bo ma bo phan tshun 'gro ba'i gan su mchod rte nu tas la/ de'i nang du bcug na/ 'gro ba thad dang / ba dang / sbrang ma dang / than grog srung
275b6(rgyud): yan chad kyis mthong ba dang / thos pa dang / reg pa dang / de la phog pa'i sa dang / rdul dang / rlung dang / grib mas phog na yang byol song dang / yi dwags dang / ngan song log par ltung ba sen
275b7(rgyud): byargyal bar skye bar 'gyur ba'i sdig pa thams cad dang bral zhing / 'chi ba'i dus byas nas bde 'gro mtho ris lha rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur te/ sngon gyi las kyi sgrib pa yong su byangs
275b8(rgyud): tshe rabs rje su dran pa 'thob par 'gyur zhing / phyir mi ltung ba'i chos can du 'gyur// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sede'i sems dpa' chen po sgrib pa thams cad rnam pang sel
276a1(rgyud): // gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje dang / rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / tshangs pa mi mjed kyi bdag po dag / tshangs ris kyi phurnarnams dang / drabang rgya ma chen po la sogs pa'i lha rnams las
276a2(rgyud): stsal pa/ skyes budam pa dgangs gsang sngags kyi rgyal po'i snying po 'di dag khyed rnams la yongasu gtad kyis rtag tu rim grong bya zhing yongasu gzung bar bya ste/ rin po che'i za ma tog gi nang du
276a3(rgyud): chug la gnas thams cad du bsgrags te/ nam du yang rgyun ma bcad par sems can la ston cing / mthong zhing thos par byas nas mtshams med pa lnga'i sdig pa yang 'byung bar 'gyur// de nas byang chub sems dpa'
276a4(rgyud): sems dpa' chen po sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba dang / gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje dang / rgyal po chen po bzhi dag dang / tshangs pa dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / srad med kyi bu dang / lha dang / klu dang / na
276a5(rgyud): sprin dang / srin po dang / lha ma yin dang / lto 'phye chen po la sogs pa thaMd kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal na sa tshig 'thun par smras te/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bcom
276a6(rgyud): ldan 'das kyis bdag la thugs brtse bar dgongs te gsang sngags 'di'i cho ga dang / mchod rten bgyi ba'i cho ga ji skad gsu ngas pa rnams sems can thams cad la smad pa'i slad du bdag cag
276a7(rgyud): kun gyis srung zhing rim gror bgyi/ rtag par gzungasu bzung zhing mi bskyed par bgyi/ yi ger bri ba dang / klag pa dang / mchod pa'i las rnams kyang bgyi ste/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus na sems can gang la las chos kyi
276a8(rgyud): rnam grangs 'di thos shing kho dud chud nas ngan song ngan 'gro sems can dmyal ba la sogs pa dang / sdig pa thaMd las thar bar 'gyur bar bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pas na/ bdag cag rnams kyis bac+doM
276b1(rgyud): kyis bka' drin spyi bos blangs pa'i sla du gsang sngags kyi chog 'di dag rim grong bgyi/ btsun par 'gyi/ gus par bgyi/ rin po che'i 'du shes bzhag par bgyi// rgya cher 'phel bar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das
276b2(rgyud): kyi zhal dang 'dra bar blta bar bgyi ste/ nam du yang nub par mi 'gyur zhing ci nas kyang rgyas par bgyi ba'i slad nan tan bgyi bar 'tsha'o// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'ang skye bka' stsal pa/ skyes
276b3(rgyud): dam pa rnams dam tshig la gnas pas gsang sngags kyi cho ga 'di dag srung ba dang / rim gror bya ba dang / yongasu bzung bar khas blangs pa ni leg solagaso// shin tu yang lag so// bcom ldan 'das kyis de
276b4(rgyud): skad ces bka' stsal nas/ thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dag yi rangs te bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod// 'phags pa 'od zer dri ma med pa rnam par dag
276b5(rgyud): pa'i 'odadra ces bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs// rgya gar gyi mkhan po bud+ya ka ra saM hi dang / zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban d+he dpal gyi lhun zo'i sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la rab pa/ dzo Ta a Shi sha dang
276b6(rgyud): dge ba shes 'brom ston pas sngags rnams dag par bcos// rgya ga ska du/ kA ru Na a gra nA ma d+ha rA Ni/ bod skad du/ snying rje'i mchog ces bya ba'i gzungs thams cad mkhyen pa la phyag 'tshalo// 
276b7(rgyud): pag na pad+ma bsnams pa/ sa sdug bsngal rnam pa sna tshogs kyi tshang tshing du nub pa rnams yang dag par bsgral ba'i phyir/ blo gros shang ba la phyag 'tshalo// de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang sngags
276b8(rgyud): kyi mchog snying rje chen po'i rtse mo 'chang gathogs pa med pa'i don yod pa'i las kyi dngos grub de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhal nas byung ba/ sen gyi dkyil 'khor ma lus nga'i las kyi
277a1(rgyud): // sgrib pa dang / ngan song gi sdug bsngal rnam pa sna tshogs zhi bar byed pa/ phan pa ma yin pa dang / bkra mi shis pa dang / rmi lam ngan pa dang / ltas ngan pa thad dang / nad rnam pa du ma dang / dus ma hI
277a2(rgyud): bar 'chi ba sna tshogs rab tu zhi bar byed pa/ stong chen mo rab tu 'joms par byed pa bshad par bya ste/ thog mar bcom ldan 'das bsod nams kyi tshogs du ma bye ba phrag 'bum gyis brgyan pa'i sku mnga'
277a3(rgyud): ba la phyag 'tshal nas brtsams pa bya'o// na mo b+ha ga ba te/ bai ro tsa nA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya/ a d+ha te samak+saM bud d+hA ya/ sarba adz+nyA ma d+ha kA ra sha ma yi tre/ trad+ya thA/ sA d+ha ni sA d+ha ni/ sid d+ha bid d+ha ri/ b+ha ga
277a4(rgyud): bA ra bI ra/ kle sha d+hA ba ti/ adz+nyAn sha mA ya/ sarba pA wa bi shud d+had+harme nong me la d+hAm ga tsa pa a sa~M gi rgya rtsi pra sha ma mU d+hi su kha pra te sarbakle sha d+ha ba ti/ sarba pA ba chig d+ha ni bi d+ha ma ni/ na
277a5(rgyud): nan bi nA sha ni/ bi mA sha ya bi nA sha ya/ b+ha ga ba ti sungs bim la hu d+hA/ sa ras pa/ bI sa da bi sa ra su ru su ru/ sUr sUr bra sa dpra sa ra bi sa ra bi sa ra/ a dz+nyAn ma ko Ti sa twa sa?
277a6(rgyud): saM tsi tan kardza a ba ra ni k+Sha pa ya/ k+She ma bi ti bu da d+hi ba shA ya/ ba sha brti ni bA ra mi tAdz+nyA na go tsa re/ baM she Sha ba ti/ a she Sha l-i nau/ ka ru Na go tsa re/ ba ma hA dz+nyA na a b+hi Sha ka ba ti/ su baM nish+tsi ta d+harme/ he he b+ha ga
277a7(rgyud): bti/ ma hA ka ru Ne ku ru ku ru khi sho d+ha ya mam/ sarba sa twaM sh+tsa/ ma hA ka ru No tas ke na san sin tsa ya/ sa ma ba d+hA ya/ sa ma b+ha lA ya/ pra ro tA ya me/ ma hA ka ru Na bi dza na pa ri shud d+ha/ a mo g+ha me ku ru dzI ba ta na
277a8(rgyud): kA rAk+Sha maM/ b+ha ga ba ti ma ma hA bo d+hi tsit+ta ma saM mU h+yed ma san tu shud bi ti ma~M ka ru ti/ bud+d+hi pra len raka pre ta ti rAg gi dumakhan mul ni/ de lam nu Sh+ya gti sam pa can po ga to bkre she/ sarba bud+d+ha d+had+hA pa
277b1(rgyud): pU ra ni swA hA/ bcom ldan 'das kyi snying rje chen po'i mchog ces bya ba'i gzungs/ bcom ldan 'das kyi gtsug tor nas byung ba 'di ni gzungs grangs med pa phrag stong gi 'khor dang ldan pa'o// sdig pa dang / 
277b2(rgyud): dang / nyon mongs pa thams cad 'joms pa'o// bkra mi shis pa dang / rmi lam ngan pa dang / ltas ngan pa dang / dus ma yin par 'chi ba thams cad zhi bar byed pa'o// tshe dang / bsod nams dang / gzugs dang / stobs
277b3(rgyud): dang / bde ba dang / spobs pa dang / nad med pa byed pa'o// 'byung po dang / brjed byed dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / nam mkha' lding dang / lha ma yin dang / mi 'am ci'i gdon thams cad nges par 'joms pa'o// 
277b4(rgyud): gzungs 'di'i ming bzung ba dang / thos pa dang / brjod pa tsam gyis kyang tsho rabs bye ba phrag 'bum gyi bar du bsags pa'i las kyi slob pa yang byang bar 'gyur/ nyon mongs pa thams cad bsrabs
277b5(rgyud): par 'gyur// de'i ngan song gi 'gro ba thams cad kyang rgyun chad parar gyur// sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thad kyis kyang yo su gzung bar 'gyur// byang chub sems dpa'i
277b6(rgyud): dge ba dang yang ldan par 'gyur// yongasu mi nyams pa'i chos can du yang 'gyur// snying rje las kyang nyams par mi 'gyur// sems can thams cad kyis kyang mngon par dga' bar 'gyur ro// nyin dus
277b7(rgyud): gsum mtshan dus gsum du lan bdun bdun brjod na sdig pa thams cad las rnam par thar pa 'gyur// byang chub sems dpa'i yon tan stong phrag dpag tu med/ grangs med pa dag kyang thob par 'gyur
277b8(rgyud): nam nangs pa'i dus skyil mo krung bcas te bde bar 'dug la/ lag pa gru gsum gyi phyag rgya byas nas/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la dmigs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa yod / 
278a1(rgyud): / nyid chen po mngon sum du bsam nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa la bga' tsha lo nas smras te/ yid kyis bga' tshal nas lan nyi shu rtsa gcig brjod na/ de la yid la rdzi ltar 'dod pa'i bsam pa
278a2(rgyud): / yongasu rdzogs par 'gyur te/ don ji lta ba bzhin du 'grub pa thob par 'gyur// tshes brgyad dang / bcu bzhi dang / bco lnga la bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byas la/ bsnyen nas blangs nas gos dkar po dgos
278a3(rgyud): smin pa bas la byang chub kyi sems chen po blangs nas mi sdug pa med par lag pa brkyang ba des rang gi lag gi dkyil 'khor bas la me tog kha dog sna gsum gyi mchod nas tsan+da dkar pos 'dugs pa
278a4(rgyud): jig rten gyi khams stong phrag mtha' yas pa dag na mchod pa dang / bzung sti chen po rnam pa sna tshogs yod pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la 'os pa rnams yid la bsam / sangs rgyas dang byang chub
278a5(rgyud): sems dpa' thams cad la phul nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying ngo stong chen po 'bar ba byung ba 'di nam dga' ba chen po skyes kyis bar du brjod na bdag nyid de bzhin gshegs pa
278a6(rgyud): rnams kyi drung na 'dug par shes shingag/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis zang zing med pa'i chos kyi long spyod chen po'i dga' ba thob par 'gyuraro// de phyin chad de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigasu phyir mi ldog pa
278a7(rgyud): skyes pa yin// tshe rabs gzhan du song na yang byang chub sems dpa'i chen pos thob par 'gyuraro// rig sngags 'chang chen po'i 'khor los bsgyur ba yang thob par 'gyuraro// gzungs kyang thob par 'gyur// de bzhi/ 
278a8(rgyud): gshegs pa rnams kyang mnyes par byed// mngon par shes pa mi nyams pa yang thob par 'gyur// tshe 'di la yang sems can thams cad dga' bar 'gyuraro// lha thams cad kyis kyang srung bar 'gyur/ thob
278b1(rgyud): 'gyur// de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyang mnyes par byed/ mngon par shes pa mi nyams pa yang thob par 'gyur/ tshe 'di la yang sems can zad dga' bar 'gyur// lha thams cad kyis kyang srung bar
278b2(rgyud): 'gyur/ klu dang / lha ma yin dang / na mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po thams cad kyis kyang srung bar 'gyur te/ gang la smras pa de'i bya ba sgrub par 'gyuraro// des ci bsams pa dang / khyad du su
278b3(rgyud): pa rnams kyang lha la sogs pa rnams byed par 'gyur// de'i 'dod pa thams cad kyang yong su rdzogs par 'gyur/ sus kyang ngag mi bcog par yang 'gyur/ lha rnams kyis kyang de'i stobs dang / gzug
278b4(rgyud): dang / bsod nams dang / lang 'tsho dang / nad med pa dang rgyas pa 'phel bar byed// 'gegs thams cad kyis kyang mi tshugs par 'gyur// mdopa na de ba zhin gshegs pa'i grong khyed du 'jug par 'ang
278b5(rgyud): pa rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sku chen po thong bar 'dod pa rnams dang / yon phun sum tshogs pa thams cad thob par 'dod pa rnams dang gzhan yang byang
278b6(rgyud): nub sems dpa' chen po'i bslab pa'i gang thabs byed pa la 'jug par 'dod pa rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i chos nyid kyi de tshig thob par 'dod pa rnams dang / rtag par rgyun mi 'am
278b7(rgyud): pa dang / bar chad med par rgyud chen po'i don togs pang 'dod pa rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa yon gyi rgyan gyis bdag gis bdag nyid brgyan par 'dod pa rnams kyis yon gyi tshogs chen po
278b8(rgyud): bsags pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis du stod cing / byang chub sems dpa' sede' chen po rnams kyis yang dag par bstan pa 'di thog mar sgrim pa chen pos de bzhin gshegs pa than
279a1(rgyud): // bsdams pa'i cho ga ji skad bstan pa bzhin du blangs par bya'o// snying rje'i mchog ces pa pa'i gzungs rdzog so// rgya gangaswa du/ kro d+ha bidz+ra ya kal+la gu h+ya tan+da/ bod skadadu/ khro ba rnam par rgyal ba'i rtog pa gas
279a2(rgyud): ba'i rgyud/ bcom ldan 'das 'jam pa'i dbyangs la phyag 'tshalo// de nas 'jam pa'i dbyangs kyi ni// khro bo 'di ming gshin rje gsheng // mtshon cha me lce 'bar bas 'khrugs// drag la mthu rtsal drag ldan pa/ 
279a3(rgyud): de mthong nas ni khro bo gzhan// thams cad kyi ni lag cha shor// de bzhin du ni 'jig rten pa'i// lha rnams lus kyis 'dud par byed// gzhan yang thal mo sbyar bas te/ skrag nas bstod pa mang po byed/ lha rnams mang po ji
279a4(rgyud): snyed kun/ 'jam dpal khro bo'i gzi brjid kyis// gzing bzhin du ni rab rje/ sa pa/ bcom ldan bdag cag sangs rgyas dang // chos dang dge 'dun skyabs mchis kyis/ rab tu mi zad 'jigs pa'i gzugs// 
279a5(rgyud): brjid 'bar bas phyogs khyab pa// khams gsum 'khrug par mdzad pa mthong // gang tshe lha dang lha min rnams// skrag nas skyabasu dong ba na// de tshe 'jam pa'i dbyangs kyi ni/ khro ba slar yang
279a6(rgyud): zhi bar 'gyur// gshin rje gshed ces bya ba yi// khro bo chen po zhi ba la// de nas skyabasu dong ba yi// lha rnams kun gyis zhus pa ni// khyod kyi brtson 'grus mchog 'tshal bas// ci lta bur na mnyes par bgyi// ci ltar yA
279a7(rgyud): ni dang bar 'gyur/ bdag cag the tsom chen po mchis/ khro bo lha rnams tshig gsan nas// gshin rje'i gshed kyis bka' stsal pa/ gzi brjid chen po khyed rnams kun/ gang tshe gsum la skyabs song ba/ de tshe
279a8(rgyud): mi barbad pa// khro ba yid la gnas par gyis// dkon mchog gsum ni gnas pa dang / dmi bka' yang bskyang ba dang / san kun la snying 'artse'i phyir/  sa yi sa ni gyur gyis// khyed rnams skyab su dong pa yi/ 
279b1(rgyud): chub sems dang ldan pa yi// thams cad don ni sgrub pa'i mchog/ yi ge 'bru ni bcu bdun po// nga yi snying po yid las byung // lha rnams kun gyis gzung bar gyis// gshin rje'i gshed po bdag nyid kyi/ snying po
279b2(rgyud): tu gsungs pa na// de nas sa ni g.yos par 'gyur/ rgya mtsho yang ni rab tu 'khrugs/ gnod sbyin dang ni srin po dang // sha za la sogs phung bar 'gyur/ lha rnams kun ni phyag 'tshal zhing // yan lag kun nas spu
279b3(rgyud): langs nas// gshin rje'i gshed po khro ba yi// khro bo snying po de gzung // de nas dam chos srung ba'i phyir/ khro bo rnam par rgyal ba yi// rtog pa 'di ni de dag la// gshin rje'i gshed kyis rgyas par gsungs// 
279b4(rgyud): nas khro ba rnam rgyal gyis// rtog pa khro bo nyid kyis gsungs// snying rje byang chub sems ldan po'i// lha rnams kyis thos dga' gyur nas/ dkon mchog gsum ni srung ba'i phyir/ so so yi mi rtog pa
279b5(rgyud): bshad/ de dag gi ni rtsa ba'i rgyud/ khro bo nyid kyis rab gsungs pa khro bo rnam rgyal zhes bya 'di// 'jig rten 'das dang 'jig rten bas// sngon nas phagu bas khro bo yi// zhal nas ji
279b6(rgyud): zos nas kyang / khro bo nyid kyis gsungs pa yi// rgyud 'di byang chub sems rnams kyis/ snying rjes de bzhin rgyas pa dang // rnam pa mang por byin gyis brlabs// 'jam dpal gyi rtsa ba'i rtog pa khro bo rnam
279b7(rgyud): bang rgyal ba las rgyud 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i skabs te dang po'o// de nas khro bo rnam par rgyal// 'jam dpal khro bos bshad pa yi// rtag pa rma du byung ba'i mchog mdor ni rab tu bshad par bya// de la 'ad
279b8(rgyud): yi dkyil 'khor na// dngos grub thams cad sbyin mdzad pa'i// 'jig rten gsum po 'khrugs par mdzad// yi dwags mang po zhes pa'o// thams cad ni dkyil 'khor 'di// gnas ni gang du 'grub par 'gyur
280a1(rgyud): // sdug pas thog ma ni ni// de yi gnas ni brtag par bya/ shing gcig pa 'am dur khrod dang // khyim stong dang ni bzhi mdo dang / mchod rten dang ni mu gnyis dang / thibs po stong pa lam srang rnying
280a2(rgyud): bskyed mos tshal dang ri yi rtse/ chu yi 'gram dang nags tshal dang // yang na mtsho yi 'gram dang ni/ lha chen gyi ni gnas kyang rung // ba lang lhas ma g.yul gyis/ khyad par da ni yul gtsang bar// gang du
280a3(rgyud): yid ni dga' bar yang // deng ni dkyil 'khor rab tu ba// de nas rig 'dzin nan tan gyis// sa ni yang dag sbyang ba ste// ba tsha med cing ma gas pa// mnyam zhing zug rngu med pa la/ shar dang bang ni mtho ba da
280a4(rgyud): kha dog snum pa lhag par bzang // ba las byung ba rnam lnga dang / ldan pa yi ni lci bas byug/ ci rigs par ni byugs nas kyang // slob dpon gyis ni khrus byas nas/ smyung ba bas te mnyam gzhag
280a5(rgyud): nas// khro bo'i srung bas byin gyis brlab// yi dwags phal chen zhe bya ba'i// dkyil 'khor gsang mchog nub mo bri/ zar ma'i rasaras bal las// thig skung gsum sgril ma
280a6(rgyud): ba yi// gru bzhi dngon sgo bzhi par// mkhas pas dkyil 'khor thig btab ste// thog ma shar dang byang nas ni// lho dang nub kyi bar du'o// thig skud de ni phyogs mtshams nas/ de nas kyang ni drang ba ba
280a7(rgyud): shar dang lho yi mtshams dang ni// nub dang byang gi mtshams dag tu// thig gis rab tu tshad byas te/ gru bzhi par ni thig gdapo// rim pa gcig pa mdzes pa la/ sgo bzhi dag gis mdzes par bya// lho ga
280a8(rgyud): kyi ni sgo he la/ lhag ma rnams ni bcad ba bya/ dkyil 'khor dang ni 'tsham pa yi/ dbus pad+mo bri bar bya// pad+mo dang ni phyogs bzhi sgo// the tsom med par mnyam par bya// mdzes byed sgo yi byedu bya/ 'bran
280b1(rgyud): ba mdab ma'i chang dang mnyam// nye ba yi ni mdzes byed kyang / mdzes byed dang ni 'dra bar bya// cho ga bzhin du dkyil 'khor te// kun tu thig ni btab nas kyang / phyi nas tshul bzhin rig 'dzin gyis/ dung khrod thal
280b2(rgyud): bas bri ba ni/ rtag tu bang shar la sogs pa'i// grwa yi nang ni de dag tu// mkhas pas be con phag rgya bri/ phyogs kyi sgor ni yi dwags gzhag/ gzhan yang yi dwags lnga pa ni// pad+ma'i steng du bsam ba ba
280b3(rgyud): de bzhin pa sgo'i nang dag dang / sogs rnams de dag thams cad/ mi ro mgo mod yi dwags rnams/ dur khrod thal bas dang tre bri/ de pyir yi dwags pal chen yin// khru gang la sogs rim pa nas/ khru brgyad
280b4(rgyud): pa mi bang duste/ de las lhag par yong mi bri// rtag tu bdag nyid mchod pa ni// khru gang ba ni bri bar bya/ zhi ba dang ni rgyas pa dang / mau rgyal sgrub pa khru dang bstan// sems can kun ni smad pa dang / de bzhi
280b5(rgyud): gzhig la khru gsum pa/ khru bzhi dbang dang dgug pa yi/ las rnamasakyi ni mchog tu gsungs/ khru ldand dang mi rnad dang // dgra rnams me dpar brtsal ba'i mchog khru drug bgegs rnas
280b6(rgyud): thams ca dang // gdon rnams nges par bzlog par byed/ khwa bdun pa ni lha yo rnams/ dbang dang dgug pa'i las rnams byed// khru brgyad pa ni dngos grub kun/ sbyin sreg mchog tu shes par bya// de ltar cing
280b7(rgyud): bris nas ni// de nas gtsang mang nye reg bya/ chu yi phying ni chu yi snod/ chus ni rab tu dgang bar bya// de bzhin me tog don du yang // me tog sdu gu dri zhom dang // me tog phreng bas snod mchog gzhan/ lag
280b8(rgyud): ba dgang zhing mdzes pa drug/ dri yi don du bya ba nau// nAmra dgang po dmar mo glang / a ga ru dang sbyang ba yi/ gu gul 'dug pa de bzhino// mar mo mor gyi mar me dang // mkhas pas snying po 'jam pa'o// drag kyi
281a1(rgyud): // yi ni las dag la/ mi yi tshil gyis bya bar bshad// gtor ma nya dang sha la sogs/ sbyang dag la sogs lhag par dbul// de ltar der ni tshogs bsags nas// de nas rig sngags 'chang ba yis// 
281a2(rgyud): sangs rgyas kun la phag byas te// byang chub sems la dmigs nas ni// ri mo yi ni las rnams dag/ gal te 'dri bar mi nus na// yi dwags phal chen dbus dag tu// pad+ma sngar bris gang yin pa// da yi stang
281a3(rgyud): du yi dwags ni// mkhas pas yid kyis bsam par bya// yi dwags kyi ni sngags mchog gis// bsam pa dag ni byas nas kyang // gra yi bcon bzhi po yang // sngags nyid kyis ni bsam par bya// gal te dri
281a4(rgyud): banus na ni// sngags nyid steng du bzhag pa ba/ sgo yo yi dwags bzhi po yang // gal te bri bar ma nus na// de bzhin yi dwags 'dzin sngags kyis/ byin gyis rlob par gsungs pa yin// de yi nang du rang snga
281a5(rgyud): kyis/ byin gyis rlob par bya ba'i phyir/ rkang lag mgo bo dpung pa dang // de bzhin gzhan yang dpung pa dang // gzhan yang de bzhin la/ pa'i phreng // thod pa keng rus mi lpags rlon// ro yi
281a6(rgyud): phreng ba bsam par bya// de yi nang du rang sngags kyis// byin gyis rlob tu gzhug par bya// de ltar cho ga bzhin bsam nas// 'jug tu khro bo gshin rje'i gshed// sngags brjod pas ni spyan drangs nas// rang
281a7(rgyud): snying pos bzhugasu gsol// khro bo 'khrugs pa 'jigs mdzad pa// sku ni me lce'i'abar ba 'dra// gzi ljid 'phags pa bsam pa ni// sku mdog stang zil bcag 'phro 'dra// zhal drug skra yang kham par
281a8(rgyud): 'dug/ smin ma kham pa mig kyang sed/ sbyin gsum mig ni zlum pa ste/ phyag ni bcu gnyis pa yi gzugs/ de bzhin yi dwags steng na 'azhugs/ zhabs drug gis ni mdzes parar+ya byas/ tri shul ral gyi/ 
281b1(rgyud): drubyug drag ste// sbyin pa'i phyir ni phag brkyang ba/ lcags kyu yin mtshon ma dag/ g.yas pa'i phag na de bzhin bsnams// de bzhin g.yon pa'i drug po yang // thod pa mdung thung mdara' bo che// mdzub mos brji
281b2(rgyud): dang zhag pa bsnams// phag na du byug to bsam par bya// mi mgo rlon dang skam po dang // yi dwags phreng ba rnam par rgyan// stag gi lpags pa'i na bza' gsos// sku yang che la gsus khyim che// zhal gyi dbyibs
281b3(rgyud): ni du ma ste/ skra ni rgya mtsho 'khrugs pa 'dra// zhal gcig bzhad cing zhal gcig ni// zhal gcig 'jigs par bgrad pa'i zhal// zhal gcig zhal ni gdangs pa ste/ ljags kyang bskyod par mdzad pad/ 
281b4(rgyud): zhal gcig kyang ni mche ba gtsigs/ de ltar snying pos legs par ni// spyan drangs mchod yon dbul bar bya/ de nas dri dang phyung ba'i chus/ mcho yon chog bzhin phul nas/ yi dwags kyi ni spyi bo
281b5(rgyud): yang // me tog dmar po bzhag pa drug/ blo chen gyis ni khro bo la// de nas tsan+da dmar po dbul// dri yi 'og tu me tog rnams/ tsan+da gyi ni gtor ma dbul// me tog me tog gtor ma dbul/ 
281b6(rgyud): me tog me tog phreng ba rnams// me tog sngags kyis dbul bar bya// me tog sngags kyis rims bzhin du// me tog cho ga bzhin phul nas// rang gi snying po sngags kyis kyang // khro bo yi ni spyi bo dang // khro bo
281b7(rgyud): gtso bo'i snying kar ni/ snying po rnam par dgod par bya// mtshogs mang de yi mtshogs ma dang // de yi gtsug tu spyi gtsug bzhag/ da yi lus la go cha dang // mtshon cha'i tshogs la mtshon bzhag snga
281b8(rgyud): skad bstan pa 'di dag ni// me tog dag gis dgod par ga/ de ltar ci rigs mchod nas kyang / bdug pa rang gi sngags kyis dbul/ de nas mar me rab 'bar ba/ pogs brgya du yang dgod pa nga// 'byung
282a1(rgyud): // po'i gtor ma khro bo la// phul nas yi dwags phal chen gyi// phyi rol tu ni mkhas pa yis// smre gtor rnams ni sbyin par bya// khro ba gtsol de phyogs te/ de nas yang ni bdug pa dbul/ de yi phing ngos
282a2(rgyud): chu bcas snod// me tog gis ni bkang ste bzhag/ tshogs khrus kyi bsnyung ba yi// slob ma dag ni bos nas kyang / sngags kun gyis ni gzi bskyed la/ khro bo yi ni snying po yis/ lag gnyis me tog byin nas ni// 
282a3(rgyud): gos kyis gdong ni g.yog par bya/ dkon mchog gsum ni dran pas la// slob dpon gyis ni bzhugs par bya// rang gi snying pos me tog nyid/ dkyil 'khor la ni gtor du gzhug/ de nas btson zhes pa
282a4(rgyud): yaM// phyag rgya sngags pas de la bstan/ dkon mchog gsum no ga/ sang ba yi// dam tshig de la sbyin par bya/ de nas grub par bya ba'i phyir/ sngags pas chu dang me tog gis/ khro bo'i gtso ba'i gas
282a5(rgyud): sngags dag/ dbang skur nas ni de la sbyin// de nas khro bo snying po yi// cho ga bzhin du dbang bskur nas// me tog bdug pa'i phreng ba yI/ snying po de la sbyin par bya/ khro bo yini snying po mcho
282a6(rgyud): des kyang de ltar mnos nas ni/ de nas bla mas phag byas nas/ ci nus sbyin pas mchod par bya/ sngags pas bla ma mchod byas nas/ dngos grub thob 'gyur gzhan du min// slob ma snying po byin nas kyang / 
282a7(rgyud): phreng ba tsan+da la sogs pas// mchod nas de yi 'og tu ni// phyi rol du ni sngang bzhag pa'i// dri chu la sogs bkang ba'i snod/ de blangs mchod yon phul nas ni// 'jam dbyangs khro bo mi bzad pa'i/ @
282a8(rgyud): rtsal drag po gshegasu gsol// bzhud nas kyang ni yon chud// dkyil 'khor la yang dbul bar bya/ rgya chen sa yi dkyil 'khor na// dngos grub mtshungs med 'dod pa yi// rig sngags 'chang
282b1(rgyud): gi de ltar ni// mchod pa rtag tu legs par bya// de nas dngos grub thob par 'gyur// 'jam dpal gyi rtsa ba'i cho ga zhib mo khro bo rnam par rgyal ba'i rgyud chen po las yi dwags phal po che'i dkyil 'khor
282b2(rgyud): rim par phye ba ste gnyis pa'o// de nas gzhan yang gsang sngags rnams 'byung ste/ oM na maHsarba ta thA ga kASh+TaHpre ta mu kha pa dak+Sha swA hA/ dbus kyi yi dwags kyi'o// oM na maHsarba ta thA ga te/ oM kraH
282b3(rgyud): bi dzA ya/ oMg+na dzA li tri dzi hiSh+pe ta shwa ri hUM paT/ 'di ni grwa yi be con bzhi'i sngagaso/ oM na maHsarba ta thA ga ti b+h+yaHoM pre ta thod lak+Sha ya hU paT/ shar gyi sgo'i yi dwags kyi'o// oM pre ta bi mAn+ta ka hU~M phaT/  sga
282b4(rgyud): yi dwags kyi'o// oM pre ta dz+wa la hUM phaT/ nub kyi sgra'i yi dwagaso/ o k+Shi pra pre tota ki Ta hUM phaT bang sgo'i yi dwag so/ oM na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHpre Tha mA le bi kr-i te/ pre ta mA le bi kr-i te pra ta mA la dza
282b5(rgyud): kr-i te/ gu t+ya be tsika mu kha~M sarba klo badz+rAd+d+ho hUM phag/ yi dwags phreng ba'i'o// 'din mau dwags kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sngags kyi tshogs/ dani khri ba gshin rje'i gshed spyan drangs pa la
282b6(rgyud): sogs pa'i sngags la sogs pa 'byung / oM na ma bud+d+ha d+harma se ge b+heHkro d+ha ba ra bi ra sarba ma yen/ A gats+tsha A gan+d+ha/ oM AHhUM/ i dAM pre ta/ A sa naH/ pre tota ga ta na rAk+Sha rAk+Sha swAhA/ khro bo'i
282b7(rgyud): rgyal po gshin rje'i gshed spyan drang ba'i sngagaso// oM dz+wa la dz+wA li ta li ta bi gra ha hUM phaT go cha'i'o// oM a kro d+he kA ya man+ta ka ha na ma thA b+hany+tsa hUM phaT/ 'di ni khro ba'i rgyal po gang gi rtog pa 'di yin
282b8(rgyud): pa do'i sngags mige 'bru bcu 'dun pa'i/ oM AHhUM/ de nyid kyi stong pa'o// oM kA la hUM phaT/ mtshogs ma'i'o// oM ya mad+ha/ e ka bIr hUM phaT/ spyi gtsug gi'o// oM baM bas sa tran ta ka hUM/ mtshon
283a1(rgyud): / tsha'i'o// 'di ni khro bo'i rgyal po gshin rje gshed kyi yan lag lnga pa'o// oM e ka bI ra ya man+ta ka bi sa ra swA hA/ mchod yon 'bul ba'i sngagaso/ oM b+hi mAm ta ka te dzo ba lin ni swA hA/ 
283a2(rgyud): lha bshos kyi sngag so// oM bA ka tsi ta sho ni tra ra tra/ saM gan d+ha bi gra ha swA hA/ dri'i sngagaso// oM di pa sre ka ma la d+ha ri NaswA hA/ me tog gi sngagaso// oM tsi tri d+hU pa pri yA ya swAhA/ bdug pa'i sngagaso// oM dAM byA
283a3(rgyud): dz+yo tiSh+Tha ste swA hA/ mar me'i sngagaso// oM sarba a mi she b+hu ba ha ri Ne swA hA/ sme gtor thams cad kyi sngags// oM dI byAn nu b+h+yo dzi ni/ ha ra ha ra dre dr-i khA hU~M swA hA/ gtor ma thams cad dbul ba'i sngag so// 
283a4(rgyud): khu khu ni pre to ta ka te/ pre ta mA la li ni/ mA s+sa kle d+ha bri bri ti shi pre dri da dr-idaHkhu khu ni gri ha pA liM swA hA/ ya~M dwags mang po'i dkyil 'khor gyi gtong ma'i sngag so// 'jam dpal gyi bya ba'i chog
283a5(rgyud): zhib mo khro bo rnam par rgyal ba las yi dwagyes phal po che'i dkyil 'khor gyi sngags rim par phye ba ste gsu pa'o// de nas gzhan yang 'jam dbyangs kyis// khro bo dpa'
283a6(rgyud): gcig pu ni// tshad med gzi brjid bdag nyid che/ de yi phyag rgya bshad par bya// thog mar dkon mchog gsum po yi// dam tshig mngon par bstan byas nas/ lag pa g.yas pa cho ga bzhin// 
283a7(rgyud): legs par rab tu bcing bar bya// rig 'dzin dag gi rtag par ni// lag pa'i sor mo thad kyis// mthe bong legs par sbas pa ni// rab tu bsdams pa bzang po bcing // cho ga zhes pa'i be con rgya// 
283a8(rgyud): snying po sngags sam log shin tu// sngags pa phyag rgya sngags kyis bcing // gzhan du nam yang mi bcing // oMn mo bud+d+ha d+har+m+ma sa~M g+he/ a sar+b+ba ta thA ga te kro d+ha bi dzA ya/ ag+ni dz+wa la ti dzi hA/ 
283b1(rgyud): ag+ni dz+wa li/ tadzi hA khre ta shi hUM phaT/ be con gyi phyag rgya'i sngag so// phyag rgya gcig pur gyur pa 'di// khro ba'i snying po sngags 'bar byed// mtshon cham lus pa yi gtso// bdud rnams thams cad
283b2(rgyud): zhi bar byed// ji ltar dkyil 'khor du bri ba/ de yi cho ga bshad par bya// be tson dbyig pa lta bu'i tshul// 'di ni be con zhes par grags// khyang par du ni de yi rtser/ yi drags mgo bo mkhas pas bri// yi drag
283b3(rgyud): mang po rtag tu bri/ de las gzhan du nams kyang min// rig 'dzin gyis ni cho ga bzhin/ rgya 'ad du khrod thal bas bri/ yang na 'di nyid logs shig tu/ gang gis tshen sgrub 'dod pa/ sgrub pa dngos grub 'a
283b4(rgyud): pa yi// rang gi dkyil 'khor dag tu bri// de nas phyaHrgya sgrub pa yis/ dkyil 'khor 'dir ni bshad par bya// snga ma bzhin du gru bzhi pa// yi dwags phal chen 'dir yang bri// de yi dbus
283b5(rgyud): cod bzhag/ phyogs brgyad rnamasu de bzhin// ga rgya dgu dang ldan pa yi// phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor zhes kyang \u0f7f/ de bzhin du ni lho yi sgo// phye ste de nas mchod pa hA// phyag rgya sngags na
283b6(rgyud): ma lus pa// khro rgyal rang gi spel ma bya// de yis 'dir ni mchod gyur la// rim gyis gsang ba'i mchod byas 'gyur// oM na mo bud+d+ha d+har+m+ma saM g+he b+h+yaHoM A sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta kro d+ha bi dza ya/ ag+ni ra dzA la
283b7(rgyud): tra pre Sha shing hUM phaT hUM/ 'di ni khro bo rnam par rgyal ba'i gong du bcug pa'i be con gyi phyag rgya'i sngag so// 'di las thams cad bsgrub par bya'o// de nas dngos grub kun gyi mchog/ khro ba'i gtso bo de kha
283b8(rgyud): gsang ba'i mchod dang ldan pa yi// be con sgrub pa ru'ang pad+ma bya// snying po'i ze ba mdzes pa yi// pad+ma mdab ma brgyad byas la// mdab ma rtse mo'i phyogs brgyad// be con kho bo'i bar bcug shi// 
284a1(rgyud): su dgu pa bzhag nas ni// gzhan rnams shang phyogs nas brtsams te// bskor ba'i tshul dug rims bzhis/ me tog dag gis bzhag par bya// be con kun gyis bon hUM// yi drag
284a2(rgyud): spyibo ba nag par bya// thog mar oM dang ldan pas te// oM dang na ma mchod par 'gyur// a 'dra khro ba rjem rgyal gyi gas bon dam tshig yin par bshad/ oM AHhUM/ oM ni maM bud+d+ha d+har+m+ma si k+She b+h+yaHsa
284a3(rgyud): rgyas kun gyis mngon par bstod// be con rnams ni thams cad kyang // rang gi de tshig bskul bar ldan/ thams cad 'ang gi dam tshig ldan// de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs las byung / bskul ba'i tshig ni rab ldan zhing
284a4(rgyud): khro bo'i lta bas brtags pa dang / rang rang rtags kyis bskul na ni// de mtha gtu las byed 'gyur/ AH'di khro bo rnam rgyal gyis// khro bo'i lta bas bltas pa'o// rang gi dam tshig dang ldan pa// hUM dang ldan pa
284a5(rgyud): bskul ba bzhin// zhi brgyas pa dbang dang dgug dbye ba dang ni bskrad rnams/ gsang ba'i mchod pa'i spyor ba yis/ bdag gis mad ni bshad pa bya// de yi thog mang yi ge oM/ de las
284a6(rgyud): gzhan pa sngags 'phel byed/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i dam tshig nyid/ gsum pa yin par yongasu bsgrags// bzhi pa dngos grub ster ba'i phyir// 'dir ni sngags la bskul ba'i tshig/ oM AHhUM/ sarba ta thA ga ta hUM
284a7(rgyud): swA hUM/ zhes brjod pa sngags kyi bdag nyid// 'jug gi rgyu ni khro ba yi/ sngags ni 'grel bar byed par bshad// de las gzhan ni khyad por du// rang gis bskul ba'i tshig gis byed// dbang du bya bar 'dod pas ni// 
284a8(rgyud): rang gang ba smos par bya// lha dbang dbang du byos shig ces/ brjod nas tha mar swA hA sbyang // zhi ba'i phyir ni bskul ba nyid// 'jug tu gau Sha Ta brtag par bya// de bzhin gshegs rigs las byung ba'i// dpal ni
284b1(rgyud): mtshungs med 'dod pa yis// bskul ba'i tshig gi mjug tu yang / namaHswA hA rtag tu sbyang / rgyas pa'i ping ni sngon bzhin du// bskul dus bau ShaT sbyar bar bya/ rgyas ping bskul ba'i thog ma dang / tha mar khro bor hUM
284b2(rgyud): yang sbyar// bsad pa la ni phaT ces pa// 'brar ba 'di la lhag pa yin// rig rnams brlag par bya ba la/ hU~M dbus khro dang ldan pa'i phaT// de bzhin bskrad dang bskul ba yi// mgo dang mjug tu hUM bzhago// yang dag
284b3(rgyud): 'brang ba'i phan kyang bzhag/ gsang ba'i mchod pa'i cho gang grags// de ltar mchod pa'i rim pa dang / ba tson dgu ni byas pa par gyur// gsang ba'i mchod pa'i sbyang ba yis// bdug pa me tog de bzhin dri/ de bzhin
284b4(rgyud): gtong ma mang me dang // bzlas pa med kyang 'grub par ra'agyur// dbang du bya dang dbye ba dang // bskrad dang bsad la sogs pa ni// ji skad gsungs pa'i tshul dag dang // de ltar sbyor ba de 'dra las// tshes grangs dag
284b5(rgyud): dang ska ma dang // smyung ba dag kyang bya mi dgos// gsang ba'i mchod ba'i cho ga shes/ phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor legs pas la/ khrus byas khrus ni ma bas rung // ji ltar 'dod pa rang
284b6(rgyud): spyod// ci yang rung ba'i gtor ma dang // lo ma me tog 'bras bus kyang // gang dag gshin rje'i gshed po yi// snying po phyag rgya mchod byed la// byang chub sems dang ldan 'gyur zhing // rab tu gus na zla dru gis// 
284b7(rgyud): don ci 'dod dgos pa rnyed/ ji ltar 'dod pa'i las kyang byed/ 'jam dpal gyi rtsa ba'i cho ga zhib ma khra bo rnam par rgyal po las btson gyi phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor gsang ba'i mchod pa ma padu po bcwan
284b8(rgyud): pa'o// 8 de nas be con phyag rgya yi// ji skad gsungs pa de dag sgrib/ de yi dkyil 'khong gnyis pa'ang gzhan/ dkyil na yi dwags zhes bya ba/ sgrub pas mtshan mo dur khrod du/ dur khrod dag gi thal bas
285a1(rgyud): // grub nig la / ma dzang spong dag dang ldan khri rdul ba me 'ong dril me chog gle bas mdzes 'dug / ltardzas sa dwags mang po nga/ zod pa brgyad kyis rnam par smram// byasan checan
285a2(rgyud): phyag rgya yang // mgo med ro yo steng du bri/ dkyil na yi dwags zhes bya ba'i// thams cad grub byed dkyil 'khor 'di// khro bo'i gtso bo'i phyag rgya yis// mchod pa ji skad gsungs pa ba// sme gting thams
285a3(rgyud): cad byin nas ni/ gtsang mgo cha dgos nas kyang // 'bum phrag gcig ni sngar bstan pa/ byas nas 'di ni brtsam par ba/ phyogs chen dog gi khrag gis kyang // shis pa'i thod pa bkang nas kyang // de bzhi
285a4(rgyud): mi las byung ba'i sha/ phag rgyal ni dbul bar bya/ byugs chen gyi ni tshil bu las/ mar ma 'bar ba byas pa dag/ de yi phyi rol po gas brgyad// sngags bsrung de la dbul ba bya// cho ga shes
285a5(rgyud): bas de lta bur// byas nas mjug la bsgrub par bya// dpal lnga na gos ni dmang po gyon/ can+da dmar pos bskus nas ni/ nu zad dag kyang mi byed pang / mar gyi brgyad la gcig pus
285a6(rgyud): dpa' la sems drag mthu ldan pa'i// grogs ni gsum dang lhan cig tu/ sgrub pa blo ldan sems stobs can/ dbang po legs par bsdams pa yis/ yi dwags kyi ni dkyil 'khor du// sgrub pa la na
285a7(rgyud): 'jug par 'gyur// de nas mtshan mo rgya bcings te// brtan par 'dug la legs par bzlas/ bgegs rnams sna tshogs mtshan gcig tu/ 'byung ste de las rgyal bar bya// de ltar srin po'i tshogs
285a8(rgyud): las/ rgyal nas phyag rgya 'grub par 'gyur/ mi 'grub pa yi las rnams kyang / de nas thogs pa med par byed// 'jam pa'i dbyangs kyi khro ba yis/ bskul nas 'dir ni dgas pa med/ ha ni bi s+pho Ta bany+dza
285b1(rgyud): bany+dza zhes// bskul ba'i tha mar hUM brjod cing // g.yon brkyang ba'i tshul gnas nas/ khros pas ri rtse bgrod dka' dang // ra ba yang thog sgo gang dang // bu gu khang pa dang bdag/ skad cig gis ni rnyil ba ru da/ 
285b2(rgyud): da ra bi s+pho Ta ba dze zhes// bskul ba'i mjug tu hUM brjod na// ri bo dag ni mang po dang // de bzhin lha min sgo dag dang // de bzhin sa dang gzhan dag dang // ji ltar 'dod pa 'gas par byed// pa tsa baM d+hAn sang sho zhes/ 
285b3(rgyud): bskul nas tha ma pahUM brjod na/ phag rgya 'di yis chu rnams ni// thogs pa med par bskams par byed// mtsho chen dang ni chu bo dang // rgya mtsho dag kyang bskams par bab/ staM b+ha ya zhes las gnyis brjod// 
285b4(rgyud): mang hU~M dang de bzhin mu~M// de nas de yi mjug tu hU~M/ sain sta maHzhes sbyangs// pa tsa bi d+h+wan sa ya sho 'a ya sho Sha yang hUM phaT/ ri mo la ni gnas pa bzhin// nges par myung du gnod par 'gyur/ 
285b5(rgyud): tha mar hUM bzhag de nas dring / k+Sho pa ya zhes lan gnyis brjod/ de yi tha mar yi ga ma/ mkhas pa dag gis spong ba ni// dpung rna mas 'khrug par 'gyur ba la/ khros na ngo mtshar ci zhig
285b6(rgyud): tha mar hUM dngag bzhag la// de nas tik+Sha tiSh+Tha bzhag/ sngags pas gal te s+phar na ni// cho ga 'di ni glang po gnon// haM ni bi d+h+wan sa mA ra ya// bskul nas tha mar hUM brjod cing // de bzhin tha ma phaT brjod ma
285b7(rgyud): dpung dag rab tu 'chi bar 'gyur// kha kha bA hi lA hi zhes/ bskul nas tha mar hUM brjod na// dpung rnams phan tshun 'khrug par ni// thogs pa med par rab tu 'gyur/ tha ma ba hUM dang de bzhin phaT/ drim dri
285b8(rgyud): dzadza dri ba drib dag/ nges pa dag tu spyad na ni/ sngags pa khro dang ldan pa yis/ khrag go char 'bab byed par gsungs/ tha ma hUM brjod ha ha hA tA bai tA li hUM paT/ ces bdag gi ba// sngags pa dpa' dang ldan
286a1(rgyud): // pa yis// bskul nas myur du rmongs par 'gyur// tha mar hUM brjod ha ha ha// de bzhin an+ta ya dang phaT/ bskul ba 'di dag dang ldan na/ 'gro ba dag ni mdongs par byed// tha mar hUM brjod de
286a2(rgyud): nas hUM// de bzhin ni dri di dza dza gzhag/ tha mar dri dang phaT ldan na// 'gro ba de ma thag tu 'bebs// khro bo chen po 'di yi ni// phyag rgya de ltar grub gyur na// de tshe las rnams thams cad ni// yid kyis bsku
286a3(rgyud): btsam gyis byed// byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi// dam tshig rab tu bskong ba yin// sgrub pa gang dang gang 'dod pa// de ni thogs pa med par byed// gal te deng ni ma grub na/ 'di yi sngon du ban
286a4(rgyud): pa ni// cho ga bzhin du 'bum byas la// de nas blo ldan sgrub la 'aHgrade che de bzhin gshegs pa yi/ snga ma'i dam tshig bskul ba bzhin de nas slang yang sngags rnams la/ thogs pa med pa de she
286a5(rgyud): skyang / phyag 'tshal ba dang kun tu ldan// de yi thog mar wa~M bzhag la// oM zhes bya ba gzhan yang bzhag/ a zhes bya ba gnyi sa pa'o// de yi tshig gi 'jug tu hUM// gzhag ste de nas
286a6(rgyud): tshig rnams kun// de ltar kro d+ha bi dza ya/ ag ni dz+wa li dzi hA ta shrI// tshig rnams gzhan ni brjod pabya ba// de nas de yi tha ma hUM// de bzhin tshig gi tha mar oM/ mtha' mar A bzhag de yi mthar// hUM/ 
286a7(rgyud): dang saM Ti lag gnyis sgom// pra pu ta zhes lag gnyis sgom// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa yi// bka' lung gis ni phyag rgya do// gzir nas rang gis bzlas brjod pa// de ltar bzlas brjod 'bum
286a8(rgyud): byas nas/ khro bo chen po de yis ni// kun la ci rigs bskul nas// las rnams thams cad bsgrub par bya/ khro bo gtso bo de yi ni/ bkara' bzhin byed de gzhan du min// gang gis sngon du bsnyen pag
286b1(rgyud): 5/ de yis bskul ba'i cho ga ni// ji skad gsungs pa'i las rnams la// kha grub na ni nges par sbyar// gzhan du sngags ni gzir bas na/ bdag nyid nges par 'chi bar 'gyur/ khang par du ni dpa' bo 6/ 
286b2(rgyud): khro bo'i gtso bo'i snying po ni// ngag rgya 'di ni gzir bas na// 'gro ba ma lus 'khrug par 'gyur// sngags 'di gang du bzlas pa dang / 'jig rten 'jig rten las 'das pa// de dag kun gyi lus rnam
286b3(rgyud): ni/ dogs pa med par 'jig par 'gyur// phyag rgya 'di yis gzir gyur na// dpag tshad bdun gyi dkyil 'khor na// gzhan gyi sngags rnams gang yod dang // dgra rnams dregs pa med par byed/ 
286b4(rgyud): 'byung po skrag par byed pa dang / de bzhin lha rnams 'gug/ dbar byed/ khro ba rab tu dga' bar byed// gshin rje'i gshed zo'i mthu yang bskyed/ yi drags ro langs rigs pa/ 
286b5(rgyud): ni// de bzhin rab tu 'jigs par byas// khang dang gnod pa skrag pa yang // rab tu bskul na 'jigs par byed/ bgeg/ sa rnams thams cad 'jigs par byed// 'chi ba thang
286b6(rgyud): med par byed// phongs pa thams cad med bad la// bcon phyag rgya drag por bsgrags// dragra dang de bzhin gzhan dag kyang / skye bo dag la 'di bcings bstan// gshin rje'i gshed po spang na ni/ 
286b7(rgyud): de yi mdo la srog kyang 'phrog mdor ni snying po phyag rgya yi// cho ga rang gi dam tshig cas khro bo'o zhal nas gsungs pa 'ad/ gsang bar rab tu bstan pa yin/ sngags pas khro ba'o ga
286b8(rgyud): ni// gshin rje'i gshed po gcig dba' ba'o// snying po phyag rgya brtson dang / snying po dag gi spyang bar bya// 'jam dpal gyi rtsa ba'i cho ga zhib mo khro bo rnam par rgyal ba las btson gyi pas/ 
287a1(rgyud): // cho ga zhib mo rnam par phye bsna lnga pa'o// de nas yig bcu bdun pa'i// rtsa ba'i sngags ni gang yin pa/ de yi phag rgya gzhan dag kyang / ro langs zhes ni ba ba yod// gshin rje'i gshed
287a2(rgyud): drag brtson pa'i// snying ni dga' bod gsang ba'o// sngags pa dag gis gang dag tu// bcings pa der ni bin rlob pa/ ro langs zhes pa'i phag rgya 'di// khro bos gsungs pa bshad par ba// dur khrod
287a3(rgyud): dag gi thams cad ni// gang la rtag tu rag lus pa'o// de nas lag pa gnyis ka yi// sor mo phan tshun bsnol bas te// sor mo gung mau gshibs te skrang // mdzub mo gnyis kyis srin lag gnyis// ma
287a4(rgyud): bong gnyis kyis srin lag gnyis/ legs papa bzung nas dgug par bya// mthe'u chung gnyis kyang nang du dgug/ de bzhin du ni mthe bong gnyis/ phan tshun bsnol te brkyang bar bya// shes rab can
287a5(rgyud): gyis ro langs 'di// rtag tu tshul bzhin khro bos bstan/ khro po gtso bo'i gsang sngags gang // yi ge bcu bdun legs gsungs pa// de nyid 'di dang sbyar bar bya/ ro langs rgya
287a6(rgyud): rgya ldan pa ste// bdag nyid 'dong pa thams cad ste/ ha har gyur pa'i dkyil 'khor du// cho ga bzhin du spang bar bya// ha har gyur pa'i dkyil 'khor ni// khro bo 'bang byed bshad par bya// tshig bzhin du
287a7(rgyud): ni spang bar ba// yi dwags phal chen bshad pa bzhin// 'di yang gru bzhi lham par bya/ khad par dag tu phyogs kun tu// mkhas pas ma ni spang bar bya// khru brgyad lhag chad med par ni/ cho ga bzhi/ 
287a8(rgyud): du bri bar ba// sgo sgo dag tu gsal shing gis// phug pa'i yi dwags khrag can bzhag/ dbus su mgo dang bral ba yi// mi ro ro smad gsal bar bzhag/ yi dwags phal chen dkyil 'khor bzhin/ 
287b1(rgyud): tha mar yi dwags phreng ba dgod// khro bo yi ni gtso bo'i sngags/ mchogs ma spyi gtsug la sogs med// yi ge bcu bdun blo ldan gyis// mgo med ro yi steng du bzhag zhal drug pa la zhabs kyang
287b2(rgyud): drug/ de bzhin pag ni bcu gnyis pa// rab tu 'bar ba drag po'i gzugs// snga ma bzhin du bzhag par bya// yi dregs mang po spang ba ni/ snga ma bzhin du bzhag nas kyang / me tog bdug pa drang
287b3(rgyud): la sogs// sngags des de la mchod padra ba/ 'dir ni gtor ma sha chen du// gsungs pas gzhan gyis mi bya'o// khrag gi gtor ma'i cho ga dang / de bzhin bdug pa kun sme ba'i// de mas dpal ldan pa
287b4(rgyud): 'dzin gyis/ ro langs phyag rgya bcings nas ni// gtong ma me tog dbul la sogs/ rnam pa kun tu khro bos pa// dkyil 'khor gyi ni khor yug gi// phyogs brgyad dag tu mang me
287b5(rgyud): dgod// dur khrod dag gi mgal dum maM// yang na gsal shi bdag gis bud// seng ldeng dag gi bzar bu yis// tshil chen dag la lan bdun du// lho phyogs me la bsregs nas ni/ 
287b6(rgyud): de nas khro bo bsgrub par bya/ de la sngon du bsnyen pa dang / bzlas pa dang ni bsdams pa'ang med// rig 'dzin nyid kyi sems stobs nyid// 'di yi rgyur ni shes par bya// lnga phyogs bskor ni nan tan du/ 
287b7(rgyud): ma med pa'i ro bzhag ste/ snying kar raM langs brgya bzhag la// de la rab tu bskor bar bya// de nas khro ba chen po yis/ shin tu bkrus shing lags par rgyan// dri dang me tog dmar sngon gyis// legs
287b8(rgyud): ngag tu mchod nas kyang / mkhas pas ro langs phyag rgya yis/ thog mar bdag nyid bsrung bar bya// gshin rje'i gshed byed yan lag lnga// de bzhin lus la sbyang badrub/ dpa' bo mthu chen bdag
288a1(rgyud): / nyid kyis/ la gri lag par blangs nas ni// dpa' bo'i rkang pa g.yon pa yis// de yi snying kar mtshan nas ni// dpa' ba'i rkang pa g.yan pa yis// dal snang kang mdzad nas na// khro zam
288a2(rgyud): gtso bo yi/ yi ge bcu bdun sngags bzlas// oM a kro d+ha ka ya mahAg/ tan ma thA rmany+dza hUM phaka 'di ni rtsa ba'i sngags yig 'bru bcu bdun pa'o// de sngags drag pos bskul ba dang / yi dregs don
288a3(rgyud): bar 'gyur// ta tang gyur pa 'khrugs pa dang // de bzhin ha ha'i sgra yang 'byin// de nas bdag gis langs pa la// mtshon cha rnon po 'bar ba yis/ bcad pa'i sha dang khrag bcas pa'i// mchod yon de
288a4(rgyud): la dbul ba bya// rig pa 'dzin pa da yi ni// sems kyi drod ni des shes nas// mchod son blangs te dkyil 'khor ni/ ha har gyur pa 'jigs par byed// de nas bdag nyid chen po de'i// 'ji
288a5(rgyud): su rung ba'i gzugs mthong nas// gshin rje'i gshed rje dpa' bo yi// ro langs phyag rgya bstan par bya/ de nas gshin rje'i gshed po ni// yi dwags lus la gnas pa ngas/ 
288a6(rgyud): langs nyid kyi rgya mthong nas// rig pa 'dzin pa de yi ni// sems drod rig nas 'dod pa'i mchog sbyin par byed la gdon mi za// khro ba'i rgyal po slang gshegs nas/ mi ros la 'gyel bar 'gyur/ 
288a7(rgyud): de yi lus ni de nyid kyang / gser du 'gyur ba gdon ma za/ de tshe grogs po rnams dang yang // son rnams la ci bdeng sbyin/ bdag nyid chen po dpa' bo yi// sgrub pa bshad pa 'di yin te/ sems na
288a8(rgyud): rab tu dpar bas bya'i// ngan song gzhan gyis mong mi bya/ sems zhan pa yi sgrub pa pos/ khro bo'i rgyal po da bsgrubs na/ de ni langs nas myur bar ni/ grogs dang bcas pa gsod par 'gyur rol
288b1(rgyud): phyag rgya mi shas na// des ni ci ltar drag gyur kyang / khro bo'i rgyal po de yis ni// sgrub pa po ni bsad par 'gyur/ rig 'dzin mchog gis gang dag tu// de bzhin gshegs pa'i dam tshig gis rgyun cing gro
288b2(rgyud): ba~M bskul ba yis// ro langs phyag rgya bcings pa dang // gdon mi za bar khro bo ni// legs par byin gyis rlob par 'gyur// myur du mchog kyang stsol bar mdzad// 'go bar gyur pa gdon mi za// oM na mo bud+d+ha
288b3(rgyud): d+har+m+ma saM g+he b+h+yaHa kro d+ha kA ya mAn+ta ka ha na ma thA b+hany+dza hUM ba tha bi rak+Sha man+ta ta thA ga to Adz+nyA pa ya ti swA hA/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i dam tshigs bkas rgyan pa/ ro langs kyi khro bo'i phyag rgya'i sngaH
288b4(rgyud): so/ ha ra gyur pa'i dkyil 'khod du/ ro langs phyag rgya rang sngags dang // ldan na myur du khro bo ni// nges par byin gyis rlob par mdzad// dpa' bo dag gi sbyor bar ni// sdang bsnyen la
288b5(rgyud): byed na yang / sgrub pa po ni 'dod pa bzhin/ khro bongs par myu ra du 'grub/ yang na ro 'angs phyag rgya 'di// skyes bu sems ni mi dpa' bas/ hahar gyur pa'i dkyil 'khor du/ bdag

288b7(rgyud): byas pa'am/ de bzhin sku gzugs gzhan yang rung / yid dang dbang po bsdams byas te/ thog mngar tshig 'bum bzlas pa bya / de lta ba sngon du bstan pa ni/ ci ltar 'dod pa bya byas nas gdong / phyi
288b8(rgyud): nas smyung ba byas nas de/ Sha longs pag rgya sgrub la 'jug sa sar gyung ba'i dkyil 'o khor na/ tshag bzhin du dung khrod bri// yango na sems ni mi dpa' bas/ dung khrod thal bas lam du bri khyim
289a1(rgyud): // stong pa yin yang rung / gal te khyim de ma stong ma/ sa par gyur pa mthong ba dang / zhag bdun lon ma thag tu 'jig/ de nas yi dwags mang po las// gsungs pa'i mchod bci rigs byas/ 
289a2(rgyud): de nas lho phyogs sgor 'dug ste/ byang gi phog su kha bltas la// rang gi dam tshig las gsungs pa'i// ro langs phag rgya bcings te bzlas/ zla ba mar gyi tshes brgyad la/ blo ldan chog shes pa yis
289a3(rgyud): mtshan ma bstan cing 'dug nas ni// nyi ma shar gyi bar du bzlas// de nas khro bos dgongs pa yis// ro langs lha mo 'grub par 'gyur// khro bo lha yi sngags dag dang // bskul ba'i tshig ni mchog rnams

289a5(rgyud): byed par 'gyur/ ro langs phyag rgya sgrub pa bri/ sngags pa rnams la 'dir gsung so// de ni zhan pa'i sems rnams kyis// sgra pa dag ni gsum pa 'byung // cho ga bzhin du sngar bshad bI/ 
289a6(rgyud): yi dwags mang po de tshe bri// gang yang rung bar ci rigs par// sngags de rnams kyis sbyar bar bya// de nas yi dwags mang po yis// dkyil 'khor blta na sdug pa 'di// khyim mam yang na gzhan yang
289a7(rgyud): rung / dang ni dkyil 'khor bris nas ni// de dbus yaM dwags spyi bo la/ ro langs ma ni 'ding bzhog// khro ba yi yi ge gzi bskyed pa/ zhi zhing kun tu dga' byed pa/ ro langs slong po'i phyag rgya ni// bcings
289a8(rgyud): de la sbyang bdubya// de nas ro langs phyag rgya yis/ gsang ba'i yi ge bcu gsum pa'o// zhi ba gzhan yang shes byas nas/ ci ltar 'dod pa bzlas po ba/ oM AHhUM bai tA la~M rA kA rAmA ma~M sAhA// 
289b1(rgyud): langs lag rgya'i snying po 'ang // gang yang rung bar ci 'dod par/ bcur bsgyung ba yi grangs rnam su// cho ga ji bzhin bzlas nas ni/ rma du byung ba'i las rnams kyang / mid kyis bsams pas byed par 'gyur
289b2(rgyud): gsang ba'i rig sngags dam pa 'di/ las rnams thams cad byed pa'o// de nas da ni 'di yi las/ khro bo'i rgyal po nyid kyis kyang / tshig zhib las gang gsungs pa/ de dag mdor ni bshad par ba/ chu
289b3(rgyud): dang gnad dang rmongs pa dang // de bzhin dbab pa'i cho ga dang // dbang du bya dang byed pa dang // bsad pa dang ni bskrad pa dang / phan tshun 'thab cing gsod pa dang // de bzhin gzhan yang mig 'phrul dang // zhi dang
289b4(rgyud): par sbyor ba dang / de bzhin dga' ba byed pa dang / dgug par byed pa'i cho ga yang / mdor bsdus nas ni bshad par bya/ ri langs phyag rgya las sgrub phyir/ cho ga bzhin du sngang bsnyen pas/ som
289b5(rgyud): don rnams sgrub pa'i phyir// cho ga 'di ni rnam par brtsam/ rma ba'i mjug ma'i sgro dag gi/ mdongs brgya bam por sbam sa nas kyang // seng ldeng yu ba 'phan med pa// bzang po khru

289b7(rgyud): byas ro langs bri mkhas pas mchod rten 'og tu bzhag/ de nas zla ba gzas zin pa'o// nub mo yi dwags ngal chen gyi/ dkrol 'khor mtsho 'grom dris nas bzlas// de nas grub phyir snga
289b8(rgyud): yis// mjug me de la ming gtang nas/ lag pa gson pas bzung nas ni// zla ba del blta zhing bzlas/ sems ni 'dud kyis me 'khrugs pa'i// sems dpa' chen po kha cig la/ drang dadun
290a1(rgyud): 'phrul 'bar ba dag mjug ma de las 'byung bar 'gyur// dro bar gyur ba mthong na ni// byang chub sems dpa' 'dra ba yis/ sems can rnams ni thams cad la/ des ni phan 'dogs gnod
290a2(rgyud): banus// mjug ma bzang po de las ni/ du ba 'byung ba mthong na yang / myur du mi snang bar yang 'gyur// 'dod pa'i gzugs can yid mgyogs bzhin/ rga ba dang ni 'chi ba med// gnod sbyin rnams ni yongasu
290a3(rgyud): bskor// sems can chen po de yi gzis// gal ta de ni 'bar 'gyur na// rig 'dzin dpal dang ldan par 'gyur// nam mkha' la ni myur du 'gro// bde ba kun dang ldan pa yis// rig 'dzin rnams kyis mchog
290a4(rgyud): tu 'gyur// gal te zla ba gzas btang la/ de tshe grub par ma gyur na'ang / mjug ma lan gcig bskor ba yis/ dpung rnams gnon pa'i dngos grub dang // gang yang rung ba gci kyang gnon
290a5(rgyud): mos pas dregs pa'i glang po dang // stag dang seng ge wa rna mas dang / rta dang shing rta ba rnams dang / glu dang gru chen ba'o/ na ba rnams/ bskor na thams cad gnod par bang a
290a6(rgyud): pa dag las thar bar yang / mjug ma 'dis ni gdon mi za// de nas gzhan yang ro langs kyis// rmugs par bya ba gsang bar bshad// de nas tshil chen blangs nas ni// de yang thod pa'i nad du bzhag
290a7(rgyud): aM shwa mar dmar po yis/ shing ngal 'jam po'i snying po pa/ gdol pa'i ma yis 'bar bas nas// nyi ma zla ba gzas zin tshe// thod pa'i drung pa blangs nas ni/ zla ba 'am yang nanyi ma dag/ btang
290a8(rgyud): bang du bzlas pa ba/ yang na arga'i shing bal las/ de yi 'og tu lcags thung gyis/ mig gnyis dag ni bsku ba ba// de ltar mig gnyis bskus pa yis/ gang dag bltas pa de dag ni/ chu/ 
290b1(rgyud): bar 'gyungar bang gdon ma la/ de nas gdong krus bltas nan/ slang sa de las thar bar 'gyur/ de nas gzhan yang rmongs pa'i// rmongs par byed pa mchog pashod/ an 'acig gi zla ba dang / khan
290b2(rgyud): ka yi rtsa ba dang // a shwa ma ra ru Na dang / mo han yi rtsa ba dang // ma hA na la yi rtsa ba dang // shar bu kar ldan pas shing / yi drags me tog rnying bar ldan/ mdun so dag dang ldan pas te/ skyes pa dag
290b3(rgyud): gam bud med kyi/ gsang ba'i lpags pa dang ldan pa/ bu mo 'dod pa ma spyad pas// mar gyi brgyad la legs par btab/ phyis ni bud med khrag dag dang / bong bu'i khu bas smra bar bya// dur khrod thal ba
290b4(rgyud): dang sbyang te/ de nas mar gyi chos brgyad la/ thog ma yi da sa mong bris nas/ rig pa 'dzin pas mtshan mo bzlas/ stong rtsa brgyad ni legs bzlas na// de nas rdzas ni grub pa
290b5(rgyud): 'gyur// rmongs par byed pa'i phye ma 'di// sems kun la sgra na ni// de nas rmongs par byed par 'gyur// 'di la the tsom mi bya'o// 'thab mo dang ni rtsod pa dang // rgyal po g.yul ngo chen
290b6(rgyud): la// bdag gi phyogs ni srung ba'i phyir/ sbyor ba shes pas 'di bskul ba'i/ ba dan dag kyang sgrang na ni/ ngag rnams kun tu rmongs par 'gyur// pha ma 'di yis reg na ni// de ma thag tu mi rnams rmongs
290b7(rgyud): chung zhugs na ni thar bar 'gyur/ nges par gzhan du ma yin// de nas gzhan yang dbab pa ni/ cho ga'i mchog ni bshad par bya// ci nas 'byung po dzad ni// mod la 'bab par 'gyur ba'o// sdug gi
290b8(rgyud): lpags pa dang ldan pang / sbrul gyi shun pa brtags na ni// dug dang yung ba'i rtsa ba dang / mo can dang ma la ti/ ra yi gcin las btags nas ni// de nas de dag ril bung bya/ tsan ka yi 'bru chang la/ 
291a1(rgyud): / bdud nam brgyad dam dgu'am yang // gzhan yang ri bong khrag dag dang // gur gum la su btags na su// bdud nam brgyad dam dgu dag tu// ril bu snga ma bzhin du bya// de nas snga ma'i ril
291a2(rgyud): bu la/ sngags pas thod pa snod bzhag/ mar gyi tshes brgyad mtshan mo ni// brgya rtsa brgya du bzlas par ba// gur gum can ni a ri sta'i// snod ni gtsang mar bzhag par bya// de bzhin stong rtsa brgyad bzlas te// 
291a3(rgyud): rtse mor rab tu sbyang bar bya// sngar ni legs par sbyar byas pa'i// ril bu tha mal gdug pa la/ btab na myur du 'bab pa ni// ring por mi thogs gzhan du min/ bsams nas mya du bsang ba ni// de nas gur
291a4(rgyud): gum ril bus te// de nas gzhan yang grub po 'do// dab du byed pa gang gi mchog rig pa 'dzin pa'i yid las 'byung / las kyis nges 'gyur ba shad par bya/ ra// zhes ni 'di grags pa/ rtsa ba ruH
291a5(rgyud): mu li ka/ deng blangs shar bu ka dang / mi las byung ba'i mdu/ so dang // tshub mas btsugs pa'i shing lo ni/ lding zhing lhag dang bcas pa dag/ gzhon mas ni mtshan mo btag/ pha ma
291a6(rgyud): mchog de lan bdun du/ bdag gi khu bas sgrub par ba// de nas bdag gis sbyar ba de// pad+mo snying po la bzhag pa/ gtsang mas mar gyi tshes brgyad la// blo ldan lag pas bzung nas ni// sngags kyis stong
291a7(rgyud): du gdab par bya// phye ma'i rgyal po dbang byed pa// de nas dngos grub thob par 'gyur// bza' ba 'am btung ba dag la sbyin// yang na phye ma gdab par bya/ yang na rlung gi phyogasu btang / yang na gos la la/ 
291a8(rgyud): gcig gdab/ yang na byug pa 'am so yi rtsi// gang yang rung bar sbyar na ni/ de la 'dis ni lan gcig gis// mos shing drags pa'i ngag dag ni// rgyang nas kyang ni dbang du 'gyur/ bran bzhin du ni len
291b1(rgyud): pa byed// phye ma 'di yis reg pa ni/ shi na'ang rdzasu 'brang bar 'gyur// gal te rgyang ni ring po nas// phams reg par mi 'gyur na/ de yi gzugs brnyan pas nas ni// bam 'di yis gdab par bya/ 
291b2(rgyud): zhag 'dun gyis ni rig 'dzin gyi// ming ni de yis thos nas kyang / bdag rang dang ni nor bcas pa/ gad na mi za bar dbang du 'gyur/ de nas sbyong ba 'ba'o zhig gis// mkhon pa'i las dag bshod pa
291b3(rgyud): bya rma ba'i mdongs ni bzang po dang / de bzhin sbrul gyi shun pa dang // rta dang mahe spu dag dang / ka na ka yi sa bon dang / a shwa ma ra'i me tog dang / de bzhin glang po'i byi bi ling // 'di rnams thams
291b4(rgyud): cang mnyam bas te/ khi ba bi la'i khrag las btag/ bdag gis ril bu mnyam par bya khas nas chog shes pa yis/ mtshan mo stong rtsa brgyad du bzlas/ khi ba dang ni bi la ya~M/ spu
291b5(rgyud): yi bdug pas bdug par bya/ de nas sbyong ba shes pa yis/ de la ril bu gcig blangs nas/ gang dag dbye bar bya ba ni// de dag gcig gi spyi bo la/ ril bu 'am yang na phye ma dag/ 
291b6(rgyud): dab par bya ba'i phyir gang po// dbye bar byed pa'i mchog 'di ni/ khro bo nyid kyis gsungs pa'o// de nas 'di ni bas ba ba/ sbyor ba'i tshul bzhin lags sbyar na/ dogs pa med par 'grub 'gyur ba/ 
291b7(rgyud): gsod byed mchog ni bshad padu ba/ mi dbang rnam pa du ma yis// dkon mchog gsum la gnod byed pa// da la skyong ba 'od sbyar gyi// don song gzhan la mo yin// 'di ni byang chub sems ldan la/ grub
291b8(rgyud): par 'gyur gyi gzhan du min// de bzhin gshegs pa'i dam tshig 'di/ dngos grub thams cad ster bas na// cho ga gzhan du legs par srung // gzhan du byas na 'grub mi 'gyur/ de bzhin ga
292a1(rgyud): / pa dngos grub kun/ 'dod na srog chags pa na 'dod pas// 'og dang 'bur ba'i drongos grub kyang kha shol ba med par bsgrub par ba/ khro dang gtum pa'i spyod pa can/ 'dod pang gsod
292a2(rgyud): 'dod de la/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i dngos grub dag rmi lam du yang dag la 'byung / snying rtse bzed dang de bzhin bams/ rang ba nini gyis ni snying rje tsam ji skad bston pa'i sngags pa ni/ byang chub
292a3(rgyud): sems nyid sems byed la/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i dngos grub kun// gdon mi za bar de la 'grub// 'dug pa rnams ni 'dul ba'i phyir/ sbyor ba 'di ni kun tu gsungs/ dkon mchog gsum la
292a4(rgyud): cher gnod la/ bya bar bshad kyis gzhan du min// sems gdug bsgrub par bya ba yi// rkang pa'i rjes kyis blangs la/ de nas gtsang ma'i ma ha yi/ gcin gyis de ni spras nas kyang // 
292a5(rgyud): de yi gzugs brnyan pas nas ni/ dur khrod thal bas bsku bar bya// sol ba tsher ma rnon po dang // de bzhin rus pa phub ma dag/ de yi snying kar gdab par bya// de bzhin ga
292a6(rgyud): yang lto ba dang / rna ba sna dang mig dang khaM/ rab tu bkang nas g.yang sar bzhag/ rkang pa g.yon pa mnan par bya// de nas ro langs zhi ba'i sngags// phyin ci log tu bzlog sta bzlas// bsgrub par
292a7(rgyud): ba'i ming smos nas// sgrub pa stong rtsa brgyad bzlas la/ bzlog pa'i rim pa 'di nyid kyis// phaT gnyis dag gi bar du gzhug/ las 'di byas pas nges par ni// bsgrub par bya ba spos gyur nas/ 
292a8(rgyud): nges par 'chi bdag dbang du 'gyur/ blo dang ldan pas bsgrub pa yi// dregs pas de ltar bsal bas na// na ba kun gyis btab pa de// de nas slar yang thar par ba/ gzhan du byas na med la ni// 
292b1(rgyud): nges par 'chi bdag mdun du 'gro// dkon mchog gsum ni srung ba'i phyir// gnod par byed pa thams cad la// nad la sogs pa sbyang na yang / 'chi bar 'gyur ba 'di bshad// dam tshig shes la
292b2(rgyud): mi bsta/ gal te bas na bdag nyid 'chi// bskrad par bya ba'i cho ga yang / 'jam dbangs rab tu dpa' bo yang // khro bo nyid kyi ji skad// gsungs pa da ni bshad par bya// sang ldeng las bas phur bu
292b3(rgyud): ser brgyad tsam du byas pa la// yungs mar tsha bas byugs nas ni/ dur khrod thal bas gdab par bya// de nas khwa ni rang shi ba'i// de yi lpags pas drakra par bya// sgrub pas nub mo phur bu re/ 
292b4(rgyud): skung ba dmar pos bcings nas ni// de las ro langs pa/ ga rgyani// skad cig pa yi tshig ldan pas// bsgrub par ba y-i ming smos te// mkhas pas stong rtsa brgyad bzlas pa// dmas
292b5(rgyud): skrod pa 'dod pa yis// bsgrub par bya ba'i sgo gang ni/ phung bu de ni gdab par bya// 'di ni skrod pa'i mchog tu gsungs/ 'on tang bad+ma byin stobs ldan pa'i// bsgrub pa dub
292b6(rgyud): bskrad par 'gyur// de nas gzhan yang gcig la gcig/ 'thab dang rtsod pa bshad par bya/ dkon mchog gsum la gnod byed par// rig nas ci ltar 'dod pa ni// de dag rang gi phyogs 'phru
292b7(rgyud): par/ sngags pas ji skad gsungs bzhin pa/ ba ri ha dang nai ru tsar/ pa tra dang ni ke shi na~M// de bzhin tha ma su ka ri/ rdzogs pa'i byang chub bzhugs bzhugs pa/ mthu chen sman ni 'od rnams la
292b8(rgyud): gang yang rung ba gcig blangs te// lo ma rlung gis btab par spyad// de bzhin pa la ka ta dang // gos stod nag po ldong ros dag/ 'di dag btags te pha ma ba/ mi yi tshil gyis sbrus nasu// rol
293a1(rgyud): / stong rtsa brgyad du bzlas// nam langs paradu gyur ba dang / gdug pa 'khrug par byed ces pa/ gang gis bsnams te de dag ni// rang gi phyogs rnams pa markun 'khrug/ gcig la gcig
293a2(rgyud): kyang 'thab par 'gyur// yul 'khor dang ni grong khyer dang // dpung la gnod pa bya ba'i phyir// phan tshun gsod par bya ba la/ gdug pa 'di ni sbyar ba ba// phan tshun 'thab cing gsod pa dag / ci rigs
293a3(rgyud): bstan pa 'di yin// de nas gzhan yang mig 'phral gyi// cho ga tshul bzhin bshad par ba// dur khrod dag gis thal ba yis// mig 'bral dngos po 'grub par 'gyur// mi thong bzang por tha
293a4(rgyud): ba dang // ri bong dag gi khrag blugs te// yi dwags pa la char dkyil 'khor gyi// ji skad gsungs pa bris pa bzhag/ de yi nang du ro langs la/ mchod pa chen po byas nas ni// der
293a5(rgyud): lho phyogs sgo dag tu// zhugs thab tu ni me bus te// de nas thal ba de la ni// mar gyis bdugs te sprin bsreg pa// de nas thal ba de la yang // stong rtsa brkyang du bzlas pas
293a6(rgyud): stong rtsa brgyad po de nyid kyis// nam langs par ni nges par yang // mkhas pas mig 'phrul rtsed mo rnams// thal ba des ni byed par 'gyur// me tog dkar la thal ba das// lan ra dag tu bskus
293a7(rgyud): nas ni// na mkhar gtor na nges par yang // rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ston par 'gyur// thal ba de yis snga ma bzhin// me tog ser po la bskus te// de bzhin nam mkha' la gtor na/ 'dod cha/ 
293a8(rgyud): bral ba stong dag dang // nyid kyis gnas bcas sangs rgyas kun// ston par byed bzhin du min/ me tog dkar pos 'jig rten pa'i// lha rnams kun kyang snga ma bzhin/ gang dang gang gi 'dod par/ 
293b1(rgyud): yid la bsam pas ston par byed/ mchog sngon pos de bzhin du/ gnad sbyir srin po snga ma bzhin/ yi drags mkha' 'gro grul bus dang / yang na gang dang gang 'dod pa'o/ zhulas lan dum
293b2(rgyud): bzlas pa ni// gyen du gtor nas nges par yang // mig 'phrul slar yang bsdu bar bya// yang na khu tshur bcangs paso// khra y-i sgro bdun mi dus kyi// yu ba dag la bcings na su// de la thal ba de bsku
293b3(rgyud): te// mig 'phral bsams la ci 'dod par// tshogs kyi nang du bskor nas ni// mtsho dang rgya mtsho rgal ba dang // de bzhin khang pa li ba dang // g.yul dang 'khrug cing 'chi ba dang // ltad mo chen po mtsho/ 
293b4(rgyud): rnams ni// rab tu sbyang ba ston par 'gyur/ khu chur bcangs pas de bzhin sdud// sa yi 'og kyang ston pa dang // 'gro ba mang po'i ngus pa dang / gyen du 'gro dang de bzhin 'khrug/ rang gi
293b5(rgyud): dpung dang rgya mtsho'ang 'a khrug/ mjug ma de dang thal ba ma sa// gzhan yang gang dang gang 'dod pa// de dag nges par byed par 'gyur// khu tshur bcangs pas de bzhin sdud/ de
293b6(rgyud): ltar mig 'phrul 'dor bsdus pa/ ji skad bshad pa de bzhin pa/ ro langs de yi ngo bo nyid// zhi ba'i phyir ni tshul bzhin bzlas// bdag gam 'on te gzhan yang rung // bsgrub pa zhi ba'i tshig
293b7(rgyud): smos te// stong rtsa brgyad du bzlas byas nas// me tog dkar po bzang po ni// gsung zhim yid 'ong ba dag/ tsan+da dkar po chus btab nas// rgya mtshor 'gro ba'i chu nang du// zhugs nas ra re la
293b8(rgyud): bzlas shing / brgya rtsa brgyad ni dor brgya ba/ 'on kyang bdag ma gzhan yang rung / mtshungs pa med pa zhi bar 'gyur/ rgyal po'i yul lam ljongs dgam// grong ngam yang na grong khar dag/ 
294a1(rgyud): // ba'i las de bas pa yi// zhi bar gyur pa gdon mi za/ de nas rgyas pa'i las rnams kyang / tshul bzhin du ni bshad bad+ma ba/ mchod rten la mchod sna tshogs pa/ bas nas de yi mdun 'dug ste// ro langs pag rgya chen
294a2(rgyud): po ni// rdzogs sangs rgyas kyis mchod pa bzlas/ gal te mchod rten ring bsrel can// yin na de ma thag tu 'gyur// bsgrub pa'i ming smos bzlas na ni// skyes pa bud med rgyas par 'gyur// dam chos mchod rten mdun
294a3(rgyud): du ni// cho ga bzhin du khri bzlas na/ dri srid rgyas par 'gyur gyi bar/ de srid rgyal pir rims kyis bzlas// de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod pa dag/ mkhas pas mchod rten kun la ba// ring bsrel can la cho ga pa'i
294a4(rgyud): khang pad du ni bshad pa du ba// thog mar mchod rten drung du ni// mkhas pa dag gis dkyil 'khor ba// de nas der ni me tog dang // shin tu yid 'ong dgram par ba// mem rab tu 'bar ba brgyud// ma
294a5(rgyud): pas de la dbul bar bya// shin tu yid 'ong chu dang bcas// sna chog/ pa'i bshos phul nas// gu gal bdug pa phul nas ni// bang chub sems dang ldan pa yi// de bzhin gshegs pa tha
294a6(rgyud): la// zhesar bcas pas phyag bas nas/ mchod rten la ni mngon phyogs te/ zhi dang rgyas phyir bzlas par bya/ dam pa'i chos kyang klag pa dang // dus du su sang mchod rten pa// de ltar nyin mtshan pad byas na// zhi ba dag
294a7(rgyud): dang rgyas par 'gyur/ rgyas pa'i las ni bshad zin to// gzhan yang sgrub pa po la ni// 'jig rten thams cad nges par yang // dga' bar 'gyur ba bshang bar bya// ji ltar ma la bu sdug pa// de 'dir de bzhin ga
294a8(rgyud): du min// mkhas pa yis ni ge'u wang dag/ nges par bdag gi khrag dang sbyar// lan grangs mang du sbyang nas kyang // mkhas pas de ni thod par bzhag/ de nas zla ba gzas zin tshe/ zla ba la ni mig bltas shing / 
294b1(rgyud): btang gi bar du legs par bzlas// nang bar bdag gi dpal ba la// thig le gcig ni bas nas kyang // de nas rgyal po'i 'khor du 'gro// 'gro ba dbang byed spong ba 'di// mdor bsdus nas ni bshad pa ste// rgyu dang mi rgyu 'ji
294b2(rgyud): rten dag mthong ba yis ni dga' bar 'gyur/ 'di ni 'jig rten pa rnams kun/ dga' bar byed pa bstan pa yin// de nas dgug pa'i cho ga yang / 'jam dpangs mgon po gcig pu yi// khro bo'i zhal nas gsungs
294b3(rgyud): pa dag/ mdor bsdus nas ni 'ashang bar bya// bud med bu ma shi sgra las/ mang gyi brgyang la nam tan du// zhags pa lags par dkal byas te// de nas thong pa'i nang du gzhug/ de nas zla ba gzas zin par/ 'gyu
294b4(rgyud): ba'i bar du nyin re bzlas/ zla ba gzas zin gyur pa dang / chu 'gram gtsang ma dag tu yang // da~M ni yi dwags phal chen gyi// dkyil 'khor de bris mchod pa ba/ khro ba'i gtso bos gsungs pa yis/
