339a8(rgyud): bod skad/ 'phags pa gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i rin po che'i phreng ba zhes bya ba dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshalo// sangs rgyas la phyag 'tsha'o// chos la phyag 'tsha'o// dge 'dun la phyag 'tsha'o// yangs
339b1(rgyud): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bye ba phrag bdun nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa rnams la phyag 'tshalo// nyams pa la sogs pa byang chub se thams cad la phyag 'tsha'o// yang dag par song ba rnam/ 
339b2(rgyud): la phyag 'tshalo// yang dag por zhugs pa rnams la phyag 'tshalo// dgra bcom pa rnams la phyag 'tsha'o// phyir mi 'ong ba rnams la phyag 'tshalo// lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams la phyag 'tsha'o// rgyun tu
339b3(rgyud): zhugs pa rnams la phyag 'tshalo// lha'i drang srong rnams la phyag 'tshalo// brtul zhugs grub pa rnams la phyag 'tshalo// lha rnams la phyag 'tshalo// klu rnams la phyag 'tshalo// gnod sbyin rnams la
339b4(rgyud): phyag 'tsha'o// dri za rnams la phyag 'tsha'o// lto 'phye chen po rnams la phyag 'tshalo// mi 'am ci rnams la phyag 'tsha'o// srin po na mas la phyag 'tsha 'o// sha za skra gyen du brdzes pa rnams
339b5(rgyud): la phyag 'tsha'o// rig pa'i bdag po rnams la phyag 'tsha'o// zla ba dang nyi ma rnams la phyag 'tsha lo// rgyu skad nyi shu rtsa brgyad la phyag 'tsha'o// de nas gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i rin po che
339b6(rgyud): phreng ba'i snying po// yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa/ lha dang klu rnams kyis rje su yi rangs pa/ las thams cad byed pa/ go tsang ma brjod par bya ste/ dag cing de ni bkra shis pa/ 
339b7(rgyud): nams byed gtsang dpal yon can/ srin po 'joms pa'i lha rnams dang / sems can kun gyis mi thub pa'o// sdig pa thams cad rab 'jig pa// don kun grub pa dpal yon can// gdon kun rnam par/ 
339b8(rgyud): 'jig byed pa// ga sngags 'din brjod par bya// 'di ni rtag tu rgyal byed pa/ brgya byin gyis kyang mi thub 'di/ dug dang gshang byed 'jig byed pa// me drag rgyal po'i 'jigs pa dang / gshing byed dang / 
340a1(rgyud): dang ro langs dang // rmi lam ngan dang lus srul dang / lha dang lha min dri za dang // gnod sbyin srin po klu rnams las// kun nas dpag tshad brgya chur chad// rtag tu bdag la srung bar mdza
340a2(rgyud): nyin cig pa yi rims nang dang // nyin gnyis pa dang nyin gsum pa/ nyin bzhi pa yi rims nad dang // ljang dub rims las 'di srung mdzad// dug dang dbyig dug zos pa yang / kha zas bzhin du zhu bar
340a3(rgyud): 'gyur// gang gi mngol ni mi chags dang // gang gi bu pho 'chi ba yang / rin po che yi phreng ba yis/ de dag myur du 'tsho bar 'gyur// nor 'dod pa ni nor rnams thob/ dpal 'dod pa yang dpal thob 'gyur
340a4(rgyud): 'thab cing 'gyed dang g.yul ngor yang / myung du rgyal bar byed pa yin/ san rnams la gnod gzigs nas// 'jig rten mgon gyis rab gsungs pa// rin chen phreng zhes bya ba yi// rig sngags
340a5(rgyud): 'di ni brjod par bya/ tad+ya thA/ oM dan ka ri/ khi bu la ka bi dza ya ka ri/ yaSh+TA ka ri/ pri d+hi ka pi/ A yurda de/ buN+ya dA / Ak+ShA pa? sha ma ni/ d+han d+han/ bi brtani/ shrI ri/ sarba gratanatA
340a6(rgyud): tra pA sha ba ti ni/ mau dA dz+ran ni/ pu tra dza nA ni/ ba ri ba rA bA brta ni/ A yu dzA ni/ pra ti ka ri/ dzi b+ha ni/ staM b+ha ni/ mo ha ne/ a mo g+ha sha ka ti/ kits+tshi na mA le/ gra ha so/ ma ka pa Ni/ sarba kA li kA la ha bi gra ta bi bA d+hA/ 
340a7(rgyud): pra sha ma ni/ pa ratsAkra ni ba ra Ni/ pa ra sen+ya/ sta b+ha ni/ ts+tshin+da ning mA li/ ka rau Ni/ sarba pA ba pra sha ma ni/ sarba kA la biSh+Ta nA sha ni swA hA/ tsu ru tsu ru sAt+ma/ tu ru tu ru sAhA/ mu ru mu ru sUtra/ sarba de ba a nuSh+Ta/ 
340a8(rgyud): swAhA/ sarba nA ga saM rAk+Shi te swA hA/ oM ni ri ni ri phaT/ han ha na phaT/ da had ha laT/ pa tsa pa tsa phaT/ gang dag bdag la sdang bar sems pa dang / gnod par sems pa dang / sbyin sreg byed pa dang / byang byed pa
340b1(rgyud): byed du 'jug pa dang / byed pa la rje su yi rangs pa de dag thams cad/ phaT phaT swA hA/ ag+ni staM b+ha ya mi bI shan/ sha rdzun u dkam ci ma/ sarbaduSh+Tam sarba brab t+ya r+thi ka/ pra ts+tsha ma tram sta~M b+ha yA mi/ dza b+ha
340b2(rgyud): mau/ ma~M ha ya mi/ phaT phaT swAhA/ gzhan gyis mi thub ces bya ga rin chen phang gis rab rgyan pa/ las kun byed dang de bzhin du// rtag tu srung bar byed pa 'di/ 'gro 'am yang na ci yang rung // de dag 'gal la
340b3(rgyud): bris te 'chang / srin po 'joms pa bsod nams mchog/ sdig pa'i rnyog pa 'jig par byed/ g.yul 'gyeng pa dang 'thab pa dang / kun tu rgyal bar byed pa dag/ mi gang gtsang sbra byas nasu// rig sngan 'ad
340b4(rgyud): bris bcang ba dang // dwaklags ngan shes rab can de la// 'jigs bkun/ tu mi 'byung // cho ga bzhin du klog 'chang na/ gsang 'a bo kun rtag tu srung // yongasu skyong bar byed bar 'gyur// rtag tu rgyal ba
340b5(rgyud): byed pa ste/ dbang na rin chen phreng ba yis// mgo ba rgyan na mdzes bltar// de bzhin phun sum tshogs pas mdzes// gang dag ji ga sngags 'di 'chang na/ de mi gdon rnams rnam pa
340b6(rgyud): 'jig/ nad kyis btab par mi 'gyur/ bu dang tsha bo rnam par 'phel// da yi 'khor ni bzang por 'gyur// san kun la phan phyir dang // ba brag tu ni byas pa'i phyir// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis/ 
340b7(rgyud): rig sngags 'di ni byin gyis brlabs// lha yi rgyal po rnams dang ni// de bzhin byang chub sems dpa' srung // de la phyogs bcu rnams kyi ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa gzigs par mdzad// dag pa dang
340b8(rgyud): ninong rnams 'phel// sdig pa rnams kyang byung bar 'gyur/ rmi lam ngan dang thos byas las/ grol 'gyur 'di la the tshom med// d+ya thA/ mu ni mun mun ri/ mji mati ma li/ mahA ma ti/ bdag 'dzi pa
341a1(rgyud): / las bsrungs shig/ bsrungs shig/ sangs rgyas thams cad la phyag 'tsha'o// yams kyi nang dang / gnod pa thams cad las bde lagasu gyur cig swA hA/ 'phags pa gzhan gyis mi thub
341a2(rgyud): ba rin po che'i phreng ba zhes bya ba rdzogaso// rgya gar gyi mkhan po su ren+da bo d+he dang / zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba bar d+he ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa// oM pad+ma tsin+ta ma Ni dza la hUM/ snying po'o// oM ba
341a3(rgyud): dad+me hUM/ nye ba'i snying po'o// oM pa Ni badz+ra tra~M hUM gsang ba'i snying po'i/ sngags snying bzhi 'byung smon lam dang tshig su bcad nga rdzogs// rgya gang skad/ At+ma sarba aR+tha dA ya bi sho d+ha ni nAm d+ha rA Ni/ khongs du
341a4(rgyud): 'phags pa bar da gcod pa tha~Md rnam par sbyong ba zhes pa nA gzungs/ sangs rgyas la phyag 'tsha'o// chos la phyag 'tshal/ dge 'dun la phyag 'tshalo// 'di skad bdagis thos pa dus
341a5(rgyud): na/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab kyi sha du dogs bram ze/ 'grong shing a mra'i gnas zhes bya ba de'i bang phyogs na/ lus 'phags ri la dbang po'i drag lug na bzhug so// de nas lha'i
341a6(rgyud): dbang po brgya byin la 'chi 'pho'i cho su gyur te/ tshe'i 'du byed kyi lhag ma lus pa'i snga bltas kho dud chung nas skrag pa skyes te/ btsun mo'i 'khor dang / g.yog dang bcas par bcom ldan 'das
341a7(rgyud): kyi gan du song nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ lan gsum bskor ba byis nas/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug ste/ yang tshe don du gnyeng ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis del
341a8(rgyud): bka' stsal pa/ ko'u shi ka de'i phyir/ khyod kyis rig pa'i gsang sngags kyi gzhi gang dag gis bdud thams cad dang / phyir rgol ba thad dang / phas kyi rgol ba thams cad shin tu tshar bcad par 'gyur
341b1(rgyud): / bang du gcod pa thams cad rnam par sbyod pa zhes bya ba'i rig pa'i gsang sngags kyi gzhi rnams nyon cig/ tad+ya thA/ a b+ha ye/ b+ha ya ga ga te/ b+ha ya pa 'i sho d+ha ne/ a b+ha se/ a b+ha yan+da de/ ni du pak+ki
341b2(rgyud): a na ku li/ a ku la pa Shi sho d+ha ni/ a gle ta a bi kAl+le/ a ka wAn/ an+yA te/ shud+he shu b+ha/ ti tre She dza ba ti/ sha me u pa sha me/ mcho ba sha me/ me dri ma d+hu d+hi ti ta no/ to Sha yanas te/ sa t+ya mr-i/ 
341b3(rgyud): a bi ru d+he/ sa hi ta \u0f7ftatwe/ sarba ar+d+ha sid d+he/ a mr-i ta pa te/ a b+hi te/ badz+ra sa t+ye/ ak+Sha ya ak+Sha ya pra b+he/ dran+ta ba ra/ shud+d+he shud+d+he/ pra b+he/ a ba b+ha saM/ a ba b+ha sa ba ti/ u pa yo kaM/ a nut+ta ra
341b4(rgyud): samaH/ bud+d+ha/ ad+hiSh+Tha ma shI la bi sho d+ha ni/ a se dar+ye/ sun gr-i taH/ ma ra ba la tsA be radza yo dr-iSh+Tha ga tra nAn/ d+ha mo la kA la~M/ u dag tA nAn/ d+ha ma ri d+ha nri s+ya/ sa gra tra nAmad+d+ha pakolus
341b5(rgyud): shi ka khyod kyis rig pa'i gsang sngags gzhi 'di dag ni/ khyod kyi rig pa gsang sngags gzhi gang dag gis bdud thad dang / phyir rgol ba thams cad dang / phas kyi rgol ba thams
341b6(rgyud): shin tu tshar gcod par 'gyur ba dag// 'di bzlas brjod pas ma/ sngon gyi las kyi rnam par smin pa ma gtogs pa/ ba du gcod pa thams cad rnam par dag par 'gyuraro// don thams cad 'grub par
341b7(rgyud): 'gyur// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsol pa dang / lha'i dbang po brgya byin yi rangs te/ de'i tshe 'di skadadu/ kho bo lha las ma gyur la// 'di nyid na ni 'dug bzhin du// kho bos tshe
341b8(rgyud): yang thob zin gyis// grogs dag de ltar shes par gyis// zhes che du brjod pa ched du brjod/ 'di yi mthu thad kyis bdag gi bad du gcod pa dang / bgags dang log 'dren thams cad ni med par gyu
342a1(rgyud): / phun sum tshogs pa thams cad ni grub par gyur cig/ na so a ke tu len ge tsan+d+ra na~M ye swA hA/ sarba ar+tha sA d+ha ni ye sA hA/ d+harma sA d+hA ri ye swAhA/ sarba an+ta rA ya bi sho d+ha nA ye swA hA/ ba
342a2(rgyud): kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin bcur mo'i 'khor dang bcas shing / 'khor dang bcas pa dang / tha~Md dang ldan pa'i 'khor de yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
342a3(rgyud): gsungs pa la mngon par bstod// 'phags pa bar du gcod pa thams cad rnam par sbyong ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzog so// rgya gar gyi mkhan po trid mi tra dang / dA na shi la dang / zhwa chen gyi lo tsA ba
342a4(rgyud): ye shes sngas bsgyud cing zhus la/ skad gsang chad kyis kyang bcos nganas gtan la bab pa// rgya gang ska du/ Ar+ya sarba ab+ha sa pra dA na nAm d+hA baNi/ bong sa te/ 'phags pa thams cad la mi
342a5(rgyud): 'jigs pa sbyin pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ sangs rgyas dang bya ba ba sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tsha'o// 'di skad bdang/ gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das yul
342a6(rgyud): ga d+ha nas/ yul rgyu zhing a mra'i tshal du gshegs te byon nas/ a mra'i tshal lus 'phags ri'i dbang po'i brag phug na bzhag so// de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste
342a7(rgyud): phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig na 'dug/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// 
342a8(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das lham yin rnams ni/ rab tu gnod par bgyid pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das lha ma yin rnams ni/ bdag la yun ring por phyir rgol ba'i ngag lags na/ de las bcom ldan 'das kyis
342b1(rgyud): bdag la chos bstan du gsol/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// lha'i dbang po khyod kyis/ thams cad la mi 'jigs pa sbyin
342b2(rgyud): nga'i rig sngags dod thams cad byed pa/ 'jigs pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa/ nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa/ dug thams cad 'jil ba/ mtshon thams cad rengs par byed pa/ rkang mad/ 
342b3(rgyud): rkang gnyis dang / rkang bzhi pa thams cad rengs par bdang/ ngag thams cad phung bar byed pa/ lha dang / namakha' lding dang / sbyin byed ma'i bu dang / sha za dang / brjed byer dang / sgo byed dang / bram ze'i srin po dang / byu
342b4(rgyud): po dang ro langs dang / ba'i gdon dang / srul po dang / nam gru dang / gnon po'i gdon dang / gnon po dang / brjed byed kyi gdon dang / lha'i gdon dang / klu'i gdon dang // gnod sbyin gyi gdon dang / dri
342b5(rgyud): za'i gdon dang / mi 'am ci'i gdon dang / log 'dun gyi gdon pa ma mo'i gdon phung bar byed pa/ mdangs 'phrog pa dang / zasu da da ba za ba dang / za su spos za ba dang / za su me tog za ba dang
342b6(rgyud): zasu bdug pa za ba dang / zasu khrag 'thung ba dang / zasu rnag 'thung ba dang / zasu mi gtsang ba zo ba rnams dang / zi su gcin 'thung ba rab tu phung bar byed pa/ rims nad thams cad dang / rlung las
342b7(rgyud): gyur pa dang / mkhris pa las gyur pa dang / bad kan las gyur pa dang / 'dus pa las gyur pa dang / 'gro ba drag shul spyod pa rab tu 'jigs par byed po// 'thab pa dang / rtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa dang / ma
342b8(rgyud): 'drub thad rab tu zhi bar byed pa 'di zung shig dang / thams cad la mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa'i rig sngags bshad par bya'o// tad+ya thA/ a Sha ma De pra ma Da/ gol po// la bos sa/ moTaT/ paT+Te/ khar/ 
343a1(rgyud): / kha ra \u0f7f/ ga Na gA Na/ ga Na brag a pra ti mo Ni/ kA li pra kA li tsaN+Da/ ma hA tsaN+Da pra ti tsaSh+Ta kha ge a ti ga/ son/ gon/ mo hA/ ba mo tsA/ pra mo Da/ nA sha ni/ pra nA sha ni/ d+ha ba ni/ pra d+ha ba ni/ khal
343a2(rgyud): ga ni/ bra ba la ga ni/ nr-i ti na pra ni t+ya ni/ kro d+ha ni/ pra ti kro d+ha ni/ ta na han/ bi ha na bi han/ sarba duSh+Ta pra dug+h+nA na nA sha ya/ sarba a b+ha ya pra de/ bdag 'khor dang bcas pa 'jigs pa thad dang / gnod pa
343a3(rgyud): dang / nang 'gro ba thams cad las bsrungs shig/ bsrungs shig/ gnas 'dir bdag gi don thams cad 'grub par gyur cig/ de lta bas na/ khi di khi di/ tsum pa/ sarba sid+d+hi hi da ra ta/ na maHsarba bud+d+ha
343a4(rgyud): nAr swA hA// lha'i dbang po thams cad la mi 'jigs pa smin pa'i rig sngags tshig bzhi bcu rtsa gcig pa 'di skud pa la mdung du/ bcings ma/ ska la mdung pa bor ram/ bzlas brjod byas
343a5(rgyud): sam/ yungs kar ma/ gi wang la lan gcig bsngags te/ ba skus sam/ go cha la bsngags na mtshon gyis mi tshugs/ du gagis ma yin/ rims nad kyis ma yin/ nyin gcig
343a6(rgyud): bas ma yin/ nyin gnyis pas ma yin/ nyin gsum pas ma yin/ nyin bzhi pas ma yin/ mas ma yin// gsang sngags kyis ma yin/ ro langs kyis ma yin/ dug gis ma yin/ nad kyis
343a7(rgyud): ma yin te/ chus 'chi ba'i dus byeng par mi 'gyuraro// rig sngags dang / gsang sngags sbyor ba sgrub pa thang spor ba rnams kyis ma grub pa rnams grub par bya // sbar te grub pa rnams gzhan gyis mi
343a8(rgyud): tshugs par bye // pha rol gyis bcings pa las grol bdu bya'o// gzhan gyis rig sngags gcod par ba'o// bdag gi rig sngags 'phel bar byedo// gdor thaMd phung bar byed// gdon gang gis ma/ 
343b1(rgyud): gtong na yang / nga'i mgo ardza ka'i dog pa bzhin du tshal pa bdun du 'ag so// de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ lha'i
343b2(rgyud): dbang po brgya byin yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la brjod// 'phags pa thams cad la mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzog so// rgya gar gyi mkhan po rngan mi
343b3(rgyud): dang / dA na shI la dang / zhu chan gyi lo tsA ba ban+de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te/ skad gsang chad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa// rgya gang skad+ha/ Ar+ya drA ba~M Da bid+ya rA dza/ bod skad/ 2
343b4(rgyud): pa 'gro lding ba'i rig sngags kyi rgyal po/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub seda' thams cad la phag 'tsha'o// 'di skad bang gis thos pa das gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na
343b5(rgyud): smig ma'i myu gu'i 'khor gyi khams na bzhugs te// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la ba/ 'astsal pa/ kun dga' ba tshad kyis glog thams cad
343b6(rgyud): bzlog pa/ so sor 'brang gi sdom gyi yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis gsungs pa nga yang da ltar 'chad kyis zung shig/ kun dga' bo shar phyogs na 'ong ba zhes pa ba'i
343b7(rgyud): glog yod/ kun dga' bo lho phyogs ma skad brgya zhes bya ba'i glog yod/ kun dga' bo nub phyogs na 'od nyams pa zhes bya ba'i glog yod/ kun dga' bo ba po phyogs na rgyun gyi bdag po zhe
343b8(rgyud): bya ba'i glog yod/ kun dga' bo gang la la glog 'di rnams kyi ming shes pa dang / phyogs rnam par gnas pa zhes pa de la glog gi 'jigs pa thad du mi 'byung bar shes par ba'o// glog
344a1(rgyud): ming 'di dag yi gang bris te/ gnas gang dag tu bzhag pa'i gnas de dag tu glog thams cad mi 'bab po// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe 'gro lding ba'i gsang sngags gzhi 'di
344a2(rgyud): dag bka' stsal to// tad+ya thA/ ni mtshan mi ni ni mi ni ni min d+ha re/ 'jig rtes gsum sdang bar byed pa/ lag na rtsa gsum pas phyogs 'dir glog thaMd las bdag la bsrungs shig/ bsrungs shig sa
344a3(rgyud): yang de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ngas gzigs dbang phyug 'khor de nyid 'dus par gyur te 'dug pa des bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// 
344a4(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la 'gro lding ba'i gsang sngags gzhi 'di rnams brjod par bgyi'o// tad+ya thA/ ha te bi ha te/ ni ha te/ pra tur+thi ke/ pra t+ya mi te/ shud+d+ha
344a5(rgyud): muk+Sha/ bi ma la/ pra b+ha swa re/ at+tA ra/ shwe te/ pat+tA/ ra bA si ni/ ta ri ka ra di/ bi ga lAk+Shi da d+hi mu khi dus ma yin par 'chi ba thams cad las bdag la bsrungs shig/ bsrung
344a6(rgyud): shig/ 'phags pa spyan ngas gzigs dbang phyug gi gzi brjid kyis bdag dus ma yin pa 'chi ba thaMd mthong bar ma gyur cig swA hA// de nas gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag no rdo rje bcom ldan 'das gal ba de log
344a7(rgyud): thal mo sbyar bab tu de bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang / chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la gzungs kyi tshig rnams brjod pa bgyi'o// tad+ya thA/ mu ni mu ni/ mu ni mu ni/ ra ri/ 
344a8(rgyud): tis ti/ su ma ti/ ma hA ma ti/ tA tA hA tA/ khyod la sdig pa med kyis/ ma 'jigs shig ces lag na rdo rjes smras kyis/ dri ba swA hA/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gi bsrungs pa gzhan gyis mi thub pa 'di su'i snying
344b1(rgyud): la 'dzin tam/ yi ger byis na de la bdag gis rtag pang rgyun tu 'jigs pa thams cad las srung bar bgyi'o// dus ma lags pa 'gum pa thams cad las thang bar bgyi'o// de nas mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa
344b2(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang sems can tha~Md kyi don dang / sman pa dang / bde ba bskyeng ba'i slad/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi gzhi rdzas
344b3(rgyud): brjod par bgyi'o// tad+ya thA/ hi li mi li/ tsi li swA hA/ brah+ma sA ra sA re swA hA/ prah+ma gar+b+ha push+ma saM sta ra swA hA/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ni bdag gi srung ba tshangs pa'i chang pa zhes bgyi ba ste/ dus ma lags par 'gum
344b4(rgyud): ba thams cad las yongasu skyob pa/ sdig pa thams cad rab tu no bgyid pa lagaso// de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de log su thal mo sbyang ba btud / bcom ldan 'das
344b5(rgyud): la 'di skad ces gsol to/ com ldan 'das byung gis kyirnam grangs 'di la gzungs kyi gas sngags ga'i rnams dbang bgyi'o// d+ya thA/ ni ba ri Ni/ ban d+ha ban d+ha mA ngan / 
344b6(rgyud): ma timra ti ti mgau r-i/ gan d+ha ra/ tsaN+Da li/ ma ti gi/ ba ra la naM/ hi na mA rI NI ma la na~M/ dal maH/ tsakra ba kra/ sha ba ri sha ba ri bAhA/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das 'di ni bdag gis rig sngags rje 'babs pa 'o
344b7(rgyud): bgyi ste/ 'jigs pa thams cad las rnam par thar bar bgyid pa/ dus ma lags par 'gum pa thaMd las yongs skyob pa lag so// de nas rgyal po chen po yul 'khor srang dang / 'phags skyes po dang / mig mi
344b8(rgyud): bzang dang / rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bus/ bcom ldan 'das ga la bde log su thal mo sbyar ba btud/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bad gis kyang skye bo mang po la sman
345a1(rgyud): / dang / skye bo mang po la bde ba dang / 'jig rten la snying 'artsa ba'i slad chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la gzungs kyi gsang sngags gzhi rnams brjod par bgyi'o// tAd+ya thA/ puSh+pe puSh+pe/ d+harma ba ri ta ri/ 
345a2(rgyud): Ar+ya pA sha ste/ shing muk+te/ maM ga la/ stusta/ s+thA tsi te swA hA/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das 'di ni rgyal po chen po gzhi po bdag cag gis srung ba 'jigs pa ma mchis pa ste/ 'jigs pa thams cad
345a3(rgyud): las mi 'jigs par bgyi ba/ tshe skyong ba dus mi legs par 'gum pa thams cad las yongasu sgrub pa lag so// de nas klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho dang klu'i rgyal po glog 'od dang / klu'i rgyal po ma dros pa dang / 
345a4(rgyud): klu'i rgyal po glog lce dang / klu'i rgyal po 'od zer brgya pas ba com ldan 'das ga la ba de logasu thal mo sbyang ba btud/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das
345a5(rgyud): bdag cag gis srung ba chen po yid bzhin gyi nor bu zhes pa gyi ba glog thams cad bzlog pa/ dus ma lags par 'gru pa thams cad sel ba/ dug rnams mi gdug par bgyid
345a6(rgyud): ga/ gshed byed dang / byang dang / ro langs dang / bkra mi shis pa 'jig par bgyid pa mchis na/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cag klu'i skye gnas 'di nas dbyung ba dang / sir sna spangs pa'i slad thugs
345a7(rgyud): bar dgongs te bzhi su gsol/ de ci'i slad zhen/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cag klu rnams ni sems ser sna can te/ sems seng sdes kun nas dkris pa lags pa'i sa du'o// tad+ya thA/ A r-i dzi/ a ma ra/ 
345a8(rgyud): oM mr-i ta/ akA ye/ puN+ya pad+ya ba te/ sarba pA ba pra sha ma ni ye swA hA/ sAr+ya br-i N+ya so ba kI ye swA hA// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gsang sngags gzhi 'di dag skyes pa 'am/ bud med gang la la'i
345b1(rgyud): lce la 'don tam/ yi geng bris pa de la glog gi 'jigs pa thams cad ma mchis par rig par 'gyi'o// rtsa ba'i dug ma/ mche ba'i dug me/ dbyig drugam/ gang dag gzhan yang yan lag las byung
345b2(rgyud): dug de dag gis/ de 'gam pa'i des bgyid par mi 'gyuraro// bdag 'jigs pa thad dang / gnod pa thams cad las bad legs gyur cig/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 
345b3(rgyud): 'jig rten skyong ba dang / klu'i rgyal po de dag la leg so zhes bya ba yin te/ bzhin bzang dag skye bo mang po la phan pa dang / skye bo mang po la bde ba'i phyir zhugs te/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di rje su gzung
345b4(rgyud): phyir 'gro lding ba'i gas pa sngags kyi tshig rnams bshad pa legs leg so// phyogs rnams na gnyid log pa dang / myos pa dang / rab tu myos pa rnams srung bar 'gyur// bcom ldan 'das kyis de
345b5(rgyud): skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag dang / brgya byin dang / mangs pa dag 'jig rten skyong ba dag dang / klu'i dbang po dang / ga dang / lha dang / mi dang / l+h+wa ma yin dang / dri zang bcas pa'i
345b6(rgyud): 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod// 'phags pa 'gro lding ba'i rig sngags kyi rgyal po rdzogaso// rgyu gar gyi mkhan po dzin mi tra dang / dA na shI la dang / 
345b7(rgyud): chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban+de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te/ skad gas chad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa// tsargya ga ska du/ gA thA dI ya d+hA ra NI/ bod skad/ tshig su bcang ba gnyis pa'i gzungs/ 
345b8(rgyud): 'jam dpal gzhonur gyur pa la phyag 'tsha'o// sangs rgyas dang ni chos la brnyas pa dang / le lo dang ni cung zad chog par 'dzin// 'did chags dang ni nga rgyal spyod pa dang / 'gyod pa dang ni ma ngas spyod pa rnam/ 
346a1(rgyud): / sems can rnams kyi sgrib par gyur ba ste// de'i gzhan por theg pa mchog bstan pa// de yis par du gcod pa de dag gi/ nyes pa thams cad rab tu spong bar 'gyur/ tad+ya thA/ oM badz+ra pra k+Sha
346a2(rgyud): tsakra/ dak+ta b+hU yA na ke/ a ma le/ bi ma le/ ning ma le/ tsu lu ke/ tsu lu tsu lu sarba bud+d+he swA hA/ tshig su bcad pa gnyis pa'i gzungs la ni// tshig ma don gyi sgo nas gang sbyong ba// sngon dam pa blo dang
346a3(rgyud): ldan pa des// phan yon rnam pa bcu dag thob par 'gyur/ khams rnams mtha' dag rtas par 'gyur pa dang // 'chi ba'i tshen mchog dga' dam pa 'thob// ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du skye ba dang // thams
346a4(rgyud): cad du ni tshe rabs dran par 'gyur/ sangs rgyas rnams dang phrad par 'gyur ba dang // de bzhin de dag las ni thag mchog thos// mos par 'gyur ba blo dang bcas pa dang // sgo gnyis dang ni byab chu
346a5(rgyud): myur du thob/ tshigasu bcad pa gnyis pa'i gzungs rdzog so// rgya gangs du/ Ar+ya d+h+wa dza a gra ka yu pa dA ma d+hA dANI/ khongs 'phags pargyal mtshan gyi rtse mo'i dpung rgyan zhe
346a6(rgyud): bya ba'i gzungs/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshalo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha'i nang na la
346a7(rgyud): ba dkar po lta bu'i rdo la ba la bzhugs te/ de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin lha ma yin rnams las pam/ rab tu pham nas de btab cing rings pa'i gzugs kyis/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der so
346a8(rgyud): ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag 'dir lha ma yin dang / g.yul bkye ba las/ lham
346b1(rgyud): yin gyi dbang po thag bzangs ris las pam/ rab tu pham ste/ sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyang pham/ rab tu pham ma/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis de la ji ltar sgrub par bgyi/ bcom ldan
346b2(rgyud): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lha'i dbang po khod kyis rgyan mtshan gyi rtse mo'i dpung rgyan zhes bya ba gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i gzungs zub shig/ ngas kyang sngor byang chub sems dpang gyur pa na/ de bzhi
346b3(rgyud): gshegs pa gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i rgyal mtshan las 'di mnos// mnos nas kyang gzhan la rgya char yang dag par bshad// mngon par dran te de tshun chad 'jigs pa 'am khag tsha ba 'am/ spu zing
346b4(rgyud): zhes byed pa'am/ than skad cig yud tsam yang lus la gnod pa 'byung ma myong // bcom ldan 'das rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo'i dpung rgyan zhes bgyi ba/ gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i gzung

346b7(rgyud): trem tsatur+thak+Sha/ tsa tu daMSh+TA/ tsa tu b+hu dze/ oM si mu sa la/ tsar+thatri shU la/ badz+ra ka btsa d+hA ra Ni/ bdag gnod pa thams cad las bsrungs shig/ oM b+ha ga ba ti/ hed ha sa/ da ha da ha/ pa tsa ba rtsa
346b8(rgyud): ma tha ma tha/ pra ma tha pra ma the/ d+ha na d+hA na/ bri d+hA na bid+d+has hUM hUM phaT phaT/ b+hany+dza b+hany+dza/ pa r+ya sa n+yam bi d+hA na sa ya/ sarba sha trun nA sha ya d+hA dza a gra ka yu re/ tri Ta tri Ta ti DaSh+NI Ta b+hI Ta/ u la kAH
347a1(rgyud): u la kA d+ha ni/ dz+wa lo kya ma thA ni/ bid+h+wan sa ya pa bsan+yas/ bdag gnod pa thams cad las bsrungs shig bsrungs shig/ tsal tsal khyim ci li/ tsu lA tsu lu/ kr-i pa kaM pa/ ka laka
347a2(rgyud): ki li ki li/ ku lu ku lu/ muny+dza puny+tsa/ aT+Ta ha saM/ bi d+hAd sa sa pa ra sai n+yaH/ trA sa ya trA sa ya/ b+h+ra ma ya thA ma ya/ bud+d+ha sa t+ye na/ d+harma sa t+ye na/ saM g+ha sa t+ye na/ sa t+ya bA d+h+r-i na na sa t+ye na/ bud+d+ha sa t+yan pa
347a3(rgyud): kra ma/ d+harma sa t+ya ma ti kra ma se g+ha sa t+ya ma ti kra ma/ sa t+ye bA dI nAn/ sa t+ya ma ti kra me/ laM bo da ri/ laM bau da ri/ ku Ta ku Ta/ kuT+Ta kuT+Ta/ kuTA pa ya kuT+TA pa ya/ ru tra ma nA yA biSh+Nu ma nA ya/ tsan+d+re sur+ya brah+ma
347a4(rgyud): nAs trai lo kya a d+hi pa ti ma nA ya/ sarba de pa a d+hi pa ti ma nA yas pra yash+ma dAkrus/ ga d+haH/ kuM b+har+b+ha/ mahong ga a d+hi ba ti ma nA ya bai d+hanas ya pa ra sa nAH/ ri ga rag/ reg pasdu
347a5(rgyud): rig pa yA/ dz+ha la dz+wa la/ puSh+Ta mA lis/ dumadza dus d+ha gyi/ d+de tid+hi ti/ dz+dza ku mu kha pa/ se na ku lo/ sA dan/ kA / hal ta la/ Sha la~M DI li/ tsu lu hu lu/ 
347a6(rgyud): ri Ni rI Ni/ ri Ni ma ti/ dzaM b+ha d+ha dze/ sarba bud+d+ha/ a ba lo ka ti/ bdag 'jigs pa thams cad las bsrungs shig/ sarba ta thA ga ti/ a ba lo ki ti swAhA/ gu Na rA dza pra b+hA sot+ta ma~M swAhA/ sU r+yam
347a7(rgyud): bi ma le swA hA/ tsan+d+ra a rka bi ma le swAhA/ sarba gra ta na k+Sha tra d+hi/ sI ka ra Na swA hA// bdag 'jigs pa dang / gnod pa dang / nad 'gro ba dang / 'khrug pa thams cad las bsrungs shig/ bsrungs
347a8(rgyud): swAhA/ b+ha'i rgyal po rgyal mtshan gyi phyi ma'i dpung rgyan zhes bya ba gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i gzungs 'dis khyod g.yul spyod pa 'am/ 'thab pa'am/ rtsod pa'am/ 'gyid pa 'am/ gang du 'gros
347b1(rgyud): rung ste/ thams cad du rgyal bar 'gyur// rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo 'am/ mgul du btags na/ mi'i rgyal po dang / skyes bu dpa' bo thams cad la srung ba bye'o// bud med kyi gzugs lta bung bsgyur nas
347b2(rgyud): mdun du 'dug ste/ mi 'jigs pa sbyin zhing srung ba byed// dpal skyed par byed/ pha rol gyi sde dpa' kong bar byed/ bkra shis pa dang / gtsang ba dang / grags pa dang / dpal dang / phun sum tshogs pa kun tu
347b3(rgyud): gnas par byedo// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi
347b4(rgyud): gsung ba la mngon par bstod// / 'phags pa rgyal mtshan rtse mo'i dpung rgyan zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogaso// rgya gar gyi mkhan po rje na mi tra dang / dA na shI la dang / zhu ches gyi lo ts+tsha ba
347b5(rgyud): bar d+ha ye shes sngas bsgyur cing zhus te skad gsang chad kyis ba cos nas gtan la phab pa dge'o// 6// rgya gar swA d+ha/ Ar+ya tsun+de de bi nA ma d+hA ra NI/ bod ska du/ 'phags pa lnga
347b6(rgyud): mo bskul byed ma zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshalo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad
347b7(rgyud): la phyag 'tshalo// bcom ldan 'das lha mo bskul byed ma mthu dang stobs dpag tu med pa dang ldan pa/ rdzu 'phrul dang pha rol gnon pa grub pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bsngags shing
347b8(rgyud): bstod pa la phyag 'tsha'o// bdag rnam pa thams cad kyi thad du dge bar mdzod cig/ na maHsab+hA nA~M/ sumakr-i bud+d+ha ko Ta nA~M/ tad+ya thA/ oM tsi le tsu le tsun+de swAhA// brtson 'grus chen po thogs pa med
348a1(rgyud): 'dul ba/ spobs cheb pha rol gnon pa chag phyagan ral gri dang / dgra sta dag lcags kyu dang / zhags pa bsdams pa/ khro ba chen mo// khro za chen mo'i dbang phyug ma/ drug pa'i gzug
348a2(rgyud): can ma/ zhal ras mtha' yas ma/ phyag stong mnga' ma/ ma pham ma/ gzhan gyis me thub ma// don yod ma/ gdul bar dka' ma/ mig stong ma/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyis ba
348a3(rgyud): ma/ lha thams cad kyis bag bas shing mchod pa rab tu sgrub ma/ rdo rje sen mo can/ rdo rje rdo rje 'dran ma/ rdo rje'i mtshon cha can/ rdo rje'i sku can ma/ rdo rje'i khu chur ma/ rdo rje'i sman gdangs pa'i stang snga
348a4(rgyud): can ma/ drag shul can ma lags kyang drag shul gyi gzugs na du bskyung bar bston par mdzad ma/ sku rdo rje dang be DU rma'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa/ oM b+ha ga ba ti DUn+de/ d+hAr+N+Na/ hU~M k+ku/ rgyurgyu
348a5(rgyud): sr-i d+hu rU/ a be sha ya/ gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na ba la gr-ihA pa sa/ @tsaMpar+Nany+dza b+hany+dza/ sa ra sa pa/ ma ma pa mar ya ma ra ya/ tsa pa tsa/ data dang / gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na/ sdong ba'i gnan
348a6(rgyud): rims zhag gcig pa dang / zha gnyis pa dang / zhag sum pa dang / zhag bzhi pa dang / zhag bdun pa dang / rtag pa'i rims dang / yud tsam pa dang / 'byung po dang / ro langs dang / yi dregs dang / shaH
348a7(rgyud): dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / grul bum gyi gdon dang / mngal las skyes pa dang / las las skyes pa dang / 'gro ba dang gnas pa 'di dag dang / sdang ba gang dag la 'tshe ba dang / gdag pa de dag
348a8(rgyud): thams cad/ sA d+ha sa sA d+ha ya/ ma rdza sa mardza ya/ sho Sha ya ko Sha ya ShA pa ya tA ba ya/ uta sA da ya/ utra sA da ya/ ha na ha na badz+re ma/ sa nga sa ra ngaN+Da na/ mA ra ya mA ra ya khag+ne na/ hU~Mn+d+ra/ 
348b1(rgyud): druM dru druM/ oM tsa le tsu ledun+de sarba ar+tha sA d+ha ya swA hA/ bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa lha mo bskul byed ma'i mthu dang byin gyis brlabs kyis bdag gnod pa thams cad las dge bar gyur cig/ 
348b2(rgyud): bAhA/ 'phags pa lha mo bskul byed ma zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzog so// 6// rgyu gar sa du/ Ar+ya su mu khan nA ma d+hA bi tsi/ bong sra du/ 'phags pa sgo bzang po zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ sangs rgyas
348b3(rgyud): dang / byang chub sems dpa'i thams cad la phag 'tshalo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub kyi shing drung na/ byang chub snying po'i mchod rten chen po na/ dag
348b4(rgyud): slong steng nyis brgya lnga bcu'i dge slong gi dge slong cher po 'di lta ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu dang / tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po la sogs pa nyan thos chen po tham
348b5(rgyud): cad dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs te/ byang chub sa de'i dge 'du na chen po 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sed chen po la gan rdo rje dang / byang chubs pas dpa' seMng
348b6(rgyud): chen po rdo rje'i rgyal mtshan dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje'i snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sede' chen po byams pa la sogs pa/ bskal pa bzang po'i byang chub
348b7(rgyud): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang yang thabs gcig// de nas byang chub sems dpa'i sanga' chen po lag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das
348b8(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis/ sgo bzang po zhes bgyi ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs bshadu gsol// gang gis sen rnams la snang ba bgyis
349a1(rgyud): / pa dang / phyir rgol ba dang / dag thams cad kyis gnod par bgyi ba srung ba dang / bslab par 'gyur ba dang / 'di lta ste/ lha'i dbang po rnams dang / klu'i dbang po rnams dang / gnod sbyin gyi
349a2(rgyud): dbang po rnams dang / srin po'i dbang po rnapas dang / 'byung po'i dbang po rnams kyis 'jigs par mi 'gyur ba dang / sdig pa dang / mtshon dang / dug dang / khyed kyis gnod par mi 'gyur ba dang /

349a6(rgyud): ba bgyi ba'i slad/ de bzhin gshegs pa la gsol ba 'tshal lag so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ byang chub seda' sems dpa' chen po lagan rdo rjes gsol ba btab pas thugasu
349a7(rgyud): chud nas/ de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// lag na rdo rje khod san thams cad kyi don gyi phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa la gsol ba 'debs pa lag so// leg so// de'i phyir lag na rdo rje khod
349a8(rgyud): legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang / sgo bzang po zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs bshad par bya'o// u gu mu gu ba li ni/ bar d+ha ni/ bal tsamam/ ba tub tu br-i hu li brta ya swA hA/ 
349b1(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pas spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba'i gzungs sngags gzhi rnams bka' stsal to// de bzhin gshegs pas kyang gsungs par 'gyur// khyim gyis rlob par 'gyur/ tad+ya thA/ badz+rI badz+rI dz+dzi
349b2(rgyud): badz+ri d+ha ngi/ badz+ra bA Ni/ badz+re bA tri/ dz+rAM d+ha pi tsakra badz+ri/ tsakra d+ha pi bany+tsa d+hi d+hi pa b+hi bi mu pa/ tsi ri/ a hu pi b+ha ga d+hi b+hi ngi/ shi tra/ shai ri/ ru ru tsa du dra tse/ tsa tsa ri/ dra bi tsa le tsu ru nu ru/ bir+d+he

349b4(rgyud): ri ni/ mu ta ni/ pra mUr+d+ha ni/ mA sha ni/ pra mA sha ni/ nad rab tu zhi byed pa nas/ rmi lam ngan pa'i bang du 'gog par byed pa/ 'di lta ste/ nA sha ni/ nA sha ni/ bin d+ha ni/ bar d+ha ni/ ts+tshin+da ni ts+tshin+da ni/ 
349b5(rgyud): gyi ma had ni/ banai pa pa kha re be re kha ba 'i/ bod+d+hi/ suSh+Ta Ni/ shu ni/ 'du ma na/ ba n+du me/ aHhrIdz+dzad+hi rA ya Ni/ na mo many+tsa ma
349b6(rgyud): b+hany+dza ni/ bA ba dza ta ni kA la pa ti ni/ b+hU ta ba da ni sat+ya ga tha/ so ma bA di/ som pra b+haM/ sA hA/ tshe ring bar 'gyur ba/ tad+ya thA ha da ha ra tA ni swA hA/ tad+ya thA/ i Di ta ga biM ta/ ba ding / a ye na/ a raM/ 
349b7(rgyud): d+h+waM dza ni/ ka kIr+t+ti ni/ pu tra da ha ni/ marga a b+hI ro ha ni/ tu sa pa ti/ mu pa ba ti/ hi li ti li/ ya thA badz+rA ya/ ya thA ag+ni/ ya thA ba raM tsa ya thA na la/ ya thA badz+reH/ sa thA hr-i da ya swA hA/ lag
349b8(rgyud): rdo rje 'di ni sgo bzang po zhes bya ba'i gzungs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis thugs rje nas/ san rnams kyi don du bshadado// ji ltar sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
350a1(rgyud): // par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dmas kyis gsungs shing byin gyis brlabs pa dang / bden pa'i thugs dam gyis rnam par gzhag bzhin dang yang 'tsha'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis
350a2(rgyud): skyes bu chen po'i mtshar srid mtshams kyi mdzod spu nas 'od zer phyung ste/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cadadu 'od zang snang ba bya'o// 'od zer gyi snang ba des bskul bas/ rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing dag
350a3(rgyud): ngas chas te/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'ding bon nas/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la legaso zhes pa buM bAn te/ shAkya thub pa khyod kyis sems can thams cad kyi don du sgo bzang
350a4(rgyud): zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs gzungs sngags gzhi rnams snang bar byed pa/ mchog tu dga' bar byed pa/ dran par byed pa/ 96dbang byed pa/ leg so leg so// bdag cag gis kyang byin gyis
350a5(rgyud): brla'o// legaso zhes bab pa'o// rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la gzungs sngags gzhi 'di dag 'dzin cing / nang par langs nas klog pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ 
350a6(rgyud): kyi bu mo de yi ston gyi phan yon nyi shur shes par bya ste/ nyi shu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur pa dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyis dgongs pa
350a7(rgyud): 'gyur ba dang / ngan song du 'gyur ba'i las kyi sgrib pa thad med par 'gyur ba dang / tshe ring bar 'gyur pa dang / ring du 'tsho zhing grags pa dang ldan pa dang / long spyod dang ldan pa dang / stobs dang ldan
350a8(rgyud): ba dang / gzi brjid dang ldan pa dang / rtag tu nang meng pa dang ldan pa dang / brtson 'grus dang ldan pa dang / sangs rgyas bac+doMs thams cad gyes shing thugasu byon par 'gyur pa dang / lha tha~Md kyis bas/ 
350b1(rgyud): bar 'gyur pa dang / dge ba'i spyod par 'gyur pa dang / dge ba'i don la rab tu brtson pa dang / sdang bar byed par ra gyur pa dang / mchog tu dga' ba dang / dran pa dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang / mtshan phun sum
350b2(rgyud): tshogs par 'gyur/ mi 'jigs par 'gyur ba dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba tha~Md dang ldan par 'gyur// lag na rdo rje 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams
350b3(rgyud): kyis gsang ba'i gnas kyi gzungs sngags gzhi 'di rnams gsungs/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa yino// de nas byang chub seda' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rjes/ bac+doMs
350b4(rgyud): la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdagis kyang rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de la srung ba dang / yongasu bsku nga ba'i skad gzungs sngags gzhi rnams bshang bar bgyi'o// 
350b5(rgyud): su zhig sgo bzang po zhes bgyi ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs/ tshe skyong ba'i rig sngags 'di 'dzin cing nang par langs nas/ klog pa de// rnam par 'tshe ba thams cad las srung bar bgyi'o//

350b7(rgyud): tsa me/ sarba a hi ta/ shin swA hA/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ lag na rdo rje la leg so zhes bya ba byin te/ lag na rdo rje sems can tha~Md kyi doran gyi phyi
350b8(rgyud): dngos grub dam pa'i gzungs sngags gzhi rnams smras pa lag so legs// byang chub sede lag na rdo rjes gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gang sgo bzang po zhes bgyi ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs che skyong
351a1(rgyud): // pa'i rig sngags 'di 'dzin cing / na pang langs nas klog pade'i sku'i khung bu rnam sus ngangs thaMd 'bul bar bgyi ba bshad pang bgyi'o// t+ya thA/ ti l-i mi la tsa li swAhA/ prah+ma sA raH

351a4(rgyud): sngags 'di dag 'dzin cing / nang par langs nas klog pa'i ri gas kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo srung ba dang / yongasu bskyang ba'i slad du/ sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs pa'i gzungs

355a1(rgyud): / na mu stegs can kun tu rgyu ba rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gnod pa rlab pa'i pir/ ro langs chen po bdun btang bar gyur to// de dag bcom ldan 'das kyi thad song ba las de dag gis glag

355a4(rgyud): shi la thug pa'i tshor ba rnams dang ldan// bcom ldan 'das des ma dgong so// bdag 'di ltar nyam ngabar gyur na de bzhin gshegs pas ma dgong so snya mo// de'i tshen tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dang / tshe dang
355a5(rgyud): ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' do dang / thag mi ring bzhin na 'dug par phyu to// tshe dang ldan pa kun ga' bo'i nye ba'i nyon mongs pa de lta bud tshe dang ldan
355a6(rgyud): ri'i bu dang / tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen pos tho so// de nas de gnyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo ga la ba der song ste phyin nas 'di skad ces smraso// tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo sdug bsngal mi bzang
355a7(rgyud): drag ga tsha ba'i tshor ba myong nas bdag la de bzhin gshegs pas ma dgong so zhes ci de skad smra 'am/ de skad ces smras pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos de dag la/ 'di skad ces smra so// tshe dang ldan pa
355a8(rgyud): bdagis lus la tshor ba dang ldan pa ni dper na/ sog les mgo bo gshegs pa ltar kun dga' bo la reg pa yang de dang 'dra'o// kun dga' bo ma 'jigs shig/ bdag cag gis khyod khro'i steng du bzhag
355b1(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa'i drung du bku// bcom ldan 'das de khyod la yongasu skyob pa mdzad par 'gyur// de nas me dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dang / tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen pos tshe dang ldan pa kun
355b2(rgyud): dga' bo nyal khri'i steng du bzhag nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba derang song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi drung du bzha'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ 
355b3(rgyud): kun dga' bo khyod ci sdug bsngal mi bzad pa/ drag pa/ tsha ba'i tshor bas thabs sam/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das de lta lag so// kun dga' bo khyod de'i phyid lags par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig da
355b4(rgyud): bshad/ kun dga' bo khyod la reg pa'i ro langs chen po stobs che ba/ gdul da/ 'a ga mthong na gnod pa bdun yod/ bdun gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ phreng ba 'dzin ces bya ba dang / dor bu 'dzin dang / 
355b5(rgyud): gtum po dang / gdol pa dang / rma bya'i snying dang / tshe zad dgal ba can te/ ro langs chen po bdun po de dag ni stobs che ba/ gdul dka' ba/ bsnyen par dka' ba/ rdzu 'phrul che ba mthu
355b6(rgyud): ba'o// kun dga'o ro langs re res kyang 'dod na rkang pa g.yon pa'i mthe bos ri'i rgyal po ri rab kyang 'phen to// ri'i rgyal po ring ba yungs 'bru tsam du rnam par 'jig// stang du bltas nas 'gas par
355b7(rgyud): bye // phyog su bltas na 'chi bar 'gyur// phyogs mtsham su bltas na mes sreg par byedado// de dag gis khyod la reg// de lta mod kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthu dang / chos thos pa'i gus pa dang / de bzhin
355b8(rgyud): ba'i byin gyis brlabs kyis da dang du khyod kyi lus 'tsho ba yino// bcom ldan 'das legs par bsal du gsol// phyir bzlog tu gsol// phyag rgya bcing du gsol/ skad pas bcing du gsol/ kun dka
356a1(rgyud): / bo de'i phyir legs par rag tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang bstan par bya'o// tad+ya thA/ ha ra/ mahA ge pa/ g+ha sa ra ba ti/ d+ha ra d+ha pid+ha ba ni/ tshong tsher Ni/ ka ro ti ti/ ka toHsa mA d+hi mi/ sams / 
356a2(rgyud): sar na ko ta ma ti/ sau ma b+ha be/ b+ha ba na/ nA ga re/ b+ha da ni sa d+ha nai ti swA hA/ kun dga' bo gzungs sngags kyi tshig 'di dag lan lnga bcu rtsa gnyis bzlas brjod byas te/ mdud pa lnga bcu rtsa gnyis bor na brjed
356a3(rgyud): byed thaMd dang / 'byung po thams cad kyi snying la gnod pa byas par 'gyuraro// gdon thams cad kyis byas pa las thar bar 'gyuraro// bcom ldan 'das leg so// de ltar mdzod cig/ slar yang mi 'chi ba
356a4(rgyud): mdzad gsol// kun dga' bo de'i phyir nyon la legs par yang zung shig/ tad+ya thA/ ba da tsa le ba le/ ma hA bad tsa le ba la/ b+hi li b+hi li/ ma hA b+h+r-i ri Ni/ ni mi ngi ni/ ha na hA na ta ti ri/ ma tsa thA/ ma bi tsa rdza
356a5(rgyud): sti ri s+thi mu le/ ma tha ni bam tha ne/ tsa la ni/ mA ka nI/ \u0f7f/ bI dA ni/ ba ya s+ya kra Ni/ b+ha ga pa ti/ ta thA ga ta/ bi tA the/ tag+ha d+hide/ bar bred/ ha tiSh+Tha/ nI la ba sin swah+ma/ kun
356a6(rgyud): dga' bo langs 'di dag ni 'chog pa sdang ga gtum por gyur pa/ gsod par gyur pa'o// de la rig sngags 'dis ke mu ru ka'i skud pa la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod byas te/ mdud pa nyi shu
356a7(rgyud): gcig por// de nas 'byung po chen po shin tu 'khrugs par 'gyur// 'dis thams cad kyang sdang bar ra'agyur/ 'dzem par 'gyur/ zhi bar 'gyur zhing / 'dis 'byung po thams cad kyang dbang
356a8(rgyud): 'gyur/ 'dis 'byung po tha~Md kyang rab tu zhi bar 'gyur// kun dga' bo nyon cig dang bstan par bya'o// tad+ya thA/ dar dang dang / kar kar kar/ ma hA kak+ka pa tsa ba tsa ra/ cad cod/ mahAtsa da tsang / ha la ha la / 
356b1(rgyud): hi li hi li/ hu lu hu lu/ hi ra bI ra/ hi ra~M ki ri/ bai re ba tsini ka ra na ka ri/ sar+b+ba b+hU tA nAH/ pra dze \u0f7f ni/ nI la ba ra sa ni/ tsan+d+ra/ tsakra ts+tshak+Sha/ A su d+he swAhA/ kun dga' bo 'dig ni gnod sbyin thaMd dang / srin po hra
356b2(rgyud): dang / gsang sngags thad dang / yi drags dang / byad dang / sdig pa rab tu zhibar byed pa'o// rgyal pos bkrabus pa dag la gi can pa phyir bzlog par byed// de la rig sngags 'di skud pa dmang po la lan sum
356b3(rgyud): cu rtsa bdun bzlas brjod byas te/ mdung pa sum cu rtsa bdun po ngan thams cad rengs par 'gyur// kun dga' bo gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag zung shig/ tshangs shig/ legs pa rab tu yid la zung shig/ 
356b4(rgyud): rdzasu skyong bar gyis shig/ da lta bas na kun dga' bo khyod kyis dran pa dang ldan pas gzung bar bya'o// tad+ya thA/ d+ha ra d+ha pa~M/ d+ha d+har/ kha ra khar mahA khar/ ma nA ba le/ ba lA nA sha ni/ gong Ta ni/ 
356b5(rgyud): kun tsa ni/ kuT Ta nI/ sa mahA dak+Sha T+Ta daMSh+Te ka khwa khA / kuT+Ta/ d+ha ra Ni/ mu lu kA// k+Sha Ni kA nA~M ko/ sa mo sma shA naM/ ki ni/ gi biH/ rtogs pa sA sA be taHma kumA
356b6(rgyud): ka kri ti swA si/ kin naM ba bud+d+ha saM/ ba~M bud+d+ha gri han b+ho/ kr-i ta b+hai ba ga/ bi kra ta b+hai ra ba/ ma hA ba yo/ kr-i tA na/ he ra saM/ kin ma mA ra ya si/ kin ni sarba de ga/ nA ga/ yak+Sha/ gan d+ha ba/ a su ra/ sarba a su
356b7(rgyud): sarba b+ha ya sha ma na/ ma ka sa ra swA hA/ kun dga' bo rig sngags 'di sbyin sreg ma/ skud pas bcings na 'dod pa'i mthar gtogs pa thad 'jigs par byed/ ltung bar byed/ za bar byed// kun dga'
356b8(rgyud): ro langs thad rangs ba byed pa'i rig sngags zung shig/ tad+ya thA/ sa me l-i/ ma hA ha ta la/ ha ra d+ha re/ g+hor d+ha pa/ d+ha rit+ti/ rit+ta/ bi rot+ti/ kur+Nat+ti/ ku ta ni/ saM ko tsa ni/ ka tsa rau/ kha tsa ri/ kha tsa ngaM/ ma raH/ 
357a1(rgyud): / tu tu a he \u0f7fma hA mA la d+ha pan yon ma ti swAhA// kun dga' bo gsang sngags kyi tshig 'dig dgod pa drag po dang mtshungs shing 'dra ste/ 'byung po thaMd rnam bdag shig pa'i phying ba
357a2(rgyud): gtsang ma'i skud pa la lan nyi shu rtsa bzhing bzlas brjod byas te/ mdud pa nyi shu rtsa bzhi po na log 'dram thad kyis mi tshugs par 'gyur/ kun dga' bogs sngags kyi tshig 'di dag zub gi
357a3(rgyud): legs par rab tu gzung bar gyis shig/ kun dga' bo gsang sngags 'di gang yang rung bas gzung bar mi nuso// kun dga'i bo de lta bas na legs par gzung bar gyis shig/ tad+ya thA/ 
357a4(rgyud): ma hA tsaH tsar/ tsi ri tsi bi/ bu ru bu ru/ mar+tha/ bu ru/ saM b+ha le/ mahA saM b+ha le/ ma hA ba le swA hA/ kun dga' bo lha dang bcas/ bdud dang bcas/ tshangs pa dang bcas/ dge sbyong dang bram ze dang / 
357a5(rgyud): skye dkur bcas pa'i 'jig rten na gang zhig gas sngags pa la mi spro ba ni ngas rje sum mthong ste/ srung ba dang / rjesu 'brung ba yin// gsang sngags 'di na mi zad ba ste/ sreg
357a6(rgyud): byang / 'tshed bar byed/ 'ching bar byed/ 'joms par byed/ 'bar bar byed pa yin te/ rig sngags lan drug cu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod byas te/ mdud pa drug cu rtsa gcig bong na sdig pa tham
357a7(rgyud): bud rab tu zhi bar byed dag sngags gcod par byed/ de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' beb 'di skad nas gsol to// bcom ldan 'das legaso// lags par gzung lags// 
357a8(rgyud): bzod drugasol// phyag rgya bzhag pa yo du gso/ kun dag ba de'i phyir/ tsa n+de/ b+ha b+her/  re/ b+ha ci bang brata pa t+ya ni/ kum ni ga'i/ yid ma da ti/ mangs pasu byas
357b1(rgyud): rig sngags bcad// dbang phyug chen pos byas pa'i rig sngags bcod// khyab 'jug gis byas pa'i rig sngags bcang / brgya byin gyis byas pa'i rig sngags bcad // rgyal po chen po bzhis
357b2(rgyud): byab pa'i rig sngags bcad// gnod sbyir gyi sde dpon gyis byas pa'i rig sngags bcang // zla ba dang nyi mas byas pa'i rig sngags bcad/ gza' dang nyi mas byas pa'i rig sngags bcang // gza' dang
357b3(rgyud): rgyu skar gyis byas pa'i rig sngags bca'o// phyogs nas byas pa'i rig sngags bca// phyogs mtshams nas byas pa'i rig sngags bcod// steng nas byas pa dang 'og nas byas pa'i rig snga
357b4(rgyud): btsang // lngas byas pa'i rig sngags bcang // klus byas pa'i rig sngags bcad// gnod sbyin gyis byas pa dang / nam mkha' lding gis byas pa'i rig sngags bcod// grul bum gyis byas
357b5(rgyud): dang / tshor ba pos byas pa dang / dag sbyong dang / bram ze dang / rgyal rigs dang / rje'u rigs dang / dmangs rigs dang / skyes pa/ bud med dang / gdol bas byas pa dang /  klod
357b6(rgyud): pas byas pa dang / seng ge dang / sbrul gyis byas pa dang / 'gro lding ba'i yid kyis byas pa dang / gsung pos byas pa dang / dongs la pas byas pa dang u dag ri khrod pas bas pa dang / sar zang rig
357b7(rgyud): sngags 'chang bas byas pa'i rig sngags bcad// tad+ya thA/ ga ga gA ra li phu ma hA ga gA ri la phu/ Shi she lu/ sha ba ra singad+d+ha phu/ tsat+pa la~M phu/ ma hA tsaN+Da li phu/ tsaM gi dro/ tsam de phu/ tsi tsi mi re lu
357b8(rgyud): tsakra d+ha pu/ kr-i bu/ kr-iSh+Te ru She phu/ tsaN+Da phu/ so ge phu/ bany+tsa pa lI phu/ bany+tsa le phu b+hi me phu/ b+hi pA pa le phu/ baM ga la phu/ piM ga la/ ak+She phu/ A many+dza pu/ sa man+te phu/ nA sha ni phuts+tshed
358a1(rgyud): / ni phu/ bis+yA ni bu swA hA/ kris mi wA ni mA ba ni/ khim nga ni/ bin d+h+ya nan/ bak+Sha Ni/ nA sha ni/ khAd d+yA ka nam gA la b+hin sha ni/ dA tA ma si/ b+has+sa/ dzAs+sa ni/ ma sa ni/ bar d+ha ni sA hA/ kus dga' cha
358a2(rgyud): sgyid kyi sde ngopom chen po bzhi bcu rtse gnyis po 'di dag ni mtshan mo gzi 'phrog par byeng ba'o// kun dga' bo nyi ma 'cher ba'i tsher langs chen po gnod byed ces bya ba zhig yod/ nga ston gyi dus kyi tshe
358a3(rgyud): ma'i 'od zer gyi rje su zhugs nas/ gang 'od zer de dag gis gang la reg pa 'od zar gyi dra bas reg nas rim su 'gyur te de yang bcang // kun dga' bo ro langs kha cig pa zhes pa pa zhig med/ 
358a4(rgyud): yang 'di nyid kyi nang du bsdu bar bya'o// klu'i rgyal pos 'dzin ces bya ba yang 'di nyid kyi nang du bsdu bar bya'o// klu thams cadang / gla 'bum thad dang / yi dwags dang / sha za thid kyang 'di nyid kyis
358a5(rgyud): du bsdus/ na mkha' lding yang 'di nyid kyi nang du bsdus/ nob dzin yang 'di nyid kyi nang du bsdus/ rlung lha yang 'di ci h+ya nang du bsdus/ sgyu ma len gyi bu bo ro la Di she rung dros
358a6(rgyud): 'di nyid kyi nang du bsdus/ phung po 'dzin dang / mdung thung 'dzin kyang de bzhin du bsdus/ de bzhin du blon po dang bcas pa dang / 'khor dang bcas pa yang 'di nyid kyi nang du bsdu sa// kun nas dpa'
358a7(rgyud): tshad brgya dag tu// nga yis chad pa dgu bas pas// nga la 'byung pos par ci yod// nga yis sdang ba thams cad bcom// gsod par gyur pa stobs po che// rongs dag gis byar ci yod// de dag kyang ni
358a8(rgyud): nga'i zhags pas// kun nas yongasu bskor ba yin// zhags pa kun gyis de dag kyang // rmugs shing shin tu rmongs par byas// 'di yi bdagis kun 'grub cing // gsang sngags tshig rnams grub gyu
358b1(rgyud): na maHsid d+ha nAn/ sid d+h+yan tu ma dA pA dA swa stir ma sarba sa twAnany+tsa swAhA/ sangs rgyas kun gyis stobs gang dang / dgra bcom rnams kyi stobs gang dang // dam pa'i chos kyi gzi brjid kyis// bde legasum
358b2(rgyud): rab gyur cig 'phags pa sangs rgyas kyis gzi yis// rtag tu 'jigs pa zad la swA hA// cho ga ni lan drug cu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod byas te/ ke ma ru dang bal gtsang ma la sogs pa'i skud pa ma
358b3(rgyud): bo la mdub pa bod// de bzhin du bya ba yang byed/ 'byung po thams cad dang / brjed bang ngag/ sems rnam par gau yeng byed la sogs pa dang / dug byin pa dang / dug byas pa dang / rkang gnyis pa dang
358b4(rgyud): bzhi pa rnams la kun tu 'gro ba grub pa'i mchog yi no// bcom ldan 'das kyis da skad ces bka' stsal nas/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas
358b5(rgyud): pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsung pa la mngon par bstongo // 'phags pa rolas bdun pa na sa bya ba'i gzungs rdzog so// rgya gar gyi mkhan po
358b6(rgyud): shud+d+ha sa~M ha dang / ban d+ha ya shes snying po'i sngas bsgrub rgya gar kyi mkhan po bid+yA ka ra siM ha dang / zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba bar d+he ye shes sdes zhus te gtan la phab pa// rgya gar skad/ Ar+ya b+ha draka
358b7(rgyud): dA tran ma su tra/ bod skad/ 'phags pa mtshan mo bzang po zhes bya ba'i mdo// sangs rgyas dang / byang chub seda' thams cad la phyag 'tshalo// 'di skad bdagis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom
358b8(rgyud): ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na/ 'od ma'i tshal ba ka lan da ka gnas pa na bzhugs te/ de'i tshe dge slong zhig rgyal po'i khab kyi chu tal po ta'i 'gram na 'du'o// de nas lha kha dag bzang po mchog
359a1(rgyud): // dang ldan pa zhig/ nam sros nas dge slong de dag la ba la der song ste phyin nas/ chu tal po tha 'gram thams cad snang bar byas te/ dge slong de la 'di skad ces smraso// dge slong khyod kyis
359a2(rgyud): mtshan mo bzang po'i mdo sde shes ma/ des 'di skad ces smraso// lha bdag gis ni mtshan mo bzang po'i mdo sde ma 'tshal na/ lha khyod kyis mtshan mo bzang po'i mdo sde mkhan tam/ mi mkhyen/ des
359a3(rgyud): 'di skad ces smraso// dge slong bdagis kyang mtshan mo bzang po'i mdo sde mi she so// lha 'o na mtshan mo bzang po'i mdo sde 'tshal ba de lta bu su mchis/ nges 'di skad ces smoso// rgyal po'i khab kyi'o/ 
359a4(rgyud): ma'i tshal to ka lan dka gnas pa 'di na/ bcom ldan 'das pa zhugs kyis// khyod bcom ldan 'das kyi thadu song la zhus te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de khyod la lung bstan pa de bzhin du chu
359a5(rgyud): la/ brtson par gyis shig ces smras nas/ lha de de nyid da mi snang bar gyur to// de nas dge slong de nang par langs nas/ btso ma ldan 'das ga la ba der song snga phyin nas/ bcom ldan
359a6(rgyud): 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug// phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/ dge slong des bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa ma dang dgung rmongs nas
359a7(rgyud): bdag gi deng lha kha dog dang ldan pa zhig bdag ga la ba dang mchis te/ chab tal po ti'i 'grom thed snang ba rgya chen pos khyab par bgyis nas/ bdag la 'di skad ces mchi'o// dge slong khyod kyi
359a8(rgyud): mtshan mo bzang po'i mdo sde shes sam/ bdags de la 'di skad ces bgyi so// lha ba gis ni mtshan mo bzang po'i mdo sde ma 'tshal na/ lha khyed kyis mtshan mo bzang po'i mdo sde mkhyen tam/ mi/ 
359b1(rgyud): mkhyen de dag la 'di skad ces mchi'o// dge slong bdagis kyab mtshan mo bzang po'i mdom she so// lha'o na mtshan mo bzang po'i mdo 'chal ba deng lha su mchis/ da 'di skad ces mchi'o// dge slong rgyal
359b2(rgyud): khab kyi 'od ma'i tshal bA ka lan da ka gnas pa 'di na/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zadu song la zhus te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de khyod la ji ltar lung bstan pa de bzhin du/ 'di bzung la brtson par gyis
359b3(rgyud): shig ces smras nas/ lha de nyid du mi mda' bang gyur to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das de'i sla du bdag 'di yongasu zhu'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong khyod kyis lha de shes sam/ dge
359b4(rgyud): slong des gsol pa/ btsun pa bdags lha de ma mtshal to// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lha'i bu don sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams kyi ded dpon de tsan+da zhes bya'o// dge slong
359b5(rgyud): gsol pa/ btsun pa bdag kyang mtshan mo bzang po'i mdo ldaHsa par 'tshalo// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal gang/ slong khyod de'i phyir legs pa nyon la yid la gyis shis
359b6(rgyud): dang / ngas khyod la bshad par bya'o// dge slong chos gsum dang ldan na// dge slong mtshan mo bzang po'i mdo sde la gnas pa zhes pa'o// gsum gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ 'das pa la rdza su phrad bang mi byedapa
359b7(rgyud): ma 'ongs pa la re ba med pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i chos rnams kyis mi 'phrogs par gnas pa'i chos can te/ chos gsum po de dag dang ldan na// dge slong mtshan mo bzang po'i mdo sde la gnas pa zhes
359b8(rgyud): bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal te/ bde bar gshegs pas de skad ces gsungs nas/ ston pa gzhan yang 'di skad gsung// 'das la rdza su phrad mi ba/ ma 'ongs pa la reb me
360a1(rgyud): / 'das pa gang yin de 'gag ste// ma 'ongs de ni ma phyin pa'o// gang dag nga ltar byung ba'i chos// de dang de la rab bltas na/ rnam par rtog pas mi 'phrogs par// de dag mkhas pas khong du na
360a2(rgyud): sa tsam shi 'am su shes kyis// de ring nyid brtun te bya// 'chi bdag sde chen de dang ni// bdag tu shes pa ma yino// san kun dang srog chags kun/ 'byung po kun dang thams cad kyang // bde ba 'ba' zhi
360a3(rgyud): grub 'gyur te// thaMd nyon mongs med par shog/ thams cad bzang po mthong 'gyur te// gang dag sdig par ma gyur cig/ de ltar gnas shing rab brtson la// nyin mtshan snyoms las med pas na// de phyir
360a4(rgyud): mtshan mo bzang po yi// mdo sde thub pas rtag tu gsungs// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis san thams cad rje su bzung ba'i phyir/ mtshan mo bzang po'i mdo sde 'di bshad nas/ 'gro lding ba'i
360a5(rgyud): sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag gsung so// tad+ya thA/ bin bi ni/ bi ni pU ra ni/ bud+d+ha man+tat+te/ bA ni ni/ mA ni ni/ mAn na/ Ni/ Ti Ti Ti Ti bI ra Ti/ gau hi/ gan d+ha ri/ tsaN+Da li/ ma tig/ khyuH
360a6(rgyud): si/ b+ha ma ni/ drA baM Di/ dri ma Di/ sha ba ri/ sa ra lA d+hi/ ti na ma d+ha mo pa ni/ mai to li/ ral ba ni da la pa ti/ nga la bat+te/  d+hA da li ni/ tsa li ni/ muSh+Te/ tsakra ba ti/ ma hAtsakra ba ti/ sha ba ri sha ba ri/ mahA
360a7(rgyud): ba pr-ib+d+har+NaM gair+thiSh+Ta rtsig ni/ ni mi ni mi ga ni/ ni mi d+hi ri/ b+hU ta ni swA hA/ tad+ya thA/ e Tu Tu Du Du/ na Tu mir+t+ti/ kir+t+ti/ i ku/ si ta ta ri/ tsa la lu/ rnir+d+ha/ nirmal+lu/ galgu/ a ba tron ne/ she kuM/ ni tha pad sa
360a8(rgyud): le/ tang ke/ ti / ta rod/ nong+ka/ ti la la lu/ b+hu ta pa ti yA/ ba ti yai/ ye sA hA// tad+ya thA/ a ra ga d+he/ bA su ka pA yI ya/ ka po ta ka pA li ye/ ta po d+ha Ne swA hA/ dge slong rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi
360b1(rgyud): bu mo gang la la zhig gis/ son thams cad rje su gzung ba'i phyir/ mtshan mo bzang po'i don dang / tshig dang / tshig su bcad pa dang / 'gro lding ba'i gsang sngags gzhi 'chang ngam/ 'dzin tam/ klogs/ 
360b2(rgyud): yid la byed ngam/ kun chub par byed dam/ gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par ston na/ de'i lus la mes mi tshugs par 'gyur/ dug gis ma yin// mtshon gyis ma yin/ nus ma yin// rgyal
360b3(rgyud): bo'i chad pas ma sem rkun po'i chad pas ma yin/ dus ma yin par 'chi ba'i dus byed par yang mi 'gyur zhing / ngas par mya ngan las 'das par yang nye bar 'gro bar 'gyur// gang dang ga'adu
360b4(rgyud): skyes par yang // mtshan mi bzang po'i mdo klags na// skye ba dran dang dgra bcom dang / dbang phyug du yang nges par 'gyur// lan gcig gis ni gnas kun tu/ dus min
360b5(rgyud): dang bar mdor// bdagis bdag la mi sbyong ba/ dus min 'chi dang chos ma yin// sems can tha~Mng srung zhing sel/ nad dang mya ngan 'jigs skye dang // rmi lam mi shes mya ngan du/ 
360b6(rgyud): brjod na dpal du byed par 'gyur// gang gis bris te skyes pa dang // bung mang lus la btags na ni// skal ba bzang dang gzi brjid dang / de yi dpal yang skye bar 'gyur// lus dang ngag dang yid kyis/ 
360b7(rgyud): mi dge cung zad ga byas pa// de dag thams cad bzang po'i mdos// dus ma yin ltas 'chi las skyob// rgyal po chu dang me dang glog/ chom po nang dang dragra dag dang // g.yul sprong pa dang 'thab par yang / 
360b8(rgyud): bzang po dran na sgrub par byed// rig pa bzang po 'di dang ni// gsang sngags 'di dag rtag brjod na/ mau dag mi zhum gnas kun tu/ de bas 'dir yid kyis brjod/ 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / nga ltar byung
361a1(rgyud): // de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la phag 'tsha'o// phyag 'tshal nas rig sngags 'di dag brjod par bste/ rig sngags 'dis bdag 'bo
361a2(rgyud): bar gyur cig/ tad+ya thA/ ni mi ni min d+ha me/ ti mo ti mi gi li/ te lo ka ni/ a lo ki ni/ tri shU la d+hi r-i Ni/ a ku pi tsi/ kr-i mi kri ti/ ko lo ko li/ kut+to kuN+Do/ kut+to/ ku si/ kI ti/ ku pu ti/ bdag dang son thams ca
361a3(rgyud): lag na rdo rje dang lhan cig tu 'jigs pa thams cadang / nad thaMd dang / dug thams ca dang / rims thams ca dang / gnod pa thad dang / gdug pas zin pa thams ca dang / chom rkun thams cad dang / mi dang mi ma
361a4(rgyud): yin pa thams cad dang / 'jigs pa dang / gnod pa dang / nad 'gro ba tha dang / 'thab pa dang / rnyog pa dang / sdig pa dang / rtsod ba dang / 'gyeng ba dang / tshang 'brub thams cadang / lus dang / ngag
361a5(rgyud): dang / yid kyis ngan par spyad pa thaMd dang / thams cad du' jigs pa thams cad las bsrungs shig bsrungs shig/ d+ya thA/ hi li mi li/ tsi li/ e li/ mi li/ pi shA tsi ni/ ba
361a6(rgyud): ba ri/ tsi li tsi li swA hA// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag dang / tha dang ldan pa'i 'khor dang / lha dang mi dang / lha ma yin dang / na mkha' lding dang / dri za dang / mi
361a7(rgyud): 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / yi dwags dang / sha za dang / bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod// 
361a8(rgyud): 'phags pa mtshan mo bza' bo zhes bya ba'i mdo rdzogaso// rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang / dAn shI la dang / zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba bin d+he ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te/ skad gas cha
361b1(rgyud): kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa// rgya ga skad/ Ar+ya o dza pra t+ya ha ra Ni sU tra/ bod skad/ 'phags pa mdangs phyir 'phrog pa zhes bya ba'i mdo// sangs rgyas dang / byang chub se der thams
361b2(rgyud): cad la phyag 'tsha'o// 'di skad bdagis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na bzhugs te/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dag
361b3(rgyud): bo khod kyis mang pu phyir 'phrog pa'i rig sngags zung shig/ chongs shig/ lhogs shig/ kun chub par gyis shig/ kun dga' bo gang la la zhig mdangs phyir 'phrog pa'i rig sngags 'chang ma/ sto
361b4(rgyud): ma/ klog ma/ kun chub bar byed na/ de'i mdangs phyir mi 'a phrogs shing / 'phrogs par mi 'gyur// phrogs na yang phyir yang dag par gnas par 'gyur// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de
361b5(rgyud): tshe gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag bka' stsal to// tA/ thA/ pi la pri le me/ paM lu me ge/ pr-i lu ma ti bal gu tiM/ sA ra ba ti/ k+Shi ra ba ti/ ku ru mA ti/ u ta ba la ni/ gau ri gan d+ha ri/ 
361b6(rgyud): tsi bi/ tsaN+Da li sUr sgrub re/ in+d+ra mA li ni/ dz+wa li ni/ so bko tri k+kha Sha De/ sA ga re ma hA sA ga ra/ bu ru tsi pu tsu rus mno// de ba gad da pe/ hu lu hu lu swA hA// rig sngags 'di bka' stsal pa na/ stong

361b8(rgyud): kyang / kye ma'o sdug bsnga'o// kye ma'o nyam thag go zhes du zhing skad chen po/ sgra chen po 'byin cing 'khong // bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
362a1(rgyud): // shAkya thub pa ngas/ bden pa dang / bden pa'i tshig gang gis// mngangs phyir 'phrog pa'i rig sngags 'di gsungs pa'i bden pa dang bden pa'i tshig des ngas bsrung bar bya'o// de legs
362a2(rgyud): 'gyur ba'i bar du bya'o// de'i mdangs dbrog par bya'o// pir dbrog par bya'o// nye bar bsgrub par bya'o// gnod sbyin gyis zin ma/ mi dang mi ma yin pas zin na ni/ dus de dang / tshed de dang / yung tsam de la
362a3(rgyud): mngangs 'phro'o// phyir drabrog// rnam par 'jog// gal te 'phrog cing por 'phrog par mi bang / gnas na 'dag bzhin du rnam par mi 'jig cing yang 'jog par 'dod dam/ 'phrog par 'dod par gyur na/

362a5(rgyud): nas/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo yi rangs te/ bcom lnga na 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bsto // 'phags pa mdangs phyir 'phrog pa zhes bya ba'i mdo rdzog so// 
362a6(rgyud): / rgya gar skadad/ Ar+ya tsAkra bi sho d+ha ni nA ma bid+ya/ bod skad/ 'phags pa mig rnam par sbyong ba zhes bya ba'i rig sngags/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sada' thams cad la phyag 'tshalo// 'di skad
362a7(rgyud): bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya'i grong rdal bzang po zhig ma shAkya rnams kyi nang na bzhugs te/ de'i tshe sta du so zhes bya ba na/ shAkya bde ba zhes bya ba sangs rgyas la
362a8(rgyud): mngon par dad pa dang / chos dang dge 'dun la mngon par dang ba dang / sangs rgyas la skyabasu song // chos la skyabasu song / dge 'dun la skyabasu song / sangs rgyas la gcig tu phyogs// chos lag/ 
362b1(rgyud): tu phyogs dag 'dun la gcig tu bogs// sangs rgyas la nem nur med cing the tshom med/ chos dang dge 'dun dang / sdug bsngal dang / kun 'byung ba dang / 'gog pa dang / lam la nem nung med cing
362b2(rgyud): thotshom meng la bdo pa'i 'bras bu baT pa mngan pa rdzogs par gyur ba/ mtshon dang byig babor bzhig gnas pa'i 'amig la snang ba dang / mi snang ba'i gzug ba rnams mi snang bar rgyangasaste/ 
362b3(rgyud): ngas rgyas bcom ldan 'das la dang ba skyes te/ ming labyud cing yang nga rgyas bcom ldan das la phyag 'tsha'o/ ngas rgya bcom ldan 'das snga 'amadzang ga smran ma 'jim pa gsal ba 'dzin
362b4(rgyud): la phyag 'tsha'o// bde bar gshegs pa thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa gsal bar mdza du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gi mig rnam par spyang du gsol zhes bya ba dang / bcom ldan 'das rgya'i
362b5(rgyud): gnas pa la bzhugs pa/ lha'i sil snyan rnam par dag pa/ mi las 'das pas/ shAkya bang bas tshig de skad ces brjod pa gsan to// gsan nas kyang ting 'dzin de las gzhas
362b6(rgyud): te/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun da ga' bo khong song la mig rnam par sbyong ba'i rig sngags 'dis/ shAkya bde ba la srung ba gyis shig/ yongasu bzung ba dang / yongasu
362b7(rgyud): bskang ba dang / zhi ba dang / bde lagasu 'gyur ba dang / chang pa spang ba dang / mtshon ma spang ba dang / dug gzhol ba dang / dug gsad pa dang / mtshams bcad pa dang / sa bcing bar gyis shig dang de bzhin du
362b8(rgyud): 'khor bzhi po dge slong rnams dang / dge slong ma rnams dang / ngag bsnyen rnams dang / dge bsnyen pa rnams dang / sems can gzhan gyi mig kyang rnam par sbyongs shig/ mig sbubs rnam par stongs shig/ 
363a1(rgyud): / tad+ya thA/ hi li mi li/ ki li mi li/ hi li te/ hu yA tu sA hu yA ma ni/ hu lu hu lu hu lu hu du tu du hu du/ tsUk+Shar mu ba bi sho d+ha ya swAhA/ kun dga' bo rig sngags kyi rgyal po mig rnam par
363a2(rgyud): sbyong ba 'di ni/ mig gi skyon dang / rlung gi skyon dang / 'khris pa'i skyon dang / bang kan gyi skyon dang / 'dus pa las gyur pa'i skyon sal te/ tshul khrims kyi bden pa dang / brtul zhugs kyi bden pa dang / 
363a3(rgyud): drang srong rnams kyi bden pa dang / rten cing 'bral bar 'byung ba'i bden pa dang / sdug bsngal gyi bden pa dang / kun 'byung ba'i bden pa dang / 'gog pa'i bden pa dang / lam gyi bden pa dang / dgra bcu

363b1(rgyud): las gyung pa rnams sam/ ro langs dang bad las gyur pa rnams ma/ kun tu rgyu las gyur pa rnams ma kun tu rgyu dang ro langs las gyur pa rnams kyis tshugs par 'gyur ba ni/ lha dang bcas par
363b2(rgyud): bdud dang bcas pa dang / tshangs pa dang bcas pa dang / dge sbyong dang bram zer bcas pa dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i skra dga'i 'jig rten nangs ma mthong ste/ da ni gnas mamedo// 
363b3(rgyud): tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bros bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan te/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin no zhes gsol nas/ gsang sngags kyi gzhi rnams bzung ste/ kun chub par byas nas/ shAkya bde
363b4(rgyud): bag la ba dang song ste/ bde ba mig rnam par sbyong ba'i ga sang sngags gzhi 'di dag de bzhin gshegs pa khyod la bskar gyis nyin ra zhing dus gsum du dran par gyis shig/

363b6(rgyud): skad ces bka' stsal nas/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang / shAkya bde ba dang / lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bsto //

364a1(rgyud): te/ de nas gnod spyir gyi sde dpon chen po nag po// bcom ldan 'das ga la ba dang song sde phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i
364a2(rgyud): khab kyi grong khyer chen po 'dir / mog nang byung na de dag la ji ltar sgrub par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ga/ nag po mi gnad kyi sngags kyi tshig 'di dag yod/ tad+ya thA/ ru d+hi re phu
364a3(rgyud): d+hi ra ak+ShaM pr-i ru d+ha raM paM ga la phu/ khA te phuHpa nye le phuHhan te phu/ mA sa dud+d+ha b+hi pu/ pad+ma a k+Shi phu/ pad ma daN+Da hi pa Ni ya phuHswA hA// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal/

366a1(rgyud): / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa ste/ 'di la sangs rgyas ni sems can thams cad kyi mchog// 'dod chags dang bral

366a5(rgyud): 'od dpag med la phyag 'tshal lo// tad+ya thA/ oM gyimaHme le/ ha ne su 'an/ chege mo zhig d+ha ban d+ha ma/ e gti kan hrIHkau mad+ha \u0f7f kan/ sIt+ya dz+nyA na swA hA/ chog ni 'di bris te mgul du/ 
366a6(rgyud): na rims nad med par byedado// rims nad zhi ba'i gzungs rdzogs so// rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya dzA pra sha ma ni nA ma d+ha rA NI bod skad du/ 'phags pa rims nad rab tu zhi bar byed pa ces bya ba'i gzungs/ 
366a7(rgyud): sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshalo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab dur khrod chen po bsil ba'i tshal na bzhugs/ 
366a8(rgyud): de nas dge slong zhig bcom ldan 'das ga la ba derang song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/ dge slong de/ 
366b1(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das 'di na sems can rims nad kyis rnam padag tses pa rnams mchis na/ bcom ldan 'das de dag srung du gsol/ 
366b2(rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo phyogs 'di na me lha'i phreng ba zhes bya ba'i rims gnas te/ de sems can rnams la nyin
366b3(rgyud): cig pa dang / nyin gnyis pa dang / nyin gsum pa dang / nyin bzhi pa'i tshul gyis rnam par gtse bar byed de/ de srung ba'i gsang sngags kyi gzhi ni 'di dag yin no// tad+ya thA/ dzA
366b4(rgyud): la ni dz+wa la ni/ pra dz+wa la ni pra ti pa ni pra ma sha ma ni bdag gi rims nad song shig/ ma 'dug cig swA hA/ bden pa dang / bden pa'i tshig gang gis 'jig rteman sa
366b5(rgyud): rgyas bla na med pa dang / 'jig rten na chos dang / da 'dun bla na med pa'i bden pa dang / dben pa'i tshig nges bdag gi rims nang song shig ma 'dug cig
366b6(rgyud): swA hAka/ sing d+hi man+ta ba dag tu bid+yA tan tu ma a nu mot+ta swA hA/ skud pa nag po la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas te/ mdud pa nyi shu rtsa gcig dong ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis dra
366b7(rgyud): skad ces bka' stsal nas// dge slong de dag yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// 'phags pa rims nang rab tu zhi bar byed pa'i gzungs
366b8(rgyud): rdzogs so// dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo// te b+ha ga ban many+dzu shri ku mA rA sarba ta thA ga ta ba la/ bI d+hi dz+nyA/ sarba ta thA ga tA nAn/ nA ge sti tiSh+Tha sarba sa twa nAn sA hA/
